112b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon gtor ma kun/ /spyi gzhud dag gis byin brlabs nas/ /rang rang gnas su dbul bar bya/ /de rjes nad pa mdun byas te/ /'brang rgyas phyed la mar byugs te/ /dpal phred lnga yi phod gzugs bya/ /mar me la tams la 'chi bdag dang/ /
112b5(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs dag tu dor bar bya/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i nang/ /tshon skud nad pa la bkris te/ /snying po'i sngags kyis mtshon gyis ni/ /bcad la byang gi phyogs su dor/ /de nas slob dpon khrus byas la/ /stan bzang dag la nyer 'dug ste/ /
112b6(rgyud 'grel): thum pa rim pas dbang bskur bya/ /oM bai ro tsa na A yurdza na sid+d+hi sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dbus kyi gtso bo'i dbang bskur bas/ /sdig sgrib dag te tshe 'phel bsam/ /lus la rnam snang tshe dbang bskur/ /bu khyod 'chi bdag las grol te/ /bskal
112b7(rgyud 'grel): pa stong du tshe 'phel te/ /srog gcod sdig pa dag gyur cig/ ces bya yang na gzungs kyis ni/ /pa? phyin drug gi tshig bcad brjod/ /shar la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /rdo rje la sogs ming bsgyur te/ /bum pa lnga yis dbang bskur bya//
113a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi bum pa kun gyi chu/ /las bum nang du bsdu bya ste/ /nad pha la sogs bkru bar bya/ /de nas chu de ma bo bar/ /chu bo che 'am lteng ka mtsho/ /chu chen rnams la dor gyur na/ /nges par 'chi las bzlog pa yin/ /
113a2(rgyud 'grel): de rjes slob ma'i bla ma la/ /yon dbul sdom pa las blangs te/ /bla mas slob ma'i spyi bor ni/ /rdo rje des gzung tshig 'di brjod/ /nga ni ye shes tshe dpag med/ /kun tu brnyas pa spang bar gyis/ /'chi bdag chen po ngas bcom pas//
113a3(rgyud 'grel): pu khyod che yi dngos grub brnyes/ /de skad bya ste slob ma ni/ /tha mal lus su bsams pa la/ /snying gi pad+ma'i rtsa ba la/ /dbu mar rnam snang tshe dpag med/ /phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi bsam bya ste/ /spyi bor ye shes tshe dpag med/ /
113a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams pas bdag gi thugs ka nas/ /bskul bas bdud rtsi chu rgyun dbab/ /rigs lnga spyi bor slob gyur te/ /thams cad bdud rtsir zhu gyur nas/ /lus nad thams cad khyab par bsam/ /tshe dpag med pa'i gzungs kyang 'dzin//
113a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum bya/ /de nas mchod dang gshegs par bya/ /mjug tu tsha tsha cung zad gdab/ /sa tshon la sogs chur bor te/ /nye bar 'khor bas 'chi bdag gzhom/ /tshe dpag med pa'i gzungs kyang 'don/ /slob
113a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas/ bram ze nam mkha' dbyangs kyi bu'i ched du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI many+dzu dang lo tsa ba lce dga' ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
113a7(rgyud 'grel): ('jam dpal rdo rje shes rab blo 'phel gyis sgrub thabs 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu sh+rI badzra pradz+nyA bard+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel zhes bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab 'phel bar 'dod pas gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' bar gtsang ba dri zhim po'i chus chag chag btab la/ /maN+Dal khru gang pa zhig byas te/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ser po dbus
113b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar por byas la/ /de'i steng du lhung bzed du shes rab 'phel bar byed pa'i rdzas/ /dbang po lag na/ gla rtsi gi waM spang rgyan dkar po/ tsan dan dkar po rnams/ ba dmar mo'i 'o mas sprus te/ ril lu sran ma tsam bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'jam
113b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang dbyangs can ma gnyis zhal sbyor gyi tsa ka li gcig bzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas oM swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+honyahaM gi sngags kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i ngang las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma
113b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa zhig bsam/ de'i steng du oM las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du d+hi(rgyud 'grel): ser po gur gum gyi mdog can zhig bsam/ /de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas na shes rab kyi ral
113b5(rgyud 'grel): gri g.yon na shes rab kyi po ti bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /mdun gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ /dbyangs
113b6(rgyud 'grel): can ma dkar mo g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na po ti bsnams pa/ /rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pa zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa dag bsgom bar bya'o/ /de nas sa bon gnyis las 'od 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas/ /ye shes sems
113b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' spyan drangs nas so sor bstim mo/ /yang na 'od zer 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab dang mthu dang nus pa thams cad bsdus nas rang dang rdzas la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ na mo
114a1(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI bA gI shwa ri muM/ bA gi sha ri ho/ /u pa de sha pra mo d+had+d+ha ba ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ sngags kyi 'od zer bdag gi zhal nas lha mo'i zhal du/ lha mo'i zhal nas bdag gi thugs kar thim par bsgom/ de las 'od zer
114a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs/ gti mug la sogs pa thams cad bsal bar bsgom/ 'jig rten drag byed kyi pradz+nyA thams cad bsdus bar bsgom/ /sman gyi ri lu dang bdag la
114a3(rgyud 'grel): thim pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad thob par bsgom mo /'di'i phan yon ni nyin gcig bsgrubs na nyin gcig tshigs su bcad pa stong zin bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gnyis sgrubs na bstan
114a4(rgyud 'grel): bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gsum pa sgrubs na skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bzhi yis sangs rgyas dang pradz+nyA mnyam par 'gyur/ /lnga yis ma bslabs pa'i chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /drug gis 'jam
114a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdun gyis gzhan gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i tshad zhag bdun du bya'o/ /rtags ni 'od dang sgra la sogs pa 'byung ngo/ /zhag brgyad na dkyil 'khor gyi lha rang dang ri lu la bstim ril bu de
114a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa pos zos pas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang shes rab mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /thun mong tshe'i dngos grub kyang 'thob ste/ /de ltar yang/ 'di zos yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /lo brkya thub pa brgyad brgyar 'gro/ dgu bcu lon
114a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu drug lta bur 'gyur/ /skra dkar bud nas nag por 'gyur/ /bang ni rta dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /skra ni me tog pad+ma 'dra/ /lus na dkar la sbom par 'gyur/ /nyams stobs lus zung 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lha 'dre rnams kyang stong
114b1(rgyud 'grel): grogs byed/ /yon tan smon 'jug sems dang ldan/ /sems skyed de dang ldan pa yi/ /skyes bu de ni dam pa yin/ /yon tan de dang ldan zhes smra/ /'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya ba kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //mnos nas su/ /bla ma de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ /ci snyed pa yi yon mchog tshul bzhin dbul/ /gzhung las 'byung ba'i sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /rig 'dzin gyis kyang de nas phyag 'tshal te/ /ci nus
114b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi mchad pa sna tshogs byos/ /spos chus sbyar ba'i me tog sna tshogs kyis/ /tshig sbyin de nas snying pos bzhes su gsol/ /de yi rtsa ba'i sngags ni 'dir bshad pa/ /rab tu gsang ba'i yi ge 'bru drug ste/ /bE gI shwa ra zhes pa'i thog ma la
114b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ste de yi tha mar mu gzhag go /snying po'i sngags ni bA gI shwa ra med/ /mtshogs ma'i de bzhin 'dir ni mu mu yin/ /spyi gtsug de bzhin snga ma'i oM med pa/ /aM aM yin te de yi mdza' mar mu/ /go cha 'bar pa oM aM de nas mu/ /swAhA
114b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu tha mar nges par ro/ /oM aM de nas mu ni rab 'bar ba/ /mtshon cha yin par sngags rig pa la bshad/ /'di ni don grub pa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /dgod pa'i cho ga sngon mthong bshad pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang dngos grub bsgrub
114b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /cho ga mchog 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /cho ga bzhin du thog mar sngags mnos nas/ /bsod nams skye bos bcags pa dge ba'i yul/ /mdangs dga' ri bor 'bab chu'i dogs dag tu/ /gnas nas de ru gtsang ma'i
114b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas byas te/ /sa phyogs de yi shar gyi ngos gcig tu/ /thog ma bye ma can gyis dag la/ /gzhi dang bcas pa'i rin chen stegs bu ni/ /rab tu mdzes pa khru gang tsam du bya/ /tshig sbyin pa la de ru mchod pa yang/ /cho ga shes pa'i
115a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags pbas rtag tu bya/ /de nas der ni ji skad bsha pa yi/ /bzlas pa 'am mchod pa zin ma thag tu bya/ /sngags kyi cho ga da ldan pa'i khrus dag bya/ /bsgrub pa'i cho ga shes pas rtag tu bya/ /de la tshig sbyin snying
115a2(rgyud 'grel): pos drug pa ru/ /bye ma can gyis dag blang bar bya/ /de ni mtshogs mas de bzhin kun tu spyang/ /de la sngags bas spyi gtsug bzlas nas su/ /de yi go chas de nas sa de la/ /cha gsum dag tu rnam par dbye bar bya/ /de nas
115a3(rgyud 'grel): sa de'i cha gcig blangs nas su/ /sngags pas phyogs kun tu ni gtor bar bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa cha gcig chu der gtor/ /cha cig gis ni lus dad yan lag bsdu/ /tshig sbyin gyis ni 'bru drug gang gsungs ba/ /de
115a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas su chu der 'jug par bya/ /skal ba bzang po rab tu dri zhim pas/ /mdangs dga' i chu la tshul bzhin khrus kyang bya/ /de ltar sngags pas tshul bzhin byas bas na/ /gtsang zhing nang gi yid kyang dag pa des/ /thog mar
115a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /sngags rnams kyis ni rnam par dgod bya ba/ /lus la yan lag dgod pa'i rim pas so/ /de ltar lus ni rung bar byas nas su/ /'jam mgon tshig sbyin de ni bdag yin zhes/ /
115a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po yin par de ltar byas nas ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa zla gsum byas ba yis/ /de 'dir tshig gi dbang por grub par 'gyur/ /yang dag bkod pa dang por byung na ni/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu'i thams cad rig pa
115a7(rgyud 'grel): 'thob/ /de yi snying po'i sngags ni rab 'bar ba/ /sngags pas bdag gi snying khar gzhag nas su/ /de nas mtshogs ma'i sngags kyang mtshogs ma ste/ /bdag blos spyi gtsug de bzhin spyi gtsug tu/ /tsheg sbyin
115b1(rgyud 'grel): go cha mchog ni lus la ste/ /lag pa gnyis dang mig tu mtshon cha'i sngags/ /cho ga bzhin du de ltar 'du byas nas/ /de ni tshig gi dbang por 'di 'gyur ro/ /de ni yid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags zlos shing/ /sngags mkhan bdag gi gnas su 'gro
115b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /sod nas de bzhin stegs bu dang bcas par/ /yid kyis mtshon cha'i sngags kyis brtsal bar bya/ /yang na yungs kar ram ni me tog gi thal? mo lan gsum brdabs bas khor yug tu/ /phyogs mtshams dag ni rnam pa gsar
115b3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /blo ldan stan cig 'dug bas nan tan du/ /mchod ba ji skad bshad pa legs par bya/ /mchod ba byas nas mdun du de 'dug ste/ /sngags kyi nor bu mtshon chas blangs pa ni/ /gcang zhing dge bas tshul bzhin bzlas par bya/ /
115b4(rgyud 'grel): de ni yid la yi ge gcig pu sems/ /sgra la sogs pa phyi rol yul dang bral/ /skyon med sems kyis chog bzhin du/ /de bzhin grangs kyang yid la bzung nas su/ /de yang de la yid kyis dbul bar bya/ /de nas bzlas bas skyo bar gyur
115b5(rgyud 'grel): na yang/ /mchod rten dag la sogs pa'i las gsungs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams de nas bya/ /mchod rten zin pa'i 'og tuAng mchod pa dag /sdig pa byed pa mthong ba'i phyir bya'o/ /de ltar gang gis rang gi yi ge bzhin//
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bum grangs bzlas byas de yis de nas su/ /rang gi sbyang las dngos grub gang bstan pa/ /mdun na 'dug ste thos pas 'dzin pa'ang mthong/ /sngon du bsnyen pa tshig 'bum sngar byas pas/ /nang bar chu la bdun gsus bzlas btungs
115b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /da ni zla ba gcig gis glen ba yang/ /gdon mi za bar lan cig smra bas zin/ /rang bzo sna tshogs dag kyang legs par byed /gtsug lag don 'brel dga' ba dag kyang shes/ /sgra yi gtsug lag la sogs ma shes
116a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /rgol ba dag las skad cig las sangs rgyal/ /oM aM iM uM cig char phyogs rnams su/ /de nas bA gi shwa ras mtshams rnams su/ /rang gi sa bon mu ni dkyil du bzhag /'bar ba de ni mi shes med bar
116a2(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /'khor lo de ni rtsibs brgyad par bshad de/ /zla ltar dkar ba snying gar bsam pa ni/ /shes rab rnor 'gyur sa bon de dgu ste/ /zla 'od gsal ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'o/ /'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs kyang zhi ba ste/ /
116a3(rgyud 'grel): sa bon de dag nyid kyis gsal par byas/ /dkyil du oM dang rab tu 'bar ba'i mu/ /mi shes nyes pa ser phyir 'bar ba ste/ /ka la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams dang ldan/ /snying gar gzhag ba legs bar gang shes ba/ /sngags
116a4(rgyud 'grel): bas zla ba gcig gis ma lus shes/ /ji skad thos pa'ang lan cig dag gis 'dzin/ /nam mkha' de bzhin rtsibs na med par bshad/ /'khor lo de yang 'dir ni oM gzhan ste/ /de la snang byed sa bon gcig gzhag pa/ /mi shes
116a5(rgyud 'grel): med phyir rab tu 'bar ba'i mu/ /'khor lo 'di ni snying gar lags bsams na/ /zla ba gcig gis thos pa 'dzin par bshad/ /rab tu myur ba'i tshig kyang thams cad du/ /de nas sngags ba des ni rig par 'gyur/ /'khor lo
116a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil bzang snying gar bzhag pa ni/ /shel sgor bzhin du rab dkar bcu drug rtsibs/ /rang gi sa bon zla 'od 'dra dang bcas/ /dkyil du oM gzhan mu ran gnyis su phye/ /sa bon ma lus 'bar bas mu ran brgyan/ /'od 'phros
116a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'bar 'byung nyi ma 'dra/ /dri med shel gong 'dra ba'i oM dkyil gyi/ /dbus su mu mu rab tu 'bar ba gzhag mi shes mun pa bsal ba'i phyir 'di bshad de/ /mun pa'i nang na 'di ni mdun na 'bar/ /sgom pa'i tshe na
116b1(rgyud 'grel): lus la rab bltas na/ /thams cad shes bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de nas 'khor lo'i mu ran legs phye ba/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sa bon gcig bzhag pa'o/ /snying por bcas bar phyi rol mtshon char ldan/ /mtshon chas rtsibs rnams
116b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gsal bar byas/ /dkyil du bzhag pa'i sa bon sngon bshad ba/ /rin chen rtse mo me ltar shin tu 'bar/ /rab tu 'phro ba 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /thub pas bsgoms na nges par ma lus shes/ /bsam gtan dang ldan tshig ni rab tu
116b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /de yi lus kyang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /khams gsum dag gi don rnams ma lus ba/ /rang ni gnas pa des ni ci bzhin shes/ /de bzhin dpyad las 'bras bu khyad par can/ /bstan pa rnams kyang mkhas pas 'dir bshad
116b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /brtul zhugs dam pa ji skad bshad pa ni/ /gzhon nu brtul zhugs 'di ru gdon mi za /gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs 'dir ni gtsor bshad de/ /dngos grub thob phyir zla ba gcig tu'o/ /byis pa'i zur phung mdzes pa gsum dag dang/ /
116b5(rgyud 'grel): mgur gyi rgyan yang gser mchog dag gis brgyan/ /lus kyi yan lag ngo mtshar mdzes par byas/ /dpral bar mdzes pa'i mtshal ris gcig kyang bri/ /rgyan du 'os pa'i gdu bu bzang pos brgyan/ /gos kyang khro bo ma yang na dkar po
116b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ brtul zhugs 'di ni tshangs pa mchog sbyang bshad/ /zas su zho 'am 'bru mar tshigs ma bza' / /byis pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu mdzes par brgyan/ /thog mar bsrung ba tshul bzhin byas nas su/ /bu don gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi
116b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan snga ru/ /brtul zhugs spyad cing bzlas pa'ang der bya'o/ /sngags bas bu don de la mchod pa yang/ /grub ba thob phyir 'dir ni rtag tu bya/ /de bas bu don brtul zhugs sngon rol tu/ /bzo bo mkhas pas legs par bri ba ni/ /ras kyang khru 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): gang tshad du byas pa ste/ /sar la kha tsha ra dong rab tu bshad/ /kha dog gsal ba'i mtshon bzangs sbyin med pas/ /gzhon nu sku gzugs ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /dkar sham po la sha tshugs legs byas nas/ /pad+ma'i gdan
117a2(rgyud 'grel): la bde bar bzhugs par bya/ /zhal bzangs gzhon nu'i gzugs las ldem bag can/ /yan lag yongs rdzogs sku ni mchog tu mdzas/ /mdzas pa'i utpal g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /de yi phyag g.yas mchog ni sbyin par
117a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /rig 'dzin mang po rnams kyang mchod pa byed sku gzugs de yang ri yi phug na gnas/ /cho ga bzhin du legs par bris nas su/ /ji skad bshad pa'i mchod pa rab tu bya/ /'dir ni mchod pa'i yi ge 'bru drug gis/ snying
117a4(rgyud 'grel): pos spyan drangs gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i phyag rgyas bya ba ni/ /de la yon chab bdag ni dbul ba dang/ /spyan drangs pa dang gdan la bzhugs pa dang/ /gshegs su gsol ba'ang snying por bcas pas so//
117a5(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i phyag rgya tshul bzhin bcings nas su/ /las rnams bshad pa gzhan yang legs par bya/ /de ltar brtul zhugs spyad cing sngags bsgrubs pas/ /de nas sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs byas/ ral gri la sogs ji skad bshad
117a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi/ /'byor ba mchog gi lam rnams bsgrub par bya/ /brtul zhugs cho ga ji skad gsungs pa'i rnams/ /ma lus par ni bshad pa 'di yin no// //de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu yi/ /dpyad las
117a7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i dpyad ni bshad par bya/ /dkar mo ma yin pa las byung ba yi/ /ba yi 'o ma mtshan mo'i bsgrub pa ni/ /zla ba gzas zin pa la 'o ma de/ /zhor gyur na ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /de tshe 'thungs na 'dod pa'i gzugs 'gyur ba/ /
117b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu gzhon nu'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu nam mkha' la yang 'gro/ dngos grub can de grub pa rnams kyis bskor/ /ser skya las byung mar yang de bzhin du/ /dbul gyi snod du de ni bzhag nas su/ /zla ba gzas zin tshe ni lag pas
117b2(rgyud 'grel): dag po/ /rtse gcig yid kyis tshul bzhin bsgrub pa ni/ /mar de tshar gyur dbu ba byung gi bar/ /de nas mar de myur du 'thungs nas ni/ /thams cad shes 'gyur 'di ni gdon mi za/ /stobs kyang che ba rlung dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sngags pa
117b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid tshe ring 'gyur ba ni/ /lha yi lo stong bar du thub par 'gyur/ /lha yi byang gzugs lha yi dbyangs dang ldan/ /grub pa de ni skra gnag nad kyang med/ /'o thug dam pas lhung bzed bkang nas su/ /mar gyis blugs la sha kha ra dang sbyar//
117b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gzas zin nub mo lag pas dgab/ /rab tu bsgrubs na grub pa'i mtshan 'byung ba/ /lhung bzed 'o thug gis su bkang ba ste/ /lag pas mnan kyang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de nas lhung bzed 'o thug de 'thungs na/ /nam mkha' 'gro
117b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rig 'dzin rab tu g.yo/ /de 'thungs na ni dngos grub ma thob kyang/ /tshe zad pa yang nad med lo brgya thub/ /gtsug lag don rnams rang gis 'grel nus pa/ /gang zhig glen pa'ang 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /ral gri de bzhin utpal lo ma 'dra//

117b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri nges/ /rig 'dzin 'gyur ba g.yo zhing nam mkha' 'gro/ rig 'dzin rnams kyi thog mar 'gro ba ste/ /ral gri grub pas de ni stobs kyang che/ /gzugs mchog 'gyur ba gser gyi btso ma 'dra/ /skra yang rab tu 'khyil ba lcang lo
118a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /ldong ros dag kyang de bzhin me mdag 'dra/ /mar dang de bzhin 'o ma las btags nas/ /zla ba gzas zin tshe na sngar bsrungs la/ /dngul gyi snod du gzhag ste bsgrub par bya/ /ldong ros de las nam zhig grub pa na/ /rnam pa

122b3(rgyud 'grel): kha phye ba lta bu'i spyan dkyus ring ba/ dbu la gtsugs phud lnga 'phyang ba/ rin po che'i rgyan mang pos mdzad pa/ /bcu drug lon pa'i khye'u ltar gzhon sha dang bcas pa zla ba bye ba'i gzi brjid ltar 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sku bskyed de/ de'i
122b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar oM 'od zer gyi phung po can yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog shin tu dkar zhing 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dbus su aM yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dbyangs/ shar
122b5(rgyud 'grel): du ra yongs su gyur pa las dra ba can gyi 'ong/ /rgyab tu ba yongs su gyur pa las zla 'od/ g.yas sa tsam yongs su gyur pa las skra can ma/ g.yon du nam yongs su gyur pa las nye ba'i skra can ma'o/ /'di dag gi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni
122b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gyi 'phags pa bzhin no/ /sku phyi nang thams cad dri ma yongs su dag cing 'od zer 'phro bas ma rig pa'i rdzab bsal bar bsam/ /g.yo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /'khor lo de g.yo zhing 'khor bas rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo
122b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar rab tu 'khor bsam rig pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams gcod par byed do/ /ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ rigs lngas dbang skur te/ rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa ni gzhan dang mthun no/ /zla
123a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang 'khor lo dang lha'i sku dri ma yongs su dag pa 'ja' tshon lta bu la dmigs la/ /oM a ra pa tsa na d+hI(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /'di'i bsnyen pa'i tshad ni yi ge re re la 'bum tsho re re yin no/ /'grub pa'i dus
123a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang gus pa'i sgo nas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal g.yo ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag /kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bA gI shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ dag gi dbang phyug la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba'o/ /ye shes sgron mas rab brgyan cing/ /'jig rten gti mug mun sel ba/ /'jam
123a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyid kyi mdangs bzang tshogs kyis ni/ /zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon cing/ /rig pa rnam par gsal 'gyur ba/ /'jam dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma bsgos zur phud gsal ba la/ /nor bu 'bar
123a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku mnga' zhing/ /nyid ni kun tu 'bar ba'i sku/ /'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud rtsi dri zhim 'jam la zab/ /yid 'ong gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen mdzod/ /'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i chu thigs ltar grangs med/ /'jig rten khams kun ma lus pa/ /nyon mongs dri ma rab spangs pa'i/ /'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mche ba gtsigs shing bsgyings pa yi/ /'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni/ /gshin
123a7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /'jam dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba'i/ /utpal sngon po rab mdzes pa/ /lhung bzed phyag mchog bsnams pa yi/ /'jam dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
123b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /rgya cher bstod pa spyod pa dang/ /'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po/ /'jam dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
123b2(rgyud 'grel): Arya many+dzu sh+rI sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal gyi 'byung gnas 'jam dpal kun gyi dpal/ /mdza' dag byams pas khyab pas 'jam pa'i ngang/ /'jam
123b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dpal du grags pas don dang ldan/ /'jam dpal yang dag dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhon nu'i sku mdog gser mdangs 'od lam 'bar/ /rin chen mchog gis brgyan pas sa les pa/ /byin chen dang ba'i thugs mnga' 'dzum pa po//
123b4(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid mdzes dang ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yon tan gter gyi utpal phyag na bsnams/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs/ /lha yi cha lugs lha las khyad par 'phags/ /blta bas mi skyo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhon
123b5(rgyud 'grel): nu sgeg pa'i tshul du gda' mod kyi/ /ye shes thogs med mnga' bas kun mkhyen pas/ /sems can don la nan tan don du gnyer/ /'gro ba mdza' dag sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhon nu sprul pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad la/ /gang gis yud
123b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam mthong bas 'dun pa skye/ /gang la cis 'dul de ltar sprul mdzad pa/ /thabs kyis 'dren pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bsam rtogs spros la dben pas sangs rgyas brnyes/ /yod med rtag chad mdza' la mi gnas shing/ /gnyis
123b7(rgyud 'grel): med mnyam pas chos kyi tshul la gnas/ /yang dag don gyi mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te/ /yi ge smra bas rtog pa'i yul med kyang/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis cho 'phrul gzugs
124a1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa/ /dam pas mthong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshul bzhin ma yin yid la byed pa spangs/ /rig pas dgon par gyur pa'i thabs la dben/ /ye shes bdud rtsi char gyis brlan mdzad cing/ /byang chub myu gu
124a2(rgyud 'grel): skyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byams chen 'gran zla med pa dag gi dbang/ /mtshan mar spros pa'i rtsod pa tshar bcad de/ /zhi ba mi g.yo dbyings su 'dzud mdzad pa/ /'jig rten ded dpon mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /cang mkhyen chen po shes
124a3(rgyud 'grel): rab ral gri yis/ /lta ba dman pa bslang pa'i dra ba 'dral/ /bag yangs mi rtog dbyings su yun du bzhugs/ /skye dgu bde bar 'god la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te/ /gsung rab mdo sde bcu
124a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gang la yang/ /gang du khyod kyis gsungs pa lhag par zab/ /chos nyid don mchog ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dngos po mtshan mar chags pa'i dug 'thungs pas/ /sdug bsngal nad kyis brgyal ba'i sems can rnams/ /gnyis
124a5(rgyud 'grel): med rang bzhin mya ngan 'das ston pa/ /bdud rtsi stobs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma rig rmongs pas bslad pa'i mun rum nas/ /thar pa'i dus med mu chor 'khyams pa la/ /ye shes sgron ma'i 'od kyis gsal mdzad
124a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /snang bas thar par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yon tan rdzogs te btsal bar bya min pas/ /thugs rjes thugs dam btsan par gyur pa yang/ /brtson 'grus skyo ba mi mnga' srid ba sel/ /sems can mdza' dag sgrol la
124a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can mthun par srid pa mi 'dor zhing/ /ji ltar nyes pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa/ /'dam nas pad+ma gsal ba 'byung ba ltar/ /skyon med dag pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can zad pa'i mdza' ni dpag
124b1(rgyud 'grel): dka' ste/ /srid pa stongs par thugs dam bcas pa yi/ /yon tan des na byang chub gzhan las 'phags/ /thugs rje mthu stobs che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa rdzogs so// //
124b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya bA gI shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug la bstod pa/ /'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu yid 'ong mdzes pa'i cha lugs can/ /nyon mongs rnam dag puN+Da rI ka'i mdog /zla
124b3(rgyud 'grel): ba phye ba'i mdog can mtshungs med sku/ /'jam dbyangs snying rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngag gi nyes spangs ka la ping+ga'i gsung/ /stong nyid zab mo'i sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/ /'gro kun ma rig gnyid las sad mdzad pa/ /'jam dbyangs dag
124b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med bde chen mdza' dang bral ba'i thugs/ /mkha' ltar tshad med 'gro ba kun la gzigs/ /sgyu ma'i tshul gyis 'gro don rdzogs mdzad pa/ /'jam dbyangs spros dral thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi rtog ye
124b5(rgyud 'grel): shes don gyi 'khor lo dang/ /dmigs med thugs rje dra bas 'brel ba yis/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po dra ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mig gis 'gro ba kun la gzigs/ /'od gsal dri med
124b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab zla 'od kyis/ /ma rig mun nag thibs po sel mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po zla 'od de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde chen don mtshon shes rab ma yi gzugs/ /'gro la chags pa'i spyan ni zur gyis lta/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra chen sgrogs
124b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /lha mo skra can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam sgeg bud med tshul/ /thabs dang shes rab yongs rdzogs nu ma rgyas/ /gzhan don mdzad la nye ba'i dgongs pa can/ /nye ba'i sgra can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): kye ma mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /mi dge'i sems las bzlog tu gsol/ /rmi lam duAng sdig pa'i sems/ /phyin chad 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /'jam dbyangs khyod la rtse gcig
125a2(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /bsam pa gus pas gsol 'debs shing/ /rtag tu sgrub pas mnyes byed shog/ khyed ma 'jam dbyangs snying rje can/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i lam chen nas/ /byang chub sems kyi shing rta dag/ 'dren pa'i bshes
125a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyen khyod kyis mdzod/ /'phags pa dag gi dbang phyag gtso 'khor lnga pa'i bstod pa/ paN+Di ta thig le bum spon mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ na pa ku ku mosta pa/ bod skad du/ gur gum gzhon nu lta
125a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i bstod pa/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gur gum gzhon nu'i ge sar mdangs 'dra'i sku/ /lhag par chags shing mos pa 'dzin 'di ni/ /'gro ba rjes su chags pas 'dul gzigs nas/ /thugs rje
125a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis gzhan gyi dbang du bzung/ /char sprin gzhon dang zla ba lta bu'i zhal/ /gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa rab mdzes pa/ /'char kha'i nyi ma'i zer gyis phrog pa yi/ /gser gi pad+ma lta bu rol pa'i zhal/ /thub pa yan lag dri med
125a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen brgyas/ /brgyan cing yid 'od 'od zer rab 'phro ba/ /char sprin gzhon nu glog gis bskor 'dras ni/ /sprus pa khyod kyi cod pan steng na 'dzin/ /'char ka'i zer gyis pad dmar phog pa'i/ /mdangs 'dra dge ba'i mtshan dang
125a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi gnas/ /khyod kyi phyag na ral gri mda' dag dang/ /ud pal sngon po dang ni gzhu dag 'dzin/ /khyod kyi 'od kyi phung pos phyogs mtshams su/ /thub rnams rab skyed yon tan rab rgyas byas/ /yang yang rab g.yos yang yang rab
125b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pas/ /gdul bya'i glo yi ma rig mun pa 'joms/ /bcom ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa sel mdzad la/ /tshad med mchi mas mig brlan bkang byas nas/ /thal sbyar spyi btud ba sbu langs pa yis/ /thugs rje can la mos pas gus phyag
125b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdams 'gro gsum po/ /thugs rje chen pos 'grol bar mdzad pa la/ /lus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal dag dang yang/ /phyag 'tshal yid kyis gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod 'bangs skye ba skyabs
125b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ma mchis pas/ /'di ni yang dang yang du slong lags so/ /bdag ni skye ba skye bar mgon khyod la/ /skyabs su mchi yis srid pa'i sdug bsngal sol/ /gur gum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa/ /slob dpon seng ge mi g.yo bas mdzad pa
125b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kar sh+ri dz+nyAn dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa pa dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn Arya many+dzu sh+rI swa a dri Sh+TAn stwa ti/
125b5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dbyangs phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
125b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bstod par gyur mong de lta na'ang/ /bsam pa blun po'ang bla ma la gus dbang gis kyang ni khyod kyi yon tan brjod bgyi ste/ /rab tu dregs bcas dang pa'i rgyal bo'i sde dag gis bsten chu dang ldan pa'i yid bzhin mtshor/ bzhad
125b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang ni yid la rab tu dga' ba bskyed de rgyu zhing rnam par gnas par bgyid/ /zur phud gsal ldan gser mchog snyan chas legs par rnam rgyan mgul ni rab tu sgeg bcas shing/ /snyan gyi gang rgyan utpa la mdzes 'dra
126a1(rgyud 'grel): mda' slad khyod ni gzhon nur rab grags de lta na'ang/ /kun tu bzang po 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnga yab mchog tu mdzes 'dzin pa'i/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bla ma lta bur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su
126a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni bsten par gyur/ /do shal phreng ba'i sil sil sgrogs byed mchog tu dga' skyed snyam gdub mda' ba spyi gtsug gi/ rin chen 'od mdzes 'phro ba dang ldan gzhon nu'i na tshod dge legs mda' ba gdan yang/ /bcom
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan sa gsum dag na gus pas phyag byar 'os pa khyod ni rtse gcig nyer zhi yi/ /snod gyur mchod par 'os 'di gang na'ang de slad du zhig ngo mtshar ci phyir skye mi 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan sprul stong drag gi chun po
126a4(rgyud 'grel): gdud bur byas pa 'dzin mdzad cing/ /rno ba'i mtshon bsnams g.yul dor rab dpa' gshin rje rnams ni rab tu skrag par mdzad pa yi/ /mi bzad 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed dang bcas par 'gyur kyang khyod ni zhi ba'i
126a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ /cha yi tshogs kun yongs rdzogs lus ldan ston ka'i zla ba nye ba lta bur gyur pa lags/ /khyod ni chos lam nye bar ston la mkhas kyang chos 'dir 'ga' yang gzigs pa yod ma yin/ /khyod ni sems can phan
126a6(rgyud 'grel): la dgyes kyang sems can nyid ni 'ga' yang dmigs par gyur ma lags/ /bdag shes dgyes pa phan tshun du ni mi 'grigs 'gyur ba'i mdzad spyod mang po 'di 'gal bas/ /khyod ni sa gsum ngo mtshar rgyu gcig gyur pa de slad
126a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'dir bsnyen par bgyid pa lags/ /gzhan don 'bras bu smin pas shing bzhin rnam par gnas pas gangs chen lta bur gyur pa ste/ bstan pa yi ni ri rab dang 'dra grub pas bsten pas ri rgyal ma la ya dang mtshungs/ /gti
126b1(rgyud 'grel): mug rab rib zhi bar mdzad pas nyi ma bzhin te/ phun sum tshogs gzugs zla 'dra yi/ /mgon khyod gzhan don mdzad slad 'gro na byis pa 'ol 'dra'i mdzad pa yis ni rnam par rgyu/ /dri zhim gyis bsgos mchog tu mdzes pa'i utpal sngon
126b2(rgyud 'grel): po bsnams pas rdzing bu lta bu ste/ shing tu rnam sgeg tshul dang ldan pas yul gyi byis pa lo brgyad lon pa dang 'dra zhing/ /chos char dri ma med pa 'bebs pas chang sprin 'brug sgra rab tu sgrogs pa lta bu dang/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po yid 'ong
126b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra skad zil gnon gsung mnga' khyod las su zhig bsnyen mi bgyid skad cig nyid la yongs su 'bar gyur gti mug rab rib skad cig nyid la zad gyur cing/ /thams cad du ni legs pa'i lam ston bde gshegs sdig med mya
126b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ /gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin 'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis legs par spras par gyur pa yis/ /khyod nyid gcig pu phyogs bcu rnams na da lta mchog tu snang bar mdzad pa ma lags sam/ /mgon
126b5(rgyud 'grel): po kye ma khyod gzugs ri mor byas pas kyang na ji ltar tshim pa skyed byed ltar/ /ston ka'i mtshan mo dkar zhing rab tu mdzes par gyur pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lags te/ /utpal sngon po mdzes pa'i dri dang zhim pos bsgos
126b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ser bu'i dang kyang ma lags shing/ /lha yi bu mes bstabs par gyur pa'i ha ri tsan dan dri bzang ldan pa'ang de lta min/ /gzhon nu khyod zhabs sen mo'i 'od zer phreng ba rgya chen thun mtshams shar zla 'od bzhin/ /shin tu yid
126b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ong dkar dmar mdog can rab tu da lha dang lha min gtsug nor 'od zer dang/ /'dres pas gang reg ral pa can gyi mi de dag kyang skye bo kun gyis phyag byar 'os/ /mgon po khyod kyi sngags 'dzin grub pa thob nas rab chags sgeg pa
127a1(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i/ /gom tshugs kyis 'gro rgyan phreng rkang gdug yid 'phrog dang ldan mdzes ma brgya dang lhan cig tu/ /sa steng na rol gzhan ni lha yi dbang pos tsan dan btul ba'i dri zhim dang ldan pa'i/ /le shi me tog
127a2(rgyud 'grel): dri ldan sprad mas dkrigs pa'i tsan dan gyi ni nags na gnas par byed/ /na tshod gzhon zhing dregs dang bcas pas sgeg cing rnam par 'phyan byed gsal bar byas gyur pa'o/ /dri zhim la ni chags pa skyed byed sbrang ma'i tshogs rnams
127a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni rab tu dkrigs gyur cing/ /pi wa gling bu dang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra shin tu snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan gyur pa'i/ /gnod sbyin bu mo mchog kyang khyod kyi sngags bzlas pa yi mi yis rab tu 'gugs par byed/ /'gro ba gsum
127a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mgon po 'bras bu med pa'i mang du brjod pa yis ni ci bgyid mchis/ /khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yang yang brjod par thub pa'i mkhyen pas spyod pa ma lags pa/ /de phyir 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi yon tan 'di tsam zhes bya bdag
127a5(rgyud 'grel): gis rtogs par nus ma lags/ /kun nas dpag med chu dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho las ni phan tshun 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir/ /mgon po sems dang bcas pa'i mi rnams dag las su zhig 'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal bar bgyid/ /
127a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bcom ldan 'das ni mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las/ bdag gis dge ba gang zhig bsags pa de ni 'gro ba kun gyi rnyog pa zhi gyur cig/ de yis bdag kyang skye ba dang ni skye bar brtan
127a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing mtshungs pa med pa'i snyan sngags dang/ rigs dang ldan zhing tshe rabs dran dang snying rje rgya chen yid 'phrog pa dang ldan par shog/ //bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa byin brlabs dang
127b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa snyan ngags mkhan rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu byang chub sems dpa' i rigs can mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po sum ti kIrti'i zhal snga nas/ /bod kyi lo tsa
127b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab dang/ mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rIdz+nyA na gu Na pha la nA mastu tir/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das
127b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi blo gros sgrib gnyis sprin bral nyi ltar rnam dag rab gsal pa/ /ji snyed don kun ji bzhin gzigs phyir nyid kyi thugs kar glegs bam 'dzin/ /gang dag srid pa'i btson dang mang
127b4(rgyud 'grel): mun 'thoms sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i/ /'gro tshogs kun la bu gcig ltar brtse yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs ldan gsung/ 'brug ltar cher sgrogs nyon mongs gnyid slong las kyis lcags sgrog 'grol mdzad cing/ /ma rig
127b5(rgyud 'grel): mun sel sdug bsngal myu gu ji snyed gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams/ /gdong nas dag cing sa bcu'i mthar son yon tan lus rdzogs rgyas sras thu ba'i sku/ /bcu phrag bcu dang bcu gnyis rgyan spras bdag blo'i mun sel khyod la
127b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gcig dang bdun dang/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ brgya dang/ stong la sogs pa bdag nyin de bzhin du sgrogs pa de ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /sgrib pa 'dab pa dang/ thos pa
127b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ spobs pa dang/ mi mdzad pa'i gzungs dang/ phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs la sogs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyin re bzhin du lan gsum
128a1(rgyud 'grel): du bstod pa byed pa de ni ji srid bshad pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pas shes rab dang snying rjes lam dang sa rnams rim gyis bgrong de/ gong nas gong du ches cher 'phags nas myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
128a2(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer du phyin nas 'gro ba ma lus pa 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i ded dpon chen por 'gyur ro/ /dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya'i bstod pa slob don rdo rje mtshon chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /rdog lo tsa ba'i
128a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu g+hoSha stro traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdigs mdzub gdod nyid bstan pa yis/ /ri rab lhun po
128a4(rgyud 'grel): du ma g.yos/ /ma lus rgya mtsho chen po'i chu/ /sen mo'i rtse mos gyen du blangs/ /nam mkha' i mu med pa yi khams/ /zhabs kyi gom pa gcig gis mnan/ /zad pa'i dus kyi me 'bar ba/ /zhal gyi dbugs kyis btab pas btsal/
128a5(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshungs sku yi cha gcig la/ /chu dang me yi char phab pa/ /la lar nang par sangs rgyas su/ /gyur nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /la lar nyon mongs ma lus pa/ /nub pas zhi ba sten par mdzad/ /dal bas dbang po bde sogs
128a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /gdong la rnam par gzigs pa'i spyan/ /phyogs kyi 'khor los bkab pa yi/ /phyag mdza' i dmar po nyi ma smugs/ /la lar lha ma yin gyi dpal/ /mthur gyur dam par gur pa 'dzin/ /khyim pa dang ni brtul zhugs pa/
128a7(rgyud 'grel): tshangs spyod rtag tu ye shes can/ /byis pa'i gzugs can 'gro ba'i yab/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'jigs pa dang stobs mnga' ba/ /thub pa'i gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa/ /phye ma mig sman dang mtshungs
128b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis/ /khyod la skabs su rab tu 'chi/ /nyon mongs bud shing ye shes me/ /du ma mtshon pa bgrad pa lta ra/ 'khor ba srid pa'i sbyor ba dang/ /mya ngan 'das la khyod mi gnas/ /mgon po rtag tu dgu ma mchog/ yang dag brnyes pa ma lags
128b2(rgyud 'grel): sam/ /chu dang bcas pa'i snod rnams su/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar ba ltar/ /gcig tu gdul bya g.yo ba'i yid/ /rnam pa mang po 'dra ba'i mtshan/ /nyid kyi bag chags yid gcig tu/ /ye shes grub pa'i gsal gyur pa/ /bka' 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): drin don gnyer tshul gyis ni/ /chags pas khyod kyi zhabs drung ltung/ /khyod kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i cha/ /phyogs kyi khongs su rnam spros pa/ /zla ba'i 'od zer gang gyur mnyam/ /byis pa'i gzugs can mdzes pa 'di/ /tshes gcig zla ba
128b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar mnyen pa/ /khyod kyi spyod pa bzlog dga' bas/ /bdud kyi mthu rtsal 'joms pas ci/ /khyod kyi mtshan tsam dran pas ni/ /dmyal ba pa yi khrag dang zhag/ med par skams pas dmyal ba pa'i/ /'od 'phro de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /
128b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab bral bas mdun du khyod/ /dran pa'i yul du gyur pas kyang/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang the tshom gyis/ /mdug pa dam pos 'ching bar byed/ /thams cad lta zhog skad cig tu/ /khyod kyi spyan zur gyis gzigs nas/ /rnga yab
128b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yob ba'i bzhad gang kyis/ /bsten pa'i dpal ldan nyid bdag gis/ /gdul bya pad+ma'i snod rnams la/ /'od zer dra bas kha 'byed pas/ /mgon po sngon med nyi ma yi/ /rol pas nyin mtshan snang bar mdzad/ /don gsal mdzad pa'i
128b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung gis ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /stong pa nyid ni mngon sum ltar/ /gsung gi dbang phyug ston par mdzad/ /rnam par rtog las ma gtogs pa/ /'khor ba zhes bya ci'ang med/ /rnam rtog de dang bral bas na/ 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni rab tu mya ngan 'das/ khyod kyi yon tan cha brjod las/ /byung bas bsod nams 'phel ba yi/ /'gro ba rnams ni khyod brjod pas/ /phun sum tshogs pa la gnas shog /bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs
129a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstod pa/ /rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rad+d+hA ka ra wa rma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyar cing zhus te gtan la/
129a3(rgyud 'grel): phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a ra pa tsa na sA d+ha nAM bid+haM/ bod skad du/ a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pas dang por gdod bkru ba la sogs

129a5(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM zhes brjod la/ /bdag dang gzhan stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de nas rang gi lus kyi mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par
129a6(rgyud 'grel): dang pa'i shel sgod lta bur dri ma med par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i nam mkha' la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ha(rgyud 'grel): ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba 'od tshogs 'phro bar bsams la/ /de yongs su gyur pa

129b1(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyis 'dzum pa'i spyan can/ /pad+ma dang sla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ /phyag g.yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'phyar ba/ /g.yon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa zhal cung zad bzhad pa/
129b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs ka'i nam mkha' la a yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de'i steng du de'i sa bon gyur pa las zla ba de la bla ma'i man ngag gi yi ge lnga bsam par bya'o/ /de la man ngag ni 'di yin te/ de la a yongs su
129b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las/ /bcom ldan 'das many+dzu sh+rI sku mdog dang dbyibs sngar bshad pa lta bu/ ra las dra ba can gyi 'od/ pa las zla 'od/ tsa las skra can/ na las nye skra can/ thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar bsam par bya'o/
129b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha lnga po de dag las yi ge lnga 'bar ba'i 'od kyi tshogs 'phro ba'i rang bzhin du bsams la/ /rang gi snying gi mi shes pa sbyang bar bya zhing sems kyi rgyud dri ma med par bya'o/ /de nas skad cig gis 'khor lo g.yas su 'khor bar
129b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams zhing/ /lha rnams mi g.yo bar bsams la gti mug gi mun pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor lo dang de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las 'od kyi tshogs mang po 'byung la/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi
129b6(rgyud 'grel): mi shes pa'i sgrib pa sbyangs la/ /rgyud dri ma med par byas te/ /slar 'ongs nas de nyid du zhu bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bsgom pa la sems brtan zhing/ /bla ma'i man ngag gi spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bzlas ba
129b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /a ra pa tsa na d+h+rI?(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i yi ge rnams las sngags kyi 'phreng bshel lta du byung nas/ /rang gi lta ba las thugs ka de nyid du zhugs par bsam mo/ /de ltar ji srid mi skyo'i bar
130a1(rgyud 'grel): du bzlas par byed cing bsgoms la dang pa'i sems dang ldan nas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dus gsum du rnal 'byor byas na ring po mi thogs par blo mchog tu 'gyur ro//

130a4(rgyud 'grel): blo gros ngan pa sreg mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lo phyed rgyun du bsgoms pa mngon sbyor skye bo gang/ /nges par gnas kun khong du chud 'gyur mchog gi blo/ /thob 'gyur a ra pa tsa na ni legs 'grub phyir//
130a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rin chen shin tu bsdus pa'i gdams pa brtsam/ /mnyam zhing gtsang legs yid 'ong dri zhim me tog bkram/ /dri yi chus btabs phyogs 'gar ni sngags rig pas/ /shin tu nyams dga' 'jam pa'i stan la nyer

130a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid du blta/ /de nas nam mkhar dbyangs yig dang po las/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom/ /de nas de la d+d+hi(rgyud 'grel): yig shin tu dkar/ /de ni 'jam dbyangs dri ma med par bsgom/ /rtse gcig bsam gtan gyis
130b1(rgyud 'grel): ni pad stengs gnas/ /chags bcas cung zad 'dzum zhing yid du 'ong/ /ri bong gis mtshan bye ba'i 'od zer can/ /rgyan kun gyis brgyan rab gsal bsgom par bya/ /rang gi snying gar rab 'phro a yig mchog bsgom ste/ /'od kyi dra ba dpag

130b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rab blta g.yon du ni/ /rab mdzes rol pa'i 'gying ldan nye ba'i sgra can ma/ /mdza' dag yon tan gter dag tsa dad na las bsgom/ /rab dkar re ba las byung dri ma med/ /dra ba can gyi 'od nyid mdun du bsgom/ /pa yig las
130b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes 'od zer rang bzhin can/ /yid 'phrog zla ba'i 'od de'i rgyab tu bsgom yang na 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge rnams/ /rgya che nus mthu ldan pa bsgom par bya/ /de rnams mi shes ri bo 'joms byed cing/ /rnyog pa med pa'i ye shes

130b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dam pa a ra pa tsa na bzlas na/ /myur du blo ngan skyon bcom yid 'ong dri med mchog /rgyal ba'i sa dang mchog gi dbang phyug kun kyang thob/ /mchog gi bla ma dga' ba'i rdo rje dam chos mchog gis mdzed gyur pas/

131b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma gzhan yang snang bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla gzas zin dus su ma sha nyid/ /dar dkar gyis dril lce 'og bcug la bzlas/ /myu gu byung 'gyur 'di ni grub pa yin/ /yang na ral gri nyid bzung rig 'dzin 'gyur/ /gre phugs a dkar dag

131b5(rgyud 'grel): tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na sh+rI las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir lha'i skad las bod kyi brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya a ra pa tsa na pU dzA bi d+hi nA ma/ /bod skad du/ 'phags

132a1(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): pra bar satkA ra ya a ra pa tsa nA ya pA tyaM pra tIts+tsha hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri pra bra ra satkA ra ya a ra pa tsa na ya pro k+Sha Na pA tIts+tsha hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): pra bar satwA? ra ya a ra pa tsa na ya a tsa ma naM pra tIts+tsha hUM swAhA/
