132a5(rgyud 'grel): puShpe hUM swAhA/ oM na ma stA ra ye hAM oM badzra hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi rim pas/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM swAhA/ oM badzra dI pe hUM swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he hUM swAhA/ oM badzra nai be dye hUM swAhA/ de rnams kyi mdun du 'dod pa'i yon
132a6(rgyud 'grel): tan lnga po rnams nye bar yang dag par dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra ta thA ga ta pU dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa ma he spho ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT/ mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dngos po med kyang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa 
132a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sarba thA ud+ga te spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta swAhA/ /yid kyis mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu yi/ /ces pa la sogs pa dang/ rin chen gsum rnams phyag
132b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa'ang rin chen gsum po la/ /sdig pa gang rnams brjod par bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la rjes su dga' / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing/ /mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/ /bdag gis sbyin sogs bsod nams
132b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bdag la kun rtogs yongs su bsgyur/ /ces pa rnam pa bdun bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo mngon par dga' bas dbang bskur ba'o/ /rang gi rigs kyi ngo bor byas nas
132b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i phyir bdag la dbang bskur ro/ /gtsang mas gnas kyi lha rnams kyis/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 'khrungs tshe/ /kun bkrus de bzhin bdag dbang bskur/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba tA thA ga tA b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI hUM/ oM sarba tA thA
132b4(rgyud 'grel): ga tA b+hi She ka badzra sa b+hA bA ko haM/ yi ge'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas dang/ /lhan cig kun tu rnam par rtogs/ /grangs med A li kA la'i tshogs/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i rnam par 'gro/ oM pa de pa da mahA dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma haM b+hA me hUM hUM hUM ho:
132b5(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): khe swAhA/ 'di yis gsang sngags kyi phreng ba rnams byin gyis brlabs la gsang sngags bzlas so/ /gsang sngags bla ma'i nye bar bshad pa las rtogs par bya'o/ /bzlas pa byas nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par
132b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ yaM yig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /raM yig gi me'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du kaM yig gis sgyed bu gsum gyi steng du/ a yig las skyes pa'i snod du 'chi med lnga dang rab tu gsal ba lnga po lhan cig bzhu
132b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /'chi med ye shes bcug nas dbul bar bya ste/ /oM a ra pa tsa nA ya ang+ga pu sta ka ha sta ya i maM baM li kha kha khA hi khA he he na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ma sarba sa twA nA ny+tsa pra tyA rtha ka na band+ha band+ha nI d+h+ri(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI khaM/
133a1(rgyud 'grel): a ra pa tsa nA ya swAhA/ /gtor ma'i sngags so/ /chad pa dang lhag pa dgang pa'i phyir/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ /oM badzra satwA sa ma ya ma nu bA la/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri b+ho me b+ha ba/ su tO Sh+yo me
133a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+tO me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+himme pra yats+tsha sarba karmma su tsa me tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga tA badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrA b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwA A:/ bdag cag sems
133a3(rgyud 'grel): can don kun mdzad/ /ji ltar rjes rtogs dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs pa dang/ /slar ni byon par mdzad gyur cig /oM mu(rgyud 'grel): swA hAs gshegs par bya'o/ /smon lam gyi bye brag kyang gdab par bya'o/
133a4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bsags dang yod pa'i dge ba yis/ /bdag cag srid kun pha rol phyin nas ni/ /sems can kun bcas rin chen rtogs ldan pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ /'phags pa a ra pa tsa na'i mchod
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lung du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad rtogs pa'i/ /shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ /grub ba'i zhing dam pa mang yul skye grong 'phags pa
133a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las/ /cung zad mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa/ dpal shes rab kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// (//'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa zhes
133a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ Arya a mo g+ha bra sha pany+tsa de ba sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i lha lnga'i bstod pa/ rje btsun spyan ras gzigs
133b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' ltar rang bzhin rnam dag las/ /baM yig a kar yongs gyur pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po zla steng du/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar po las 'khrungs shing/ /g.yas brkyang rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /gangs ri
133b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar gsal kun da'i mdog /g.yas pa mchog gi don sbyin mdzad/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po g.yon na 'dzin/ /'dzum bcas zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /ma chags
133b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gtso la bstod/ /pad+ma dkar po zla steng du/ /ha yig dmar po las 'khrungs shing/ /mnyam par bzhengs nas 'gro don mdzad/ /pad+ma rA ga dmar po'i mdog /zhags pa dang ni rdo rje g.yas lcags kyu bgrang phreng g.yon na
133b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes pa yi/ /don yod zhags la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /pad+ma nyi steng hUM las 'khrungs/ /g.yon brkyang gyang gyi tshul gyis bzhugs/ /sku mdog dmar po ba ru'i tshul/ /stag dang sbrul gyis rnam brgyan
133b5(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /brtson dang ni sdigs mdzub g.yas/ /'khor lo pad+ma dmar po g.yon/ /spyi gtsug rta mgo ljang gu 'tsher/ /ha ya grI la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chu skyes nyi mar pha las 'khrungs/ /nam mkha' i mdog can g.yon brkyang tshul/ /mche
133b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs khro mo'i cha lugs 'dzin/ /stag gi pags pas rnam par dkris/ /ral gri zhags pa pad ma mda'/ /'khor lo dbyug ba rtse gsum gzhu/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams/ /ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal bstod//
133b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po zla steng du/ /Ta yig dkar po las 'khrungs shing/ /zla ba chu shel nor bu'i mdog /'gying zhing ldem pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dbyug pa pad+ma dkar po g.yas/ /bgrang phreng dang ni spyi blugs g.yon/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis
134a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa yi/ /khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ /slob dpon chen po tsan bra go mi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya a mo g+ha pA sha maN+Da la de
134a2(rgyud 'grel): wa ga Na sto? tra bi ma la bra b+hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin
134a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ /thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ngo la/ /gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug khyod la bstod par bgyi/ /'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos phyir/ /pad+ma
134a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po rab rgyas lte ba la/ /thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan/ /ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod/ /'jig rten log rtog ston pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ /rgyal po'i rol stangs dbang phyug cha lugs
134a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /sna tshogs thabs mnga' i rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud/ /don dam chos sku nyag gcig zhal mnga' zhing/ /thugs rjes 'gro la chags bas h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las 'khrungs/ /sangs rgyas kun
134a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis dbang bskur 'od dpag med/ /ral pa'i khur na 'tshang ba khyod la bstod/ /'gro drug sgrol phyir ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan can/ /me tog cod ban rgyal sras 'gran zla bral/ /dus
134a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum rgyal ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod/ /nor bu'i snyam chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs/ /spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen/ /'dzum pa'i zhal mnga' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes/ /stong nyid thugs rje can la
134b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/ /nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing/ /don dam rnam dag pad+ma dkar po bsnams/ /thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sred ba'i mes
134b2(rgyud 'grel): bdungs rgyud lnga'i sems can la/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs g.yas na spyi blugs 'dzin/ /bdud bzhi'i 'jigs skyob g.yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad/ /'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /srid gsum gzod/
134b3(rgyud 'grel): nas dben par rtogs pa'i phyir/ /ri dags lpags pas sku yi sham thabs mdzad/ /'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir/ /gangs ri kun da'i mdangs ldan khyod la bstod/ /khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi/ /
134b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas/ /mdzad bya'i 'phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs ba khyod la bstod/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir/ /phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan gyis
134b5(rgyud 'grel): spras/ /sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir/ /mu tig do shal 'phyang la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang/ /stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir/ /zhabs gnyis cung zad brkyang
134b6(rgyud 'grel): bskum rol pas bzhugs/ /rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /srid pa gsum po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skus/ /ye shes rol ba'i 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa'i/ /ma rig mun
134b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral pad+ma'i gdan/ /nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'gro don yengs ba mi mnga' bzhengs tshul can/ /thugs rje chags pa'i mdog mda' khyod la 'dud/
135a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir/ /ha las 'khrungs pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad/ /skye med zhal mnga' srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan/ /dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 'chad la bstod/ /bden bzhi'i
135a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad rtogs pa'i rdo rjes log rtog mtshan ma 'joms/ /sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' ba khyod la bstod/ /mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar
135a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs/ /nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin/ /'gro don mdzad mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul/ /mtshan don ldan par bzhugs pa khyod la bstod/ /ma chags pad+ma'i rigs te skyon bral steng/ /
135a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pas nyon mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan/ /bdud dpung 'joms mdzad khro rgyal hUM las 'khrungs/ /khro bas khro ba 'dul mdzad khyod la bstod/ /rngam pa'i zhal gyis log rtog dbyings su gsol/ /dmar ser
135a5(rgyud 'grel): ral pas log 'dren bran du 'dul/ /ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs/ /rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dbyug bas bgegs dpung rdul du rlog /rdo rje sdigs mdzub bdud sde skrag
135a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad/ /gser gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod/ /chags bral pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen sprul rkyen klu rgyal gdugs ba 'dul/ /glang chen g.yang gzhi stobs bcu mda' ba' i dpal/ /stag sham
135a7(rgyud 'grel): ba tis 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad/ /khro rgyal brkyang bskum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skyon bral gdan la rmongs sel nyi ma'i steng/ /pha las 'khrungs pa'i bdud 'dul nag mo che/ /rngam pa'i stangs kyis gdug pa
135b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol bar mdzad/ /mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod/ /rnam thar phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon/ /shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsad nas gcod/ /thugs rje'i zhags pa skyon bral pad+ma 'chang/ /thabs mkhas brtse ba'i
135b2(rgyud 'grel): mda''phen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad cing/ /dbyug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum gcod/ /spros bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mda''phen ma/ /'phags la/ don ldan ral
135b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma la bstod/ /khro rgyal kun 'dul dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang/ /bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs/ /stag lpags sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod// //
135b4(rgyud 'grel): skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng/ /Ta las 'khrungs pa'i 'phrin las kun rdzogs ma/ /brtse ba'i zhal mnga' 'phrin las rgyas pa'i phyag /ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod/ /thod dbyug bgegs 'dul padmos 'khor
135b5(rgyud 'grel): ba skyob/ /phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin/ /sgrub pa po la mchog gsol mdzad la bstod/ /rin chen rgyan 'changs dang yon tan rdzogs/ /dar sham ba tis mi 'jigs
135b6(rgyud 'grel): lha chen 'dul/ /chags can 'dul phyir chags pa ltar ston pa'i/ /lha mo khro gnyer ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs/ /thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston/ /nyam thag 'gro la
135b7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu brtse ba can/ /thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod/ /ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid phyir/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma/ /sgeg cing
136a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang chub yan lag 'bras bu kun ster bas/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul/ /chags bral blta bar mdzad la
136a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzod nas zhi ba'i don la rab mos pas/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul/ /don dam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba mchod par
136a3(rgyud 'grel): bya phyir skyo ba med/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /sna tshogs rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma/ /mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras byang chub sems yin pas/ /
136a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /yid 'ong me tog rnams kyis mchod mdzad ma/ /rnam thar sgo gsum rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs
136a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod/ /don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod/ /mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms shing/ /thabs mchog pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/ /snang ba'i sgron mas
136a6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu mnyes mdzad ma/ /ma rig mun sel mdzad ma khyod la bstod/ /nyon mongs dri nga rab tu 'joms pa dang/ /smon lam pha rol phyin par ba rdzogs phyir/ /dri mchog byug pas rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma/ /ri rab bsnams
136a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas/ /stobs bcu'i sa la kun tu dgod bya'i phyir/ /lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma/ /shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal//
136b1(rgyud 'grel): byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal nas/ /yang dag rig pa'i don la dgod pa'i phyir/ /zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma/ /lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dga' ba chen pos 'gro kun bde
136b2(rgyud 'grel): la 'god/ /srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ /lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma/ /nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag tu mdzad/ /ma lus sangs rgyas sa
136b3(rgyud 'grel): la rab dgod phyir/ /dril bu 'chang zhing mngon spyod las mdzad ma/ /byang sgor bzhugs ma khyod la gus pa bstod/ /tshangs pa drag po nyi ma zla ba dang/ /dbang po gshin rje chu lha nor gyi bdag /drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste/ /'jig
136b4(rgyud 'grel): rten 'dul phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod/ /bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo yis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgon po yis/ /yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas/ /khyod kyi mdzad tshul dpag par mi nus mod/ /
136b5(rgyud 'grel): mun khud nang nas me khyer 'od tsam zhig /khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas/ /rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam/ /bdag yis spro bas khyod la bstod pa 'dis/ /cung zad tsam rnyed dge ba dri ma med/ /gangs ri ltar dkar shes
136b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam thob pa des/ /rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas/ /mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i
136b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ kalpa ma na ha ra na ni nA ma log nA tha sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/ /thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
137a1(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min mi yis zhabs la phyag byas shing/ /skye rga na 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku/ /'jig rten dbang phyug thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis ni/ /mgon med bdag la bsrung mdzad thugs rje mdzad du
137a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil du ni nub gyur te/ /nyon mongs dpa' rlabs kyis ni yang dag nyam nyes shing/ /chos nges 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par/ /khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos
137a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung du gsol/ /srid pa'i rab rib kyis ni blo mi gnyer gtsos shing/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis ni lus sems g.yengs gyur pa/ /ji srid mi bzad mnar med gnas su ma lhung bar/ /bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis
137a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ /rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med brten bgyis dang/ /srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa/ /mgon po bdag gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis/ /lus kyi nyes pa de dag
137a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag sbyang du gsol/ /gang zhig bkur sti'i ched dang 'tsho ba'i ched du ni/ /'jig rten mi bden brdzun tshig brlang po la sogs pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug ngag gi nyes pa'i kun sbyor yang/ /dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus
137a6(rgyud 'grel): goms par bgyis/ /sems can rnams la rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang/ /gzhan gyis bgyis pa la ni rjes su yi rang ba'i/ /bdag gi yid kyi sdig de dag ni smre sngags su/ /'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po
137a7(rgyud 'grel): kye/ /lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams dang ni/ /dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dags rnams su yang/ /sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la/ /bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag gis khums/ /des na bdag
137b1(rgyud 'grel): la thugs rjes bdag mdzad du gsol/ /g.yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khang/ /de phyir ji srid dmyal pa'i gnas su ma zhugs par/ /bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gi zhu ba gsan par mdzod/ /gzhan yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid
137b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs mdzad na/ /bsod nams mar sags bdag ni spyan sngar mchis kyang spong/ /khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la bltos sam ci/ /sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lags na/ /dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su/ /
137b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums lags sam ci/ /de phyir bcom ldan gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung/ /bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang bskyab pa mdzad du gsol/ /glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang/ /
137b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang/ /sha dang rus pa dbu mi sku 'tshal mthar thug btang/ /grub pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni/ /grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang/ /'jig rten mnga' bdag
137b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag/ don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis sbyin par mdzad/ /gang dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang/ /sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs pa dang bcas rnams/ /yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes
137b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis de dag gi/ yan lag sogs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /mkha' lding sprul gdugs gnod dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni/
137b7(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang snang mi 'gyur/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam par g.yengs pa yis/ /nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang steng du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang/ /nye ba lags na bcom
138a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan skyabs med 'bor ram ci/ /yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang g.yo ba dang/ /mnyam par ma gzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis/ /nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir/ /thams cad
138a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad/ /de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal dang/ myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni/ /mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni
138a3(rgyud 'grel): gnang par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku/ /khod ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lon lags/ /khyod ni ltung bas sgrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste/ /khyod ni brjod bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i
138a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan lags/ /khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po/ /khyod ni sdug bsngal mar ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin/ /khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka' i bdud las nges brgal ba/ /khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol
138a5(rgyud 'grel): brgal ba lags/ /khyod ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku/ /khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nad na mchog tu mdzes/ /khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste/ /khyod ni rgyu med gnyer du 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs/ /khyod kyis g.yo
138a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang po 'bar pa med bar btul/ /khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom pa lags/ /khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog ni mnyam par bzhag /khyod kyi thugs ni slong? ba kun la snyoms par mdzad/ /thugs rje
138a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni/ /ma rig sbrul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi/ /'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur ba bdag la 'dir/ /khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar
138b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yar chab byin cing smre ba yi/ /sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na/ /mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa/ /de ci khyod kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam/ /mgon po khyod kyi thugs rje nam mkha' khyab pa yi/ /
138b2(rgyud 'grel): sprin gyur char pa'i rgyun ni chu dang skam dag dang/ /mthon dman yul ni kun la 'bab cing sems can gyi/ /don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad du 'jug/ de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang/ /des ni
138b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis/ /'gro nar mdzes pa nam yang rnam par rol pa yi/ /po ta la yi ri rtser gnas pa thob par shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/ /shar
138b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ba reN+Di'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs ba reN+Di'i dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bsgyur ba// //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA
138b5(rgyud 'grel): kA ru Ni ka sto tre/ /bod skad du/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chags pas rnam gzigs bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras kyis gzigs spyan
138b6(rgyud 'grel): zur bdag la gzigs/ /spyan zur gzigs pa tsam gyis 'gro rnams kyi/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag zhi mdzad khyod la mnga' / /mdza' med g.yang sar lhung nas sa 'og gi/ mun nag thabs par gtan du 'khyams pa bdag/
138b7(rgyud 'grel): nyam thag phongs pas thugs rje mchog sbyin cing/ /yongs su bskyab pa'i dus la di ring bab/ /sdug phongs gang gis nga ni dran byas na/ /de yis nyams thag nga yis bsal lo zhes/ /khyod kyis zhal bzhes mngon mdzad ded
139a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi/ nyam thag bsal te 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ mthor dang thos dang reg dang dran pa yas/ /nad gdan thams cad ngas bsal zhes gsungs pas/ /nad kyis gdungs pa'i 'gro ba bdag cag
139a2(rgyud 'grel): la'ang mchog sbyin nyid kyis zhal bzhes ma bsnyel mdzad/ /'gro rnams gang dag sdug bsngal de dag gis/ /nyam thag kun tu bcad par bya'o zhes/ /dgongs nas mgon po gzhan du rnam rgyu na/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal khyod
139a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ma gzigs sam/ /gang gis khyod nyid dran pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de mod nyam thag ma bsal 'ga' med la/ /bdag kyang rtag tu nyam thag gzir bzhin du/ /khyod kyi drin gyis ma skyabs bskal chung so/ /mthu ldan khyod kyi
139a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i blo gros kyis/ /lan la mi re bzhin du phan 'dogs la/ /bdag kyang khyod la skyabs su mchi bzhin du/ /sdug phongs 'di 'dra 'ang mi gzigs kye ma'o brlag /ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs gyur pa dang/ /ji lta ji ltar rten med
139a5(rgyud 'grel): phongs gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar khyod kyi thugs rje yang/ /der ni phyi phyir mngon par 'phel lo skad/ /sdig ldan bdag gi nyam thag sdug bsngal yang/ /shin tu mnag dka' rten med skyabs med bzhin /de dag las bdag thugs
139a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes bkol mdzad na/ /khyod kyi thugs rje phyogs gcig ci ru rung/ /'gro ba gang gis skyes mchog khyod dran na/ /don med gyur pa sngon chad 'ga' ma mchis/ /sdug bsngal shin tu drag po nyam thag 'dis/ /brlag la bar gyi
139a7(rgyud 'grel): mgon khyod bdag la dgongs/ /thugs rje'i gnas gyur sdug phongs ma lus pa/ /phongs pa thugs rje chen pos 'phrogs mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis gal te bdag la ma gzigs na// bdag gi rten gzhan gang lags gsung du/ /
139b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mgon po khyod la skyabs su mchi dgu la/ /mod la sdug bsngal ma zhi 'ga' ma mchis/ /bdag kyang skyabs su mchi yis brtse ba yis/ /sdug bsngal nyams thag 'di las bskyab tu gsol/ /khyod kyi mtshan tsam grag la brten bas kyang//
139b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug phongs ma lus zhi bar 'gyur lags na/ /bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ /de 'dra'i thugs rje ci las gyur pa lags/ /khyod kyis grub brnyes bzhin du sems can rnams/ /yongs su bskyab phyir smon lam mdzad
139b3(rgyud 'grel): lags na/ /bdag kyang sems can grangs las ma 'das pas/ /mchog sbyin bdag gi sdug bsngal dbrog tu gsol/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa'i tshogs bcom bzhin/ /zla gsal dri mar khyod ni ra ba bzhugs kyang/ /da dung bdag ni
139b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal gyis non cing/ /sdig pa'i mun pas non pa skal chungs so/ /skye bo rnams kyis gang zhus skyong mdzad pa/ /de nyid bdag gis zhus bzhin mi gnad ba/ /mtshams las thar bar skal ba med dam ci/ /shin tu dan nam
139b5(rgyud 'grel): cir thal yi re mug/ mgon po khyod ni sems can phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po ma spangs bzhin du yang/ /sdug bsngal ba rnag dka' rang bzhin gsol 'debs la/ /skyob pa mdun na gnas bzhin 'o dod 'bod/ /'jig
139b6(rgyud 'grel): rten skye bo'i pha ma'ang 'di ltar du/ /kha mtshus btab par gyur kyang mi skyo bzhin/ /sems can phan brtson khyod la'ang 'khor ba nas/ /'khor ba'i tshe na bdag ni skyabs mchi zhing/ /nag po'i las kyis nyin dang mtshan du na/ /
139b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par zil gyis non par gyur pa dang/ /sdug bsngal cher gdungs 'di las thar bya'i phyir/ /nyin rer 'o dod 'bod kyis ma skyo srungs/ /de ltar bdag gis bos shing smre ba yis/ /khyod thugs shin tu thugs rjes brlan gyur la//
140a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar skye bo sdug bsngal brgyas gzir ba/ /kun la'ang srid bcom khyod ni dgongs mdzad cing/ /thugs rje'i dbang gyur thugs ni brtan pa yis/ /gzhan don 'ba' zhig lhur len yon tan ni/ /bla ma'i gnas gyur khyod ni
140a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal kun/ /'phrog pa'i nus mthu ldan pa de bzhin shog/ bdag gi srid pa mthar mdzad spyan ras gzigs dbang la/ /bstod bskul 'di bgyis bsod nams thob pa gang yin des/ /bcos min rab zhi'i bde ldan bde
140a3(rgyud 'grel): pa can du ni/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal gzir spangs rab tu phyin gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba nyer bzhi pa/ /dge bsnyen chen po zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba ra na de shwa ra
140a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba dogs lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten dbang
140a5(rgyud 'grel): phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btud cing/ /skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa/ /'jig rten dbang khyod la skyabs mdzad na/ /brtse dang snying rje ldan la skyong bar mdzod/ /'khor pa'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su
140a6(rgyud 'grel): des lhung ba/ /nyon mongs dpa' klong mnyam gzhag gis ni bcom/ /kho bos brtan par zung zhes kun du du/ /brtse ba chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mig la srid pa'i rab rib nye bar 'tshe/ /lus ni 'chi bas 'jigs
140a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam par du/ /ji srid mnar med nyam ngar ma song bar/ /bcom ldan kun tu gzigs la bdag la skyongs/ /gzhan gyi bud med sun par byas shing bcom/ /mi shes pa yis srog chags stong phrag bsad/ /mgon po
140b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis sdig pa ma lus byas/ /so so'i lus kyi nyes pa nyams par mdzod/ /gang zhig 'tsho dang bkur sti'i ched rnams su/ /'jig rten pa rnams mi 'dod mi bden smras/ /ma lus dmyal ba gang gis yul ring goms/ /de rnams
140b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod/ /sems can rnams la mi phan bsam pa gang/ /rang dang gzhan gyis byas la'ang yi rang ba/ /de 'dir bdag gi yid kyi sdig pa rnams/ /bsal bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don/ /
140b3(rgyud 'grel): lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams/ /dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dags 'gro ba rnams/ /sems can des gnas rtag par nyam thag gang/ /de rnams srung zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos/ /des na bdag la snying rjer kun tu mdzod/ /lus kyi lang
140b4(rgyud 'grel): tsho ngal bar rtogs gyur na/ /ji srid dmyal ba nyid du ma zhugs par/ /de phyir bcom ldan khyed la gsol bar bgyi/ /cung zad btang snyoms mdzad pa gzhan don phyir/ /bdag gi don phyir bcom ldan nyid dmigs na/ /yang na brtse ba
140b5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams la bltos sam/ /gang la phongs med mthong ba bskyed par gyis/ /nyid dran pa yis kun nas yongs tshim na/ /nyes pa zad par mdzod cig brtse med dam/ /de yi phyir na bcom ldan gzhan phan mkhas/ /rnam
140b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ma mdzad kho bo 'dir ni srungs/ /glang po rta dang bu dang chung ma dang/ /rgyal srid tsher ma med dang khyim sna tshogs/ /sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug par/ /don gnyer rnams la khyod kyis mdza' yang byin/ /mig sman
140b7(rgyud 'grel): ri lu rkang mgyogs grub pa dang/ /grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags/ /grub pa gnod sbyin mo ni grong la 'jug/ 'jig rten dbang po gang gis nyid dgyes pa/ /rkang lag rnam par lta pa'i sman pa dang/ /sna tshogs 
141a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs chen nad kyi zhu ba gang/ /khyod mnyes pa las de rnams lus rgyas shing/ /nad med yon tan zab mo rnam rol 'gyur/ /mkha' lding sprul dang gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /sbyor ba pa rnams rtag par zhi 'thob
141a2(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /khyod mnyes gang yin de yi mdun du ni/ /gshin rje pho nya mi 'gro rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de phyir lag pa spyi bor thal sbyar te/ /spyi brtol mi brtan dag gis nyin re bzhin/ /du ba skyabs med bdag ni 'chi ba la/ /bcom ldan
141a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dor ram ci/ /mi srun yul la g.yo ba'i yid dbang po/ /mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing/ /lto ba'i tshad du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med/ /bdag gi 'di ni skye ba thams cad lugs/ /gang gis lus kyi
141a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal ma myong bar/ /khyod kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba/ /bdag 'dir thal sbyar rab btud bdag ge de/ /'jig rten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod/ /rmongs dang zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu/ /khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i
141a5(rgyud 'grel): zam pa ste/ /g.yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag/ khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam/ /bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na/ /khyod ni sdug bsngal mang po'i sems can skyong/ /rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las
141a6(rgyud 'grel): ngas rgyal zhir?/ /khyed ni srid pa'i mtsho las pha rol brgal/ /nad kun mdza' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus/ /khyed sku 'gro ba kun la mchog tu mdzes/ /dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du skye
141a7(rgyud 'grel): bos shes/ /byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cid sgeg /khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongs su bor/ /lha yi bsam gtan la sems mnyam par gzhag /khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor/ /thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad
141b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /kho bo 'dir ni srud ba mi mdzad cing/ /gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab la/ /yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las lhung/ /khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mdza' yas pa'i/ /skye po kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir/ /sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi
141b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /nges pa lags sam mdun nas dung mo 'byin/ /mgon po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su/ /sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sbyin ji ltar/ /skam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por/ /ma lus rgyun du rgyun ma 'chad par 'bab/ /de ltar
141b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang/ /des ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir/ /po ta la ke g.yo ba med pa'i gnas/ /rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la/ /tsirya Di
141b4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so// //sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba snyan gyi zhal snga nas/ /lo tsa pa shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya a mo g+ha pA sha pa ny+tsa de ba sto
141b5(rgyud 'grel): tra/ bod skad du/ /phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can sdug bsngal me tshogs kyis gdungs la/ /thugs rje'i char rgyun bsil bas zhi mdzad cing/ /
141b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bde ldan gnas su 'dren mdzad pa/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas 'gro kun gyi/ /gnod pa des sel bde la 'god mdzad cing/ /sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad
141b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /don yod zhags par grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma chags pad ma'i rigs kyi sbrul pa ste/ /klu rgyal tshul gyis gdugs pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /dbang chen bskal pa'i me ltar rab sbyin 'bar/ /khro rgyal rta mgrin rgyal la phyag 'tshal
142a1(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /chos nyid spros bral ro gcig mngon gyur tshul/ /ral pa gcig 'chad lha mo'i skur ston cing/ /bgegs tshogs 'dul phyir khro mo'i cha lugs 'dzin/ /ral pa gcig ma khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum
142a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pa'i yon tan gzhir gyur cing/ /skal ldan rjes mthun 'gro don mdzad la brtson/ /mgon po'i 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad ma/ /lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod
142a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /paN+Di ta chen po e ra pa tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang/ lo tsa ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o// //'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug pa bstod pa grub thob chen po tsarbba? tis
142a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra sya tserbba Ti ru tsi ta sto? traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsarbba Tis bstod pa/ /'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mi lha min gyis
142a5(rgyud 'grel): ni zhabs la btung/ /skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab tu bcom/ /thugs rje'i dang can 'jig rten dbang po khyed/ /skyabs med bdag la snying rje mdzod cig kye/ /nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms byed cing/ /sna tshogs sgra sgrogs
142a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i chu gter dbus/ /bying ba bdag ni zung la bsrud bar mdzod/ /brtse ba chen po khyed la bstod pa bgyid/ /srid pa'i mun pas mig la nyer 'tsho zhing/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa chen pos lus nyam chung/ /ji srid mnar med mi
142a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam 'gro min par/ /bsrung la bcom ldan bdag la kun tu gzigs/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med gzung ba byas/ /mi shes ba yis srog chags stong phrag bsad/ /bdag gis sdig byas deng du mgon po yis/ /lus
142b1(rgyud 'grel): can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod/ /gang zhig 'tsho ba dang ni bkur sti'i phyir/ /bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa smras/ /dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i smra ba can/ /de kun 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod/ /bdag gis sems can
142b2(rgyud 'grel): phan min gad bsams dang/ /gzhan gyis byas la'ang rjes su yi rang ba/ /mgon po de la du bar bgyid pa na/ /deng bdag yid kyi sdig pa bsal du gsol/ /lha dang mi dang lha min ris rnams dang/ /dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dags 'gro bar
142b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gnas shing rtag tu gdung ba'i sems can gang/ /khyod ni de rnams bsrung zhes bdag la grags/ /de phyir gzhon du nyid srod yus la ni/ /thugs rje'i gzigs pa bdag gi steng spros shes/ /dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid
142b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ /smra bar bgyi yis bcom ldan khyed kyis gson/ /'on kyang gzhan gyi don la btang snyoms pa/ /dor zhig bcom ldan bdag don ma mdzad do/ /yang na brtse ba'i dbang gyur khyod kyis ni/ /bsod nams bskyed mdzod rgud pa ma gzigs
142b5(rgyud 'grel): sam/ /dran pas kyang ni khyod ni yongs tshim na/ /sdig pa dor bar mdzod cig ma gzigs sam/ /de slang bcom ldan gzhan phan la mkhas pa/ /bdag ni 'dor bar ma mdzad 'di ru bsrungs/ /glang chen rta dang bung bcas chud ma dang//
142b6(rgyud 'grel): dmag bcas rgyal srid khang pa sna tshogs dang/ /sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug pa/ /don du gnyer la mdza' dag khyod kyis byin/ /su zhig 'jig rten dbang po khyod mnyes byed/ /ri lu mig sman 'chil lham grub pa dang//
142b7(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags/ /gnod sbyin mo dang grod 'jug sgrub bar byed/ /gang dag mig dang rkang lag sman pa yi/ /sna tshogs nad kyi 'jigs chen nyams thag pa/ /khyod mnyes na ni de rnams yongs rgyas lus//
143a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam sgeg nad med yon tan zab mor 'gyur/ /khyod dgyes gang lags rgyal 'gyur ga ra Da/ /gcan gzan gza' dang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma/ /rtag tu zhi 'gyur de yi mdun du ni/ /gshin rje'i pho nya rgyu bar mi
143a2(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dgyes bzhin skyabs med bdag /'dor ba ci zhes bcom ldan bdag smre te/ /nyi ma so sor lag pa bsgreng byas nas/ /tshig 'khrugs pa yi skrag pa zhi bar mdzod/ /'khrugs pa'i lus kyis song ba'i skye
143a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bdag/ yul drug la ni dbang po g.yo ba'i yid/ /sdig pa mad? byas 'dir ni ma lus pa/ /bkres pa'i rgyu yis 'khor zhing rnam par 'dzing sa/ /gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal ma myong bar/ /bde 'gro mngon sum 'gro de
143a4(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis mdzod/ /deng bdag 'jig rten dbang la phyag dang zhing/ /sna tshogs thal sbyar 'di ni phyag gi'o/ /khyod ni rmongs dang ldang ba 'jig pa'i rgyu/ /'khor ba'i chu gter chen po'i zam pa lags/ /ltung zhing skrag pa stong pa'i dpung
143a5(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod/ /sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan no/ /bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyid kyis/ /khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal mang po skyangs/ /rgyal dka' yid bsrubs bdud las khyod rgyal te/ /kun tu grol ba srid
143a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i pha rol lo/ /nad kun gcod par mdzed pa khyod kyi sku/ /ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa/ /bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i sin d+hu khyod/ /rgyu med gnyen du skye ba rnams la grags/ /rol pas dbang po 'joms shing
143a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byed/ /khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dir/ /lha yi bsam gtan mnyam bzhag khyod kyi thugs/ /nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong lags/ /brtse ldan khyod ni gzhan la phan mdzad kyang/ /gti mug lto 'phye chen
143b1(rgyud 'grel): bos sos zin cing/ /yul la kun rtog dge ba las ltung ba/ /bdag ni tshim par mi mdzad ci ltar lags/ /mdza' dag 'gro pa'i don bsten snying rje gang/ /khyod kyis spros de nges pa lags sam ci/ /khyod gyi spyan sngar sna tshogs sgra sgrogs
143b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sdig ldan bdag las gang las bsrung mi mdzad/ /mgon khyod snying rje nam mkha' las yangs te/ /sems can rnams la chu 'dzin chu rgyun ltar/ /mya dam chu dang mtho dma'i yul kun tu/ /ma lus nyin mtshan par med 'beb par
143b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bcom ldan dran las bdag gi bsod nams gang/ /de ni 'gro 'dis bde blag thob gyur te/ /dpal ldan po ta la yi ri bor gnas/ /mdzes shing sna tshogs rol pas skye bar shog/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
143b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa grub tho ba chen po tsarbba Tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi baN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang/ lots+tsha ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //!/ /'jig rten
143b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa bzhugs/ /!/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra sha ta ka sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstong pa brgya pa/ /'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtho ris mgon po'i yan lag
143b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog ba tud cod pan 'dzin la 'od dang ldan pa'i nor bu lta bu'i 'od/ /mtsho skyes stan ldan bum pas rab bdud mgo po la ni dzA ti'i me tog rgyas 'phreng 'od ltar te/ bde byung dbu yi dbu rgyan ri dags mtshan ldan dkar ser mi dman
143b7(rgyud 'grel): dman zhing nyams pa nyid bgyid pa/ /'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs sen dri med ri bor 'dzin pa'i mdzes pa zhi slad 'jig rten la gyur cig /ral khur 'dzin pa'i zla ba rab gsal ral pa dmar ser dang 'grogs lhan cig bkra ba'i
144a1(rgyud 'grel): zer rnams kyis/ /nges par mi rje 'phrog byed kyi ni dman pa min pa'i cod pan nor bu'i 'od rnams kyis kyang min/ /lha tshogs rnams kyi skya 'phreng mdzes pa nag po dag dang 'phrogs pa las ni rnam par mi
144a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa/ /mi bzlogs 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen 'od zer khyed rnams dag gi mun pa zhi ba'i slad gyur cig /yongs su rdzogs shing rgya che'i bar mdzed rab tu gsal zhing dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rgyu//
144a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa dang ni ring du gyur pa'i skye po rnams kyi mi bzang 'jigs pa'i dogs pa rnam par sel/ /sprin rnams kyis kyang bsgrib par mi nus mun can gdug ba'i gza' las byung ba'i 'jigs pa zhi gyur pa/ /'jig rten dbang
144a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhabs kyi sen mo bsil zer ldan pa'i sngon med zer gyis khyed rnams dag gyur cig/ //nyon mongs phung po'i bud shing dag ni lus ba med bar sreg byed me chen mthon por gyur pa'i rtse/ /'jig rten gsum po
144a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu rab dkar gsal zhing gti mug mun gnag dag gi smag rum 'thibs pa sel/ /dmyal ba'i sa gzhir me yi phung po rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu po rgya chen rgyun ni 'bras bcas pa/ /padmo 'dzin zhabs las 'khrungs sen tshogs
144a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rnams kyis khyed kyi 'khor ba yang dag sel gyur cig /rang gi 'dun pas bcang pa'i 'dod pa sbyin la shin tu mkhas gyur yid bzhin nor bu bsam yas shing/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dogs pas gdungs gyur
144a7(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar bgyid ba'i bsil ba'i 'od zer yid ni rab 'phrog la/ /yon tan du ma'i tshogs rnams 'dzin pa gsal bar gyur cing mdzes pa dang ldan me long dag gi gzugs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs las skyes pa'i sen mo
144b1(rgyud 'grel): nges bskyed 'od zer mdzes pas khyed rnams skyong gyur cig /'od zer dpag med las 'khrungs che ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa dang ldan gtsug pud chen po ni/ /mdzes ldan mgon po'i rab tu mdzes zhabs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs ni de la
144b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshang mkhas lha rnams kyi/ /mgo yi rin chen mchog gi tshogs las nges par 'phros gyur shin tu rab bkra'i 'od zer tshogs rnams kyis/ /bde sogs dga' ba'i gzhu la nye bar spyod byed 'di dag gis ni khyed rnams yun ring dar gyur cig
144b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'dod pa'i yul rnams 'thob pa'i sbyin pa las ni dpal dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis mtho zhing/ kun tu rnam par mi g.yo'i 'od ni bsten byed snod rnams dag gi mgu ba bskyed par byed gyur la/ /dri ma dang bral mtshungs pa med
144b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs ni ri bong can las lhag cing skyon gyi mun sel pa/ /nor bu'i 'od zer lta bu phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyis khyed rnams dag la tshim pa sbyin gyur cig /rab mdzes phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las 'khrungs sen mo'i tshogs rnams dag
144b5(rgyud 'grel): gi 'od zer ni/ /rgyun chad med par snying rje'i chu yis nye bar bran pa de yi sku lus dag gis gzhi la/ /khyad 'phags ye shes sa bon btab pa las skyes mi chung dpag bsam shing gi myu'i tshogs rnams dang/ /mtshungs pa gang yin 'di yis
144b6(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa rab mang mdza' tshogs nyams par byed gyur cig /'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs pad las skyes sen mo'i 'od zer bdud dang dgra sde bdag la skrag ster zhing/ /utpal dmar mdog dang por don yod mnga' rnams med
144b7(rgyud 'grel): rtse gyen du bstan bcug? 'od zer ltar mdzes la/ /'jigs rung 'khor ba'i dong du rtag tu lhung ba'i skye bo 'dren byed sra mkhregs thag pa'i dpyad thag 'dis/ /shin tu rnyed dka' i phun sum tshogs pa chen po mtho ba'i go bzad? dag la 'khyen rnams
145a1(rgyud 'grel): 'god gyur cig/ 'od dang ldan zhing nyon mongs las kyis rang dbang med du ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam bar gcod la dpa' / /skyon gyi dmigs pa las ring gsal zhing mkhas ba'i bla ma skye bo rnams kyi sgrol bar byed gyur la
145a2(rgyud 'grel): kun du dga' ba rab sdug ster zhing ri bong 'dzin dpal mdza' dag 'dzin gyur dri ma dang bral ba/ bsam yas phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs 'khrungs sen mo gang yin de yis khyed kyi bsam pa rgyal gyur cig/ ci zhig bde 'byung gis 'di zla dum rnams
145a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod par bkod byas 'od dang ldan pa'i dum bu 'am/ /yang na nges par khyad 'phags yid gyur byang chub dpal mos rin chen phreng ba bkod dam ci zhig yin/ /lha rnams kyis ni lha yi me tog rmad byung mtshungs pa med rnams phreng ba rgyus
145a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs pa min nam zhes blo gros bskyed pa 'jig rten mgon po'i zhabs las 'khrungs pa sen mo'i phreng bas khyed rnams dgyes gyur cig/ gang du 'di ni padmo las skyes phyag bgyid 'chi med mgo bor nor bu'i khri stan mthon po la/ /zhabs
145a5(rgyud 'grel): rdul dag ni rgyun du gzims shing gang du yang ni 'dzin byed gzhi la mgo 'phyang rab 'dud pa/ /de ltar rab bskyed 'od zer tshogs kyi so ring gsal zhing bzhad gang bgyid 'dra 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs skyes sen mo gang yin de dag
145a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni khyed kyi mdza' bral mun pa gzhil ba'i slad gyur cig/ tsha gdung sel byed dpa' bo dkar bsil mchog ldan bdud brtsi'i thigs pa'i char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs mdzad cing/ /mi bzang mda' chen char gyi rgyun ni drag po rab 'grems
145a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud la gnod byed phyir ltar gyur pa/ /phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi sen mo'i 'od zer dpal mdzad dag gis khyed kyi 'khor ba'i rnam pa yi/ /khongs chen brtson rar rgya che'i sdug bsngal rnam mang 'jigs su rung rnams yang dag 'phrog
145b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byed gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs las rab skyes sen mo'i gnas la snang ba dag ni shin tu bzlog dka' ba'i/ /bdud kyis kun nas rab 'phangs mda' yis khyab rnams sgrib bar byed pa'i yol par 'khrul ba bskyed byed cing/ /kun nas
145b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs dpung rnams brlag 'gyur bsal bar go byed mjug rings chen po'i tshogs su brteg bya ba/ /'jig rten gsum gyis mi nus nus pa srid pa gsum las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon chen pos rgyal gyur cig/ //yang dag rdzogs pa'i
145b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi zla ba kun nas mdzes ldan 'od kyi tshogs pa lta bu dang/ nyon mongs nges bsregs thal ba'i tshogs rnams grol ba'i lam gyi rlung gis bdas nas bgrod pa lta bu dang/ /mi bzad bdud rnams kyis ni rnam par mi phyed mi chung rdo
145b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar glogs bu bkod ba lta bu yis/ /nye bar mtshon 'od phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs skyes sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ mtshan mo'i mgon po nges pa kho nar phyogs la zang cing rang nyid dman pa skyengs par gyur pas ni//
145b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig brtag par bya ba mtshungs med mun pa spongs mkhas dri ma dang mi zad pa mi mnga' zhing/ /mi dman sgra yi srin po zang byed pha rol 'gro skyong rdzi ba med pa'i brtul zhugs nyer mtshon pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen gang de
145b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mi kho ma 'phan pa dag las khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ phun tshogs dam pa'i sgrub byed rab tu stobs ldan pad+ma 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi rdzong la gnas bcas shing/ /'jig rten gsum dpal rgyal bar bzheng ba sen rnams
145b7(rgyud 'grel): mo'i 'od zer tshogs ni mtshungs med mngon par rab 'thob/ /bshes gnyen 'char bas tho ba pa'i rab gsal rjes su 'grogs ldan shin tu pul byung 'phel ba rnyed gyur pa/ /rgud pa kun gyi dgrar gyu thag pa chen yang dag 'grub pa'i
146a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu des khyed rnams phongs las srung gyur cig/ /gtsug pur la ni zla phyed rgyan 'dzin bzhed par gyur pa'i phyugs bdag 'di ni ngo tsha dang bral la/ /nub par mi 'gyur nor bus mngon par mdzes 'dod khyab 'jug dag
146a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang ji ltar mkhas pa lta bu yin/ /dbang po yi ni mgo bo tshe la nor bu 'di yang don yod min zhes phyag na pad zhabs kyi/ /sen mo'i tshogs 'di mthong gyur gang zhig mdzes pas sems zin 'jig rten gyis bsams de yis rgyal
146a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ rgya khyon cher byas ring du steng du 'gro zhing 'og tu 'ang dmyal ba rnams kyi sgrol bar byed par gyur/ /bsil zer ldan pa 'char kar gyur ltar dkar zhing dgra rnams bzhin ni nag po nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyu/ /nus mthu rnam
146a4(rgyud 'grel): par shes par bya ba dkar zhing ma lus 'gro bas mchog tu gsal bar mthong zhing snang/ /dbu la sangs rgyas kyi ni zhabs pad la gnas sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyod rnams srung gyur cig/ lha dbang dgyes pa'i mchod pa
146a5(rgyud 'grel): la mkhas lha mos rab gter ga pur phye ma kun nas 'thul ba yi/ /'od ltar snang zhing gus pa'i khur thogs 'phrog byed phyag 'tshal ral pa'i thal bar rnam par 'khrul pa'i sa/ /dpal mo mchod pa 'bul ba'i lag gi pad+ma'i
146a6(rgyud 'grel): ge sar rtse yi rdul phran zag pa ltar mdzes pa/ /phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs las skyes gyur sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams phongs las srung gyur cig/ //lhun po'i 'od zer ser po min bgyid lha yi glang chen li
146a7(rgyud 'grel): khri'i tshon gyis gsal byas dmar po'i dpal/ /nyams par byed pa dpa' zhing rta ljang can gyi rta yi ming man ljang ba nyid ni 'phrog bgyid la/ /sngon po'i snang ba nyams bgyid 'chi med bu mos 'o ma'i chu gter lung bab rnam
146b1(rgyud 'grel): brtags skrag gyur pa/ /padmo 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi padmo las 'khrungs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ lha rnams khyod kyi rnga yab bsil zer byed ltar dkar pa dag gis 'di la mdzes par mi 'os te/ /ka ye dam b+he
146b2(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa med pa'i ga bur phyi ma gus pa'i rtsom pas yongs su 'thor pa ci/ bde sogs khyed kyi me tog dkar po rnams kyis rab tu gtor bas ci zhes mtho ris sa yi rje/ /mchod la sngags mdzad phyag na chu skyes zhabs 'khrungs sen mo'i
146b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //ke la sha ltar 'bigs byed mdzes bskyed lha min las rgyal lus kyi nag po nyid ni nyams pa bgyid/ /nag mo rtsed 'joms? mdzes ldan byugs shing nyid ma'i rta yi 'od zer ljang gu nyid
146b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang dkar por mdzad/ /mchod mkhas lha yi skye bos gtor ba'i kun ta'i zil las bsil zer can gyi dum bu ltar gyur rnams/ /ci zhig la dgos 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs sen 'od zer che ba'i tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur

146b6(rgyud 'grel): dags pa bad dga' dag tu 'bab pa lta bu dbu la sangs rgyas kyi ni zhabs las 'khrungs pa yi/ /'od zer mchog tu rnam par rgyal bar gyur rnams khyed kyi srid pa myur du sel bar mdzad gyur cig/ //nag mo dga' ba'i zla ba'i
146b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i ? rgyas gnon bgyid sa gzhi 'dzin pa ke la sha yin ni/ /snang ba rgyas pa gsal bar nyams shing dkar po nyid gyur kha ba can gyi dkar ba nyid kyang 'phrog/ 'e ma'i rgya mtsho rgyas pa lud pa dang mtshungs phyogs rnams kyi
147a1(rgyud 'grel): yang lha yi glang chen po rnams ni/ /bcag pa'i dum bu ltar mdzes 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen 'od zer rgyus pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //gang zhig yongs 'du'i me tog gis mchod mtsho
147a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes dpal ni 'jums shing bung ba'i tshogs rnams gar bsgyur bgyid/ /gang la gnas bzhin bsnyen bkur la chags pad+ma cung zad zum zhing rang byung 'dug pa dka' par gyur/ /gang gis lha yi chung ma bdud pa'i skyon sel nyin
147a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dpal ni nag mo min par mtshan mor gyur/ /phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs sen zla ba mdzes ba dang ldan zla ba'i 'od 'dis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //lha yi na chung skye bo mdzes ma rnams kyis 'dod 'os su 'khrul mig
147a4(rgyud 'grel): tshugs lta zhing mchod gyur la/ /sen mo'i 'od gsal dkar zhing mdzes bar gyur pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i tshogs pa lta bu 'dzin mdzad cing/ /mi chung 'dod ba rab rgyas 'dod lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gyur ma yi spong la rab tu 'jug /

147a6(rgyud 'grel): don mthun nag po brtsegs pa shin tu gnag par gsal ba'i tshogs pa lta bu rab rgyas pa/ /phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi mtsho skyes dag gi sen mo'i 'od ni dri med 'o ma'i chu gter gyi/ /dbus las 'khrungs pa'i dpal mo
147a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yo med dga' ba'i rgyu 'dis khyed kyi dge legs mchog tu sgrub gyur cig/ //de pa rnams chad skyo bas 'phel ba'i me yi rtse mo bcod pa'i chu chen rab tu rgyas gyur cig/ pad+ma'i 'dzes pa'i rjes mthun gyis drangs
147b1(rgyud 'grel): sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sgrib byed rnams kyis bsgribs par gyur pa'i dpal/ /sen mo'i 'od zer dkar zhing rags la sdug por gyur pas rang dgar khyab cing nang ni khengs gyur pa/ /sor mo chu skyes dpal la reg pa'i zhabs kyis tshegs med ma chad
147b2(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi 'dod pa sbyin gyur cig/ 'khor lo'i 'od ni rab tu mdzes dang ldan gyur dri med sen mos bskyed pa ngo zla med pa'i dpal/ /mtshungs med yon tan grangs med bsod nams rnams kyis 'thob pa'i mtshan gyi tshogs ni rnam par 'dzin

147b4(rgyud 'grel): ris gang+gA'i gser gyi pad ljon me tog cung zad byed pas 'di la gtor ba'i yon tan ci/ /gsal ldan mtsho skyes su 'khrul bur ba'i phreng bas glu blangs nyid la gru rnams kyis ni ci zhig bya/ /rab mdzes sen mo 'di la nor bu'i phreng ba
147b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mdzes pa nyid du bgyi bar nus min zhes/ /gang zhig mchod pa lha yi dbang pos gsungs gyur phyag na chu skyes bsdams pa'i zhabs des rgyal gyur cig/ /gang zhig mgon po kho na'i bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyur gyur
147b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig ma yin skye ba'i snod kyi yang/ /gang du padmo mngon 'dod sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i tshogs nyid 'dab bskyong ma yin skye bo rnams kyi yang/ /gang gis rab lci ma nyid shin tu bla mar gyur cing 'dud rnyed ma yin 'jig rten gsum pa

148a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing/ /gang zhig rtsa ba mi dman res pa kho nar ljang khu nyid min mchog tu mdzes pa nyer 'dzin la/ /rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'chi med ma gor nyal dpal ni gnas pa'i sar gyur sen mo 'od zer bzhad pa
