148a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chu klung phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi 'od kyis khyed kyi rnam mang phan pa sgrub gyur cig/ //dbu la sangs rgyas rgyan ldan zhabs kyi nye 'khor du rgyu ma tshad med pa'i padmor 'khrul ldan pa/ /bung ba'i phreng ba sgra snyan sgrogs pa rnams
148a5(rgyud 'grel): ni sems can bskyab pa'i bya ba gcig bur rab brtan la/ /yun ring bzhugs par brtan par bgyi slad stobs chen snying rje dag gis spom zhing gnas pa lcags kyi ni/ /lcags sgrogs bkod pa lta bus khyed rnams dag gi phun
148a6(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa nges par g.yo med sgrub gyur cig/ pad+ma'i nang gi 'dab ma'i phreng ba ltar mdzes 'jam zhing rdo rje lta bu sra la rnam par brtan/ /gdug pa'i dgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bsnun byas mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams rnam
148a7(rgyud 'grel): par nyams par 'gyur ba'i sa/ /dmar zhing chags pa nye bar zhi ba 'khor ba'i chu gter dag las sgrol bar bgyid pa'i byed pa po/ /shin tu stobs ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i ri bong can 'dzin zhabs kyis khyed kyi skyo ba sel gyur
148b1(rgyud 'grel): cig/ dbang po'i chu skyes rab tu rgyas shing mdzes pa'i tshogs la bung pa g.yo ldan yin yang mi g.yo zhing/ /kun tu dga' ba'i kun nga 'phrog byed lag na gnas pa'i tshogs la sred ldan yin yang mi sred de/ mdun du khyab 'jug gis gtor mdzes ldan
148b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs 'du'i me tog dri bzangs ldan la'ang dga' ba mi skye bar/ /gang du bung ba'i phreng ba dgang 'gyur rgyal ba 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma des khyed srung gyur cig/ //'od zer rab tu mang ba'i tshogs las gyur pa'i ral pa g.yo zhing shin
148b3(rgyud 'grel): tu dag mdzes gsal ldan la/ /dmar zhing mdzes pas rjes 'phrel rab tu mtho ba sen mo'i so gtsigs kun nas mdzes shing yid du 'ong/ /nyes par zhugs pa'i gnyis 'thung dgra bo skrag bgyid ring du g.yo ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs gyur
148b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /pad skyes ral pa'i nags nyal? 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi seng ge khyed rnams zhi ba'i slad gyur cig/ /shin tu dri ma med kyang mi chung yang ba min yang myur du phyogs kyi sgo nams 'god par bgyid/ /'jig rten gsum pa kun tu dga' 
148b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyid kyang stobs ldan pha rol lus khyab yongs su gdul ba'i rgyu/ mdzes sdug 'gyur byed byug par ldan yang phul byad yid 'ong rgyas pa'i 'od zer dag gis me tog ni/ rnam rgyal phreng ba'i thod can zhabs kyi 'od zer khyed rnams phongs
148b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zug rngu 'gog par mdzad gyur cig/ gang la rgyal po'i rgyal pos me tog rnams dang 'phrog byed kyis kyang yongs 'du'i ljon shing yid 'phrog rnams/ /zla bas kun dga' ldan par kun da rnams dang nor lha'i rgyud kyis 'od ldan nor bu mar
148b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshogs/ /zhabs ldan dga' bas pA la sha ste de ltar lha yi skye bos mchod pa'i khyad par dag mang rnams so/ /rjes su khrid pa'i snyan ngag lta bus mchod bgyid phyag na chu skyes zhabs des khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ 'od rnams rnam par/
149a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba nyi mas bstod bgyis sen mo rnams la mtho ris mgon po yis/ /sor mo'i rtse mo'i tshogs la dbang phyug 'dren byed rnam par mi g.yo mdzes pa'i mdza' la mthar byed kyang/ /lha yi 'jig rten
149a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la gang gis thun mong min pa'i mdzes pa phul du byung ba'i yul rnams ni/ /ma lus mthong ba'i nus pa yod min mgo la sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mtshan ma'i zhabs des rgyal gyur cig/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs
149a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'od kyis rab gsal ral pa'i tshogs kyi rtsi shing ldan pa che ba'i sku/ /'khor ba'i chu gter gting du 'jug byed skye bo'i tshogs kyi shin tu lci ba'i sa gzhi rab gnon zhing/ /mdza' rnams dag las yang byung pa yid 'od zad cing
149a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba'i khams chen ldan pa'i chu rnams 'bab/ /grub pa'i don mthun gyis bsten padmo 'dzin pa ri bo'i zhes pa ni khyed kyi bzang po'i slad gyur cig/ //'khor ba'i lam la rab bgrod 'gro ba mdza' dag ngal zhing dub ldan
149a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i rgyu yi grib bsel can/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i yal ga rab gsal sen mo'i me tog 'dzin cing 'dod don 'bras bu dang ldan pa/ /lha yi skye bos rab btud mgo yi phreng bas bskyor ba'i rtsa bar nor bu'i bum pa gang ba yi/ /
149a6(rgyud 'grel): dri med 'od kyi chus ban 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi ljon shing tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ rtsa ba rab brtan nyon mongs tshogs pa'i dgra bo stobs ldan stobs rnams rtsad bcad snyed pa chen po yis/ /rangs pa
149a7(rgyud 'grel): thob gyur rnam par sgeg ldan stobs ldan las rgyal mgo yi gnas la g.yo zhing rnam par rtse/ /chu skyes rgyas pa'i rgyun la chags shing kun tu sred ldan dar ding mang po rab tu sgrogs ba yi/ /bud pa'i tshogs pa mo bzlogs mtshungs
149b1(rgyud 'grel): med dri bral pad+ma 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyis khyed la srung gyur cing// //'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug dpal 'byor lag ldan chung ma g.yo ba'i sdom thag gdags sa'i dbyug pa ste/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sprul gdug sos zin 'gyel
149b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'gro ba mdza' dag skyong bar byed mkhan nam mkha' lding/ /mi chung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nang na bzlog dkar 'jug pa'i sgo sdom rab brtan srid pa'i chu gter ni/ /legs par rgal ba'i gdos pa gcig pu 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs ni
149b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams 'byor pa'i slad gyur cig/ mdun sa gang du lha yi rol mo mkhan rnams mdzes pas yid gzung mchod pa bgyid par ma nus te/ /gang rnams rnam pa las 'das sil snyan rig byed kha na ma tho med rnams de tshe rnam par nyis
149b4(rgyud 'grel): dman pa min pa'i glu dbyangs mi len nyams rnams dag gis spras pa'i dngos po nyid min ngo bor gyur/ /de ltas brgya byin nang du bzhad gyur lta bas mi ngoms gzugs can mtsho skyes can des rgyal gyur gcig/ dpal ldan bar med ?
149b5(rgyud 'grel): tu mtshungs pa med cing cher gyur 'dod pa chen po'i khang pa mchog gi sar/ /lhag pa'i stobs ldan g.yon gyi rim par mi bzad 'dud pa'i bdud kyi yid rnams rab tu 'joms mdzad cing/ /sems can dga' bde rab bzhed grags
149b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni 'jam pa'i thugs ldan dal bas skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /mgo la 'od dpag med pas khyed kyi gti mug gis bskrun rab 'joms gya che'i 'jigs pa 'joms gyur cig/ brtan pa'i rab 'jigs su rung bas skor zhing sgra ldan
149b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings bas dam bcings ring por gsal ba'i sgra/ /drag po shin tu 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nyid kyi rnam par 'dzin pa dgra bo rnams dag ni/ /btson khang nar du gdung ba drag pos shin tu 'jigs par gyur rnams dran nas
150a1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs la rab gshegs shing/ bskur sti sgrub mdzad snying rje rab lci 'jig rten dbang phyug gang yin de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig /bskal pa'i mdza' yis rba rlabs ? 'phyo g.yo ba'i rlung gi stobs kyis
150a2(rgyud 'grel): rab gtsubs rba rlabs phreng ba rnams/ /sgra drag sgrogs shing thor thor dang ldan chu srin tshogs kyis gang ba 'jigs rung chu yi chu gter ni/ /gang zhig dmigs pa nyid na mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i tshogs chen bkram brtse dga' dag gi nad
150a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams rab dga' bar 'grub 'gyur padmo can de shin tu myur bar 'gro rnams srung ba'i slad gyur cig/ //du ba'i tshogs kyi 'ching bas bcings bas zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer nyams shing 'bras bu med par byed/ /'gog pa bskyed
150a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bgegs la mkhas pa'i lha yi chung ma rnams kyang brtan pa'i mthu rnams nyams 'gyur ba'i/ /du ba'i rgyal mtshan can yang gang gi ming brjod rgyun 'dzin 'dzin byed rnams la rab tu nyams 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas 'dzin pas
150a5(rgyud 'grel): khyed la nyams dgar rgyun chad med cing sgrub byed dang bcas legs pa sgrub gyur cig/ //khro bas rab bslad lag pa dus kyi mtshon cha dang 'dra 'jigs su rung ba'i srung ces sgrogs par byed/ /chang gis bsgos pa'i 'gram
150a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag tu bung ba'i tshogs gtibs glo bur gnag gyur bar zhing che ba'i lus/ /lag ldan dbang po 'ong ba gang gi mtshan gyi lcags kyu mnag dkas btab na zhum zhing skrag 'gyur pa/ /'jig rten dbang po'i thugs rjes rab 'dod
150a7(rgyud 'grel): yo byad de ni khyed kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig/ sud ces dbugs ni 'jigs rung khro ba'i rang gnas za bas bsreg byed mi chung dug gi du bar ldan/ /so yi bza' ba mthong pas mgo bo shin tu rab tu gdengs gyur nyes byes
150b1(rgyud 'grel): so rtse ldan pa rnams/ /rang gi mtshan ni dug so'i dbang po'i dgrar gyur blo la rnam par bzhugs pas nus med nyams 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten dbang de kun gyi nyon mongs phung po shin tu mi bzang mngon gyur zhi ba'i slad gyur cig/ //
150b2(rgyud 'grel): spos dris rab tu bslang ba'i dregs pa che 'dzin glang chen tshogs rnams za bar sgrogs shing 'jigs pa'i shugs/ /khro bas rtse gcig tu 'gro mgrin pa'i phug zab dag nas drag po'i ngar sgra zab mo sgrogs byed pa'i/ /ri dags dbang po
150b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khol byed kyis bkol 'os pa nyid du gang gi yon tan brjod pas ldan 'gyur pa/ /yan lag mchog mthor bde gshegs gnas shing rnal 'byor ldan nges khyed kyi ngan par 'brel pa sel gyur cig/ rab mang gnod ba rjes su dpag
150b4(rgyud 'grel): bya brtse bas zad pa'i snying ldan 'jigs pa sgrub par byed gyur pa/ /mkha' la gnas shing ri yis nye bar gzhal bya bung ba ma he mngon 'gyur 'od lta'i lus kyi tshogs/ /sbyor thabs legs ldan sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu gang zhabs brjod
150b5(rgyud 'grel): pas dman zhing brtson 'grus med pa dang/ /rnam par nyams par bgyid ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas nges khyed rnams rnam par rgyal ba'i slad gyur cig/ glang chen tshogs kyi chu srin rab rgyu ral gri mdung rings 'od dang ldan
150b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rba rlabs 'khrug cing rgyug/ //rab bskad dkar zhing g.yo ba'i tog gi dbu ba legs par gsal ldan skrag pa'i gnas kyi sar gyur pa/ /mtshungs med sgra rnams yang dag 'grogs pa'i sde brtan chu bo dag ni gang zhig brtan pa
150b7(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i grus/ /spro ba dang bcas yang dag rgal 'gyur mtsho skyes can nges khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig/ //sa 'dzin tshogs rnams 'byed pa'i mthu ldan 'od zer rab mang 'byor pa'i 'od la spyod cing 'jigs byed pa/ /rab tu
151a1(rgyud 'grel): bkra ba'i me 'od rnam 'dzin 'jigs pas mi gnon 'byung po rnams ni rmongs shing 'khrul bskyed pa/ rdo rje 'jigs? pa'i snod kyi mngon du lhung ba dag ni gang la gus pa'i mthu las myur nyid du/ /rnam
151a2(rgyud 'grel): par nyams pa'i sar 'gyur mdzes ldan mtsho skyes 'dzin pa de yis khyed kyi srid pa 'byed gyur cig/ //kun tu gzir bas brtan nyams 'pho ba'i sgrub byed nye gyur lha ngan 'khros pas ma bar rje zhan gyur pa /
151a3(rgyud 'grel): zug gzer mnag dka' drag pos 'geg byed rnam pa sna tshogs mang po'i nad kyis rab tu gzir ba'i lus /gang gis bsam gtan des brjod bdud rtsi 'dzin byed kyis gzung 'gro ba blo ldan zug rdus mi rdzi bar/
151a4(rgyud 'grel): lhag par dga' bskyed mgo la sangs rgyas de yis khyed rnams glo ni byang chub slad du srung gyur cig/ //reng nas bod bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bdag mtshungs med dgra rnams nyams shing rab tu gdung bar byed pa'i
151a5(rgyud 'grel): klu?/ drag tu len cing khrims lugs grags pa tha mes bdag po'i grags pa las rgyal khrims lugs dag dang ldan/ /'byor pa rnam kun brlag ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur khros pa'i blo can gang zhabs brjod pa'i nus pa
151a6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /mchog tu mdza' bar 'gugs byed rgyal ba'i khyu mchog gnas de khyed kyi 'jigs pa yang dag 'phrog gyur cig/ //tshangs pad man pa nyid gyur bla ma yang ni bla ma yin dang ma nyams par brjod nyams
151a7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid/ /khyab 'jug mi smra'i dang tshul dbang phyug kyang ni tshig rnams rnam par 'god pa'i khengs pa med gyur la/ /tshim zhing gsal bar bstod 'dod rnams kyang de ltar lha rnams gang gi yon tan brjod la mkhas min
151b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyi spyod yul nang gi yon tan tshogs mnga' phyag na pad+ma dag gis rgya la gyur cig/ //yab kyis ya mtshan la ste lha dgra'i dgra yis spyod pa dang ni mig gsum ldan pas mig dag la/ /rigs kyi dgra yis rag
151b2(rgyud 'grel): la bla ma yis kyang gshegs pa la ste mtshan mo'i bdag pos kun la'o/ /grogs pa yis ni byams pa la sti a tre'i bu yis 'gro kun bu ltar gyur pa'i mnyes gshin la/ /'di bstod bstod pa'i sbyod gang mdza' yas sbyin mdzad phyag na
151b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyes de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //gang la tshangs pas rang gi zhal rnams mang po nyid las mang po legs par bzhed dang ldan pas bstod/ /kun dags khengs shing phung pos kyang ngo klu rnams dag gi mgon pos kyang ni
151b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bos 'dud par bgyid/ /brgya byin 'dren byed brgya phrag bcu rnams bsngags pa bgyid cing gang ba rnams gzigs rgyun chad med par ni/ /'dren byed dga' bas phyag 'tshal bstod pa'i snod gyur 'jig rten gnyen des 'jig rten gsum
151b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams srung gyur cig/ //pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gdung med rab gsal 'jig rten pa rnams snang ba'i don du yod pa min nam zhes/ /mkha' yi lam la nyi ma'i 'gron po 'di ni ngal zhing snang byed 'od zer 'bras bu med par klong/ /blo
151b6(rgyud 'grel): yi nor can blo ldan rnams kyis bstod pa bgyis pas 'dun sar rags pa'i snang ba sgrub byed la/ /gang gi bka' drin myur du dag rnams nyams par byed pa de las 'gro ba dge legs ldan gyur cig/ //phug 'os gang la phyag
151b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bkang ba las kyang bsod nams snod rnams shin tu mtho pa nyid 'gyur la/ /thun mong min pa'i mchod 'os gcig pu mchod kyang gus pa'i snang rnams nye bar bsags pa shin tu mad/ /gang gi bsam gtan gnas pa ngan pa yis
152a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dag ni 'phral la brjed 'gyur la/ /mdza' yas bsam gyis mi khyab 'jig rten phan pa'i sgrub la 'jig rten mgon des khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //dbang po'i rdo rje brdzun te
152a2(rgyud 'grel): lha yi dgra rnams nyams bar gang gis byas shing stobs ldan 'phrog byed ni/ /shin tu rno zhing yid 'phrog mngon par me tog mda' can dag la me tog can ni 'bras bu med/ /khyab 'jug 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo don yod min zhes
152a3(rgyud 'grel): skye bo tshogs kyis nges par brjod ces nas/ /mtshon tshogs bzung ba med par dgra yis skye bo dga' bas bcom pa mtsho skyes ldan bas rgyal gyur cig/ //'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba 'dzin par gyur kyang 'gro ba'i sdug
152a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal drag po dag gis sdug bsngal ldan/ /rtag tu rjes su chags pa btang bar gyur kyang skyabs med sdug pa'i srog chags gtong pa dag las grol/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po nyid du gyur kyang mi mnyam srid ldan 'gro la
152a5(rgyud 'grel): brten zhing 'dud pa bgyid/ /mchu des bral bsam yas spyod pa sgrub mdzad mgo la sangs rgyas gang des khyed rnams yun ring srung gyur cig/ //rgyun mi 'chad bar 'jig rten gsum du dpe med mnyes gshin snum blugs
152a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bdag las zhi bar ni/ /gang zhig mi gshegs stobs ldan mi chung mu stegs rlung 'tshub dag gis rab tu rnam par mi g.yo zhing/ /gzhan phan rgyu la brtson pa rab brtan sdong bu mi nyams 'od zer dang ldan srid pa'i khang
152a7(rgyud 'grel): par ni/ /gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs pa sel byed 'jig rten dbang po'i sgron ma de yis rgyal gyur cig/ //gang du 'di ni kun la byams ldan mi bzang mang por gyur pa'i nyon mongs dgra rnams ci la bsreg /gang du
152b1(rgyud 'grel): grol? par nus pa'i mthu ldan snying rje'i zhags pa brtan pos g.yo ba med par ci la 'ching/ /gang du btang snyoms phyogs nyid la brten gzhan la phan par bgyid slad ci la 'khrug ste de yi phyir/ /rnam bkra ngo mtshar phyag na padmo'i spyod pa 'gro las
152b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das pas khyed rnams dman las rgyal gyur cig/ //kun las phan zhing kun gyi rang bzhin du gsal rgya che tshul ldan dus kun du ni kun gyi mgon/ /kun gyi don chen thams cad sgrub slad gang zhig 'dul ba'i sgrub byed rnams kun ni
152b3(rgyud 'grel): ster bar bgyi/ /bla mar gyur cing che ba'i yon tan kun gyis kun las 'das shing khengs ba kun ni zhum par bgyid/ /kun ni kun la rab sbyin mgo la kun mkhyen des ni srid chen khyed rnams 'bras dang bcas gyur cig/ //dbang po rje
152b4(rgyud 'grel): bo skye dgu rnams bdag 'chi med bla ma 'jig rten skyong ba ngag dang dbang po che/ /'od ldan dang ni dgra thul dbyug pa gzhan pas rgyal pa'i stobs ldan las rgyal nor sbyin rgyal ba'i zhabs/ /don ldan ming gi snod ni rgyal ba nyid
152b5(rgyud 'grel): ces khor bshad kyis khengs 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa las/ /lha mo skye bo ngo mtshar gyur rnams gang la phyag bgyid phyag na chu skyes de yis rgyal gyur cig/ //gtso bo 'phags pa rnams kyi mchog gyur bsdoms pa dag ni pha rol phongs
152b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu sel ba'i mchog/ rab tu mang ba'i mchog sbyin rgya che'i tshogs kyi chu yi char drag gsal zhing che ba'i rgyun tshogs kyi/ /sbyin pa'i mi dman rgyun 'dzin gyur cing bzlog dkar rab brtan bdud kyi dgra yi dpa' bos mi thul ba/ /dpag
152b7(rgyud 'grel): med 'od zer 'dzin pa'i dang ? yis ni khyed rnams dag gi dpa' bo'i dgra rnams bzlog gyur cig/ //gang du phyag na padmo'i mdzes ldan nus pa mchog gyur mthu dang ldan zhing rtag tu sbyor ba'o/ /'khor pa'i chu bdag lam zhags
153a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po mdza' dag mgon dang bcas zhes rnam par bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas snying rje ma chung kun gyi sgron mar gyur par don dang ldan pa dam pa ca'i khur po dag/ rnam par dor nas yang zhing mya ngan 'das pa
153a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thob par dgyes 'phel de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ //'gro ba'i bya ba tshogs kyi khur ni bla mar gyur pa'i pa de gshegs bzhin du gtsug gis legs par blangs/ /bsngags par 'os pa padmo'i rgyan ni gus pa'i
153a3(rgyud 'grel): snod la rang nyid bzhin du lag tu legs par gtod/ /sems can tshogs kyis zhi ba dag ni dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal me bzhin du yun ring 'thob par bgyid/ /gang gis nyon mongs rab 'chi ba rnams ni shin tu mi bzang 'gro ba bzhin
153a4(rgyud 'grel): du zhi mdzad des khyod srungs/ /gang zhig sgyu can min yang rang bzhin sna tshogs mdza' yas ston byed gsal bar grags pa'i sgyu dang ldan/ /'jigs kun yang dag zhi yang shin tu snying rje ldan pa nyid kyis 'jigs par gyur ba'i kun
153a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod mdzad/ /khro dang bral ba yin yang gdug pa'i bsam pa 'dul la mkhas pa'i khro ba rtag tu rjes su 'brel/ /bsam gyis khyab pa min yang chen pos bsam bya mgo la rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzes ldan des rgyal gyur cig/ //
153a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dam pa kho na ma lags sku lus mchog kyang dpag med 'od kyis mngon par dga' ba 'dzin/ /gang gi padmo kho na ma lags dgra sde dag kyang ci 'jigs bzod par dka' bdag kyang sa rnal ma/ /gang gis ral pa kho na ma
153a7(rgyud 'grel): lags nus pa dag kyang 'gro ba'i dgra 'joms byed par chos shing bsdams/ /mkhas pa 'jig rten mgon 'dis gshin rje khros pa'i bzhin ni snang ba dag las khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ //ma lus sems can don
153b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bya ba bgyi slad nus pa dag ni kun nas rab tu bstar bus shing/ /chos kyis bsdams pa gang gi tshe na srid pa'i chu gter dag ni skams kyis dogs nas 'dar byed cing/ /nyon mongs don mthun rab 'bros byang chub sems dpa' ngal so thub pa rnams
153b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /dag zhes bsngags shing gzhal byed mgo la bde gshegs gnas nges khyed kyi rab 'dod dri ma zhi gyur cig //bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gnod pa dag gis rnam bar 'joms pa mi bzang yid kyi'ang
153b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul min pa'i las/ /gcig tu nges par bde ba gcod pa'i 'gro ba'i drag bo bcad pa'i phyag na padmo ni dbang med myos bzhin shin tu 'jigs ldan rnam par mi 'gyur gang gis sko byed mgon po dag gi yang/ /lci bar gyur pa'i jo bo brtse ba des ni
153b4(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams brtse med mthar byed dag las srung gyur cig //zil gyis mnan pa'i sa nyid ma yin shin tu 'jam pa yin yang ji snyed 'jig rten khams mdza' yas/ /brtson 'grus shin tu bzlog bya ma yin dus gcig la yang
153b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu snang ba dag gis khyab par byed/ /ma lus shin tu gsal ba ma yin gzi ldan gzi yang me khyer 'od kyi cha shas rjes mthun pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gzi brjid de yis 'jigs pa zhi slad khyed kyi gti mug mun chen 'phrog gyur
153b6(rgyud 'grel): cig/ //ma lus nam mkha' i khams ni skye bo bzhin du kun nas yongs su rdzogs par byas gyur re ba'i phyogs/ /ltung ba'i phung po thams cad snang ba bzhin du rnam par nyams bar rab brtson phul byung med par bgyid/ /gang gis rdzu 'phrul
153b7(rgyud 'grel): che ldan yid kyi bdud ni mun pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig zhi bar 'gro bgyid pa/ /mtsho skyes ldan pa'i snang ba de ni khyed rnams dag ni rab mang 'byor pa 'phel ba'i slad gyur cig/ //gzhan gyi 'od rnams nyams byed dbang phyug cig shos
154a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis mtshungs dka' mun pa'i bung po'i stobs 'bigs shing/ sems can 'che ba'i bsams pa can rnams khyad par du ni gdung byed bkra ba'i 'od zer mi nyams pa/ /sna tshogs mdza' yas g.yo med la sogs
154a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs pa'i yu ba rnams dag na gsal bar byed ba'i nus pa'i 'dzin/ /'jig rten dbang po'i snang ba gcig kyang 'chi med tshogs mtshungs de ni khyed kyi 'jigs sel slar gyur cig/ gang du sems can ma lus rab mang 'dod pa'i
154a3(rgyud 'grel): chu la chu ba'i bde ba rnyed dka' phun tshogs shing/ /don mang mu stegs ngan pa'i skye bo ri bo lta bu rgal bar dka' ba'i gting du 'gro byed la/ /bzlog dka' kun nas rab rgyas 'gro ba'i srid pa nyams par byed pa'i rlabs phreng rab tu 'thel
154a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /phyag na pad+ma'i 'od zer chu gter khyer gyi nags me'i 'jigs pa'i srad rnam par 'phel gyur cig /chos kyi bdud rtsi'i chu bo gdul bya la yod gal te dmyal ba'i me rnams zhi ba 'di ni ci/ /bcing par byas pa ral pa'i
154a5(rgyud 'grel): phung po la yod gal te dgra yi tshogs rnams 'gro ba bral ba ci/ /spyi bo'i khang par rgyal ba rab lci gnas gyur gal te mgon po 'jig rten gsum rnams dud pa ci/ /de ltar 'jig rten gnyen gyi rnam par bkra ba'i tha snyad dag
154a6(rgyud 'grel): gis khyed kyi dgra rnams 'dzams gyur cig/ mngon par dga' bas rgyas pa gcig pu nyid kyang sems can bsam ba'i dbang byas rnam pa tha dad pa/ /dbye dka' yang dag min pa'i rtog pa g.yo med mi g.yo dag la rtsom pa chen
154a7(rgyud 'grel): po rdo rje'i rtse/ /dam pa'i blo gros ku mu ta la zla ba'i 'od zer mu stegs don? med can brjod mun pa la/ /nyams par byed pa'i nyi ma 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs pa'i bstan pa khyed kyi srid 'byed slad gyur cig/ sna tshogs rnam par
154b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pa'i gnas kyi 'dun sar 'dus pa rgya cher dregs pa'i cha las smras pa po/ /bzlog dkar rab gyur bsnyon pa'i sgra chen ldan pa rkan mig la sogs dman pa dang bcas zhum 'gyur cing/ /bag med myos pa'i skye bo rnams kyis rnam par ltung ba
154b2(rgyud 'grel): rab sel mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa/ /mgo la rgyal ba'i sku lus 'od zer phun tshogs dag gi dngos po skye med gsung nges rgyal gyur cig/ dgra rnams dngar rgyal ldan mtshon gang 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mdzes shing 'gro ba  
154b3(rgyud 'grel): dag gis bstod/ /mya ngam dmyal ba'i gnas rnams dag la rgya cher gdung ba rab tu 'joms byed rnam par rgyas pa'i chu/ /dgra yis 'phangs pa'i mtshon phreng dag la stobs ldan rdo rje srid gsum mdza' dag 'jigs par gyur pa rnams/ /
154b4(rgyud 'grel): nyams par bgyid pa la bsngags phyag na pad+ma'i phyag ni khyed rnams chags nyams med pa'i slab gyur cig/ 'jig pa'i mthor rlung dag gis dkrugs ltar yul gyi ri bo rab mthor ljan pa'i phreng ba'i rtsa ba rnams/ /rtsad nas 'byin pa'i stobs
154b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing dgra yi glang chen dregs pa ni chung nyams pa nyid du bgyid/ /slong ba'i sbrang rtsi byed 'grugs sbyin pa'i rgyun 'bebs 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag gi sdong po la dga' pa/ /bzang po dag ni khyed kyi dgra yi grong khyer srid pa 'joms pa'i
154b6(rgyud 'grel): slad du brtul te 'jug gyur cig/ dam pa'i khongs ni gang zhig nor la sred ldan skye bo'i tshogs kyi re ba mi chad grub pa'i gter/ /gang zhig yu ba dag ni rdo rje'i rjes mthun dgra rnams skrag bgyid 'dab ma dam par gyur ba'i rtse/ /yang dag
154b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mos gnas bgyis yon tan bsngags par 'os ldan rnam par ma btang ba/ /'jig rten mgon po'i phyag gi yongs rdzogs pad+ma de ni khyed rnams dag gi grol ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ rtag tu sred pa rnam par 'phel
155a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing mgrin ba'i phugs skabs dman par gyur pa'i yi dags phung po rnams/ /kun tu dga' ba skyed byed dam pa'i bcud ldan mchog tu byang chub dpal mo lhag par gnas pa can/ /'byor 'dod yi dang ldan pa
155a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis legs par bsten gnas dam pa'i pad+ma gsal zhing mdzes pa yi/ /tshogs kyis rab sgras ze ba dang ldan 'jig rten dbang po'i chu skyes gang nges khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ nyon mongs nyi ma sdug bsngal tshogs kyi
155a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer chud pa ma yin stug por gyur pa'i tsha gdung gis/ /gdung zhing dman pa'i skye bo gang dag rnams la tshang pa'i gdugs dang mtshungs par rjes su sgrub byed cing/ /mi dman gdung bar mi 'gyur ma lus 'jig rten dag la
155a4(rgyud 'grel): ma tshang med 'od steng gi bla rer bres/ /'jig rten dbang po'i phyag na 'byor ba'i dri med par mos khyed kyi sdig pa nyams par 'gro gyur cig/ stobs rnams kyi gnas bdag nyid che rnams che bar dar ba'i gzhi dang 'od zer grags
155a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi khyim/ /dgra rnams skrag par 'gyur ba'i gnas dang mnag par dka' ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i sa gzhi nyid gyur pa/ /sdug cing mdzes pa'i bsti gnas dang ni 'gro las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus phung po rgya cher gyur
155a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /'jig rten dbang po'i dpung pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dgra mang tshang gcod gtum po'i dbyug pa nyid gyur cig /gang zhig rnam mdzes bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi 'gyur bag ldan yang dgra bo rnams ni 'jigs pa kho nar bgyid//
155a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba rtsol bar bgyid pa min nyid de lta na yang lta byed rnams kyi dga' ba nyung ba min/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes pa'i khang pa yin yang 'gro kun rgyan rnams mdzes dang gral bar bgyid/ /'od ldan chu skyes can gyi gos
155b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gcig bu de yis khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig/ gang zhig rab mdzes rgya mtshor gzugs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal nub cing bsod nams snod kyi lha byed rnams/ /'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas sred pa skyes pa yang ni mi gnas rab tu g.yo bas
155b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms 'gyur ba/ /mtshungs med rab tu mdzes ldan ri bong mtshan ma can sogs grangs med rnams ni gcig tu bgyis sam zhes/ /rnam bar 'gyur zhes de yi pad+ma las kyang rgyal ldan phyag na pad+ma'i bzhin des rgyal gyur cig/ /gang du rgyun chad
155b3(rgyud 'grel): med par mdzes pa'i chu tshogs ldan pa'i sprin rnams kyis bsgribs dgra rnams snod la ni/ /shin tu rab gsal lan cig ma yin 'tshig pa ster ba'i yul ngan du gyur lus can rnams la yang/ /shin tu rjes 'brel dri ma med pa'i snag tsha'i
155b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dam gyi tshogs kyis rab tu bsgos rnams 'khru bar bgyid/ /mgo la sangs rgyas khang pa'i bzhin ni shin tu bzhin bzang khyed kyi rnam bkra'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig/ phyag na bzhed pa'i chu skyes dag gis skyo ba med pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs dag ni
155b5(rgyud 'grel): rab gsal zhing/ /che bar brtsigs te bkod pa'i nang na rnam bzhugs gsal ba dang 'dres 'od dpag med kyi 'od gsal tshogs/ /tha dad du byas 'od ni gsal ldan gyen du brtsams shing bcings pa'i steng gi stug po bkod pa ni/ /mdzes pas
155b6(rgyud 'grel): tshim pa mi mthong dgra rnams rab 'jigs gsal zhing sga ldan go chas khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ rgyun chad med par rnam 'phro shin tu kun dga' i rgyur gyur 'od dpag med 'od chu yi tshogs lta bus/ /bran pa las ni shin tu phul byung dag cing
155b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i 'phal ba rnyed gyur lhag pa'i dri bzang can/ /lha yi me tog rmad byung tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i padmo 'dzin pa'i ral pa dag gi ni/ /dpag bsam 'khri shing tshogs ni khyed rnams dag gi bsam pa'i don rnams phun
156a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ gang zhig bcings par gyur kyang rnam par grol bar nges par bgrod byed gang zhig lus la lhag gnas pa/ /gzhan rnams nges par spangs kyang thun mong min par mgon po 'od dpag
156a2(rgyud 'grel): med kyis rnam par brgyan par mdzad/ /dri bzangs thams cad spangs kyang gang zhig mtshungs med dri bzangs mang pos ma lus phyogs rnams byugs gyur pa/ /'jig rten dbang po'i shin tu che ba'i ral pa de yis khyed kyi nges par thob bya'i
156a3(rgyud 'grel): 'ching ba 'phrog gyur cig/ ral tshogs ma lags skye bo ma lus rnams kyi yid bzangs 'ching bar bgyid pa zhags pa'i phung po lags/ /mdzes sdug ma lags 'on kyang sdug bsngal me yis rnam bcom 'gro rnams gso byed
156a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun/ /padmo ma lags ma rungs mthar byed rta rgod 'dul lcags rgyal ba'i ri bong can sbyar skra yi dpal/ /khyed kyi nyon mongs skyon rnams shin tu 'joms shing mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad gyur cig /
156a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus phyogs rnams sreg byed lhag par kun tu dmar ser gzi brjid ldan ba rnam par bkod gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum po rmongs shing 'jigs la skyabs med za ba'i tshogs 'bar bskal pa'i me ltar brtag bya ba/ /so bsdams
156a6(rgyud 'grel): sdang mig rab tu 'bar ba'i rta mgrin dag gis rjes su kun nas gtang de gzigs pa las/ /mtshungs med brtse ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug skad cig 'jigs pa'i gzigs stangs skyes pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ 'jig rten
156a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni brlag par rab gtod gsal ba ma lus sa 'dzin che rnams de ring myur bar ni/ /phye mar 'gyur bgyid 'dzin par byed pa yang ste mdza' med chu yi gter rnams skam pa nyid bgyid pa/ /de ltas gang zhig khrod bzung ste
156b1(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer rab rgyas bsdus gyur 'jigs su rung ba'i dpral ba las/ /des mthon lha mo mtshungs med dpung stobs can gyis mthong nas skrag 'gyur mtsho skyes can des rgyal gyur cig/ bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod cing bla ma rnams kyi'ang 'gro ba'i bla ma
156b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya rnams kyi phyag byas pa/ /mi nyung bskal par bsgrubs pa'i zol med nus ldan mdza' dag 'gro ba'i skyabs gyur mtshungs pa med pa yis/ /brtse ba rang nyid lus can bzhin du 'jig rten sdug bsngal bzhil phyir padmo can las legs
156b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thon ba/ /sgrol ma yis ni khyed kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i nang du lci bar gyur ba'i gdung byed 'phrog gyur cig/ tshig mdza' ldan pa'i tshigs kyis grangs ni bgrang bar lci zhing tshig bdag mchog gi tshig gis sde tshan yang/ /rjes su gzung bar nus
156b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin dang pa'i 'gros dang drag po'i tshig rnams kyis kyang gsal par ni/ /brjod par rtogs dka' brjod bya min tshogs ni cha shas chung ngus gus pas brjod de yongs rdzogs pa/ /bde gshegs tshig gis yang dag brjod bya chu skyes ldan
156b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ /skye ba skye ba rnams su spyan ras gzigs dbang gi zhabs la gus shing rang bzhin shin tu drang ba dang/ /blo gros mi g.yo gzhan phan bla ma'i bya ba dag/ bya bar ldan zhing snyan ngag
156b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhan duAng 'gyur bar shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa/ /snyan ngag mkhan chen po shI badzra de ba zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas spras pa bla ma
156b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang/ mi'i dbang po dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan chen po mahA paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mI kA ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shong ston gyis bsgyur ba'o/ //
157a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i brgyud pa ni/ sangs rgyas/ slob dpon badzra de wa/ karma nA tha/ A di tya/ mahA paN+Di ta sh+rI ba na ratna pA da:// //rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa/ 'jig
157a2(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten bla ma sa gsum gyis phyag byas/ /lha dbang tshangs pa mchog gis bstod pa ste/ /thub mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsol/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde
157a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog /bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /gser gyi pad+mas g.yon gyi phyag rgyan pa/ /dri med ral pa 'khyil nag cung zad ser/ /
157a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /pad+ma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan/ /mkhur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar/ /ri dags rgyal po'i dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar/ /nyi ma 'char ka ltar dmar btsod kyi
157a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog /pad+ma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la/ /ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bur sgra sgrogs pa/ /dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis mdzes pa ste/ /phyag mthil pad+ma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam/ /ri dags pags pa sku yi bstod na mnabs//
157a6(rgyud 'grel): snyan gnyis rna rgyan g.yo zhing mdzes pa mnga' / /phyag ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste/ /pad+ma dri ma med pa lta bu lags/ /gser mchog sku rags nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa/ /na bza' mdzes pas sku yi smad brgyan pa/ /rgyal ba ye shes rgya
157a7(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i pha rol phyin/ /bsod nams du ma las ni 'khrungs pa'i mgon/ /rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa/ /srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' la rgyu ba dang/ /kun tu rgyu ba'i sku mchog la bstod pa/ /bdud ris sna
157b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms/ /zhabs mchog rkyang gdub mchog gis sgra sgrogs la/ /glang po dregs dang dad pa'i stabs su gshegs/ /bdud rtsi chen po thugs chud yongs rdzogs brnyes/ /gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba/ /ri
157b2(rgyud 'grel): be bru 'dzin na ni dgyes par bzhugs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa/ /dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ma Ni dI pa mahA ka ru Ni ka de ba pany+tsa sto tra/ bod skad du/ nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po
157b3(rgyud 'grel): lha lnga la bstod pa/ /rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gling du thugs rjes sku 'khrungs dpal ldan pad+ma'i rigs/ /ri rgyal po ta la yi rin chen brag phug nyams dga' bar/ /pad zla'i dbus na thugs rje'i sku ni 'gyid
157b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing rol ba'i nyams/ /thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag nad gso ba mgon po thugs rje can/ /ma rig thibs po 'gro ba'i mun sel rje btsun rab rib sel/ /skye rgan 'chi thar dka' yang srid rtsibs drug 'khor
157b5(rgyud 'grel): lor chung/ /srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog dka' sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying/ /mgon po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad thugs rje'i sku yis sgrol/ /zla ba ltar dkar phyag gnyis pad+ma gdung ba sel ba'i phyag /dpag med
157b6(rgyud 'grel): cod pan rin chen mdzes brgyan gzhon nu zhi ba'i sku/ /thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis zug rngu'i nad dang sdug bsngal sel/ /thugs rje ri dags lpags 'dzin srid pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i thugs gdungs spyan g.yas chab las
157b7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo thugs rje'i sku/ /yid 'ong sgrol ma ljang ser bde ma rin chen rgyan mdzes sgeg /pad+ma'i sku la phyag mtshan ud pa la kha 'byed phyag gnyis kyis/ /bcud rgyas nu mas gso mdzad 'gro ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
158a1(rgyud 'grel): can sdug bsngal gzigs nas snying rje'i chu las mdzes ma 'khrungs/ /khro gnyer zhi ba ser mo rin chen sku brgyan thugs rjes 'gying/ /rje btsun mgon gzigs phyag mtshan gus pa'i phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnams/ /mchod
158a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bum chus 'gro ba'i re skong yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes phrin las dregs pa tshar spyod dbang mdzad khro rgyal sku/ /sbrul brgyan 'od dmar rta gdong ljang gu spyi bor rta skad bzhad/ /mgon po pa ne la 'dud pus btsugs
158a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams/ /pad+ma'i rigs sprul thugs rje'i brlan gyis sgeg khro phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na pad+ma'i drung na dam chos nyer zhu tshong dpon bu/ /nor bzangs sras po gser mdog skal ldan nyid bzhugs rin chen brgyan/ /em
158a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la gus thal sbyar pus gtsugs pa ti bsnams/ /bzhin bzangs khye'u dang ldan nor bzangs bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug kha sarba ni 'khor bcas la/ /bdag gis gus par bstod dgyis zla ltar dge ba
158a5(rgyud 'grel): dri med des/ /srid mtsho skems shing thugs rje'i chu yis skye 'gro kun doms nas/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' po ta la ru skye bar shog /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu brgal gyur pa/ /thub pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i
158a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso la bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog /nor bu'i gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa/ /slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga
158a7(rgyud 'grel): nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad
158b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /ge sar dkyil na spyan ras gzigs/ /man 'dzi'i ri dang mchod phreng g.yas/ /g.yon pa padmo zhabs pa 'dzin/ /spyan gsum dbu la 'od dpag med/ /shel gyi ri ltar dkar ba ste/ /rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par spras/ /ma chags dkyil
158b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gtso la bstod/ /don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren/ /spyan gsum phyag bzhi rgyan gyis klu bas/ /rdo rje dang ni zhags pa g.yas/ /g.yon pa padmo lcags kyu dang/ /'od dpag med kyis dbu rgyan mtho/ /dmar brkyang phyed ba sku phyed ldan bstod/
158b3(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi ste/ /g.yas na rdo rje be con 'dzin/ /sdigs mdzub pad+ma zum pa g.yon/ /sprul dang rtag lpags sku brgyan pa/ /dmar po dbur ldan khyed la bstod/ /do ker gcig ma bran
158b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyan/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad shin tu khro/ /rdo rje ral gri be con dang/ /thod pa g.yas na 'dzin pa ste/ /dgra sta shag ti thod zhags g.yon/ /mthing nag glang gzigs dpa' gang bstod/ /khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed/ /zhal
158b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhir ldan/ /bgrang phreng phyag 'tshal thal mo g.yas/ /g.yon na dbyug pa g+hund+he 'dzin/ /rin chen rgyan ldan shel ltar dkar/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gang ldan bstod/ /tshim par mdzad dang mdzes par mdzad/ /snang
158b6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad dang bde bar mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mdzes tshul 'dzin/ /lha mo rmad byung bzhi la bstod/ /sgo yi dbus na bzhugs pa gang/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgog dril/ /tshad med bzhi yi ngo bo nyid/ /sgo skyong rnam pa bzhi la
158b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /tshangs dbang drag po nyi zla dang/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong la sogs/ /gtsang ma rigs kyi srung mar bcas/ /rnam kun 'khor ldan kun la bstod/ /mi rtog ye shes khyad par las/ /sems can kun las thugs brtse'i phyir//
159a1(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bzhi yis don mdzad pa/ /dkyil 'khor grwa gnas bzhi la bstod/ /khyod kyis yon tan dpag med las/ /shin tu phra ba'i cha blangs nas/ /mngon sum lta bur dang dmigs pas/ /khyed ltar yon tan rab
159a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa/ /slob dpon tsan+t+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//'phags pa thugs rje chen po la bstod pa smre sngags su gsol ba bzhugs//)
159a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/ /rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil bzhin mdzes/ /ji ltar mkha' la nyi stong 'bar ba bzhin/ /dpa' bo 'od zer tshogs kyis rnam
159a4(rgyud 'grel): par mdzes/ /srid pa gsum gyi sa mkhan ston par grags/ /khams gsum 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig po/ /thugs rje'i lha khyed bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /bdag ni thog ma
159a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i dus mdza' nas/ /lam stod lam log srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyam/ /sngon tshe las log sdig pa byas pas gnod/ /sdig pa'i las ni ci byas rang gnod 'gyod/ /dar zhing rgyas pa'i las dbang de btsan pas/ /'khor ba'i sdug
159a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te/ /zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsregs/ /gti mug mun pa chen pos shes rab rmongs/ /'dod chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes bying/ /nga rgyal mthon po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan/ /phrag dog
159a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung nag tshub mas 'khor bar g.yengs/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/ /'dod pa me dang 'dra pa'i 'obs su ltung/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i mda' drag char du bab/ /me khams nyi ma'i gdugs ni steng nas tsha/ /
159b1(rgyud 'grel): chu khams sa yi brlan ni 'og nas drang/ /phyi rol ser bu'i ngang ni mdza' nas tsha/ /bad kan rlung mkhris nad ni khong nas ldang/ /de 'dra'i sdug bsngal drag po bzod dka' nas/ /sdom pa'i dam tshig gshig par ga la rung/ /sdug bsngal kun dang
159b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngos nas sdom bsrungs zhing/ /mos shing dad pas 'phags mchog mi gtong na/ /'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci la dgongs/ /byams mgon ci slad bdag la thugs mi brtse/ /ye shes spyan can khyed kyi spyan snga ru/ /bdag 'dras
159b3(rgyud 'grel): smre sngags gsol bar mi rigs kyang/ /shin tu bskrag pa'i smre sngags gsol lags na/ /thugs rje chen pos bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag 'dra'i skye bo las ngan sdig po che/ /las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes/ /skyes
159b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med/ /las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra/ /las dbang chu rgyun 'phral la ga la zlogs/ /bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thog /lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du thal/ /las kyi
159b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu ngan pas shin tu bsreg /las dbang bsreg pa'i me ni rab 'bar zhing/ /rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur na/ /phung po'i sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod pas/ /byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam/ /ye
159b6(rgyud 'grel): shes spyan can khyed kyi spyan snga ru/ /sdig pa'i rnam grangs ma lus 'thol bshags na/ /thugs rje chen pos dag par mdzad du gsol/ /da nas bzung nas sdig pa mi bgyid spong/ /dka' yi don la mngon sum phyogs par bgyid/ /nam
159b7(rgyud 'grel): yang sdig pa'i dbang du ma gyur cig /nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar 'od dangs pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong 'tshal lags na/ /thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis/ /sgribs shing nongs pa'i mig gis ma mthong na/ /'gro ba'i mgon
160a1(rgyud 'grel): khyed da lta gang na bzhugs ba sdug bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzad pas/ /shin tu bsregs pas skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs shing/ /da dung gdung ba'i smre sngags nyid 'dod na/ /nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ros 'o dod 'bod/ /byams
160a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon thugs rje can gyis gsan lags sam/ /phongs pa gang gis nga yi mchan thos na/ /de yi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya'o zhes/ /'gro la nyid kyi thugs rjes zhal bzhes nas/ /bdag cag 'gro ba sems can thams cad la/ /dug
160a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dug gsum nad kyi bzir lags na/ /mi bzad nang ni thugs rjes zhi bar mdzod/ /thugs rje'i thugs kyis bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje'i gsung gis bdag
160a4(rgyud 'grel): la sgrog tu gsol/ /bdag ni shi 'phos lus sems brjes pa'i tshe/ /gnyen bshes grogs dang bral nas gshin rjes 'khrid/ /de dus 'jig rten nye dus mi phan pas/ /las kyi mnar bas bdag rang gcig pur 'khyam/ /de
160a5(rgyud 'grel): dus bdag la mgon skyab ma mchis na/ /thugs rje chen pos mgon skyabs mdzad du gsol/ /las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba/ /thog ma med nas phyin ci log rtog pas/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las ma thar ste/
160a6(rgyud 'grel): skal pa dpag med skye ba grangs med du/ /gdos bcas lus blangs skye ba dpag med zhig /sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam/ /snag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam/ /las 'phro bsags na mdza' yas brjod
160a7(rgyud 'grel): mi lang/ /khams gsum grangs shing skye ba'i kha rgyud kyang/ /byas pa'i las rnams don med chung re gsan/ /bka' yi gtan tshigs zab mo ma khrol cing/ /shes rab zab mo'i mig bu ma bye bas/ /srid pa'i yo byad gtong bar
160b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yod cing/ /phung po sgyu ma'i lus la chags shing zhe na/ /las kyi dbang brtsan nyon mongs stobs che bas/ /sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar khyams/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i mi bzad 'di lta bu'i/ /nyes pa thams cad rang gi las las byung//
160b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyun bcad de/ /nyon mongs las kyi rgyun ni bzlog du gsol/ /nyon mongs las kyi rgyun ni dbang btsan pas/ /ma rig mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams te/ /ye shes nyi ma'i 'od kyis bsal du gsol/ /nyes
160b3(rgyud 'grel): byas las kyi 'bras bu mi zad na/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrin las mdzad du gsol/ /dug gsum sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir lags na/ /thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis gsol bar gsol/ /phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags
160b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ /myur 'gyod thugs rje'i phyag gis gzung du gsol/ /srid pa'i chu bos bdag cag khyer lags na/ /zag med ye shes gru yis bsgral du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan brjod yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan gzhung las ji ltar byung
160b5(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin/ /ma lus bdag la myur du stsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs/ /phyag 'tshal bstod dang sdig bshags smre gsol dang/ /dge ba'i las ni cung zad ci bsags pa/ /thams cad bla med byang chub
160b6(rgyud 'grel): chen por bsngo/ /mi dmigs bsngo dang gsol btab smon lam dang/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/ /zhing rab dam pa'i gnas su skye bar shog /zhing rab dam pa'i gnas su skyes nas kyang/ /rgyal ba sras
160b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas zhal mthong gsung thos shog /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /mchod pa'i yo byad bdag la ma mchis pas/ /smre sngags chen pos khyed la gsol 'debs na/ /mchog gi dngos grub ma lus stsal du gsol/ 
161a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /gang dang gang la mgon dang skyabs med pa/ /de dang de yi mgon skyabs zhal bzhes nas/ /skyabs med sdig can rnams la skyab tu gsol/ /skyabs med tshe 'das rnams la
161a2(rgyud 'grel): skyab tu gsol/ /skyabs med 'khor bar 'khyams la skyab tu gsol/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /nyin re bzhin du sdig pas zil gyis non/ /las ngan sgrib pa ci mchis bsal du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags
161a3(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs/ /bdag ni nyon mongs dbang du mi 'gro bar/ /sdig pa'i las ni gang yang mi byed cing/ /nyin dang mtshan du chos la sbyong ba ru/ /thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa
161a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs/ /mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal rnams/ /zhi bar mdzad pa khyed dang 'jal gyur na/ /bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /khyed kyi gzungs
161a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod pa'i phan yon nam/ /yon tan bzhung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin/ /ma lus bdag la myur du stsal du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /bdag gis khyed bsgoms snying po bzlas pa dang/ /
161a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod dang sdig bshags smre gsol bas/ /mgon po khyed kyi zhal mthong gsung thos nas/ /khyod kyi go 'phang myur du thob nas kyang/ /bdag kyang khyed ltar 'gro don byed par shog /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
161a7(rgyud 'grel): gzigs/ /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de srid bdag gis lus bskyed pas/ /lus kyi mgon po mchod byed cing/ /lus kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de
161b1(rgyud 'grel): srid bdag gis gang skyes pas/ /ngag gi mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing/ /ngag gi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog /thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de srid bdag gi yid skyes pas/ /yid kyi mgon po rjes dran
161b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /yid kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog /de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug bsten bgyis pas/ /lus ngag yid gsum skyon bral nas/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog /de ltar lus ngag yid gsum
161b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu dad gus bgyis bas ni/ /thugs rjes dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de 'dra bdag kyang 'grub gyur nas/ /
161b4(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum re ba rdzogs par shog /srid gsum 'dod dgu 'phyung bar shog /srid pa gsum gyi sems can la/ /dngos sam brgyud pas phan thogs shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod  
161b5(rgyud 'grel): pa smre sngags su gsol ba rdzogs so// (//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smre sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa bzhugs/) / !/ /na mo lo ka shwa rA ya/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags
161b6(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs/ /dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/ /rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /ji ltar mkha' la nyi 'od stong 'bar bzhin/ /dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba/ /srid pa gsum gyi sa
161b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan ston par grags/ /khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ni thogs ma med pa'i dus mdza' nas/ /lam log lam gtor srid pa'i 'khor bar
162a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyams/ /sngon tshe las log sdig pa spyad pas nongs/ /sdig pa'i las rnams ci byas rang gnong 'gyod/ /dar zhing drag pa'i las de dbang btsan pas/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te/ /zhe sdang
162a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsregs/ /gti mug mun pa'i cho gas kyis shes rgyud rmongs/ /'dod chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes bying/ /nga rgyal chen po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan/ /phrag dog rlung dmar tshub mas 'khor bar
162a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yengs/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/ /'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su lhung/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i 'dam rdzab char ltar bab/ /me khams nyi ma'i gdugs ni steng nas tsha/ /chu khams sa yi rlan
162a4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'og nas grang/ /phyi yi ser bu'i ngang ni thad nas tsha/ /kun nas 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni khong nas ldang/ /de lta'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' yang/ /sdom pa'i yi dam gzhig tu ga la rung/ /sdug bsngal kun dang bsdoms
162a5(rgyud 'grel): nas sdom bsrung zhing/ /mos pa'i dad pas 'phags mchog mi 'dor na/ /'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci zhig dgongs/ /byams mgon ci klad bdag la thugs mi brtse/ /bdag 'dra'i glun rmongs las ngan sdig po che/ /
162a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes/ /skyes pas 'gyod de las la yi re chad/ /yid chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med/ /las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dre/ /las dbang chu rgyun zlog par shin tu
162a7(rgyud 'grel): dka' / /bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thogs/ /lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du song/ /sdig pa'i las dbang drag po'i me 'bar bas/ /rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te/ /phung po sgyu ma'i lus
162b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis mi bzod na/ /byams mgon thugs rje can gyis dgongs lags sam/ /nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i/ /thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bar 'tshal lags na/ /thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis/ /ldongs pa'i chu bur mig
162b2(rgyud 'grel): gis ma mthong na/ /'gro ba'i mgon khyod da lta ga na bzhugs/ /sdug bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzod pa/ /shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas/ /dung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing/ /nyam thag 'phongs pa'i nga
162b3(rgyud 'grel): ngos 'o dod 'bod/ /byams mgon thugs rje can gyis gsan lags sam/ /nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus sems brje ba'i tshe/ /gnyen bshes grogs dang bral te gshin rjes khrid/ /de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te/ /las kyi dbang
162b4(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag rang cig pur khrid/ /dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na/ /byams mgon khyod kyis 'khor bar bdag gtong ngam/ /las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas lam log pas/ /
162b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las mthar te/ /bskal pa dpag med skye ba ji snyed du/ /sngon chad lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te/ /sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam/ /rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam//
162b6(rgyud 'grel): las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang/ /khams gsum bgrang zhing skye ba mang brgyud kyang/ /byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos/ /skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la/ /skye ba gcig cig kho na tsam gyi las/ /bla
162b7(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub don du rab 'bad na/ /de tsam byas pa'i las la'ang don de yod/ /las ni dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas/ /sha khrag 'dus pa'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i srid pa'i btson rar tshud/ /
163a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bzod sdug bsngal drag po 'di myong na/ /nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung/ /byams mgon thugs rje can gyis phod lags sam/ /thugs rje chen pos ngan song rgyun bcad de/ /nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni zlog tu
163a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni dbang btsan nas/ /ma rig phun pa'i gling du gtan 'khyams na/ /ye shes sgrod me'i zer gyis mi gzigs sam/ /nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na/ /thugs rje can khyod phrin las mi mdzad dam/ /
163a3(rgyud 'grel): dug gsum bzod dka' i nad kyis gdungs lag na/ /thugs rjes thabs mkhas sman gyis mi gso 'am/ /phyin ci log gi g.yang bsar ltung lags na/ /thugs rjes myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i
163a4(rgyud 'grel): las dbang me 'bar na/ /thugs rjes bsil ba'i chu rgyun mi 'bebs sam/ /sdug bsngal chen pos mnar ro ra mnga' mdzod/ /re sas bslu bar ma mdzad spyan ras gzigs/ /gang la gang 'dul 'gro ba'i don mdzad par/ /gzhal bzhes
163a5(rgyud 'grel): mang po'i dam bca' ma mdzad dam/ /mthong thos dran reg 'byung bar ma gsungs sam/ /snyigs ma'i dus kyi ngan spyod ma gzigs sam/ /ngan song rgyu 'bras bsgrub pa ma gzigs sam/ /sdug bsngal sba klong 'khrugs pa ma mkhyen nam
163a6(rgyud 'grel): nus mthu dpag med mnga' ba ma lags sam/ /byams mgon 'gro don mdzad pa 'phyis pa tsam/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyangs sbyangs nas/ /nam zhig rang gis 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe/ /'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal
163a7(rgyud 'grel): don ma mchis/ /sems can las 'phro rang sar bzhag nan/ /'phags pa'i thugs rjes su la ci zhig bgyi/ /thugs rjes 'gro rnams sgrol bar zhal bzhes pa'i/ /dam bcas don de de ring dgongs su gsol/ /'phags mchog /
163b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed la thugs rje'i stobs mnga' na/ /yal yol le lo btang snyoms ma mdzad par/ /snying nas gzigs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha/ /re sa gzhan na med po thugs rjes bzung/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smre sngags
163b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can 'di nyid/ /lnga brgya pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa/ /mthong lam rgyud la skyes pa'i gang zag /slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa'i zhal mnga' nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
163b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /'gro la nye ring med pas khyad du 'phags/ /sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs mdzod las/ /kun gyis rang ngo shes par byin gyis brlobs/ /rang don du chos sku rtogs pa/ /
163b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyis/ /mthong thos dran reg gi sgo nas/ /'gro ba yongs la phan thogs pa/ /'gro ba yongs kyi don rlabs po che/ /'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma Arya pa lo
163b5(rgyud 'grel): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA a/ mahA kA ru ni kA ya/ tadya thA/ oM tsa ma kra ba ti/ tsi twa ma ni/ ma ha pad+ma me ru/ ru ti shta/ dzwa a karSha ya/ hUM phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags oM pad+ma tsa ni ta ma ni dzwa la hUM snying
163b6(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /oM ba ra ta padme hUM/ nye ba'i snying po// //rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ snying rje la bstod pa/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba//
163b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus na bsnams/ /thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med brgyan phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje byams pas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /phongs gyur 'gro ba la mi khyod lta bu/ /
164a1(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi ba mdzad pa po/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal te/ /mun nag btibs pa snang ba med pa bzhin/ /ri bo g.yang sa'i kha na gnas 'dra
164a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigs su gsol/ /'phongs pa gang gis nga ni dran byas na/ /de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes/ /dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de lags na/ /bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /nga ni
164a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong thos reg pa 'am dran yang rung/ /nad rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces/ /bdag ni mi bzad nad kyis thebs lags kyis/ /mchog sbyin dam bcas de dag dgongs su gsol/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal gang gis nyam thag pa/ /de dang
164a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi sdug bsngal bsal lo zhes/ /'gro la dgongs pa khyod kyis rgyun 'byung na/ /mgon po ci slad sdug bsngal bdag ma gzigs/ /gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang/ /de yi mod la mgon pos gnod bsal na/ /bdag ni rtag tu 'di na
164a5(rgyud 'grel): bro 'tshal kyang/ /thugs dpag ma mdzad pa ni bdag byung ngam/ /mthu ldan sgyu med phan mdzad blo gros can/ /thugs rje ldan pa khyod la brten kyang ni/ /ci ste 'di dag zhi bar ma gyur na/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te kyi hud kyi/ /gang dang gang dag sdug
164a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal nyam thag cing/ /gang dang gang dag mgon med gyur rnams la/ /de dang der ni khyod kyi thugs rje ni/ /mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhes de skad gda' / /de ni las ngan nyon mongs bdag lags shing/ /sdug bsngal bzod dkas lus
164a7(rgyud 'grel): gzir skyabs ma mchis/ /skyabs med bdag la ci slad thugs mi rje/ /nyi tsher gyur na thugs rje ma lags mod/ /gang tshe sngon chad rmongs pas 'jig rten na/ /khyod nyid rjes su dran par ma bgyis pas/ /bdag ni nyon mongs stobs kyis shin tu gzir/ /
164b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bkum? du nyen thugs rjes gzigs/ /thugs rje'i 'byung gnas thugs rje che rgyas pa/ /sdug bsngal ma lus zad par mdzad khyod kyis/ /ci ste bdag ni spangs par gyur na yang/ /bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs/ /khyod
164b2(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su mchis pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de yi mong la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas/ /mgon po khyod ni bdag gi skyabs lags kyis/ /thugs rjes mi bzad 'di las bskyab tu gsol/ /mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag pa/ /zhi
164b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa khyod dang 'jal gyur la/ /bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/ /khyod ni thugs rje can du rung lags sam/ /khyod kyis sems can bskyab phyir smon lam gang/ /btab par gyur te'ang 'grub par 'gyur lags na//
164b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang sems can grangs su gtogs pas na/ /mchog sbyin bdag gi du(rgyud 'grel): kha bsal du gsol/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchis kyang ni/ /ci ste de ni nyam theg gyur na go /nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs su gyur pa bzhin/ /zla ba'i 'od
164b5(rgyud 'grel): zer sreg par byed 'dra gang/ /khyod ni 'jig rten dag la gsol 'debs na/ /bdag ni khyod la gsol ba 'gyid gyur ba/ /bdag ni skye bo ngan pa skal ba chung/ /bsod nams min pa'i dri ma ngan pa can/ /mgon po thugs rje che dang ma bral bas/ /
164b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la bskul lta ma 'tshal kyang/ /sdug bsngal rang bzhin du ni bdag gyur pas/ /skyob pa'i spyan sngar yang ni gsol ba 'debs/ /pha dang ma la gang zhig slong na yang/ /shin tu skyo ba med pa ji bzhin du/ /sems can don
164b7(rgyud 'grel): brtson de ni khyed lags pas/ /tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /sdug bsngal mi bzad pas ni bdag gdungs pas/ /bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'bed sgrogs kyi/ /nyin cig bzhin du sdig pa'i las kyis ni/ /zil
165a1(rgyud 'grel): nan 'di las bdag la bsrung du gsol/ /de ltar bdag gis shin tu smre gsol bas/ /khyod kyi thugs ni thugs rjes brlan pa ltar/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya yis gzir ba la/ /srid las sol pas de bzhin gzigs

165a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa mthar phyin spyan ras gzigs dbang la/ /bdag gis bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing bcom pa yi/ /rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du 'gro ba shog/

165a5(rgyud 'grel): shwa ra sa ha pra b+hu dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon/ /'das

166b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa de la yi rang ngo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta shU n+ya dz+nyA na a nu mo da na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'gro ba'i skyabs gyur ba la gsol pa ni/ /phyogs bcu'i sems

169a1(rgyud 'grel): la bi Sha ni rdzi tA/ lo ka sya rA ga bi Sha nA sha ni/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha naM/ mo ha bi Sha nir mok+Sha naM hu lu hu lu ma la/ pha la pha la ha re/ mahA pad+ma nA b+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+hya bud+d+hya/ bo d+hya bo d+hya/

169a3(rgyud 'grel): sma ra twaM/ b+ha ga ban+ti/ lo ka bi la ki twaM/ ta zla ga tA/ da nA hi me narSha naM/ ka ma sya darSha naM/ pra hlA nga ya ma na swAhA/ sid+d+ha ya swAhA/ mahA sid+d+hA ya swAhA/ sid+ha yo ge shwo rA ya swAhA/ nI la kaSh+ThA ya swAhA/ ba ru ha mu khA ya swAhA/ sid+ha mu khA ya
169a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ mahA ma nA ri si ha mu khA ya swAhA/ sid+d+ha bidyA d+he rA ya swAhA/ pad+ma hastwA ya swAhA/ mahA pad+ma ha stA ya swAhA/ badzra ha stwA ya swAhA/ kriSh+Na sarba kri ta ya dz+nyo ba bI ta ya swAhA/ mahA kA ba mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swAhA/ tsakra a yu
169a5(rgyud 'grel): d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shaM kha shabda ni rnA da na ka rA ya swAhA/ ni bo d+ha na ka rA ya swAhA/ bA ma skand+ha de sha s+thi ta giSh+Na dza nA ya swAhA/ bA ma ha sta bya g+h+ra tsa rma ni bas nA ya swAhA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ mahA lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba
169a6(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+he shwa rA ya swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwa ya mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+hyan+tu me man+ta pa dA ni swAhA/ oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): trai lo kya ba tsa ma a mo g+hA pA sha a bra ti ha ta h+ri(rgyud 'grel): ha(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT
169a7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM padmoSh+NA Sha bim la hUM swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tA ra swAhA/ /gzungs 'di lan cig brjod bas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi byung ba yang ma lus bar 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de la 'phags pa spyan
169b1(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgyun me 'chad par mig stong dang ldan pa'i thugs rjes gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag stong gis skyob bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga dang/ de dang nye ba lnga dge 'dun gyi dkor rku 'phreg byas ba rnams kyang ban cig
169b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod bas ma lus bar zad bar 'gyur ro/ /the tshom za ba ni ma gtogs so/ /gshis dan du 'chi ba'i 'chi ltas bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba bzang po bco lnga yongs su 'dzin bar 'gyur ro/ /sum snying po 'di'i ming thos pa
169b3(rgyud 'grel): de ni bskal ba du ma'i skye ba dad 'chi ba'i bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur na brjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ /rgyun ma 'chad par bzung nas bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la dka' ba med na/ /'jig rten ba'i bsod nams
169b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu thob ba lta ci smos/ /yul gang du yams kyi nad byung la yul der rgyal bos chos kyi yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang gtsang mar bya/ /sems can thams cad gtams las mi gcad do/ /nyes ba byung ba rnams la bzod bar bya'o/ /
169b5(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na yul der yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gnas ba'i mi ma yin ba rnams la gtor ma byin la/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag
169b6(rgyud 'grel): ba stod dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs la mchod ba rgya chen po byas la/ /rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas rol mo sna tshogs kyi lan gsum du bskor ba byas na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshon skud sna lnga la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
169b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod byas la mgul du gtags so/ /gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod bar byed ba dang yul der nad byung ba dang/ /char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang/ /zla ba dang nyi ma drang por mi
170a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dang/ ltas ngan ba de snyed byung na rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la gang du yams kyi nang byung ba de'i ngos su bzhin bstan la gzhag go /shin tu dud pa bdug
170a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang me tog dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan la sogs ba ci 'byor pas mchod bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan bor byas nas so so'i dgru thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems mthun
170a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ phan tshun grogs por 'gyur/ skye po yongs dang rgyal bu rnams kyang byas bas gzo zhing legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /nad dang gnod pa gang
170a4(rgyud 'grel): byung yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i mdun du mchod pa byas la gzungs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig ha la
170a5(rgyud 'grel): ha la'i dug zos na de gu gul gyi bdug pa dang/ ga bur cha bsnyams te/ /bron pa chu lhag mar ma gyur pa bskol la khyor gang lus ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te
170a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig mig nyams te 'ong bar gyur ba dang/ mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du ling tog byung ba dang/ mig tu ru skyes te mi mthong bar gyur pa des a ru ra dang ba ru ra gcig dang/ skyu ru ra gcig
170a7(rgyud 'grel): zhib tu gdags la sbrang rtsi dkar po dang/ khye'u'i nu ma'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas/ brjod cing byis pa gsar pa btsas pa'i bud med dang/ khyi dang phag gis ma mthong bar ril bu byas te/
170b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ dben pa rlud mi 'ong bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman 'di mi'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te mig gi nad du blugs na mig gi 'bras bu skye
170b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /ling tog med cing legs bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'byung po'i gdon nam mi ma yin pa'i nad kyis btab bar gyur na gu gul gyi dud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la snar bdug go/ /yang na ri bong
170b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sdug pa tsam gyi ril bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la bza' o/ /sha dang chang dang sgog pa dang 'thab mo spong ngo/ /'on kyang sos bar 'gyur ro/ /shu dag dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ /dbung pa
170b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas par gtags na 'thab mo las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang dkar po'i gi'u wad? lag 'thil du bcug la byang chub sems dpa' i drung du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te yan lag rnams bskus dpral bar thig le
170b5(rgyud 'grel): byas na/ lha dang klu dang 'byung po dang/ mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /khyo shug me dang chu lhar mi mthun par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' i mdun du dur ba'i mjug sgrol lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas lus la btags  
170b6(rgyud 'grel): na mja' bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyag bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod par bya'o/ /mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtsos par gyur na zhags pa thogs ba'i phyag la
170b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod do/ /khad par nad rnams yod bar gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs ba'i phyag la mchod do/ /'dreg don thams cad gdul bar 'dod na rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad gdul
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod na/ rdo rje thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /phas kyis rgol bar dgra gzhom bar 'dod na rdo rje'i tho ba thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad la thar bar 'dod na
171a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs
171a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag la mchod do/ /blon thabs mthon por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /lus la nad sna
171a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /lus kyi bgegs ma lus pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na
171a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /stag dang 'phar spyang dang dom dred dang gcan zan ma rungs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgegs la
171a6(rgyud 'grel): thar par 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /bu dang bu mo dang g.yog 'khor gyi phyir shes gyi gdub 'khor thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i phyag la
171a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag par 'dod na/ /pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na/ /rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
171b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na/ pad+ma thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /sa gter 'byin par 'dod na/ rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /drang srong gi lam mngon par bsgrub par 'dod na/ sprin
171b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /tshangs par skye bar 'dod na/ ril pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /lha'i gzhal med khang du/ skye bar 'dod na/ pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /phyogs gzhan gyi phyir
171b3(rgyud 'grel): rgol ba bsal bar 'dod na ral gri dang mdung thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /dge ba'i lha 'dri thams cad dgug par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /lha 'dre thams cad 'khor bar 'dod na thod pa'i khar
171b4(rgyud 'grel): ba thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshags nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril
171b5(rgyud 'grel): bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /tshig gi spobs pa gyo nam pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams dang klu rnams rtag par 'ongs te bsrung zhing yongs su skyab par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs
171b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag la mchod do/ /byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thams cad skyob par 'dod na 'khor gsil thogs ba'i phyag la mchod do/ /sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus par bsnyen bkur brtse bar sems par
171b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na thal mo sbyor ba'i phyag la mchod do/ /skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du rtag tu
172a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'dod par gyur na gzhal med khang thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /mang du thos pa'i shes rab rgya chen po dang ldan par
172a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i glegs bar thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thugs pa'i bar du rtag tu byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog ba'i
172a3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod na mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du
172a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo nas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do/ /shing thogs dang 'bras bu rnams 'grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i
172a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag la mchod do/ /de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i mchog rnams stong yod kyang/ /de mngon bsdus nas bstan pa yin no/ /lus drang por srang ste snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sor mo thams cad phan tshun thad kar bsnol la g.yon pa'i
172a6(rgyud 'grel): sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams la 'khyud de mdzub mo gyen du bsgrengs la rtse mo gnyis sbrang ngo/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por rig par bgyi/ /lag mthil la ma 'byar bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni gzung sngags
172a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge pa rnams byang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
172b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzod pa'i tshe bdud thams cad kyi mthus brtsams pas na phyag rgya 'dis btul te/ /de'i tshe zhi ba dang bde ba dang bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par gyur to/ /de'i gsang sngags
172b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di yin no/ /tadya thA/ sarba d+harmA maN+Da lA ya e hye ha sarba shud+d+ha satwA ya swAhA/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog brjod par bya ste/ thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba ma gzhis gcad cing
172b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis pa'i sa phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o/ der sa brkos te gseg ma dang gyo mo dang rus pa dad mi gtsang pa rnams bsal la dri zhim po dag dang ba'i lci ba dang 'jim pa bsres te byug par bya/ dkyil 'khor dpangs mtho
172b4(rgyud 'grel): gang gi tshad du sgo bzhi gdod do /rin po che du mas spras pa'i rta babs dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa tshang bar bgyi'o/ shar gyi sgor ni yul 'khor srung/ /lho'i sgor ni 'phags skyes so/ /nub kyi sgor ni spyan mi bzang/ /byang gi
172b5(rgyud 'grel): sgor ni rnam thos sras/ /de dag g.yas g.yon du rang rang gi 'khor thams cad dri'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i mdun sgrol ma dang khre'u bzhag ste khri'u'i
172b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du gzungs sngags 'di gzhag par bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /rgyab tu ni nor bzungs so/ /g.yon du ni rta mgrin no/ /mtshams bzhir go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal
172b7(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje'o/ /dkyil 'khor de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug go /me tog sna tshogs dgram mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /sgog pa rnam dgu dang sha ched mo
173a1(rgyud 'grel): dbab po/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa gsar ba rnams ?/ /bstod pa'i dbyangs dang rol mo sna tshogs kyi mchod par bya'o/ dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' mar ni mchod rten bdun bdun la tshon
173a2(rgyud 'grel): sna lnga'i ba dan btsugs la gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i che rtsa ba'i sngags stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'ongs nas sgrub pa po de
173a3(rgyud 'grel): la ci 'dod ces gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po des mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod lan gdab par bgyi ste/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod
173a4(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi'o/ /yang 'di skad du 'di ni lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa snyam bgyid na thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/ /bdag ni ci rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa mi 'tshal gyi nam zhig na sems can
173a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems so zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /gal
173a6(rgyud 'grel): te yid la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la ma brjod bar bdag nyid 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /gal te chos 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi gcig tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang ba'o/ /su zhig sna
173a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'tshal ba des a ka ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa bgyis la rtsa ba'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /'on kyang 'chi
173b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yongs su rdzogs brnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du sems shing su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod par bgyid na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'jig rten
173b2(rgyud 'grel): tu byon pa'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis bdud btul ba'i tshe lus las mig stong sbrul te mig re re las sangs rgyas re re sprul te/ /de dag la bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong 'byung ngo/ /lag pa stong las lag re re las
173b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po re re sprul te de dag la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong 'byung ngo/ /bdud btul ba'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' i lus ni mchog go /de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste zab pa dang phra ba'i
173b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs rim ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /de nas dza hi zhes brjod pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la gshegs la bstod pa dang mchod pas mchod la/ /mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'khor dang bcas pa dgongs su
173b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /bdag nyid gcig pu sdug bsngal las thar nas bde ba la gnas par 'dod pa ma lags kyis phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'i ched du 'phags pa sgrub pa la sku gsung thugs
173b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dngos grub thams cad thob par byin gyis brlabs dam pa mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la/ /oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon
173b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+ThA/ /dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu raka to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+he mme pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsTa? me/ tsit+taM sh+ri
174a1(rgyud 'grel): ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa A/ zhes pa lan bdun brjod la gshegs su gsol/ /gzhan yang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po nas gsungs
174a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran pa yis/ /ngan song sdug bsngal dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ /na ba'i sdug bsngal 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal ba/ /kun nas thar bar spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs/ /gal te gsod bas me
174a3(rgyud 'grel): yi dong du yang/ /gsang par bya ba'i phyir ni bor ba yis/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran nas ni/ /chu btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngan rgal na yang/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran nas ni/ /chu'i
174a4(rgyud 'grel): nang du nam yang mi 'chi'o/ /rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis gsang ba'i phyir/ ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /nyi ma lta bur bar snang gnas par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dags dang//
174a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i phyir ni spyi bor 'ongs na yang/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par ni nus so/ /gsang ba'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/ /dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang//
174a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ /gal te gsong pa nye bar 'ongs nas su/ /gshed ma'i mi'i dbang du gyur na yang/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /de yi

179a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba des/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo de lta bur/ /sdug bsngal 'gro la mi 'jigs rtsol ba nyid gyur cig /ral pa 'chang zhing shin tu zhi ba yangs pa'i spyan/ /rtag par rab tu dang ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal/ /lha dang lha min rnams
179b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhabs kyi 'dam skyes la/ /phyag byas nor bu pad+ma las byung mgon por 'dud/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la/ /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bstod ba/ dpal nags kyi rin tshan gyi zhal sngar bsod nams rnam par rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //
179b2(rgyud 'grel): (*/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa bzhugs//) !/ /rgya gar skad du/ AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag
179b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis bstod pa'o/ /lha'i gtso bo bdud dang tshangs pas bstad pa po/ /thub pa'i rgyal mchog bstod pas grub par mdzad pa po/ /bde gshegs dpag med sku mchog sku bzad 'dzin pa po/ /bde gshegs snang
179b4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas kyi dbu rgyan 'dzin pa po/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni gser gyi padmos brgyan pa po/ /dri zhim ral pa'i phreng ba dmar ser 'byug pa po/ /zhal ras rgyas pa zla ba lta bur mdzes pa po/ /ston ka'i padmo mchog la bzad pa yangs pa po/ /kha ba dung
179b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar rnam dka' dri dang ldan pa po/ /dri med chags med mu tig tshom bu 'dzin pa po/ /mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya reng dmar pos brgyan pa po/ /pad+mar mtshungs pas phyed ni dmar bar byas pa po/ /ston ka'i sprin gyi 'brug sgrar ldan zhing gzhon pa po
179b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen mang pos dpung pa gnyis ni brgyan pa po/ /'o ma'i mtsho ltar phyag mthil gzhon zhing 'jam pa po/ /rigs pags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa po/ /snyan cha gdu bus sgeg cig rgyan rnams 'chang ba po/ /dri ma med pa'i pad+ma
179b7(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog 'byung ba po/ /lte ba'i ngos ni pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'jam pa po/ /gser gyi rkang gdub sgra yis zhabs yid 'ong pa po/ /gser gyi ska rags mchog la nor bus spras ba po/ /sta zur dkris pa'i ras ni rab bzang 'dzin pa po//

180a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba po/ /gsum thar mdzad cing mkha' spyod spyod pa ston pa po/ /yongs rdzogs nye bar bsags shing brtan pa gnyer ba po/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yis dbang par mdzad pa po/ /ngang pa'i 'gros dang glang chen dregs 'drar gzigs

184a7(rgyud 'grel): yig dung mdog snying por bcas/ /'gro la stong pa nyid ston bzhengs/ /de rjes yang dag rjes 'gro ma yin dang/ /dmigs bcas dmigs bral mngon par 'du byed dang/ /de yi nges pa'i sar chud mtshan med shin tu zhi ba yis/

189a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rgyas khyad par bzhis/ /mchod byas gus pa gsol ba yi/ /sngags brjod de nas sngags zla'o/ /rjes mthun phrin las lnga po yis/ /mkha' khyab don kun bsgrubs nas ni/ /'od zer lcags kyus 'jig rten kun/ /gyen du sbar ba'i

189a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po mkha' spyod yul can la phyag 'tshal lo/ de nas nam mkha' i mtshan nyid dri med ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /ngo mtshar bsod nams brgya yi pha rol phyin/ /snang dang mi snang dmigs pa thams cad kyi//
189a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul las dben gcig min du ma'i tshul/ /bde chen nam mkha' dri med thub la 'dud/ /dmigs pa bye ba stong phrag mang po dang/ /gang zhig bdag tu lta ba mi bzad pas/ /blo gros 'chal pa don ma mthong ba rnams/ /gnas 'dir nam mkha'
