193b7(rgyud 'grel): rje ri rab 'dzin/ /sbyor ba'i rdo rje zla ba dang/ /'bar pa'i rdo rje nyi ma can/ /stobs kyi rdo rje ba dan thogs/ /kha dog phyed gzugs sgeg mo'i tshul/ /ka tsa Ta ta/ khyams kyi shar sogs phyogs bzhir yang/ /phyogs mdog gar gyis rol pa
194a1(rgyud 'grel): mo rdo rje gzugs mdzes me long can/ /rdo rje sgra snyan pi wang sbreng/ /rdo rje dri mchog byug pa thogs/ /rdo rje ro bzangs zhal zas 'dzin/ /pa ya shak+Sha(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin byang shar sogs grwa bzhir/ /rdo rje reg ma gos mchog thogs/
194a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chos mchos 'byung can/ /rdo rje zhing ma maN+Dal 'dzin/ /rdo rje snang ma sgrol ma thogs/ /yid 'ong phyogs phyed mdog can la'o/ /ri rI li lI/ de nas shar sogs sgo bzhir yang/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /phyogs mdog
194a3(rgyud 'grel): cung zad khro ba'i tshul/ /de ltar kun phyag g.yon padmo/ /brtson pa'i cha byad pad zla la/ /rang gi sa bon las gyur mtshungs/ /de rjes sgyu ma ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas dag pa rtogs par bya/ /gnas dang lus rab rnam par dag/ /dkyil 'khor
194a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo zhes byar brjod/ /de bzhin lus dang sems rab dag/ nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid do/ /pheM pheM pheM pheM/ de nas ye shes dkyil 'khor lha/ /ji bzhin bkug la mchod sogs bcas/ /gsol btab dam tshig mthu bskyed de/ /rig
194a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pas bzlas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): po ta la ke ru tu mahA ka ru mahA ka ru Ni ka hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ a i u e/ A a'i a'u i/ o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): ka tsa Ta ta/ pa ya sha k+Sha/ ri rI li lI/ hUM phaT swAhA/ /gal te dmigs pa'i sbyor ba
194a6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /skyo bar gyur na sbyor bral ba/ /shin tu dmigs med zhi ba'i rgyu/ /mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i rim ba bsgom/ /nam zhig de las ldang 'dod tshe/ /snying rje chen pos blo bskyed la/ /dpal ldan nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor mchod sogs
194a7(rgyud 'grel): bya phyir 'bad/ /bdun phrag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum/ /ji ste brgya 'am bdun phrag bcus/ /dam tshig bsam gtan ldan spyod la/ /dngos grub the tshom mi bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyud dang ni/ /bla ma sangs rgyas 'drar bshad de/ rgyud
194b1(rgyud 'grel): bral bla ma spangs pa la/ /dngos grub yod par ma gsungs phyir/ /mtshan ma tsam mthong bdag gis 'dir/ /bla ma'i gsung gis rgyud don bsdus/ /dge 'dis 'gro kun po ta la'i/ /ri mchog nam zhig bgrod par 'gyur/ /dpal thugs rje chen po po ta la ke 
194b2(rgyud 'grel): ri'i rtse mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs rje chen po 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor lo sgyur rgyal dkyil 'khor ston zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan
194b3(rgyud 'grel): yang bshad bya ba/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal 'jig rten mgon/ /dpal ldan ye shes dkyil 'khor che/ /don kun grub byed rtag pa'o/ /rgyu skar rgyal po rgyal la bab pa'am/ /yang na zla ba tshes dang zla ba nya/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa'i tshe
194b4(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang rnams kyis mgon mchod sdig pa bsal/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan gyis spras/ /sna tshogs dri bsung dang ldan pa'i/ /me tog gtsal bkram lhab lhub can/ /mchod rdzas yo byad sprin gtibs nas/ /stobs chen sngon 'gro
194b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang po bum pa dang ni lha/ /lhag par gnas byas gnyis pa ting 'dzin rgyal po la gnas bzlas/ /gsum pa mchod sbyin go rim nus sbyar bzod par gsol/ /de mthar bkra shis rdo rje chus bkrus dngos grub blang bar bya/ /bla ma'i man
194b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag ji bzhin du/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /rdo rje 'khor lo phyag rgya yis/ /lha dgu 'khor lo sgyur bar bsam/ /lte ba 'dam skyes ? 'khrungs/ /rdo rje mtshon pa dpa' chen nyid/ /shar sogs rin chen rtsibs brgyad 'khor
194b7(rgyud 'grel): lo rnam bdun gter chen bcas lha mo/ /khyams bzangs rab mnyam bai DUr ngos la nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchod pa yi/ /lha mo rnams dang de bzhin sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa sogs dgyes rol pa'o/ /mu khyud khor yug bkra shis kyi/ /
195a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bcu grub pa nyi shus bskor/ /dpag med lha rdzas yo byad kyis/ /shin tu phun tshogs brtse ba yin/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): tsakra warti maN+Da la sid+d+hi phaT swAhA/ /shes rab thabs byung skad cig sbyor bas bdag nyid 'khor
195a2(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur rgyal gsal bskyed la/ /snying po las 'phros lcags kyu'i zer gyis ji bzhin nyid bkug mnyes byas dbyer med gzhug/ bdag dang dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bcas bzlas rdo rje phreng rgyun yi ge rab zhugs pas/ /bum pa
195a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang bkang thun mtshams kun rtag mnyam gzhag che gnas dngos kun mchod brtson bya/ /thugs rje chen po can dpal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //dpal thugs rje chen po lus kyi 'khor lo chen po la
195a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon gyi man ngag gis/ sngags 'chang rgyal po rang gis lus/ /pad+ma 'khor lo brgyan gzhal med/ /sems kyi lha bcu gcig bcas bsgom/ /rtse yis lcags gong gser bzhin du/ /phung po ye shes
195a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul bsgyur/ /de dbus snying gi 'dab bzhi dang/ /yan lag drug rtsibs mkhas pas bsgom/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): kun bzhi rnam dag lhun gyis grub/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gangs ri'i mdog/ ting 'dzin mchog gis mnyam gzhag pa/ /bag chags
195a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bcom pa'o/ /hUM gti mug rnam dag rnam mi rtog /gti mug rdo rje nam mkha' i mdog/ dus gsum bde gshegs chos ston pa/ /thibs po ma lus gtan bcom pa'o/ /oM 'dod chags rnam dag bde ba che/ /'dod chags
195a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zla ba'i mdog/ rdo rje dril bu bsnol 'dzin pa/ /gdung ba ma lus gtan bcom pa'o/ /d+hi zhe sdang rnam dag 'od gsal ba/ /zhe sdang rdo rje me lce'i mdog/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya sdigs mdzub bsgyings/ /'khrug pa ma lus gtan bcom pa'o/
195b1(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): kun rtog rnam dag gya rgyu med/ /kun rtog rdo rje in+d+ra'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i gar gyis rnam par rol/ /'du byed ma lus gtan bcom pa'o/ /'di dag ni dbus nas brtsams te shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi'i ge sar la bsgom bar bya'o/ /de nas 'gro ba drug gi rnam
195b2(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa dgong par bya ste/ /lha rigs rnam dag 'chi 'pho med/ /dbang po rdo rje gur gum mdog/ me tog phreng ba'i chun po 'dzin/ /dregs pa ma lus spangs pa'o/ /a lha min rnam dag 'khrugs pa med/ /drag po rdo rje rgya skyegs mdog/ ral gri dang ni
195b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin/ /phrag dog ma lus kun spangs pa'o/ /i mi dbang rnam dag brel 'phongs med/ /dbang phyug rdo rje rdza gsar mdog/ rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /rnam par g.yangs pa kun spangs pa'o/ /u dud 'gro rnam dag blun rmongs med/ /seng
195b4(rgyud 'grel): ge rdo rje du ba'i mdog/ dgra sta dang ni dbyig pa 'dzin/ /bag med btul ba kun spangs pa'o/ /e yi dags rnam dag ser sna med/ /gshin rje rdo rje cher sprin mdog/ thod pa dang ni zhags pa 'dzin/ /'jungs pa'i srid pa kun spangs pa'o/ /oM
195b5(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba rnam dag tsha grang med/ /'jigs skyob rdo rje byu ru'i mdog/ bum pa dang ni lhung bzed 'dzin/ /mi bzad ya nga kun spangs pa'o/ /aM 'di dag ni mgo nas brtsams te g.yas la sogs pa'i rtsibs drug gi lte bar bsgom par bya'o/ /dam
195b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig lus dang sems la ni/ /ye shes sku dang thugs btsug nas/ /sa bon gsung gi yi ge bzlas/ /tshe 'di nyid la mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /thugs rje chen po lus kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs rje chen po dka' 
195b7(rgyud 'grel): thub can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dka' thub chen po dka' thub mnyes/ /zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /'dir 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dad pa thob pa'i skye bo sran thub pa rnams kyis/ /dus dang cho ga'i khyad par

196a2(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug drang srong che/ /mya ngan med pa'i sdong bu'i 'gram/ /ri dags stan can dka' thub tshal/ /rgyan spangs snying rjes gdungs pa bsgom/ /mgon po'i rten ni gang yang rung/ /ye shes ldan de der bcug mdun/ /phongs pa dag ni mya ngan gyi//
196a3(rgyud 'grel): cha byad kyis smang khas phub 'dug/ lag pa gnyis ni 'gram brten cing/ /mi ro bzhin du rkang brkyang ba/ /bza' btung spangs dang gos bral dang/ /mchi mas gdong khebs smre sngags brjod/ /spyod lam gnyis te 'gre ldog dang/ /ring du zag pa dor
196a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de bzhin dag gnyis smre sngags bsngags/ /sems pa yang ni gnyis nyid de/ /snying rjes skye bo bsgral ba dang/ /thabs su 'phags pa mthong 'dod pa'o/ /ji ste smra ba la mngon par dga' ba zhig na sngags kyi dam tshig 'di dag kyang brjod par bya'o
196a5(rgyud 'grel): na ma sh+rI lo kya nA thA ya/ bo d+hi satwa mahA satwa mahA ka ru mi kA ya/ mA ma ta mu ke mahA du(rgyud 'grel): kha ka le sha sarba a ba ra Na kha sa kha se me kha se me phaT phaT/ mA ma shI g+h+raM a nu gra ha a nu kra ha hUM hUM yid la byed ba gzhan gtab ste/ lha
196a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog sems pa gcig pu yis/ /skye bo nyon mongs gzings 'di dag/ zhi bar bya phyir smyung bar gnas/ /yun rings phan pa'i don mthong nas/ /cung zad bde ba ci dga' rung/ /sems can tshogs mang don du ni/ /bdag gis dka' thub
196a7(rgyud 'grel): bzod par byos/ /bdag med lus dang sems 'di ni/ /gnod par byed kyis phan mi byed/ /di ring dka' thug spyad pa yis/ /lus can kun gyi don sgrub bo/ /ji ltar dgra bo khros pa la'ang/ /thal sbyar snying rje skye 'gyur na/ /thugs rje che mnga' 
196b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don sdod/ /bdag la ji ltar gzigs mi 'gyur/ /de ltar bstan pa bzod ldan pas/ /nyin 'ga' smyung bar spyod na de/ /dngos dang gzugs brnyan rmi lam du/ /'phags pa nges par rjes su 'dzin/ /thugs rje chen po dka' thub can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
196b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rtag pa'i rnal 'byol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas spyi gtsug cod ban rtag tu 'dzin zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /'jig rten mgon po 'jig rten gyi/ /rtsa lag gcig gu la btud de/ /de snying cod pan
196b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor gyi/ /rnal 'byor chog bdag gis bshad/ /dben pa'i gnas 'dug 'khor ba'i me 'obs 'bar ba dang/ /bde ba'i rkyen tshogs yid skyo mngon dga' drag po yis/ /thar pa'i grong khyer rdul bral skyed mos tshal bzang du/ /zhugs nas rjes
196b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang ba dam pas sems dul bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor zhi ba 'dis/ /blo ldan rgyud rab brlan gyur pa/ /de nyid rjes thogs dpal gsum gyi/ /cho ga dam pa bsgom par bya/ /e ma'o spyi gtsug rin chen khang/ /bkra shis mchod rten dri ma med//

196b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus/ /nyi ma 'am zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /rlung gi rgyal po me yi dbus/ /bde ba'i tshul brlan mkhregs pa'i sa/ /rnam dag rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyu/ /'byung bzhi'i rang bzhin raM yig bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros cha reg 'dis/ /
196b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa mchog 'dis brgyud skyob pa yis/ /thugs reg thugs bskul thugs byung ba'i/ /byin brlab zhi byed dag byed dang/ /dri ma med byed 'od 'phro byed/ /rnam bzhi bdud rtsi'i rgyun dbab bya/ /gang tshe ye shes / 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di babs gyur pa/ /de tshe mi g.yo 'od gsal rnam par dag /kun 'byung mtsho chen nyid 'od sgron mchog dang/ /nam mkha' i yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin no/ /bde chen gnyis su med nyid la/ /ji srid bzod par nus re srid//
197a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag bya mi gnas na/ /de tshe dge tshogs dpag med bsgrub/ /dpal thugs rje chen po rtag tu bya ba'i rnal 'byor rdzogs so// //dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bla ma'i rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
197a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bla ma 'gro ba'i dgos/ /zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /srid dang zhi ba 'di dang de bzhin tshe rabs gzhan pa'i bde legs dang/ /dngos grub mchog bsgrub yid bzhin nor 'dra phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs
197a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /bla ma rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i snying dbus dri med ye shes mchog gzhug phyir/ /spyi gtsug gdan la nyin mtshan rgyun du brtan bzhugs byin brlabs mdzod/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab skem cing/ /bde chen snying dkyil sang
197a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /skal ldan ston pa rdo rje can/ /bla ma btud de de bsnyen bshad/ /re zhig sgrub pa pos skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sems bskyed pa rab tu nges par byas nas/ /dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba bla ma dam pa kho
197a6(rgyud 'grel): na yin no zhes rtse gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /kun nas ngang pa'i rlan phun sum tshogs pa las byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i ljon pa legs par bskyed de/ yid dang rjes mthun la sogs sam/ /ci rigs pa yi gnas su ni//
197a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal? ldan rnams kyi dngos grub rtsa/ /dpal ldan bla mas bsgrub par bya/ /tha mal lus kyi cod pan rtser/ /rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin dbang po/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku gsal bar blta/ /de yi thugs ni ye shes hUM/ /snying gi padmo 'dab steng
197b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus/ /bdag gi skyob pa mi dbang pos/ /gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa/ /skyil krung 'dzum zhal bsgom par bya/ /'dab stong lce la sangs rgyas stong/ /ze 'bru khyud skor nyan thos dang/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor ba/ /mkha' la zla dkar ltar
197b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal sprul/ /de'i rjes la spyi bo'i gtsug gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs ka'i thad so nas mdun du 'dom gang mngon par gzhal ba'i nam mkha' la rang gi rjes su 'dzin pa'i yi dam gyi lha bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i thugs ni rang gi sa bon no/ /oM gyis sna
197b3(rgyud 'grel): grangs pa'i a li dang/ A(rgyud 'grel): sa sna grangs pa'i kA li dang/ /hUM gis sna grangs pa'i lha'i sngags rnams phreng ba'i tshul du gshibs pas mdza' bskor ba'o/ /de nas bdun rnam par dag pas mchod la/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ltos nye bar dor
197b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo nas skyabs su bzung zhing 'di ltar mthong ba'i 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa la sogs pas rten la mi phyed pa'i dad pa drag po dang/ 'dun pa dang/ mngon par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mi gtong ba'i blos gsol ba gdab par
197b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ji snyed mchod pa rab 'byam nam mkha' i mdza' klas sa gsum gang bar gyur pa dang/ /bstod dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs rgyal ba mnyes 'gyur 'gro ba'i don bsgrub dngos gang yin/ /'di dag byas la mi bzad gdungs pa yang ni rdo rje 'dzin dang
197b6(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi lha/ /skyabs mchog nges bya de yis mi gtong thugs rdo rje'i lcags kyus tsham tshom med par 'dzin par bsam/ /de nas lha yi sa bon dang/ /yi ge'i phreng ba las byung ba/ /gsal zhing dri med rnon po yi/ /'od zer gyis ni spyi bor dgye/ /byin
197b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa 'di yi mthu/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs bskul zhing/ /de las thur du lhun ba'i 'od/ /bdag snying bla ma reg 'gyur/ /de rjes skyob pa las spros zer/ /lha yi thugs kar dad pa yi/ /tsha zer yang ni rab tu spro/ /de nas byin
198a1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs thag gu yi/ /brgyus pa'i ye shes yig phreng dag/ /lha yi smin mtshams nas byung ba/ /spyi bo'i skyob pa'i tshangs bug nas/ /zhugs gyur thugs gtams bdag gi bar/ /de ltar ye shes kyi 'od kyi rgyun babs pas bdag
198a2(rgyud 'grel): gi rgyud la de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa 'di lta ste/ gnyug ma nyid dang/ rang grol ba nyid dang/ lhun gyis grub pa ces bya ba'i don gsum gyi slus dang sems rab tu gang ba'i ye shes dam pa gang yin pa mngon du bltas la/ yi
198a3(rgyud 'grel): ge'i dang de dag nyid gsal bar bklag pa ma yengs par bya ba ni thab yin no/ /de yis slob dpon klu gang ba/ /lhag gyur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spro/ /de las de bzhin nyan thos sogs/ /phyi rol srid thar spro bar bya/ /sna tshogs
198a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ma lus pa/ /phrin las bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /'gro ba'i don bsgrub brtser bcas pa/ /skal ldan rnams kyi blo gros las/ /mdun gyi spyi bo'i lha la bsdus pa las/ /rtag tu dran pa'i rgya mi brjed pa'i gzungs nye bar
198a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa yongs su bsam zhing/ /de las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla ma lha dang bcas pa'i grub pa'i rgyur rnam par 'phang bar bya'o/ /dpal 'jig rten mgon po bsgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //dpal thugs rje chen po mchod
198a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gtso bo mchod bya mchod sbyin bzhes/ /zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpal nyid/ /gtsor bcas sangs rgyas sras bcas la/ /dad bas
198a7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su song nas ni/ /snying rje chen pos gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas/ /lce dang lag pa snod dang bcud/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos byin brlabs la/ /gzi bskyed zab cing rgya ches
198b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): a A i a'i u A/ ri rI li lI/ e i/ o aau/ aM a(rgyud 'grel): lce byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /a a hUM hUM/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dzha nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ lag pa byin gyis brlab
198b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /hUM ka tsa Ta ta pa ya Sha k+Sha/ bcud byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho:/ gzi byin bskyed pa'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harmA NaM(rgyud 'grel): A dyA nunpa n+na twat bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ zab par bsgrub pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga to a d+hiSh+Tha na sarba pU dza
198b3(rgyud 'grel): me k+ta sa mu dra pha ra Na badzra mu tra dri Dha hUM/ rgya che bar bsgrub pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI lo ka nA tha sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwa sa ka la aSh+Ti de ba ta sarba d+harmA pA la puShpaM d+hU paM/ dI paM gand+hi nai bi dyai/ shapta/ maN+Dal/ ba liM ta/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba gardza pa ri pu dyaM/
198b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ dbul ba dang las bcol ba'i sngags so/ /dpag med 'jig rten mgon 'khor lo/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pas/ /legs bskor 'od zer ljags sbubs kyis/ /bdud rtsi'i gtor ma bzhes bar 'gyur/ /thugs
198b5(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i gter ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen po rnam par skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bzang po dges ba po zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po'i sa nyid dang/ /rin chen
198b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ngos mnyam la/ /dri zhim pa yi byug pas byug /mu tig me tog nor bu dgod/ /dbus su 'dab ma brgyad 'dab bzhi yi/ /me tog dmar po sa bon can/ /gzhag la de steng thub pa bzhugs/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni steng nas dbub/ /
198b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po pad+ma'i phreng ba yi/ /nga rgyal 'dzin pas rdo rje lag/ gnyis gshibs gyen du bskyod pa'i rgyas/ /sa gsum gtso bo spar bar bya/ /rab tu dbyibs legs kha dog mdzes/ /dri bsung ro mchog rig bzang ba'i/ /me tog spungs pas go
199a1(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin/ /gling sogs bkod pa ji bzhin brtag/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra tsa tu rdI ba hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzro pa yaSh+Ta dI pa hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra Sh+Ta ratna hUM/ oM A badzra Sh+Ta maM ga la hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra sid+d+haM biM sha ti hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sUrya tsan+d+ra hUM/ rnam
199a2(rgyud 'grel): dag zhing du phun tshogs gling dang rin chen dang/ /bkra shis grub pa rim gsum phreng ba legs bkod la/ /gsal byed sgron ma 'bar ba gnyis kyis brgyan gyur pa/ /sngags 'chang rdo rje rol pa'i bar gyis bstabs pas dbul/ /de
199a3(rgyud 'grel): nas lus can thams cad la/ /'jig rten mgon po nyer 'khor gzugs/ /dpag med rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /zhing rnams kun tu yog don spyod/ /ji srid snying po byang chub par/ /de dag nam yang 'dren pa'i mthus/ /ngan 'gro'i
199a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra yang mi grag cing/ /rtag tu dga' skyid 'tsho bar byed/ /gsal te blo gsal spobs spyod na/ /sku gsum la sogs gang bshad pa/ /cho ga de dag bzlas pa yang/ /gdon mi za bar bya ba nyid/ /gang tshe bsdu bar 'dod pa na//
199a5(rgyud 'grel): se gol brdabs pas spar byas la/ /bzod par gsol dang smon lam gdab/ /dran pa'i rgya yis gzungs bya ba/ /thugs rje chen po'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //dpal thugs rje chen po pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi
199a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub kun gyi rgyur gyur ba/ /sgrub po la phan byed pa'i thabs/ /mchod sprin rgyal mtshan rtse mo yis/ /bsam mi khyab byed mchod pa bri/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dri/ /zhal zas rol mo maN+Dal rdzas/ /
199a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i khyad par gyis bkod de/ /nyid kyi nga rgyal gyis byin brlab/ /oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra dI paM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai bi dye A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra shapra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra maN+Dal A
199b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid can gyi/ /sna tshogs mchod rdzas bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rig pa yi/ /sprul nas 'phags tshogs mchod par bya/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ mahA ka ru Ni ka puShpa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra ke tu ra dzA ya/ ta thA
199b2(rgyud 'grel): ga tA ya/ ar ha te samya ka sam bud d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM puShpe/ puShpe/ puShpe/ ud b+ha be/ puShpa/ a waM kI ra ne swAhA/ me tog dbul ba'i sngags so/ /de bzhin du/ d+hU pa dang/ dI ba dang/ gand+ha dang/ nai bidye dang/ shapda dang/ maN+Dal zhes bya ba la
199b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i rim gyis bdug pa dang mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ zhal zas dang/ rol mo dang/ maN+Dal dbul bar bya'o/ /gos bzang gyon cing brgyan bzang brtags/ /yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje'i glu gar sngon song bas/ /sangs rgyas
199b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid mchod sprin rgya mtsho yi/ /dbus bzhugs mchod kun la mnga' brnyes/ /mgon po 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshul/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo gser mdog bskyed/ /ye shes snying po las byung ba'i/ /sna tshogs lha
199b5(rgyud 'grel): mo mdzes rnams kyis/ /re re las kyang dpag tu med/ /sprul pas rim gro rdzogs par blta/ /mi phyed gus pa mang yod pas/ /gzungs 'di lan gsum cho ga 'dis/ /nyin re dus gsum mchod byed na/ /bye ba bsam mi khyab mchod 'gyur/

200a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i 'od/ /de ni thugs rje mi phyed 'od/ lus can rnams kyi snying dang ni/ /nyon mongs me lce de nang gnas/ /de bzhin spyi gtsug grangs bzhin du/ /pad+ma zlum dang ri rdo rje/ /gang tshe skye bo don tshol ba dang/ /don mi tshol ba gcig

200b1(rgyud 'grel): brla bas la/ /a dang ka phreng gnyis med bzhu/ /sgron ma gnyis steng rdo rje 'chang/ /de bzhin seng ge rnam bsgyings gnyis/ /rgyur byas thabs dang shes rab bskyed/ /phreng ba gnyis kyang dgod bar bya/ /ka pA la sogs pad+ma can/ /sna tshogs bza' bas bkang byas la//
200b2(rgyud 'grel): snod bcud sbyang dang gzi bskyed pas/ /gya nom gyur ba rnal 'byor tshogs/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): baM ho/ ri bsal sbyong byed bdud rtsir byed/ /phun sum tshogs dang dges byed pa/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa lnga/ /'od kyi sbyor bas rnam par rtsen/ /dpag med bdag
200b3(rgyud 'grel): lus sangs rgyas la/ /bsam mi khyab sprul rtsi yis mtshon/ /lus lnga dag ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI lo ka nA tha sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa b+hu pad+ma bi shud+d+ha a mri te rA dza b+hak+Sha ta kha khA khA hi khA hi/ a ne ka

200b5(rgyud 'grel): rol pa yin/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a i a'u e o aM/ mahA su kha badzra ta tA sarba dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ho ho ho zhes glu blang bar bya'o/ /dpal spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i zas kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
200b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi lus la lhag par chags/ /nang ni rnam pa mang ldan pa 'am/ /yang na bsod nams tshogs don gnyer/ /des ni las sbyin cho ga brtsam/ /re zhig longs spyod dang lus la rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur rtogs shing 'du byed
200b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dri za'i grong khyer ram/ /mtshon cha'i sbyor ba lta bur yongs su shes pas/ /thog ma kho nar mchod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni/ rnal 'byor gyi lus nye bar sbyin pa 'di'o/ /de las yang rang nyid bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan
201a1(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs rnam par dkar ba 'od zer bcu drug gi rnam pa can du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i thugs ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): kun da lta bu'o/ /de las byung pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba'o/ lte bar raM dmar po las skyes
201a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i me yi phreng ba gsal kyi 'khor lo can no/ /de bzhin thugs kar yang a dkar po las skyes pa'i dbyangs kyi 'khor lo yang ngo/ /mi dang lha dbang klu rgyal gyi/ /mgo gsum sgyed bu'i steng du ni/ /lha yi smin mtshams las byung ba'i/ /pha ti ka yi gri
201a3(rgyud 'grel): gug gis/ /bdag gi thod phyed bcangs nas ni/ /phru ba'i tshul du dgab par bya/ /lha yi lte dbus raM yig las/ /me lce bskyod la spar bar bya/ /de yi nang du bdag nyid lus/ /gcer bu cog krung 'dug pa yin/ /gnas gsum yi ge gsum
201a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ /khu ba dmar pos bzhu bar bya/ /'bru gsum lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /dag par byas dang bdud rtsir bya/ /phun tshogs dgyes pa'i rgyu bsams te/ /thugs ka'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bdud rtsi dgug /dam tshig ye shes 'dres
201a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje kha phye'i phyag rgya dang/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra kA ya shud+d+ha baM shud+d+hA ka ra mu kha a mri ta swa b+hA wa mahA ba liM ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM kha kha khA hi kha hI/ sarba sa twArtha ho/ /sngags 'di lan gsum par du dbul mgron gsum
201a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor cho gas so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI nmi tra'i gdams pa/ lus sbyin pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen po rgyun gyi phreng ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje chen po can gyi rnal 'byor pas/ yi

201b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bdud rtsir 'bab pas bsre/ /'jungs pa'i mya ngan rgud pa yi/ /gzugs can ji snyed 'jig rten rgyu/ /de snyed phyag mthil 'od zer gyi/ /mdun bdar? sa gzhi gang bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mahA kA ru Ni ka pra sA da sarba pre ta bra tyu da ta shI g+h+raM dza

201b7(rgyud 'grel): par byas te cho ga brtsam/ /thams cad stong pa nyid dbyings las/ /pad+ma zla dbus sa bon ma chen/ /yongs gyur sbyar bas lha mchog bskyed/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis yongs dag cing/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba/ /gnyis brkyang gung

202a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thal sbyar bas/ /mdzub gnyis gung mo la mdud cing/ /mtheb gnyis gung mo la btung nas/ /lus kun kun tu bskor myul bas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): badzra naM badzra tsakra b+ha wa ka pa Ta hUM zhes byas pas rdo rje zhu blubs kyi go bgo bar bya'o//
202a5(rgyud 'grel): de rjes rnam dag chos nyid rgya dang nam mkha' mdzod dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang/ /shugs chen skar mda' dbang du byed bshad rgyal ba spyan ras gzigs dbang rgya/ /sngags bcas grangs kyi dri bral bsam yas bdud rtsi'i mtsho
202a6(rgyud 'grel): chen sprin 'khrigs dang/ /dpag med lus kyis phun tshogs mchod sprul ma lus ci rigs dgos dgur mchod/ /oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tE b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya/ sarba thA khaM utga te
202a7(rgyud 'grel): spha ra(rgyud 'grel): hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te sa man+ta spha ra Na ra smi b+ha ba sa ma ya mahA ma Ni du ru du ru h+ri da ya dzA la ni hUM/ na ma:
202b1(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM gra he shwa ri pra b+hA ba dza ti mahA sa ma ya swAhA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta mahA ka ru Ni kA ya swa ra sh+rI a ba lo ki te mahA a d+hi Sh+ThA na dzwa la dzwa la nA nA pu dza me g+ha spha ra Na hUM/ paM las pad snod rgya chen ni/ /'bru gsum las gyur sna tshogs bcud//
202b2(rgyud 'grel): thab cing rgya che'i sngags phyag rgyas/ /byin brlabs de steng sman shing bskyed/ /a dang ka sogs las grub pa/ /grub pa nyi shu sogs rdzas kyis/ /legs spras dam tshig gtor ma la/ /ye shes bstims la ji bzhin mchod/ /dpal ldan thugs
202b3(rgyud 'grel): rje che stobs mthus/ /srid zhu yon tan phan 'dogs dang/ /snying rje'i gnas gyur ltos chags mgron/ /tshim byed mchod sbyin 'di rab bsngags/ /dpal thugs rje chen po'i chab gtor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
202b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug me dpung 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs myur du/ /dngos grub byed dang zang zing rnyed/ /gzi brjid bskyed dang mthu bskyed dang/ /sdig 'joms bya phyir me dpung mchod/ /dam tshig can gyi sngon du lha
202b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dris par byas nas nags dben par song ste/ khru bzhi pa dang khru ngo dang/ khru gang pa dang mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi shing bu bzang po bsrung ba blangs te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang lhan cig pa'i dad pa drag pos mchod pa'i yid
202b6(rgyud 'grel): ma brjed par byas la/ /ji tsam rig par mchod rten gyi gzugs lta bur brtsig go /ji skad zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tu/ /gang gsungs sreg rdzas mchod pa'i rkyen/ /de dag thams cad 'di shes byed/ /khyad par du ni rab bsngags brgyad/ /sa yi
202b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag po'i yo byad rung ba sna tshogs phye mar byas pa dang/ /dbang phyug rnams kyi 'bru nar dang ni de bzhin tshong dus chen po'i sa/ /gzi ldan mthu chen spra dang sen mo'i 'tsho ba'i dang por skyes pa'i thung/ /rang nyid lus skyes dri ma sna tshogs
203a1(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs min ling ga'o/ /de la thog ma kho nar me sbar ba dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ 'bar ba'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha spyan drangs te/ mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas bsreg rdzas dbul zhing
203a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsngags pa'i chus yang dang yang du khrus gsol ba dang bsangs gtor bya'o/ /de nas yang mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad byas te glu dang gar dang rol mo la sogs pa btab cing pi wang bsgreng ba dang lhan cig tu man ngag
203a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i ling ga bsregs la sngags bzla'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a ki ni dzwa la dzwa la mahA dzwa gA tro/ ma ma ta mu ge las che ge mo thams cad sid+d+ha sid+d+ha mahA ka ru Ni ka ho/ zhes bya bas so/ /me dpung
203a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba spyan ras gzigs dbang me yi las/ /mchod pa gang brnyes zhal gcig phyag gnyis dza ka'i mdog /shin tu gzi brjid sgrub pa'i bsod nams sgrub brtson pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu me thab g.yas g.yon 'dzin pa yin/ /de
203a5(rgyud 'grel): yi las bsgrub me yi bu zhes bya ba'i lha/ /rkang pa gnyis bteg dga' ba'i gzi mdangs dkar dmar mdog /rin chen phreng thogs nyid kyi thugs ka las 'ongs nas/ /sbyin bdag mdun sdod don kun nges par bsgrub pa'o/ /
203a6(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas lha mchog me lha gnyis/ /mnyes gyur rmi lam nang du ston/ /de nas gshegs gsol thal ba bsdus/ /dpung pa g.yas su bdugs par bya/ /thugs rje chen po me yi lha/ /de yi nyin mo tshur bcas la/ /rtag tu bu sdug lta
203a7(rgyud 'grel): bur ni/ /dgongs 'gyur 'dod pa thams cad bsgrub/ /me'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen po sku gsung thugs ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par
203b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ mtshan ma mthong pa'i sgrub pa pos dam tshig sbyangs te/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku la bdar ba'i chu sa lus bkrus la gnas phun sum tshogs par bdag gi ltos pa dor bas brtsams mo/ /rgyu dang ngo bo kha dog dang/ /rab tu gnas pa rnam
203b2(rgyud 'grel): par dang/ /yon tan dang ni 'phrin las rgyun/ /brgyad po la ni cho ga brgyad/ /thugs dang sku dang gsung nyid dang/ /ye shes dang ni de kho na/ /lnga ni yi ge lngar bcas la/ /gzhan gsum rang bzhin ye shes gsum/ /hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): he ho phaT
203b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ 'jim pa dang rdo dang shing dang ras dang rus pa dang rtsig ngos dang rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams ni rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi hUM rdo rje sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i thugs rdo rje'i
203b4(rgyud 'grel): rdul phra rab kyis gang zhing gtams par bya'o/ /zhi ba dang khro ba dang tshul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi ngo bo rnams ni 'khor lo can dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi 'dab ma'i dbus kyi oM 'khor lo sems dpa' las
203b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa'i sku thugs rje rnam par rol pas rab tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid du bya'o/ /dkar ba dang dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang khu la sogs pa'i kha dog rnams ni pad+ma can dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi 'dab ma'i dbus kyi a
203b6(rgyud 'grel): padmo'i sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i gsung nye bar bkod pas shin tu khyab par bya'o/ /ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams ni rin chen 'dzin dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo yi
203b7(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi h+ri(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i ye shes chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par byang chub par bya'o/ /dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa rnams ni sna tshogs
204a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod dbang dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi ho/ sna tshogs sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i rnam par dag pa mthar son par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu pral ba dang phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams
204a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sku gsung thugs ye shes kho na lnga po nyid gnyis med dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi ho gnyis med sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun mi
204a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pa la sogs pa'i 'phrin las rnams ni sku gsung thugs ye shes de kho na lnga po nyid rang byung ba'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi phaT rang byung sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i 'phrin las rtag tu rtsol bar mi mnga' bar
204a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa rnam par 'phrul bar bya'o/ /sgrub pa po dang rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rgyun rnams ni sku gsung thugs de ye shes de kho na lnga po nyid nye bar sbyor ba'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi swAhA nye bar sbyor
204a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i rgyun nam mkha' ji srid par sbyor ba dbang du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rang rang cho ga rjes mthun pas/ /ji ltar bsgrub pa dga' bzhin du/ /dka' yang skyo ba med spyod na/ /mi de myur du dngos grub byed/ /gang
204a6(rgyud 'grel): zhig gang gi don 'dod pas/ /lhag mas rab tu snying brtses 'jug /de dag rang bzhin stong nyid shes/ /brtul phod 'phags sras phyir mi ldog /sku gzugs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzi
204a7(rgyud 'grel): brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po mnyes byas pa'am/ /mnyes 'dod dang pa thob pas kyang/ /mang po'i spyod yul 'gyur bar ni/ /mchod rten la sogs brtsam par bya/ /gzi brjid rgyal po zhal gcig pa
204b1(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /yang na dpag tu med zhal phyag /bsam gyis mi khyab spyan mnga' ba/ /bsod nams bsgrub phyir spyan drangs mchod/ /bdag nyid h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i rgyal ba gang bsgoms pa/ /de yis byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ /rgya mtsho la ni char
204b2(rgyud 'grel): byan? bzhin/ /'jim pa la sogs yo byad la/ /rdo rje 'bar bas bgegs bsal te/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos gzi bskyed la/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i byin gyis brlab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sarba a b+hi ka naM ha ra ha ra pra ha ra hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI sarba d+harmma
204b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rma la bi shud+d+ha swa b+ha wa sarba mahA g+hu na a nu ba rti ta ye swAhA/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas rten la tshogs bsags te/ /stong pa nyid dang bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dgongs mdzad par/ /sngags pas mchod rten bzhengs par bya//
204b4(rgyud 'grel): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ lo ki shA ra ya/ pra b+ha rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te/ semyaksa m+bu d+d+hA ya/ tadya thA/ oM suk+Sh+mE su k+Sh+mE sa me sa ma ya/ shAn+te/ dAn+te/ sa ma ro pe/ a nA laM/ ta raM be/ ya sho wa ti/ mahA te dza/ ni ra ku le ni ra bA na/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a
204b5(rgyud 'grel): d+hiSh+ThA na/ a tiSh+Thi te swAhA/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gzungs 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing las la 'jug pas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug dran pa dang/ mi 'bral bar byed na/ des ji srid yo byad la gnas pa'i rdul phra rab
204b6(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi mchod rten sku gzugs byas par 'gyur ro/ /de rjes gzi brjid nyid dpal gyis/ /ye shes spros la rab gnas bya/ /nam mkha' ji srid bzhugs gsol nas/ /bzod par gsol te mchod pas mchod/ /sku gzugs dang
204b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa mchog zhugs de nyid ye shes ma mthong dang/ /mthong ba ji srid rnal du mi gnas res 'ga' nyid/ /de bzhin rnam g.yengs
205a1(rgyud 'grel): thibs por gyur dang mthar mi 'gro /blo gros lam ltos de dag las 'phags 'dir bshad bya/ /bdag lus spyi gtsug cod pan la/ /dpal ldan bla ma brgyud pa'i rim/ /ye shes shing rta'i rtsa mchog lam/ /drang dang bar mchad dang
205a2(rgyud 'grel): dangs/ /de mdza' slob dpon rdo rje rtse/ /bdag gi tshangs gnas nam mkha' i sgor/ /A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gnyis mtshan reg bsgoms la/ /steng rim nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus ye shes can rnams kyis/ /yang dag rim mdzad sa bon hUM/ /pad+ma la ni ge ser
205a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /mkhas pas rab dang thugs kar bsgom/ /zla ba la yang skar ma ltar/ /rdo rje 'chang chen 'od mthar ni/ /bcu dang gnyis bcas a phreng gis/ /bsgor bltas gsang sngags bzlas bar bya/ /oM ratna gu ru sh+rI a ba lo ki te shwa ra sarba ashTa
205a4(rgyud 'grel): de ba ta maha tiSh+Tha ne ma ma tsi ta ta ta ta dz+nyA na dzwa la dzwa la/ pra ti dzwa la pra ti dzwa la/ pra tyu ban+na h+ri(rgyud 'grel): da ya dzwa la dzwa la spha ra Na hUM hUM hUM/ gsang sngags rgyal po rig pa che/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa gdon mi za/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya nges pa 'di/ /thugs bskul ye
205a5(rgyud 'grel): shes 'bab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbang phyug sa bcu'i snying/ /bum pa las ni rgyun bzhin du/ /rim gyis bdag snying sa bon la/ /bab gyur de yi gzi brjid bskyed/ /'char ka'i 'od ltar dmar ba dang/ /zla rgyas dkyil 'khor ltar dkar nyid//
205a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu mdog lta bu yi/ /'od kyis bdag lus gang bar bya/ /gang phyir bskal ba bye bar yang/ /'bang byas dal bas yang min la/ /bde chen 'od gsal rnams mi rtog /bla ma'i drin thob thob par 'gyur/ /chu gtor che las brlan pa'i
205a7(rgyud 'grel): rlangs bskyod dri med mkha' la mi zad sprin 'khrigs dkar ba med/ /rta bdun shar tshe thibs pos ma rungs gling rnams mi gsal snang bar byas la dka' ba med/ /nam mkha' i dngos la shugs drag rlung 'khrugs glo bur sprin sgribs dangs
205b1(rgyud 'grel): par byas la dkar ba med/ /de bzhin bdag gis chos kyi rjer gyur dam pa'i mthus kyang ye shes 'bar bar dka' ba med/ ye shes sbar ba'i gdams ba rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig
205b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed na/ /bdag gam gzhan gyis don 'jug pa/ /de tshe shes dang mi shes pas/ /dri ma rab tu mang skye 'gyur/ /de la mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs pa/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/ /bkru ba dam
205b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dir bshad do/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog gnas pa'i/ /rten gang byin gyis brlabs ba zhig /mdun bdar me tog bdug spos sogs/ /mchod pa du mas legs mchod bya/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa yi/ /rgyal ba sras bcas
205b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gsum/ /sprin gyi phung po ltar dkrigs pas/ /nam mkha' i ngos la gang bar lta/ /nyes dmigs rnam pa mang dran bas/ /gdung pa'i yid kyis 'gyong bas ni/ /thog med nas bsags sdig pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus so sor bshags shing bsdam/
205b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dge ba'i rtsa rnams la/ /rjes su yid byed yi rang ba/ /'di ni bsam mi khyab pa'i las/ /ming la phun tshogs khyad par 'dod/ /de nas 'phags tshogs spyan sngar bdag /gus pas phyag 'tshal rab dad pas/ /sdig ldan bdag la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /thugs
205b6(rgyud 'grel): rje chen pos dgongs su gsol/ /gti mug thibs pos non pa bdag /mi zad sdig pa'i dbang gyur te/ /'gro ba ngan song nges pa'i sar/ /gdon mi za bar myur ltung 'gyur/ /de bas skyob pa rnams kyi mthus/ /mgon med bdag ni gnas skabs 'di/ /gzigs
205b7(rgyud 'grel): nas myur du bskyab du gsol/ /khyed las skyabs bzhan bdag ma mchis/ /de ltar sna tshogs gdungs pa yi/ /smre sngags du mas smre brjod la/ /rtse gcig ma yangs thal sbyar nas/ /re ba'i yid kyis mdun du 'dug /de tshe lha mchog 'dus pa yi/ /tshogs rnams
206a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i thugs bskyod de/ /de dag las sprul 'jig rten mgon/ /dkar bzangs bum pa 'dzin pa 'ong bsam/ /yang ni mi byed dang dang dang/ /mchod byas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de rjes mgon po'i thugs ka nas/ /'od phyung mi
206a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs sbyin pa'i sgras/ /dbyings 'byin dri ma bsal ba dang/ /bkrus dang yongs su spyang ba bya/ de la 'od zer rnon po yis/ /dri ma bsregs pa dang po ste/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun phreng ba yis/ /bkru ba gang yin gnyis pa'o/ /yang dag ye shes mnyam
206a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag la/ /mnyam 'jog yongs su sbyong ba bshad/ /dag dang dri med 'od gsal dang/ /sgrub pa las la sbyar ba yis/ /don bsgrubs nas ni dkyil 'khor gnyis/ /slar bdag snying khar bsdu bar bya/ /dri ma rnam dag gi cho ga rdzogs so// //
206a4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pa gang zhig yul lam dbang po dang las kyi stobs kyis gal te phyi dang nang gi dam tshig nyams pa 'ga' zhig lta bu byung bar gyur na/ /de 'phags pa spyan ras
206a5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dran par byas la/ lus dang longs spyod dang/ gdam ngag la lhag par chags pa yang spangs te/ cho ga rnams las ji snyed 'byung ba'i bshags pa dang/ spyang ba rnams kyis shin tu gus
206a6(rgyud 'grel): par rab tu dag par bya'o/ /de'i yang cho ga rnams kyi gtso/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /dri ma spyod pa'i brtag pa las/ /gang bshad bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'di/ /padmo dkar rgyas 'dab stong rnam par bye ba yi/ /lte bar dang
206a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dri med hUM gi snying po can/ /sgrib tshogs chags nyams du ba khug rna dngul gyi tshul/ /me long ngos la g.ya' dang ji bzhin khebs par bsam/ /de yi gtsug tor nas brgyud pa/ /d+hu ti rin chen spangs pa yi/ /spu gu dkar po gyin?
206b1(rgyud 'grel): 'greng? ba/ /spyi gtsug par du gsal bar bya/ /bdag nyid cod pan nyi zla'i gdan stengs 'bar ba la/ /bla ma mgon dang a haM yab yum phyi nang rim/ /ji bzhin snyoms 'jug bde chen stong nyid bsam gtan la/ /rtag tu dges bzhugs bdag gi nyams
206b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gso mdzad bsgom/ /phyi nang gsang gsum mchod pa dang/ /bstod sogs rgyas par byas nas ni/ /'gyod dang sdom dang dang bar bcas/ /rtse gcig blo yis gsol bar bya/ /thog ma kho nar bla ma snyoms zhugs byang chub sems kyi rgyun rab
206b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar/ /sbyor mtshams nas sam nyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje rnam dag rtse lnga las/ /byung ba'i me lces bdag lus kun khyab rlung gi shugs bcas dkrugs pa dang/ /mngar ba'i shugs kyis ji snyed chags nyams dri ma ma lus bsreg par bya/ rdo rjes lha yang snyom par zhugs/ /thig le dkar hUM bkru
206b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /de bzhin thabs dang shes rab kyang/ /snyoms 'jug thig le sngon pos gso/ /cho ga dam pa 'di yis ni/ /mi gang shes dang mi shes dang/ /ma dang nga rgyal mang ba dang/ /bsnyen sogs rgyu yis lam nyams pa/ /de dag myur du
206b5(rgyud 'grel): gza' las thar ba'i zla ba bzhin/ /zla ba gcig gam yang na gnyis nyid de ste gsum/ /brtson dang gus drag the tshom yid gnyis bsal nas ni/ /rig ma mchog bcas snyoms par zhugs na nges par grol/ /chags nyams gso ba
206b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu snga bar langs nas ni/ /dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yi/ /bum par brtson mdzad spyan ras gzigs/ /bzhu ba'i rgyun gyis lus bkru bya/ /dge ba'i
206b7(rgyud 'grel): khung bu dam par ni/ /brtse ldan skyes bu che rnams kyis/ /dul ba'i blo gros dran pa dang/ /bag yod dbang po rab bsdams pas/ /zhugs la sna tshogs mchod pa yi/ /rdzas rnams chal bar bkram bya zhing/ /dri bsung bdug pa mchog gis bdug
207a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas bya/ /oM a b+hi ka nan sarba to Sha pra ha na hUM phaT/ de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ji bzhin bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi/ /cho ga rim pas sngon btang la/ /pha Ti ka li sbyor ba brtsam/ /rdo rje lcags
207a2(rgyud 'grel): kyu'i phyag rgya dang/ /smin mtshams 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /brtson pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang po/ /skad cig tsam gyis mdun du drang/ /shel ltar dri med yangs pa yi/ /pho brang rin chen sgron ma can/ /rab tu nyams dga' lham
207a3(rgyud 'grel): me ba/ /brgyan rnams kun gyis phun tshogs lha/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i er ka rab snyan bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /bstan pa gang dag shin tu rnam nges rtag dang bde dang gtsang ba dang/ /bdag tu chags pa'i
207a4(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i kun sel mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang dang/ /bdag med chos ston nam mkha' i mthar thug skye dgu'i snying ram sim byed bsam/ /dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi/ /gzhal med khang brtsegs dam pa dag /kun tu 'od
207a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tsher rgyal ba yi/ /sku mdzes mang pos rab brgyan pa'o/ /khang bzangs re yang mchod pa yi/ /lha mo bcu drug bcu drug gis/ /mngon par rol byas rtag tu rtse na/ /thams cad ting 'dzin bskyed brtson pa'o/ /de yi phyi rol nye 'khor
207a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ /phyogs skyong bcu yi bu rnams kyis/ /gtsor byas mchod pa'i sprin phung las/ /lus phyed mngon phyung btud pa'o/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /smin mtshams mdzod spu phyung ba yi/ /skar mnga' ltar dkar 'od 'phros pas/
207a7(rgyud 'grel): khang bzangs rgyal ba'i thugs bskul ba/ /'di ltar rnam par g.yeng kun gyis/ /rtsa ba 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa ting 'dzin myur 'dod pas/ /'dzin pa mdza' dag spang bar bya/ /de 'dzin pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ /longs spyod
207b1(rgyud 'grel): bshes dang lus nyid dang/ /dge ba'i tshogs la mngon zhen pa'o/ /'di dag gzhan gyi don du bsngo/ /de nas me long zla rgyas dang/ /dbang po'i gzhu dang 'od kyi khyim/ /ston gyi nam mkha' i gung snyams kyis/ /sbyor ba brtan pas rnam par bsgom/ /
207b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /thogs med 'od dpag med nyid kyis/ /dbu rgyan h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig snying po can/ /smin mtshams nyi mas mtshan gyur lta/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ma ma tsi tra sa ma ya d+hi badzra mu tra pra tyud ta pheM pheM pheM dzwa la dzwa la dzwa la hUM hUM hUM/
207b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs/ /ting 'dzin dbab pa'i phyag rgyas te/ /rang bzhin pad+ma 'dab stong dbus/ /thig le dkar 'tsher rdo rje'i rgyu/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis padmo dbye/ /thig le las ni 'od tshogs spro/ /de yi mun pa kun bsregs
207b4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /thogs med bsam gtan rang byung 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin myur du bskyed pa'i gdam ngag rdzogs so// //spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rab tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig ting 'dzin ri dbang po ltar g.yeng ba'i
207b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis mi bskyod cing/ /shin tu 'od gsal ston ka'i mkha' la nyi 'od dra ba bkram 'dra ba/ /gnyis med bde chen rtogs dka' i rtog pas rtag tu dges bzhugs 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag
207b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med mgon po nyid rtag 'dud/ /sgrub po gang zhig sgrub pa 'am/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnyed pa yi/ /ting 'dzin rab tu mi brtan pa/ /de dag brtan pa'i thabs 'dir bshad/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du/ /lus dang sems ni rab ral? ba
207b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen mchod sbyin byas nas su/ /man ngag gsum gyi dang po bsgom/ /ma lus 'gro la byams sogs tshad med tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs gnas la ji skad bshad pa'i ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dpa' bo chen po mnyam gzhag
208a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de rjes mtshan bcas mtshan med cho gas mgon po la gus gsol btab la/ /sbyor ba gsum pa'i rnal 'byor rgyal po rtse gcig brtan par yang dag bsgom/ /tha mal rang lus dkyil 'khor dbus/ /snying
208a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil padmo dbye ba'i nang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa legs bsgoms la/ /de yi nang na'ang mgon po nyid/ /de bzhin de yi snying po nyid/ /dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa/ /sgrub po'i ting 'dzin brtan pa'i rgyu/ /ye shes chen/
208a3(rgyud 'grel): po h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig go /de ni gnyis su med sems rgyu/ /de la sa bon yang dag brten/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes dngos/ /'bru bzhi phyogs bzhir rnam par bsam/ /mgon po nyid mthar A li ste/ /bla ma'i mthar yang kA li'o/
208a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus nas brtsams te sngags bzla zhing/ /'od zer sbyor pas don gnyis bsgrub/ /skye ba las ni phyogs bcu'i mthar thugs gang dag bsam gtan ma thob ba 'am/ /thob kyang gang zhig rnal du mi gnas ri yi rtsa rtse ltar
208a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba/ /de dag de ltar skad cig yud la ri rab spo ltar brtan pa yi/ /ting 'dzin la bkod bde chen ro myang 'chi med mnyam gzhag cher gzhag bya/ /bsdus pas phyi ma phyi ma'i rim/ /thim gyur nang ma nang ma la/ /dag dang dri
208a6(rgyud 'grel): med brtan pa zhes/ /bya ba'i ming can ting 'dzin gsum/ /go rims ji bzhin bsgoms nas ni/ /gcig tu 'gro ba snying brtse bas/ /thun gsum zhag bdun yid byed na/ /de yi ting 'dzin ri ltar 'gyur ting 'dzin brtan par byed pa'i
208a7(rgyud 'grel): gdam ngag rdzogs so/ //'phags pa mi g.yo pa'i ting nge 'dzin can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gang sems g.yo 'gog 'dod pas/ /skad cig sbyor bar spyan ras gzigs/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho dus drug tu/ /mtshan ma
208b1(rgyud 'grel): drug ni bsgom par bya/ /de la g.yon pa brtan par bya ba ni/ /phyi'i mtshan ma ri mo dang ri mo mer pa la rtse gcig tu 'jug pa'o/ /nang gi mtshan ma ye ge med pa la rtse gcig tu 'jug pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mtshan ma skye ba dang skye ba med pa la rtse gcig tu
208b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba brtan par byed pa ni phyi'i mtshan ma rgya mtsho dang nam mkha' i sbyor ba'o/ /nang gi mtshan ma bum pa lta bu dang ri mo lta bu'i sbyor ba'o/ /gsang ba'i mtshan ma ni/ /thig le snyos pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /phyi nang gsang g.yo mi
208b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo bas/ /dbang gyur dmigs par rang gnas na/ /de yang de tshe byed bral du/ /dub pa ngal bso mkhas pas shes/ /sems brtan par byed pa rdzogs so// //dpal ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa'i gter la phyag
208b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan padmo 'dzin dbang gis/ /sngags mthu ma grub grub pa dang/ /nyams chags gso ba'i cho ga ni/ /mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya/ /tha mal lus kyi snying 'dab dbul/ /phyogs kyi kha dog can hUM yig /rnal 'byor
208b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rang sems gzhi/ /dkar 'khyil gzi brjid 'od mdzad bsgom/ /kha dang rna ba sna gnyis dang/ /mig gnyis bshang dang gci ba'i sgo/ /de bzhin rkang pa lag gnyis ni/ /gtso bo las spros rdo rje bdag /gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /pad+ma utpal
208b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phra/ /nyi zla rdo rje hoM khung zum/ /rgya gram rdo rje rtse mang nyid/ /a phrang ka phreng dkar dmar gyis/ /bskor bas khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i sngags/ /thugs rje 'phros pa 'od zer las/ /skyes pa'i sbyor ba yid ngag bya/ /dam tshig rdo rje hUM yig las/ /ye
208b7(rgyud 'grel): shes dpal 'dzin bcu gnas ni/ /mchod sogs cho ga bzhin btud nas/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' rtse gcig bya/ /rnam par rtog pa kun bshigs dang/ /ye shes phyag rgya mchog sbyor la/ /mnyam gzhag phrin las bcu lhag spyod/ /
209a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas som nyi med par spyad/ /rtag tu sems can la phan dang/ /lhag pa'i lhas de de nyid shes/ /rnal 'byor cho ga la brtson pas/ /zla ba drug na rtags mthong 'gyur/ lus nad me dong lce 'bar ba da ltar tsha me 'od
209a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'khrug pa dang/ /rdo rje'i spu skyes kha nas me 'bar skye bo mang po'i mgo btud bstod/ /lag na rdo rje ral gri 'bar thogs ha la'i sgra sgrogs phyogs bcur rgyug /mig 'bras rab gsal sgron ma'i 'od 'char blo gros nye bar zhi ba'o//
209a3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs mi zad pa'i chog rdzogs so// //btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig sngags pa blo gros dam pa phul du sbyangs pa dag gis zla ba rgyas pa'i tshe kha shar du bltas la btsun pa
209a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bas/ /thog mar skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i gnas pad+ma la legs par gnas pa'i shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa yid
209a5(rgyud 'grel): la bya'o/ /me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang/ sngar byas pa la 'gyod pas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de dag nyid kyang ngo/ /de nas rang lus rgyal ba yi//
209a6(rgyud 'grel): pho brang 'khor lo dkar mdzes su/ /skad cig tsam gyis mngon bltas la/ /rnam dag gsum po bsgom par bya/ /de la mgo bo g.yas g.yon lag /gsang ba'i rdo rje g.yas g.yon rkang/ /'di dag rtsibs drug gsal ba ste/ /lte ba lte ba lin
209a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bshad/ /hUM dang oM dang traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a/ /phaT ces bya ba sngon po dang/ /dkar ser dmar ljang gud mdog rnams/ /rims bzhin me long gzugs ltar dgod/ /sgyu ma smon lam rnam thar gyis/ /don du grub pa med pa yang/ /snang ba mi dmigs
209b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du 'brel/ /rtog pa mdza' gnyis las grol ba'o/ /de rjes lte dbus sems kyi gzhi/ /brtan pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar bsams te/ /de steng bde chen thig le bsgom/ /sbyor ba gsum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang/ /nges par rtogs pa'i
209b2(rgyud 'grel): rim gsum gyi/ /mkhas pas bde chen 'bar ba yi/ /khu ba zhu ba bsgom par bya/ /'gro ba'i don bsgrub rdo rje yi/ /'khor lo 'gal me bskor ba zhes/ /bya ba 'di yang bla ma yi/ /man ngag gis ni de rjes brtsam/ /brtse chen byang chub sems bzang gi/
209b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung bskyong ye shes 'bru lnga yi/ /phreng ba 'khor lo bskor ba las/ /chos kyi sgra dbyangs snyan bsgrag bya/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med stong/ /mtshan med smon pa zad pa yis/ /gsung rab drang dang drang ba min/ /phyogs bcur mkha' khyab bstan par bya//
209b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig don gnyis byed pa 'dis/ /cig car bdag gzhan don bsgrubs nas/ /mthar ni brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /'khor lo sbar ba'ang shes par bya/ /de bzhin 'gro dang 'dug dang smra/ /gnyid log la sogs dus kun tuAng/ /brtan pa mi phyed dran
209b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /rtag tu spyod pa spyad par bya/ /'khor lo 'bar ba rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gsung dbang gi rgyal po rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung gi dbang phyug ngag gi bdag /rtag tu spongs pa
209b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog bskyed mdzad/ /so so rang rang rig mgrin par gnas/ /dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /blo ldan rab dang snying rje'i chab kyis rtog pa'i myu gu rnam brlan dang/ /gang zhig skal ngan dag gi dpa' nyams skye bos rab brnyas ma rungs nyid//
209b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag sngags rig mthu bskyed 'dod dang de bzhin pha rol byad bzlog 'dod/ /de dag gus pas shin tu yid dga' dag gi mthu bskyed gsung gis rol pa 'di bsgom bya/ /re zhig sngags pas skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang dbang
210a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba yang dag par rjes su dran pas lha'i rnal 'byor chen po yud tsam gyis mngon du byas la/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las yongs su gyur pa'i padmo sdong bu can gyi 'dab ma'i lce dang steng du a dang hUM las zla ba dang rdo rjer bskyed pa nas de'i
210a2(rgyud 'grel): mthar A li dang kA li rang phreng ba 'bar ba dkar dmar g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba'i bar du ste/ ji skad 'phags pa'i lce byin gyis brlab pa'i mdo las 'byung ba ltar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas lhag bsam rnam dag pas/ /'gro ba'i dag gi dri
210a3(rgyud 'grel): bsal zhing/ /mthu bcu spobs pa bskyed 'dod pas/ /thog mar a la sogs pa zla/ /de'i phyir de dag las 'od kyi phreng ba dkar po dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang gur phub pa dang/ /gzha' ris kyi rnam pa lta bur shar bas sems can ma lus pa'i
210a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi dri ma bsal zhing/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsung gi dbang po'i rgyal po rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ngag gi mthu rnam pa bcu po dag yongs su bskyed pa dang/ /tshur 'dus pas de dag gi ngag gi nus pa de gang yod pa de dag kyang
210a5(rgyud 'grel): mar me ltar blangs shing/ /yi ge nyid las mngon par thib pa dang/ /a sogs rdo rje dkar po dang/ /de bzhin lhag bsam sngo bas/ /ka sogs ral gri'i bar bsams te/ /ral gri rdo rje rnam par sel/ /de la ral gri ni gnyis gnyis so/ /
210a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ni re re'o/ /mthar phreng ba phreng rgyud gcig la dgod par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i las ni ngag gi skyon 'jig par byed do/ /ral gri'i las ni ngag gi mthu rnon po yang dag par 'byin par byed pa'o/ /rdo rjes yi ge de dag gis mtshan rdo rje'i mchog dang rno ba
210a7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /ral gri 'bar ba spu gri'i so 'dra 'od zer dkar dmar lhag ge ba/ /mkhas pas de tshe skad cig mngon bltas tshig bcas klag cing ma yengs pas/ /rang gzhan don phyir bro gar 'gyu byas spro dang bsdu ba'i 'od dbyung bya/ /de ltar sbyor
210b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dam pa 'di nyid dang ldan pas nam langs pa 'am/ nyi ma 'char ka 'am srod thog thag gam mtshan phyed dam rtag tu yang rung ste/ gzhan la brtse ba drag po bcas pas gang grub pa'i dge ba nyid kyang bdag nyid lhag par chags pa med par gzhan
210b2(rgyud 'grel): la yang dag par phan par 'dod na/ /'di'i ngag gi nus pa ni drang srong dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /gang tshe bzlas pas yid skyo zhing/ /'gro don ldan par 'dod pa na/ /sngags gsum bzlas pas phreng ba yi/ /'khor lo bskor ba 'od du bzhu/ /dpal ngag

210b5(rgyud 'grel): bzo bcos lte ba padmos mtshan/ /brgya ched la ni rdo rje yi/ /ral gri mi bzang gzugs bya'o/ /pho brang gnas su sa bon las/ /mgon po rlung gi 'khor lo can/ /rtsibs rnams la ni shes rab thabs/ /yongs gyur sngags grub lha mo bsam/ /dngos
210b6(rgyud 'grel): dang byin brlabs gzhug pa yis/ /gzi byin bskyed la mchod pas mchod/ /rang nyid 'khor lo 'dzin bsgoms nas/ /'od bkye sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskor/ /thun gsum thog mar brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gsang sngags myur du grub 'dod bas/ /
210b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab rlung la bka' bsgo ste/ /rang nyid ci bde spyad par bya/ /gang du 'khor lo rab 'khyil pa/ /thugs rje che mchog rig pa'i mthus/ /sgrub po'i ngal ba 'jig byed pa/ /der ni sdig ldan mi brten no/ /de ltar 'khor lo chen po rang nyid 'phags pa
211a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs kyi mthus rigs lnga bcu rtsa lnga zlos par mdzad pa ni dam tshig can rnams kyis thabs yin par blta bar bya'o/ /me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ji snyed pa la gang zag med pas ces le lo dang brnyas pa mi
211a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /kha na ma tho ba phra rab dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu thams cad la bag yod pa dang/ brtson pa lhur bya'o/ /dkar po'i phyogs gcig gis brnyes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /dpal ldan bla ma'i man ngag
211a3(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i drin/ /gang thob skal ldan ngal ba med par ni/ /gsang sngags sgrub byed lus med shugs can gyi/ /'khrus 'khor 'jig rten mgon nyid las gzhan min/ /gsang sngags myur du grub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs

211b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid la nyid/ /mngon gsum mi g.yo brtan par gzung/ /tshul 'di rang bzhin mkha' 'dra ste/ /rnam pa thig le bde ba che/ /ngo bo kun tu ma 'gags pa'o/ /spyangs sdom can gyi chos gcig bzhed/ /de ltar sgyu 'dra chos kyis rang bzhin med/ /gzhan la ma rig bdag
211b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid snying dkyil brtan par gnas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul gcig yin ma nor ba/ /bsgoms na de rjes rmi lam nyid duAng de mthong 'gyur/ /gal te sgrib tshegs bud shing tshang tshing gis bsgribs pas/ /yang dag ji bzhin de tshe mngon du ma gyur
211b3(rgyud 'grel): na'ang/ /rnal 'byor rgyal pos re ba chad par mi bya ste/ /goms pa cung zad gcig tu brtson 'grus gsel mi bya/ /mdun gyi mkha' la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /nyan thos rang rgyal lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i

211b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar spros bral du/ /rtsol ba med nyid rang dbang mngon sum 'char bar byed/ /rmi lam skyes bus rmi lam gyi/ /grong du dga' dang mya ngan la/ /bzung ba rloms sems can yin la/ /de tshe de yis shes par 'gyur/ /me long gzugs brnyan

212b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas ba yis/ /bcad dang gtub dang bsreg pa ni/ /ltas ngan rnam par ba shig par byed/ /sna tshogs mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /gtor ma stong ni rab tu sbyin/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /dag bsdams pa'i rgyun chags so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): mahA ta thA ga te aSh+Ta
212b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ta mahA lo ke shwa ra sa pa ri bA ra ba liM ta pu dza me g+ha samu dra spha ra Na hUM hUM lan gsum gsum gyis so/ /mthar ni 'di'o/ /ma ma ku TeSh+Ti ku karmmA sarba rbad tra sarba tha shA na ka rA phaT/ a ka ru yis legs bdug cing/ /lha mchog mdun du rnam
212b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams pas/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i sgra phyung ste/ /mkha' la gzhal ltar zhi bar bsams/ /sdig pa dang ni bkra shis min/ /dgra dang gdon kun rab 'jigs pa/ /cho ga'i rgyal po ye shes mchog /spyan ras gzigs kyi brtag pa'o/ /rmi

212b5(rgyud 'grel): smin mtshams las brgyud in dra mkha' 'dra'i thig le'i rgyal po a/ /gtum mo rnams kyis kaM bsreg nri sbyong thig le mchog gso rgyal/ /re zhig byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog la rab gzhol bas/ /sems ni cig tu
212b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par nges cing g.yengs par ma gyur pa/ /'gro ba lnga po rnams la byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms byang chub kyi sems yang dag par bsgoms pa ngag gis skye bo gdul bar dka' ba ma rungs pa tha dad pa dmu rgod du
212b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas/ rgyud ma rungs par byas pa rnams kyi khro ba bsal bar bya'o/ /gang phyir srid pa'i sdug bsngal rtsa/ /nyon mongs de yi rtse phyir dang/ /bsod nams mang po gzhig phyir dang/ /bdag la brtan nas gzhan brlag phyir/ /de la 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba'i gnas ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam par dkar ba zhes bya'o/ /de'i zhal ni brgya pa'o/ /phyag ni stong ngo/ /spyan ni rab tu mang ba'o/ /spu re re zhing yang 'od kyi zer
213a2(rgyud 'grel): glog gi me lta bu rnam par 'phro ba'o/ /sgron shing dang tshil chen po yi mar me la dgyes pa'o/ /a ka ru dang du ru ka dang/ gla rtsi'i bdug pas yang dag par bdug pa'o/ /tshes gcig dang gsum dang bdun la sogs pa'i sbyor ba
213a3(rgyud 'grel): la zhugs pa'o/ /tshes brgyad dang bzhi dang bco lnga la rgyun gyi sbyor ba la gnas pa'o/ /bcu drug dang bco brgyad dang gnam stong la bsreg pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'o/ /gcig dang gsum dang bdun dang ni/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi btsa
213a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang/ /bcu drug bco brgyad gnam stong la/ /byis pa'i ston mo grangs rim bzhin/ /'di ni zla ba dang po la'o/ /de nas rim bzhin yang phyi mar/ /mas bzlog grangs kyi bud med ston/ /de bzhin de phyis ci 'byor mchod/ /tshul 'dis
213a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gdug nag po yang/ /lcags bsreg snod du mar gsar bzhin/ /ring po mi thogs snying brtse can/ /zhu bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /khro ba bsal ba rdzogs so// //dpal thugs rje chen po gdug pa 'dul ba la phyag
213a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /snying rje che ldan sngags pa yi/ /shin tu gdug pa can gnas sam/ /mi srun skye bos gang ba'i gzhir/ /dpal ldan gdug pa 'du ba mdzad bsgom/ /ji skad 'byung ba nyid dpal che/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan ldan pa/ /spyi
213a7(rgyud 'grel): bo 'od dpag med kyis spras/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig ye shes snying po can/ /gsal byas de thugs nyi ma yi/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong lha mchog stong/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir mnyam gzhag pa/ /rnal 'byor can gyi skad cig bskyed/ /spyi gtsug
213b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad sgo rdo rje'i rtse/ /spu gu dkar po ta la phyin dang/ /lte ba lta ba nyid yin te/ /de stengs mgon po nyer mtshan pa'o/ /de dbus su ni rang sems h+rI:/ /khros pa drag po rab gnas bsam/ /brtse bas rtsal bskyed cher 'phel bas/ /'od 'phros gdug pa bkug mdun
213b2(rgyud 'grel): bdam/ /cho ges gtor ma sbyin byas la/ /de snying padmo gcig dbus hUM/ /gdug pa'i sems gang yin pa bskyed/ /cho ga gsum gyis de bsreg go/ kun tu sdang ba med nyid dang/ /ltos bral gcig tu snying brtse can/ /dpal ldan mgon po che nyid la/ /drin sdod de yi
213b3(rgyud 'grel): dgra rnams 'jig/ gang tshe rmi lam nang du yang/ /byams sems zhugs pas snying g.yo zhing/ /gzhan don mchi ma 'khrug 'gyur ba/ /de tshe gdug pa thul bar 'gyur/ /rlom med dregs ba zhi ba dang/ /rtag tu byams ldan snying ston pa/ /mi de'i dam tshig zab

213b5(rgyud 'grel): dregs pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ bdag nyid 'phags pa zhal brgya pa/ /phyag stong spyan dpag med ldan sku/ /dkar zhing dri med 'od 'bar ba/ /mi 'jigs sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya/ /shar du ha la zhal gsum khros/ /phyag drug mda' gzhu rdo

214a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan rgyu ma gsol/ /'di dag dpa' bo khros pa yi/ /cha lugs stang stabs drag bcas pa/ /spyan mad kyis spras spung mgo nas/ /kun nas (me 'bar 'khyil ba'o/ /de nas) dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga las ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ /bde ba
214a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i pho brang gi rnam par thar pa zab mo dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yang mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa gang dag gang gi dbang las skyes pa'i nga rgyal gyi sems rab tu
214a3(rgyud 'grel): dregs shing mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ba/ /lta ba phyin ci log dang sems phyin ci log gis kun nas bkris pa yi/ 'chi ba dam po'i dbang du gyur pa de dag nyid blos mdun du bya'o/ /de la mkhas pa sdang ba dang/ /brnyas bral zhi ba'i sems
214a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms las byung byang chub sems/ /yang dang yang du brtan bsgoms te/ /de yi sems ni rlung gi rta/ /thig le rtsa yi sbyor ba can/ /rnam par shes dang gcig gyur ni/ /de gdan tsita ta dmar

217b7(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas/ /skad cig yung? la rta bdun lam gang mgon po nyid mchod sprin rum 'khrigs pa'i dpung bkod pa/ /shes rab snang bas gsal bar bltas la mchod sprin rgya mtshos rab tu mchod/ /lha yi dbang
218a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug padmo'i rigs/ /pad+ma stong ldan sdong bu 'dzin/ /phyogs bcu nas 'ongs phyogs bcu'i char/ /bzhugs bltas de dag mgon mchod bsam/ /tshangs dbyangs sna tshogs sku gsung thugs bstod mnyam med ngag gi skyon bral bas//
218a2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan kun brjod 'dod pa drag pos shin tu gsol btab gus byas la/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ba de gshegs sa bon zla 'od 'bar ba la bstim bya/ /thim gyur rjes thogs thang cig de nyid bcu drug phyed phyed thig ler gyur/ /de yang yud kyis de bzhin du/
218a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang gzhon nur gyur/ /de bzhin de yi thugs kar yang/ rgyal ba'i snying po h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de las zer bskyod dang pa'i zhags sra rdo rje'i thig gu bzhus pa yis/ /thub dbang thugs stabs skad cig de la thugs rje che mda'i
218a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs bskul gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i 'dren pas byin brlabs phun tshogs 'od zer dmar mdzes zhing/ /gyen du 'gring ltas smin mtshams mdzod spu'i sgo nas thogs med tal phyin phyung/ /zla zer 'od ni nyi ma yi/ /zer yin de yi lces
218a5(rgyud 'grel): reg pas/ /snying gi 'dab stong kha dbye zhing/ /phye ba'i dbus na bskyab pa'i sku/ /'od dpung rgya mtsho gang ba 'dis/ /zhag bcu phrag gsum nyid na de/ /blo ldan yid kyi mun sel zhing/ /dri ma ma lus rnam bar 'khrud/ /rjes la brang srong nyid kyi sku/ /sdud byed byung
218a6(rgyud 'grel): gi shugs can gyis/ /'dab stong bdud rtsi'i bum 'thung ba/ /ting nge 'dzin yin 'khrul 'khor mchog /kha sarba Ni pad+ma kha 'byed kyi man ngag rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par snang ba la
218a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin goms pa'i gang zag gi/ /bden rtog ma lus bzlog phyir dang/ /lha yi dri ma'ang spangs pa'i phyir/ /gzugs la rnyan gzugs can man ngag gyi /skye bos rab dben nyams dga' i bzhir/ /'dab brgyad padmo phye ba yi/ /maN+Dal
218b1(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong legs bris la/ /de dbus 'dren pa snang bar bya/ /shar gyi 'dab mar khri btsugs la/ /de steng shin tu dri med gzugs/ /brtson pa'i cha byad rgyan mang mnga' / /dkar dmar la sogs bdag yid ltar/ /chu nang rag dang zla ba dang/ /gzugs ltar de yi
218b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa gsal/ /shel dang me long la sogs ngos/ /dkyil 'khor lte par mngon par bzhugs/ /drang srong gtso bo sgyu ma'i rnam thar ni/ gdul ka gdul phyir sna tshogs skur ston mang/ /de tshe de don de nyid gzugs mi mnga' / /de nyid 'dir ni stong nyid gzugs
218b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /ma dag lus kyi dri ma thams cad las/ /shin tu ring gyur phun tshogs skur snang la/ /de nyid mkha' ltar dmigs pa rab zhi ba/ /dus gsum rgyal pa'i ye shes sku yin no/ /byis pa rnams ni kha dog dbyibs/ /dbye bas snang ba
218b4(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin don de bzhin ces rtogs/ /mkhas rnams ji ltar snang ba sna tshogs nyid/ /gang snang de ltar de tsam zhi bar zhes/ /ji ltar lha yi sbyor ba 'dir mtshan med/ /de ltar gzugs sogs dngos kun yang dben na/ /shes rab kyis brtags

218b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /bdag nyid rim pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku gsung thugs mtshan nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thugs par gyur dang bse bar bya'o/ /de nas khrus dang byug pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ /phyag 'tshal pa dang bskor ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas

219a3(rgyud 'grel): blo sbyangs/ /g.yeng bral rtse gcig yid byed pa/ /de yid 'phags pa me tog gdan/ /dngos grub nye phyir bsgrub pa'o/ /yul gang ma tog kun gsal rgyas/ /'bras bu bzang rnams smin pa dang/ /nyams dga' byi dor rgyas ldan par//

222b1(rgyud 'grel): re zhig dam tshig can yon tan tshul ma gnas pa'i che ba bsgrags pas gnas gang du skye bo 'dul ba 'am/ mang pos mthong ba dang thos pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa zhig bcos la/ rdo rje thab sbyor la sogs pas bgegs bsal zhing der khang bu brtsegs 
222b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis pa grong khyer pa dang pho brang pa man ngag dang ldan pas brtsig cing bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'khor yug la sogs par mchod pa thams cad kyis brgyan cing/ /bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa klog pas phyogs bzhir sgra sgrogs
222b3(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ rnal 'byor can bdag dang skal pa lhag pa dang/ mnyam pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad gus pa'i ched du brjod pa dang/ skal pa sman pa rnams la snying rje'i lcags kyus zin pas ji tsam don bya bar bzod pa de srid 'bad par
222b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gang phyir grags pa ma yin rgyu/ /mi snyan brjod sogs don min phyin/ /mkhas pa grags pa bzang skyong 'dod/ /des ni sdig pa bsal phyir 'bad/ /gdug pa'i ngag gis mtshon rnon pos/ /gzhan gyi grags pas gcod byed cing/ /tshe rabs kun tu
222b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi yang/ /snyan pa ma yin kun bskyed pa'o/ /mi gang bdag nyid skyon brjod kyi/ /gzhan gyi yon tan mi 'chab la/ /nam yang nyes par smra mi byed/ /de ni grags pa bzang ldan 'gyur/ /ston pa la sogs gud ston byed/ /pha rol grags pa ngal
222b6(rgyud 'grel): sel brtson/ /bdag nyid sdig pa spang la mkhas/ /grags pa'i rgyal mtshan cho ga bzhi/ /sdig pa nyung du dang bsod nams mang po can ni 'phags pa dgyes pa'i gang zag ste/ grags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi tshogs snyan pa mang po rnyed par rung ngo/ /des nam
222b7(rgyud 'grel): du yang khong khro bas gzhan skyo bar mi bya'o/ /slob ma log par zhugs pa la sogs pa 'khrugs pas mi snyan par brjod pas slar zlog pa ni ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas rtsod pa can gyi skyes bu bsten par mi bya'o/ /rtag tu byams pas zhen
223a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid/ /'jam zhing yid 'bab snyan smra dang/ /kha na ma tho med kun spyod/ /rnam kun zhi la grags pa 'grub ste de la 'dir rtsa'i rigs pa sngon du bsten pas dbang gyur pa thob par byas nas grong khyer pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rang nyid ci tsam du
223a2(rgyud 'grel): grags pa bsgrags par 'dod pa de tsam nye bar dgod do/ /pho brang pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad pa pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa sprin gyi phung po'i rum phrag na gnas pa rgyun mi chad par 'brug gi sgra zab mo sgrogs pas mdzes

223b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pa gang zhig lus ring nyam chung dang/ /bzhin bzangs mthong bas 'gro ba dang 'gyur nyid/ /spro ba lhur len skye bo sdung byed la/ /de dag phyir ni gzi brjid bskyes pa bri/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku/ /ras ris la sogs
223b2(rgyud 'grel): mdun bzhugs la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad mtshan bstod pa yis/ /gus bstod me tog phreng ba gdags/ /gzhan du ma brtul me long ngam/ /rin chen sogs 'od brdar ba yis/ /sku bkram me tog spos sogs dbul/ /me yi las kyis dngos grub blang//

223b5(rgyud 'grel): sras po gzi bskyed la/ /gzi chen 'bar ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /stobs bskyed bya phyir rtag tu dbul/ /sems can gzi byin chung ngu gang/ /de dag la yang cho ga bzhin/ /bzang dang 'gran zla ma rabs rim/ /dga' dang 'dun pa snying rjes
223b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /lhag pa'i sems dang lhan cig tu/ /rlung dang 'od dang 'od 'byung zhing/ /spro bas skye bo thams cad kyi/ /yid 'ong rlom pa zhu bar byed/ /mi gang 'jig rten mgon la dang/ /'bar ba'i mtshan mas rtag lus mtshan/ /de ni dud 'gro 'dra na

224a1(rgyud 'grel): lag na thogs/ /'di dag gzi brjid grub pa'i ltas/ /de nas blo ldan grong khyer sogs 'jug rang gi khyim du de rten la/ /'od 'bar mdog bzang mar me dri zhim bdug pa can skor snyan pa'i sgras/ /legs mchod su yang ji
224a2(rgyud 'grel): srid bdag song de srid mthong ba 'bad bkag la/ /slar log don bsgrub gtor mas mnyes bya slob ma bzang la rgyun mched bsgoms/ /gzi brjid bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs rje chen po yid du 'ong ba'i

232a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byas la/ /de'i dkyil 'khor gzhon nu khros pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ku mar kro d+ha sarbba duSh+Ta na ha ra ha ra ku ma ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ khri snyan nag po'i stan 'dug la/ /gzhon nu khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis//
232b1(rgyud 'grel): shar sogs phyogs gzhir gtum mo bzhi/ /rang bzhin ma yengs blta bar bya/ /de la lus bsrung dpa' bo gnag/ zhal gsum phyag drug dkar dmar sngo/ /rdo rje dril bu dgra sta zhags/ /ral gri utpal bsnams pa'o/ /srog bsrung dpa' bo dmar pos te/ /zhal
232b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug sngo ser dmar/ /gri gug thod pa khor lo dbyig/ rgyal mtshan mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid/ /stobs bsrung dpa' bo sngo ljang ser/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ser dmar ljang/ /be con sdig mdzub mdung tho ba/ /rdo rje mda' gzhu thogs pa'o/ /dpal
232b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung dpa' bo dkar pos ste/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sngo dmar dkar/ /gnam lcags kha TaM skyabs sbyin sgrom/ /mnyam par bzhag pas zhi zhing khro/ /gzhon nu'i ston mo sngon song bas/ /lag tu rdo rje dril thogs shing/ /rkang ba rdo rje 'gros bskor bas/ /gzhon
232b4(rgyud 'grel): nu rab tu srung bar bya/ /lha la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /gzhan la bltos pa mad nyid kyis/ /'od zer rdo rje'i gur phub cing/ /ka pA la'i sbyor ba brtsam/ /rang nyid rdo rje spar ba yis/ /rnal 'byor gzhon nu khros pa yis/ /ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa dang/ /gzhon nu ngan
232b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyas bskyab bya/ /gzhon nu bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //jo bo thugs rje chen po nad thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum dbang rnam par rgyal/ /'gro ba'i nang ni sna tshogs dang/ /de rgyu nyid dang

232b7(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /? dang skyob dan sred rim bzhin/ /snying bus spyi bo phyag 'tshal bshad/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa nyid/ /'og ma'i rim drag sna tshogs rigs/ /mdze can dang ni krem smu chu/ /thibs non la sogs kun nges skyob/ /sgrub po dang ldan byams yid brlan
233a1(rgyud 'grel): pho brang mchog tu kha bltas te/ /khrus byas gos dkar bzang gyon la/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs gnas bya/ /sna tshogs mchod mdzes dpag med dang/ /'byung po rnams kyis don grub rdzas/ /stobs can dkar dmar mang

233a3(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yeng ba'o/ /de nas dang pa drag gdung bcas/ /'gro la brtse dang gzhan bltos med/ /gcig tu rnam par nges yid kyis/ /skyabs gsol mgon po spyan drang bya/ /dpag med sprin tshogs mchod pa'i lhas/ /lha mchog mdun du bdar

233b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla 'bar ba'ang rta bdun rlung g.yos gnas gcig min/ /de bzhin nyid thugs rnyog med zhi ba'ang gdul bya'i don mthong rnam pa kun tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de tshe dbang phyug thugs dkyil du/ /bdag gi lha mos bde bsnun pas/ /thugs rje'i thugs bskyod byin

236b7(rgyud 'grel): nang mchod pas 'khor lo mchod/ /pha rol gyi gnod pa bsrung ba rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das pha rol gyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtan pa rnams kyis chos kyi srid/ /pha rol 'jigs las bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'jigs
237a1(rgyud 'grel): byed thugs rje khros/ /gzhan gyis mi thub cho ga brjod/ /de la pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nges par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyor ba'o/ 'dir 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni/ thog mar
237a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma grub pa sngon du 'gro bas/ /ring bsrel can gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam/ thun mong ma yin pa'i rab tu gnas pas gnas par byas pa'i rten gyi mdun du song ste/ rang bzhin ma lus kyis gsol ba btab la/ /'dod pa drag pos thal mo
237a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te shin tu rab tu gus pas re bar bya'o/ /rten gang thugs dkyil thugs rje khros/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bcu drug sor/ /mi bzad rngam zhing rnam 'gyur ba/ /bsgoms la ye shes bstims par bya/ /rang snying nyi dbus hUM ngam h+rI:/ /'bar ba yongs
237a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rdo rje blta/ /de nyid brjod pas 'jigs byed nyid/ /kun tu me 'od 'khrigs pa'o/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ma he zhal/ /de g.yas 'bar ba rnga phyag rgya/ /gnam lcags me phung rlung dmar dang/ /nyi ma dang ni mkha' lding ngo//
237a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du sdig mdzub rdo rje zhags/ /zla ba dang ni dgra sta'o/ /nyi shu gcig dang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /yang na stong phrag gcig bar du/ /rdo rje 'bar ba yi ge gcig /dpa' bos rngam par rnam par bzla/ /de nas lha la lus bstims la//
237a6(rgyud 'grel): sku chen rab rib mnyam pa yis/ /yi ge gcig brjod 'od phyung la/ /pha rol rjes skyob zil mnan bya/ /rkang pa g.yas ni bteg nas su/ /zhags pas drangs te mgo bos rdzi/ /g.yon brgyang nga ro 'bar ba yis/ /gsus pa dral nas
237a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ma mnan/ /pha rol dmag dang g.yul 'khor bcas/ /phyag rgya lha yis las rim gyis/ /thal ba tsam duAng ma lus dang/ /yang na rdo rje zhags pas bcings/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): pheM(rgyud 'grel): pheM(rgyud 'grel): pheM(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): raM(rgyud 'grel): raM(rgyud 'grel): raM(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI:

237b2(rgyud 'grel): du g.yas/ /yungs kar phye ma thal chen bsres/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'bum bzlas la/ /dmag tshogs myos pa 'ongs pa yi/ /gdong du khros pas gtor byas te/ /phaT ces drag pos skrag par bya'o/ /wa rnams la ni seng ge bzhin/ /mthong
237b3(rgyud 'grel): ba tsam gyis dngangs 'bros pa 'am/ /ro langs la ni gsang sngags bzhin/ /rengs 'gyur g.yo ba'ang mi 'thob bo/ /ji ste spobs pa'i cho ga ni/ /myos byed rdzas bdun sbyar ba dang/ /'jigs byed chen po'i sku phyar la/ /gdug pa lnga bsregs rnga
237b4(rgyud 'grel): chen brdung/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs dpal che/ /rab tu gsang ba'i rtog pa las/ /legs phung pha rol dpung bzlog pa/ /snyigs dus bstan pa bsrung ba yin/ /pha rol gyi sde gzhom pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs rje chen po
237b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu snying rje non pa'i yid/ /lus can mya ngan 'das pa las/ /bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer ba/ /de yis pha rol bsdu bar bshad/ /nam langs mun pas sleb pa dang/ /gnyid du nye bas sad pa'i
