241b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid gsum/ /rab tu gsal zhing rnam mi rtog/ bde chen blo sgra dpe bral ba/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya la rten bsgom/ /ngos bzung ba ni blta ba dang/ /bsre dang mnyam par bzhag pa'o/ /sgo gsum rim dang rim min pas/ /drag rtogs glo bur nyid rtog 'gyur//
241b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar gang zhig gang du gang/ /dran rnams dga' gdung der shar ba/ /de nyid de ltar de der med/ /'di ni gnyis med mtshan nyid do/ /'gro 'ong gnas dang mi gnas dang/ /skye dang 'gag dang rten bral sogs/ /rjes su 'grogs dang gzhig pa yi/ /gdams ngag
241b5(rgyud 'grel): gis ni mtshan med 'gyur/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra gu ru sarba dz+nyA na DA ki nI ma ma kA ya wAk+tsit+tA mahA su kha dz+nyA na dzwa la dzwa la spha ra spha ra peM pheM/ ye shes dbab pa'i sngags so/ /rdo rje dril bu me long thong/ /sbyin pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi/ /brtul zhugs sngon du song ba
241b6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /tshil chen mar me sbar bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra badzra mahA badzra badzra dzra la hUM hUM hUM oM A gaN+Da gaN+Da mahA gaN+Da dzwa la a a a oM a darba na mahA darba na dzwa la/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): oM a ka pA la ka pA la mahA ka pa la dzwa la ho ho ho/ byin gyis brlabs nas
241b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /mthar ni spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /bsrung bas bsrung pa bya ba ni/ /thugs rje khros pas mar rkang gi/ bde chen 'khor lo zhes pas bshad/ /slob ma byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //'phags pa thugs rje
242a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po ye shes 'bebs ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /mgon po mi rtog bde chen ster mdzad sku/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin bcas brgyud dang bltas/ /spyi bo nas brtsegs ye shes yi ge 'phreng ba dpal/ /gzhu nyid pad
242a2(rgyud 'grel): zlas ye shes 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur/ /shin tu gus bcas gtong ba che/ /bzod ldan the tshom med rtog bral/ /g.yeng ba spangs shing dbang po dul/ /slob ma de ni rjes su bzung/ /sna tshogs padmo ge sar ldan/ /ze 'bru rdo rje me phreng gis/ legs
242a3(rgyud 'grel): spras byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbus/ /skal ldan gzhag la bgegs bskrad bya/ /oM a bi g+h+nAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ bdug pa mchog gis rab bdug cing/ /me tog dmar po bcal bkram la/ /mar me 'bar ba du ma yis/ /kun nas khor yug
242a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bya/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha'i nga rgyal du byas la/ rdo rje la ni yi rlung gi shugs can/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /gtsug tor du haM thig le'i snying po can no/ /de ni 'jig rten mgon po'i rang bzhin no/ /steng nas 'dzag pas ni mi 'grib po/ /smin mtshams
242a5(rgyud 'grel): nas gri 'phros pas ni slob ma la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma'i 'og tu ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ni sbyor ba 'og mas bskyod par byed do/ /sprul par ni yang lha mo nyid do/ /de ni sbyor ba bar mas sbyor bar byed do/ /snying kar ne yang ba de
242a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs snying po nyid do/ /de ni sbyor ba gong mas 'bebs par byed do/ spyi bor ni yang mgon po'o/ /de ni sbyor ba thog mas 'bebs par byed do/ /ma phebs na spobs pa'i cho ga ni/ rdo rje sna bug gi sbyor bas so/ /shin tu spogs pa ni rdo
242a7(rgyud 'grel): rje spyi gtsug gi sbyor bas so/ /babs bar gyur na spu 'greng zhing/ /gang sgyur 'od gsal ba nyid dang/ /brjod par mi nus yang na gtso/ /mi rtog bde bas myos bar 'gyur/ /ye shes gzhug pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa
242b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lhun gyis grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re shig byang chub sems dpa' i blo gros sbyangs pa dang/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang/ /bdag gir 'dzin pas chags pa sdug bsngal
242b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /phongs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba mthong bas mi bzang pa skyes nas/ thog mar gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 'jug ba na bdag gi bltos pa ring du spangs nas snying rje chen pos gzhan gyis ma bskul bar bdag 'jug par ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis
242b3(rgyud 'grel): brlab par bya'o/ /brtan pa'i gnas dang g.yo ba lus dang ngag dang yid/ /rnam kun nyer spyod gzhal med khang bzangs rdo rje'i sku/ /gsang sngags dam tshig nga ro bcu drug mthar gnas dang/ /pha rol phyin bcu lha yi sbyor ba rnam dag bsgom/ /'di na
242b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag don min sbyor/ /smad pa'i gnas la blo rab chags/ /ljongs pas sdig pa mang ldan pa/ /de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'o/ /chos gang la ni rnam par shes/ /de shes nyid ni pha rol 'gro/ 'di ltar gang la don gsal 'thob/ /sim 'gyur 'od gsal bde chen gsungs
242b5(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o 'gro ba yang dag spyod/ /gang spyod de yin gzhan ma 'gyur/ /gnas min gnas sogs gang brtags pa/ /nam yang skye sogs mi dmigs pa'o/ /'on kyang log pas cig shos su/ /bsgribs nas dri mar khrid pa yang/ /bdag gi las gsum
242b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag lngas/ /dag bcas lhag mar mi bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon nyid dam bcas/ /spyad pa spyod pa'i rim ji bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sras po brtse chen yang/ /pha rol ltos pa mi 'cha'o/ /'di na ji ltar bdag nyid dang/ /sdug bsngal mngon 'dod mi
242b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa/ /de bzhin lugs can thams cad kyang/ mtshungs na bdag cig bde ba brtson/ /yon tan phrin las thams cad la/ /rgyas btab rgyal sras 'bad par bya'o/ /gang zhig phan btags drin shes pa/ /de yang kun gyis bsngags 'os na/ /
243a1(rgyud 'grel): bcol rang dga' byin rlob pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen po cis mi bsngags/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlabs rdzogs so// //dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dpal ldan bdud bzhi'i dgra
243a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom byang chub mchog dbang nyes mnyes na/ /thugs rjes mi bsnyel lus can gzhan yang zhi ba bla med lam bzang du/ /smin mdzad dbang rtsol sa gsum bdag po spyan ras gzigs dbang la btud de/ /sgal ldan ting 'dzin ye shes sems spyod rnam par
243a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur chog bshad/ /yid 'ong gnas su bde ba yi/ /rkyen sogs dam tshig kun ldan pas/ /snying rje chen po mdun bzhag la/ /gus pas sngon du gsol gdab bo/ /'dom gang srid 'phags nam mkhar ni/ /thub pa chen po 'khor los sgyur/ /bde chen yum
243a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig skyes/ /dpag med sras bcas bsgom par bya/ /sna tshogs dngos kun mchod pa'i sprin/ /kun tu bzang spyod ji bzhin du/ /mchod byas sdig pa bsal nas su/ /rnam dag dbang bskur de rjes nod/ /lha dang bdag lus gnas gsum du/ /rdo rje

243a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros rab sngo zer/ /bdag lus ngag yid gnas gsum la reg dri gsum sel/ /de rjes bdud rtsi dkar dmar sngo/ /dag byed rnam gsum man ngag bzhin/ /de 'og yi shes rnam gsum gzhug /mthar ni gnyis med bzhi pa'o/ /thig le gsum rgyun

243b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /mnga' rtse rnos bsnun yud tsam gang la nag po'i phyogs kyi rtsa lag dang/ /bdud kyi bu mo g.yo ba'i mig gis rnam kun blta par mi nus pa'i dpal gang bde chen rab tu 'bar byed 'khrul 'khor rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ /de nas 'phags pa thugs

243b6(rgyud 'grel): shes shugs las kyang/ /me lce g.yo ba de bzhin du/ /de 'bar srog shing rlung gis kyang/ /thogs med srog g.yo snying gar 'gyur/ /de tshe phaM sgra dang bcas pas/ /steng nas lha yi bdud rtsi dbab/ /bde chen rab tu gsal ba'i dngos/ /'bar ba rab 'bar
243b7(rgyud 'grel): cher 'bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe ye shes btud? ba yi/ /chang gis myos pa rim 'gyur ba/ /de tshe dang dbang med par ni/ /lus sems spro bas nan par 'gyur/ /dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen po tshe rabs
244a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang du gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dal ba 'dis lam dbang du ma gyur pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang du gyur pa'i brtag pa bsgom par bya ste/ ji ltar spyod pa'i gnas nyid du/ /'jig rten
244a2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol dran byas nas/ /ji skad bshad pa'i man ngag gis/ /dbang 'gyur 'phags pa mnyes par bya/ /dal ba ring du mi gnas dang/ /rgyu dang 'bras pus rjes 'brel la/ /som nyi spangs nas srid pa las/ /yid byung zhi la dga' ba bskyed

244a4(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos bcas pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po nges par bya/ /de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi lus kyi snying po gsum lha'i mtshan ma gsum du bsgyur te/ /tha mal lus las 'das nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' i mngon par 'du

244a6(rgyud 'grel): ra Ne gu pa ti birya pya ma he swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sarba duShuM ma ma krita te dzaM b+ha ya stwaM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ band+ha ya hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma ma ba ra dzArmma dzArmma ta ra sarba pras+tha be rak+Sha par NaM gupta ti bits+tsha
244a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga shi sma ra sma ra/ pra ti dz+nyA mi hA sa ma ya su sma ra swAhA/ /brtson pa'i cha lugs gnas zhabs gnyis/ /gang du 'dod pa'i zhing der bskyod/ /chu skyes la sogs sdong bu 'am/ /rin chen pho brang mchog bdag 'jug /mi la mis pas
244b1(rgyud 'grel): bar chod pa/ /do mod mtshan mo'i par skabs 'dras/ /mkhas pas dogs pa med byas te/ lha bsnyen ji ltar 'dod bzhin skye/ /skye bo kun gyi mngal sgor ni/ /snying rje chen po spangs pa'i rten/ /sa bon sdig pa bsams nas ni/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa goms par bya//

244b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub po gang zhig 'chi ba dang 'chi ba ma yin lhas gang dag/ gang tshe sngon du gyur pa na/ /mgon po'i blu ba 'dir bshad do/ /'jig rten g.yeng ba ma lus las/ /rnam dben ngal ba bsgrubs nas ni/ /mchog gsum skyabs 'gro

244b6(rgyud 'grel): bral bas mig mi 'dzum par mdun gyi nam mkha' la rgyal ba lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsam par bya'o/ /gal te spros par nus na ni sku gsung thugs ye shes phrin las mdzad pa dam tshig rnam pa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor bdag
244b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi snying ka rlung sems kyi ngo bo h+rI(rgyud 'grel): gsal po bsil pa'i 'od zer can la shes pa gtad nas ji bzhin dgug pa'i sbyor pas gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rang gi nyer bsngogs kyi dngos po gang yin pa 'di dag nyid lha'i rnam par dag par
245a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la/ mngon par chags dang yongs su sdang/ /rab tu mi shes gzhi gsum gyi/ /dbang gi las gang mngon gyur gang/ /de 'dir mgon po gsum du mos/ /dbus su mthing ga rdo rje can/ /g.yas su dmar mdzes ral gri 'dzin/
245a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du dkar gsal zhags bsnams pa/ /thams cad g.yon du padmo mtshan/ /rgya chen pho brang lhar bcas pa/ /skad cig gis ni lha gsum 'dir/ /bsdus la rim pa ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i 'chi bdag sngar blu bya/ /gang phyir 'chi bar byed pa'i rgyu//

245a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor tshe yi zla ba nya/ /grol 'gyur de tshe rmi lam du/ /gsung gi dbugs 'byin thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dga' ston tshogs bsags phyir/ /dpag med mchod pa'i rgya mtsho yis/ /phyi nang gsang dang yang dag gis/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod par
245a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'chi ba slu ba'i gdams pa rdzogs so// //dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pa bde chen grong 'jug pas/ /bco brgyad e dbyings phyag rgya bca' / /g.yo ba mi g.yo bzung nas ni/ /lhag pa'i lha yi rnal
245b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bya/ /sprul pa'i gnas su ri bong 'dzin/ /ma lus byang chub sems bsdus gzugs/ /zla ba bzang ba bde ba che/ /'od mdzad drod rlung srog bdag bsam/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): lha dbang lhan cig skyes pa'i sku/ /zhal sbyor spyi gtsug gzi brjod bzang/ /sor bzhi pas ni bar
245b2(rgyud 'grel): chod bcas/ /bsams nas 'od kyi snyoms 'jug bskul/ /sbyor mtshams dkar dmar rgyun lhung bas/ /bdag lus dri med byas nas su/ /thog mar gang skyed phyis de bzhin/ /pad mchog zla pa bzang stobs bskyed/ /de nas kun sdud rdo rje yi/ /rlung bzung nas ni
245b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i 'od/ /shing rta lam chen sbyangs byas nas/ /lcags kyu lta bus drang byas la/ /gtum mo ye shes sbar ba mes/ /lte pa'i dkyil 'khor spros pas ni/ /me dpung la ni lan tsha bzhin/ /mi bzad sgrar bcas gyen du 'phar/ /de tshe spyi gtsug rdo rje 'dzin/ /
245b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab nyid la bsdus byas la/ /de yi padmo kha phye bar/ /rnam shes bung ba gzhug par bya/ /skal ldan ngo bo nyid dbang du/ /bde ba mchog gis rgyud tshim zhing/ /chos kun rmi lam 'drar shes dang/ /gang bsgyur sems ston grub pa'i rdzas/ /de nas 'og gi pho
245b5(rgyud 'grel): brang lha/ /'od zer dkrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhu byas de ni gong mar bstim/ /thim gyur rang gnas brtan par 'dod/ /dpal lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ba rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan
245b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon zhabs kyi/ /cho ga ting 'dzin rgyal po yi/ /yongs dang zhing du rnam par shes/ /'pho ba rdo rje'i skar mda' brtsam/ /shin tu yid dga' grub pas byin brlabs sam/ /lha mchog legs nas ting 'dzin grub pa'i gzhi/ /yang na dur khrod chu po
245b7(rgyud 'grel): shing/ gcig 'gram/ /skal ldan chags bral the tshom med pa zhugs/ /rgya chen mchod sbyin re ba med yid dga' ba dang/ /bcas la rgyal ba lha yi pho brang dga' ldan du/ /rtse gcig yid byed gang la chags pa'i gnas/ /ma 'ogs dong ltar mi
246a1(rgyud 'grel): bka' skyob drag bskyed bya/ /skyil krung rgyal po rdo rje'i mdud pa brtan pa la gnas la/ /spyi bo snying ka lte dbus haM dang hUM dang aM rim bzhin/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar po 'od 'phro rtsa chen sbubs nang gzhug/ pha ma sems dbyings lus rlung
246a2(rgyud 'grel): srog bsdus yi ge gsum la bsdu/ /skye med las skyes ma yis rab bzhus rgyal sras 'od 'dzag sprul ba bskyod/ /lcags kyu zhags -pa rdo rje rlung gis ha aM hUM gsum gcig gyur cing/ ye shes 'od phyung d+hU ti'i lam byung shin tu dmar
246a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal dag byas la/ /rje btsun phyag mthil pad dbus a las 'od sbubs dmar po yang drang bya/ /de la rje btsun spyan ras gzigs nyid gdul ba'i don la gcig tu thugs rnam par brtse bas bdag gi ltos pa thams cad nye bar dor ba thugs
246a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe tshe'i dus byed pas nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jigs par (bas rab tu 'jigs) par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho bo'i thugs rje dang byin gyis brlabs kyis ci nas kyang/ /khyod ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa de ltar yang dag par skyob par 'gyur
246a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad 'khor ba 'am ngan song du yang ba dang 'jigs par ma byed cig/ /rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod rjes su 'dzin pa'i lha ni nga yin no zhes gsung bas dbugs phyung ste/ ji skad brjod pa dang
246a6(rgyud 'grel): skyo ba drag po gnyis kyis gnas gnyis la mngon par dga' ba dang/ gdung ba nyid dang lhag pa'i lha la gus pa mi zad pas skyabs su gsol ba ni thabs yin no/ /de nas stobs ldan sprul pa'i dbus/ /legs bcug d+hU tis dbus nas/ /skubs?
246a7(rgyud 'grel): dag nas ni sran 'brum bzhin/ /mkhas pas rnam shes 'pho bar bya/ /tshangs dbang za dang 'gul dang 'phrig /dmigs pa rang dbang gyur nyid dang/ /gsol btab dal bsos gdon mi dra/ /brtan pa'i pho ba grub pa'i ltas/ /rdo rje skar mda'i
246b1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ngan song spyod ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje chen po yid gzhungs pas/ /spyan ras gzigs dpal bsnyen byas te/ /lus can mi 'dod bzhin du dod/ /de dag ngan 'gro bzlog par bya/ /sngon nas
246b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa nyid dang ni/ /gzhan dag blo bur bya ba nyid/ /de bzhin phyi nas gzhan gyis te/ /mchog dang bar mdza' grangs bzhin 'dod/ /bdag nyid gang la lhag par dang/ /me tog lhung ba nyid dam snga/ /goms par bsnyen par byas pa'i lha/ /'jig rten dbang phyug
246b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar dgong/ /de nyid lhags pa'i lha yin na/ /sa bon nam ni bla ma'i tshul/ /yang yang goms par rang gi sems/ /de yi thugs bcug ting 'dzin bya/ /mi g.yo ba dang rtse gcig dang/ /kun tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ming can 'od zer 'du sngon 'gros//
246b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ba spangs la brtan par gnas/ /spyi bo snying ga lte ba ni/ /haM dang hUM dang aM bsams nas/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis gcig tu/ /bsdus nas 'phen pa thabs yin no/ /de nas rten la yid 'phrog cing/ /dmigs pa brtan par gyur pa na/ /'od kyi spu
246b5(rgyud 'grel): gu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rten de nyid dang de yi zhing/ /mkhas pas bdag dang bdag gir bya/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rnal 'byor bar dor 'jug pa na/ /dran pa tsam gyis goms pa yis/ /rten la blos 'jug 'jigs med 'gyur/ /de ltar ring nas lam goms pa'i
246b6(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan dus las 'das gyur tshe/ /'phags pa ngan song spyod dpal gyis/ /cho ga bdun phrag bdun du sbyang/ /ro 'am rus pa 'am gos sam ming/ /rten de'i mdun du gzhag nas su/ /ma dag pa dang dag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis la rten gnyis gzhag /brdeg
246b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bsreg dang bkru ba yis/ /dri ma gzhig gzhom dang pa dag/ dkyil 'khor nag po bya bas te/ /brten dang dbang bskur bya ba la'o/ /yungs kar bye ma thal chen la/ /rig pa bzlas nas bsnun bya zhing/ /sbyin sreg cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /rten bcas bar
247a1(rgyud 'grel): chags 'bad de bsreg/ ngan song sbyong ba'i sku gsung thugs/ /bzhu ba'i chus bkang bum pa blugs/ /rdo rje'i glu blang rig pa bzla/ /ma lus dri ma bkru bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sarba durga ti ba ri sho d+ha yi rA dzA ya/ a mu ke kA ya
247a2(rgyud 'grel): wAk+tsi t+tA sarba pA paM toSha wa ra Na b+haM ga b+haM/ Da ha Da ha/ bE ra tsha bA ra tshe/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ phaT phaT swAhA/ de rjes dri ma dag pa'i sems/ /lhag pa'i lha la bcug nas ni/ /ji bzhin dbang bskur byas te mchod/ /dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya//
247a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'das pa la bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po gzi brjid kun nas 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dal ba don yod dus las 'das pa dang/ sdig mad ngan 'gro'i sgor zhugs de bzhin du/ /ya da
247a4(rgyud 'grel): bar ma nying mtshams sbyar ba'i tshe/ /de rten chog rgyal pos rnam par sbyang/ /slob dpon shin tu snying brtse can/ /rig pa rgya mtsho pha rol son/ /brtan zhing mi 'phrogs mkhas pa yis/ /dbugs bral slob ma mdun du gzhag /chus bkrus dris
247a5(rgyud 'grel): byugs rgyan btags te/ /brdeg dang bkru sogs cho ga bzhin/ /de nas sngags bcas bdug pa yis/ /bgebs bskrad 'khor lo bcings nas ni/ /spyi gtsug bla ma yab dang yum/ /snyoms zhugs thig le ma lhung ba/ /goms pa'i lha rten mdun
247a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi/ /shangs bug nas ni myur bsdus zhes/ /de yi thugs dkyil padmo bsgom/ /rdo rje'i rgyas btab zum pa'i nang/ /mi 'gyur yongs gyur lha gzugs bskyod/ /slar byung zhing mchog de sras gyur/ /ngogs su mthar phyin gru 'dra yis//
247a7(rgyud 'grel): phung po ma dag dag pa dang/ /dag pa dri med sreg rdzas su/ /byin gyis brlabs la rtog bral mchod/ /sngags chu dri ldan yungs kar dang/ /ral gri la sogs mtshon brdar phye/ /mar dang til sbyar blug cing bsreg/ me lce 'bar ba'i ltas rnam brtag/

248b3(rgyud 'grel): gang gis phyir dang gang du ji ltar bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la bkra shis ces sbyar ro/ /shis ba brjod pa'i dbyangs dang sems dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo dang glus mchod do/ /me tog dkar dmar dang tsan dan dkar dmar dang ni brgyan dang dri'i khyad

248b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ba'i char 'bebs pa'i lha'i sku brgya stong phrag mang po'o/ /mchod pa'i sprin rum las 'bru sgra dal bus sgrogs pa dang/ glog 'byin pa yang dgod par bya'o/ /'og nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas bum pa nor bus gad pa
248b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bul ba'i tshul lo/ /rdo rje slob dpon kun tu snang/ /bkra shis rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ sngags brjod bum pa dgu gang bya/ /bum pa gang ba dgu la sngags kyi phreng pa dgu dgu bzhu bas byin gyis brlab pa/ 
249a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas snod dang bcud ma lus pa la ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rdo rje mtshan pa re res brgyan par ro/ /phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bgegs bsal te/ bkra shis sbyin par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu dpa' bo gsal/ /snying rjes kun tu bskor
249a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing brgyug /gnas dang gang zag rnal 'byor rnams/ /ma lus bsrung pas bkra shis gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a i u e o aM a(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI AryA wa lo ki te shwar maM ga la sidb+hi/ a d+hiSh+Tha na ne dA na pa ti che ge mo'i sarba ba ri gra hA swAsti ma hA maM ga la
249a3(rgyud 'grel): su maM ga la pra ti maM ga la sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hUM swA hA/ /bkra shis kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //dpal spyan ras gzigs sku gdung rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mchod rten gyi ni cho ga brjod/ /ji bzhin brtags shing sbyangs pa'i

249b1(rgyud 'grel): na swA hA/ 'khor lo gzugs pa'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mahA tsha tro la hUM swAhA/ gdugs dbub pa'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): pany+tsa li ka bAs tra hUM swAhA/ na bza' gsol ba'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sarba da sha a a bi dik+ShA ma ka ra hUM swA hA/ bzod par gsol ba'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a ka sA d+hArma swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha hUM swAhA/ lha mchog

249b3(rgyud 'grel): ke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te saM myaksaM b+hud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM ratne ratne ratna bi dza ye swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ /rten yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ /tsha tsha 'debs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan

250a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje brdams dang gar bsgyur ba/ /dgug pa bcing dang dgyes bya ba/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /ji ltar bdag nyid la bcings pa/ /de bzhin rten la yang yin te/ /bcings nas dbang bskur rgyas gdab dang/ /mchod pa la
250a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bdag 'jug bzhin/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): badzra kA ya wak+tsit+ta pra tis+thi rA hUM hUM hUM badzra dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Tha ni sarba lak+Sha Na pa ri pU ra hUM hUM hUM sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha bi ma la da ma hUM hUM hUM rdo rje'i lus kyi pad+ma'i lag /rin chen me tog snyim par bzung//

250a4(rgyud 'grel): man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ya tsak+Shu ye swAhA/ /ci 'byor ba'i yon phul te bzod par gsol nas 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs su gsol ba dang/ 'phrin las la thogs pa med par gsol ba btab la/ dga' ston dang mchod sbyin chen pos thams
250a5(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a ji ta mi tra guptas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI dza ga ta mi trA nan+ta'i zhal snga nas dang/
250a6(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsha ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba'o// //'phags pa phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
250a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ha sra b+hu dzi? ne? tra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po mchog /dkar po thugs rje rtag 'chad ba'i/ /byams pa'i stobs
250b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'gro 'dul ba/ /dam pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bdag nyid dran phyir sgrub thabs gang/ /nges pa'i shes pa bri bar bya/ /'gro ba rnams kyis dben pa yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /sa gzhi legs par byugs byas la/ /me tog dri zhim
250b2(rgyud 'grel): bkram byas te/ /gcig dang sbyar bas 'dug pa'i stan/ /bde ba la 'dug byas nas ni/ /'gro ba'i don du sems bskyed la/ /snying gar raM las gyur pa yi/ /'od 'byung dmar po bsam byas nas/ /de steng thugs yid las gyur pa'i/ /
250b3(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes rgyal por bdag bsams te/ /chu shing raM shing sbyar ba'i sgras/ /phyogs bcu dag tu sdigs mdzub dang/ /sngags kyis yang dag bskrad par bya/ /oM sarba big+h+nAM ha na ha na hUM phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ /de nas bdag nyid snying ga la/ /a
250b4(rgyud 'grel): las ri bo can bsams nas/ /de ni thugs mchog bsgom par bya/ /de las 'od zer nag po dag /sa gzhi dag la spros byas pas/ /sa gzhi la sogs rdo rjer gyur/ /de las 'od 'phros ra ba dang/ /gur dang bla bre dra ba dag /shin
250b5(rgyud 'grel): tu mngon par bsgom par bya/ /de nas nam mkhar bla ma dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag /sngon du mngon sum dmigs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang/ /sdig pa bshags dang yid rang dang/ /bsod
250b6(rgyud 'grel): nams bsngo dang skyabs 'gro dang/ /sems bskyed pa dang gnas bzhi dang/ /mthar ni stong nyid bsgom pa'o/ /don gyi dngos por bsams nas ni/ /sngags 'di myur du bklag par bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha:
250b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de dag nang du bsam bya ba/ /a ba ra la rnam bzhi pa/ /steng du sna ldan gzhag pa las/ /dbang chen chu bdag 'bar ba dang/ /
251a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyod par byed pa rnam bzhi yi/ /dkyil 'khor kha dog rnam bzhi rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du rnam par bsgom/ /de steng suM las ri rab ni/ /rin chen sna bzhis yang dag gnas/ /de dag yongs su
251a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las/ /khang pa rtsegs pa bsam bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /ye shes sna lnga'i rtsig pa dag /phyogs bzhi dag tu brgyan nas kyang/ /dra ba dra phyed dag dang ni/ /rin chen pha
251a3(rgyud 'grel): gu dag dang ni/ /gru bzhi par ni brgyan pa yin/ /tor na ni bzhis brgyan cing/ /mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i phreng ba dang/ /rdo rje thig skud 'od 'bar ba'o/ /gru bzhi dag tu dpag bsam shing/ /chen po bzhi dang klu rgyal dang/ /sprin dang phyogs skyong
251a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing srung rnams/ /yang dag par ni dgod par bya/ /de dkyil thig ni bzhi btab pas/ /dkyil 'khor dgu ru gyur ba la/ /dkyil du bcom ldan phyag stong pa/ /kha dog dkar po ldem bag can/ /zhal gdong bcu gcig phyag bco brgyad/ /
251a5(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma'i zhal gsum dkar la mdzes/ /lhag ma khro zhal 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /kun gyi steng na 'od dpag med/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas btab/ /dang po phyag gnyis snying ga na/ /thal mo nges par sbyar ba yin/ /de
251a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og g.yas na dgra sta dang/ /de 'og gri gug rnon po yin/ /pad+ma ral gri zhags pa dang/ /ljon shing me long bsil yab dag /rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni de 'og dag /rdo rje dril bu mnga' 
251a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang/ /lcags kyi bum pa 'khor lo dang/ /gdugs dang rin chen 'bar ba rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du bsnams par mdzad/ /rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag gis ni/ /lha mo pad+ma'i sgrol ma la/ /gnyis su med pas 'khyud
251b1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /lha mo de ni zhal gcig ste/ /phyag ni drug tu nges pa ste/ /dang po'i g.yas pas utpal gyi/ /steng na pad+ma brgyad bsnams pas/ /thugs rje che ba 'khyud par mdzad/ /de 'og gri gug pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon pa'i dang pos
251b2(rgyud 'grel): me long dang/ /bsil yab bum pa bsnams par mdzad/ /hUM dang paM las gyur pa yi/ /phyag stong yum bcas de ltar bsgom/ /de yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge baM las gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma zhes
251b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i/ /zhal gcig kha dog dkar po can/ /phyag g.yas dang po utpal gyi/ /steng na pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de steng rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /sngon po nyid kyis bsnams par mdzad/ /de 'og 'khor lo zhags
251b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /g.yon gyi dang pos dril bu 'dzin/ /de 'og lcags kyi dgra sta dag /phyar ba nyid kyis bsnams par mdzad/ /lho phyogs dkyil 'khor sngon po la/ /yi ge raM las gyur pa yi/ /rin chen
251b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma bsam bya ba/ /g.yas kyi dang po utpal gyi/ /steng na pad ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de steng rin chen zur brgyad pa/ /'bar ba nyid kyis yang dag 'dzin/ /lhag ma shar gyi bcom ldan ltar/ /phyag
251b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams ni bsnams par mdzad/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po la/ /muM yig 'bar ba las gyur pa'i/ /thub pa'i pad+ma bsgom bya ba/ /g.yas kyi dang po rang nyid kyi/ /mtshan ma rnams ni bsnams par mdzad/ /lhag
251b7(rgyud 'grel): ma shar gyi bcom ldan ltar/ /phyag mtshan rnams ni bsnams par mdzad/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor ljang gu la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma ni/ /yi ge kaM las gyur pa ste/ /g.yas kyi dang por rang nyid rtags/ /phyag gzhan gong ma rnams
252a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /shar lho'i rdo rje sgrol ma ni/ /lha mo sku mdog sngo skya la/ /zhal gcig phyag ni drug pa'i dbyibs/ /g.yas kyi dang po utpal te/ /chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams par mdzad/ /phyag gzhan gri gug pad+ma dang/ /me long
252a2(rgyud 'grel): bsil yab bum pa bsnams/ /paM yig las gyur de ltar bsam/ /lho nub rin chen sgrol ma ni/ /raM yig las gyur dmar ser mdog /phyag g.yas dang po rang nyid rtags/ /lhag ma rdo rje sgrol ma bzhin/ /nub byang thub pa'i sgrol ma ni/ /muM yig las gyu lnga dang? dmar
252a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog /dang po rang gi rtags 'chang ba'o/ /byang shar las kyi sgrol ma ni/ /gaM yig las gyur ljang skya'i mdog /phyag g.yas rang gi rtags 'chad zhing/ /phyag gzhan gong ma rnams dang mtshungs/ /gru bzhir rin chen bum pa bzhi/ /kha dog rnams bzhis rnam par
252a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de yi phyi rol snam bu la/ /ling tshe bcu drug bri bya ste/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang/ /kun gzigs sgrib pa rnam sel dag /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la/ /kha dog rnam bzhis rnam par gnas/ /g.yas na rdo rje utpa la/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams
252a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gying ba? tshul du gnas par mdzad/ /g.yon pa dang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de dag kun gyi g.yon rol du/ /sgeg mo rin chen phreng ba dang/ /dbyangs dang gar gyis mnyes mdzad rnams/ /rang rang phyag rgyas yang dag gnas/ /byams pa nam mkha' i snying po dag /kun bzangs
252a6(rgyud 'grel): sa yi snying po dang/ /rang rang kha dog phyag rgya yis/ /de yi cha la rnam par gnas/ /de g.yon me tog bdug spos dang/ /mar me dri chab lha mo rnams/ /rang nyid kha dog phyag mtshan gyis/ /yang dag par ni gnas pa'o/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad ni/ /
252a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma'i steng na nyi zla yi/ /steng na rab tu gnas pa'o/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang/ /sgo rnams na ni sgo skyong dag /shes rab mthar phyed gshin mthar byed/ /pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar rnams/ /dbu gsum phyag ni drug pa la/ /
252b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi cha lugs can/ /phyag g.yas dang po ral gri dang/ /thong dbyug pad+ma rgya gram 'dzin/ /lhag ma lcags kyu zhags pa dang/ rtse gsum lcags sgrog dam pa'i bdag /rdo rje brag gi stong gnas pa'o/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' yi/ /thugs las
252b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer spros nas kyang/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs nas/ /mdun du yang dag mchod par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyor shes pas/ /dam tshig 'khor lo myur du gzhug /de nas rang gi sa bon las/ /'od zer nam mkha' i phyogs spros nas/ pad+ma'i sgrol sogs lha mo
252b3(rgyud 'grel): lngas/ /ye shes lnga yi bum pa yis/ /chu yis bdag la dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM a b+hi shiny+tsa tu maM lo ka nA tha ya hUM/ de nas bdag nyid snying ga la/ /ri bong can dang shing rta bcu/ /kha sbyor phur mar gnas pa yi/ /nang du chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ /de steng dug gsum yi ge ni/ kha
252b4(rgyud 'grel): dog dkar po rnam par gnas/ /de la stod nas dkar po ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /'phrog dang nang dang kun gyi steng/ /dug gsum yi ges rnam par brgyan/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu spros pa las/ /'gro ba'i sems can thams cad
252b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /nyon mongs thams cad sbyang byas nas/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ngo bos gnas/ /de dag rim par bsdus pa las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /lha yi sku mi bsgom par bya/ /de ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/ /bsgom pas skyon sngags bzlas pa/ /mu tig 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis
252b6(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /steng nas steng du 'bar ba ni/ /rang bzhin 'khor bar rnam par bsam/ /dang po dag dang bar gnas pa'i/ /tha ma dag gis bsdus pa yi/ /sngags kyis yang dag bzlas par bya/ oM pad+ma hastA ya/ sa ha swa badzra b+hu dza ne tra/ nI la kaN+Tha lo ke shwa rA ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma tA
252b7(rgyud 'grel): re hUM/ oM badzra pad+ma hUM/ oM ratna padme hUM/ oM mu ni padme hUM/ oM karma padme hUM/ oM badzra tA re hUM/ oM mu ni tA re hUM/ oM ratna tA re hUM/ oM karma tA re hUM/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM/ oM many+dzu sh+rI hUM/ oM sa man+tA ki ki hUM/ oM A ba ra Na bi ski b+hi b+hi hUM/ oM badzra lA sya hUM/ oM ratna mA
253a1(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ oM padme gI ti hUM/ oM karma ni rti hUM/ oM me tri ya hUM/ oM a gaM saM gurde hUM/ oM sa man+ta d+ha dre hUM/ oM k+Shi te garb+ha hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM ratna puShpe hUM/ oM pad+ma A lo ke hUM/ oM karma gand+he hUM/ oM pradz+nyan+ta ka hUM/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM banAn+ta? ka hUM/ oM big+h+NAM
253a2(rgyud 'grel): ta ka hUM mchod pa dag ni nyi shu yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas yang dag mchod/ /yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /rtag tu 'don pa nyid du bya/ /lam du zhugs dang 'chag pa'i tshe/ /spyod lam la ni spros pa ni/ /rdo rje rtsi gcig phyag rgyas ni/ /'od byung steng la snying po yi/ /sngags
253a3(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su gyur pa dang/ /cho ga gsum las rdzogs pa yi/ /rim pa bzhin du lha bsams nas/ /yan lag bzhi la rab tu bstim/ /cho ga'i phyag rgya dpa' po lnga/ /phyag rgya 'di yis lus mdzes pa'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /bdag nyid 'phrin las rnam
253a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi/ /rnal 'byor yang dag bsam byas la/ /las kyi dang po zhib mchod/ /dkyil 'khor khru gang zlum po la/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas nang bstor? zhing/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba dag /de yi phyi rol bri byas la/ /dri zhim dkar po zhor ldan pa'i/ /bsreg cing ku shas
253a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings te gzugs/ /gu gul me tog ku sha dang/ /mar dang 'bras thug til dang ni/ /'o thug lung thang sngon po dag /las kyi sngags ni mthar sbyar la/ /me lha de yi snying ga yi/ /mkha' la 'khor lo bsam byas te/ /bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yis/ /rim
253a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du mchod pa'o/ /bya ba rnams ni thams cad la/ /de yi ngo bos mnyam par bzhag /de nas bstod pa bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs kyi sku/ /chos kyi sku ste gzhan gyi mchog /sngags kyi mgon po mchog gi lha/ snying rje'i bdag nyid phyag 'tshal
253a7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /ye shes rdo rje stobs po che/ /shin tu nges pas zhi ba'i tshul/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob/ /rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shin tu dag pa'i dpa' bo che/ /mdog gi dbang phyug kun gyi mgon/ /dam chos mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i/ /ji?
253b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ci yang mi dmigs stong pa'i dang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /mi rtog ye shes go cha can/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas zas kyi rnal 'byor ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor de la yang/ /raM las me yi dkyil
253b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni/ /gru gsum 'bar ba bsam byas nas/ /de dkyil tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang/ /gsal bar rab tu bsam byas nas/ /snod ni rab las rin chen ni/ /rang bzhin 'bar bar bsgom byas nas/ /der ni kha zas sna tshogs rnams/ /bsams nas de dkyil rdo rje ni/ /rtse
253b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga rab tu 'bar ba las/ /bdud rtsir gyur par rab tu bsam/ /de nas rang gi sa bon las/ /'od zer kha dog sna lnga dag /nam mkha' i phyogs su 'phros pa las/ /phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mdzod spur zhugs nas thugs kyi
253b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdud rtsi blangs nas de nyid du/ /'dres par bsams nas sngags 'di yi/ /byin gyis brlabs nas bza' bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs 'di byas pa yis/ /sems can 'gro ba mdza' dag la/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa kun
253b5(rgyud 'grel): bsal nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /lha yi sku ni thob par shog /slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa/ ta thA ga ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas shar
253b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs b+haM ga la'i nyi ma 'byung gnas zla ba zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po de yi zhal snga nas/ /bod kyi lo tsA dge tshul khyung grags kyis/ /'dul ba'i bstan pa snying po gnas pa'i sa/ /dpal ldan rgyan gong gtsug lag khang de ru/ /bder gshegs bstan la phan
253b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir bsgyur lags kyi/ /rnal 'byor spyod rnams nges par brtson par mdzod// // !/ */ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yid bzhin nor bu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//) rgya gar skad du/ AryA ba lo ke te shwa ri tsan+ta ma ni tsakra b+ha d+hi sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
254a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba skyob mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ /zla ba'i nor lha'i sku mnga' i thugs rjes mchog sbyin de la gsum gyis phyag
254a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal nas/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis mun bsal chu skyes kha 'byed ltar/ /thugs rje'i 'od kyis ma rig mun sel snying gi pad+ma 'byed mdzad pa'i/ /sgrub thabs dam pa bka' drin dran phyir bri bar bya/ /me tog rab la sogs gtsang ma yid dga' i gnas su ni/ /rnam lnga
254a3(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis bsngags pa'i maN+Dal legs par bya/ /kha dog dkar po'i me tog la sogs mchod pa ldan byas la/ /yi ge gsum ldan khrus kyi dri ma gnyis bkrus te/ /nyon mongs mdza' dag gzhig phyir bde ba'i stan la 'dug /yi ge sum ldan h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis gnas
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag rnal 'byor bsrung/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar po bsam/ /'od kyis 'gro ba'i don byas 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan drangs te/ yi ge gsum ldan h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis me tog la sogs mchod pa 'bul/ /de la sdig pa bshags shing
254a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyod sdom pa blad/ /rjes su yi rang skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol mdzad thugs rje 'od kyis blta/ /byams pa'i 'od kyis sems can 'jig rten mgon gyi gzugs su mthong/ /dga' ba'i
254a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis sems can bde ldan rgyun mi 'chad bar bsam/ /btang snyoms 'od kyis gzung 'dzin cha spangs chos nyid mthong bar blta/ /gzung ba dag phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nyahaM/ 'dzin pa dag
254a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dri med nam mkha' lta bur kun bltas te/ /dbus su bskyes pad+ma dkar po sngon por bcas/ /lte bar h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba chu shel 'od dang ldan/ /de dbus h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung yid
254b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu 'bar/ /h+rI ldan 'od kyis 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /phyogs bcu rgyal sras bkug ste nor bu byin brlabs pas/ /de yongs gyur te 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhengs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'gying bag 'od zer dkar po 'bar/ /gu lang dkar po'i mdog bzhin gzhon
254b2(rgyud 'grel): nu rgyan cha can/ /phyag g.yas sbyin pa bzhi yi gtor sbyin yid bzhin nor bu 'bar/ /phyag g.yon 'khor ba sgrol phyir 'khor lo rin chen ldan/ /spyi gtsug thor tshugs stang na gsung gi dbang phyug bzhugs/ /thugs rje 'od kyis 'gro ba kun khyab byed/ /rang snying pad steng zla
254b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /nor bu dbus na h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar po gsal/ /de 'od las byung sgrol ma khro gnyer can sogs phyogs bzhi'i lha/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na 'gying bag ldan par bzhugs/ /phyi rol rgyal chen bzhi dang mchod pa'i lha mo sprul/ /de dag sku mdog so so'i phyag
254b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gtso bor mtshungs par blta/ /kun gyi thugs kar zla ba la gnas nor bu sa bon bsam/ /'od zer lcags kyu dang mtshungs nam mkha' khyab spros te/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs me tog la sogs pas/ /yongs su mchod nas legs pas sngags 'di gzhug
254b5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa 'o ma chu ltar tha dad med pa'i 'khor lo la/ /skye mched gnas su zla ba h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig bsam/ /sku gsung thugs la yi ge gsum bltas la/ /thugs ka'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bskul/ /mchod bstod byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA
254b6(rgyud 'grel): ga ta aM b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /lha yi chu ldan bum pas ni/ /'khor lo la ni dbang bskur te/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med pas brgyan/ /gzugs sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /'khor lo la ni legs par mchod/ /sangs rgyas
254b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' la/ /de dag gis ni bstod par bya/ /de nas thugs kyi sa don la/ yi ge sngags kyi phreng ba ni/ /mar me lta bur rab bltas la/ /'od kyis sems can thams cad ni/ /'jig rten mgon por bsgrub byas te/ /yi ge'i phreng ba rnams ??
255a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang lte ba'i bar du ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phreng bar bsgom/ /oM tsin+ta ma Ni tsakra ba rti ma Ni padme a(rgyud 'grel): h+rI hUM phaT swAhA/ /snying po'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma b+ha ra ta ke a(rgyud 'grel): h+rI hUM phaT swA hA/ /nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnams/ /sa
255a2(rgyud 'grel): bon yi ge gsum dang ldan/ /swA hA phaT ces bzlas par bya/ /'od zer la ni yig 'bru dgus/ /rdo rje skud pa lta bu yi/ /'khor bar bzlas pas lus khyab nas/ /sgrib pa gnyis spangs ye shes kyi/ /'khor lo gsal bar ston par byed/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das
255a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /lha rnams kyis ni bsnyen 'gyur te/ /thun mong thun mo ma yin pa'i/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /bye ba gsum rdzogs sngags pa yis/ /rab dga' la sogs sa thob nas/ /sa bcu dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/ /sngags bzlas dus su cho ga ni/ /gtsang
255a4(rgyud 'grel): mar byas pa'i sa phyogs su/ /gu gul tsan dan a ga ru/ /pus kas dus tso ri ka/ /go ro tsa na shing gi bcud/ /legs sbyar dung ngam nya phyis su/ /gzhag ste brtse ba la sogs pa'i/ /gzungs sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni/ /phyag g.yas zla ba dri bcas pas/ /dkyil
255a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor khru ngo la sogs byug /pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa'i/ /me tog lha yi gnas su bkod/ /der ni paM skyes pad+ma ni/ /dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa ni/ /rim pa gsum du gnas par bsam/ /lha rnams thugs kyi sa bon las/ /lha yi 'khor lo sprul byas te/ /pad+ma
255a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gsum dag la/ /rim pas lha rnams bzhugs par bsam/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim/ /dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs pa dang/ /skye mched gnas gsum byin brlabs te/ /ma ka ru dang shel spang ka /'bra ma tsa ri la sogs pa'i/ /dri zhim
255a7(rgyud 'grel): spos kyis mchod par bya/ /pad+ma dkar po tsam pa ka /dzA ya kun das mchod par bya/ /ga bur go ro tsa na dang/ /tsan dan dkar po ldan pa yi/ /dri zhim mar gyi mar me dbul/ /sA lu dkar po zho zan dang/ /sbrad bcas 'o ma dbul bar bya/ /dri zhim dkar po chu
255b1(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /sku la byug pa dbul bar bya/ /na bza' rgyan dang me tog phreng/ /gdugs dad ba dan rgyal mtshan dang/ /rlung yab la sogs rgyan rnams dbul/ /dril bu pi bang rdza rnga dang/ /gling bu rnga rings pa Da ha/ /sgra mchog rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
255b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang/ /bla ma 'khor lo bcas pa la/ /bstod nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /'khor lo'i lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /thugs kar pad steng zla ba la/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig sngags kyis bskor bar bya/ /'od zer sngags kyi phreng ba ni/ /zhal nas byung ste rjes gnang tshul/ /bdag gi zhal
255b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs? thugs kar thim/ /de dag khri phrag sngags blangs nas/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag po/ /sngags phreng kha dog bzhir shes nas/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor lha rnams la/ /rjes su mthun pa'i gsol ba gdab/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /'khor lor bcas
255b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin par bsam/ /de nas lha rnams thugs kar bsdu/ /de ltar cho ga byas nas ni/ /mchod bstod gsol gdab sngon 'gro bas/ /gzungs sngags bzlas pa brtson par bya/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs par gyur na ni/ /gang zhig bdag
255b5(rgyud 'grel): gam? nad pa'am/ /gdon chen nyen dang tshe nyams dang/ /'jig pa brgyad kyis nyen pa la/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya/ /shis par gyur pa'i nyi ma la/ /ras sam shing lo gro ga ni/ /dri zhim spos kyis bdug pa dang/ /nye ba'i snying po stong phrag gcig /h+rI:
255b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /gur kum go ngo tsa na dang/ /kor si sha ldan khu ba yis/ /'khor lo legs par bri bar bya/ /me tog dkar po yu ba yis/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad bri/ /dbus su h+rI(rgyud 'grel): chen bris pa'i nad/ /sgrub pos legs par bri
255b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /yi ge gsum ldan nye snying po/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig par du sgrub pa po/ /rak+Sha ku ru ldan par bri/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la ni/ /snying po spel sngags ldan par bri/ /pad+ma'i mu khyud tha ma la/ /rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags god dang mtshungs//
256a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsang sgra ldan pas bris nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dri yis legs byugs la/ /me tog dkar ba dri zhim po/ /sil ma legs par bkram pa yi/ /steng du 'khor lo legs par gzhag /lha rnams thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /'khor lo 'od kyis sems
256a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs te/ /paM bskyed pad+ma'i gnas gnas su/ /gzung sngags mar me'i phreng ba bzhin/ /'od ldan gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ lha yi 'khor lo spyan brangs te/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/ /'khor lo la ni bstim par
256a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /lha rnams thugs ka nas spros pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa'i/ /khri phrag bzlas pa 'khor lor bstim/ /ngas ni srung ba'i sgrub pa rdzogs/ /mchog gi dngos grub sgrub 'dod pas/ /gong gi dkyil 'khor logs byas te/ /dbus su gtso bo la
256a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /lha rnams cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/ /ye shes spyan 'dren la sogs pa/ /cho ga'i yan lag thams cad kyang/ /gong gi mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /dus gsum legs par mchod byas la/ /yi ge grangs kyi 'bum phrag bzla/ /thun mtshams gsol
256a5(rgyud 'grel): gdab bskor ba ni/ /brgya 'am stong phrag re re bya/ /de tshe thugs rje byin brlabs kyis/ /'khor lo zhal ston yang na ni/ /dngos grub rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /lus la 'od zer 'byung ba dang/ /dri zhim shel gyi mdog dang mtshungs/ /sems can thams cad dang gyur
256a6(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /gcan zan ri dags 'bros mi 'gyur/ /nam mkhar 'phur dang shing rta zhon/ /rgya mtsho sgrol dang ri rgyal mdzeg /nor bu 'khor lo rnyed ba dang/ /pad+ma dkar po zla ba mthong/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bcas yi ge zhal zhugs mthong/ /rang mdog dkar po khrus byed na/ /
256a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag 'grub pa'i rtags su bshad/ /de nas sman mchog ri lu sgrub/ /bum pa bzang po'i nang du ni/ /yungs kar ba yi rnam lnga dang/ /ru rta tsan dan dkar po dang/ /shi ri khaN+Da ga pur dang/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i a gu ra/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga/ /dri lnga
256b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po lnga bcas te/ /rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la/ /bum par btsal te dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su legs par gzhag par bya/ /de steng gdugs dang ba dan dang/ /phyogs bzhi nga rgyal mtshan gdags par bya/ /der ni lha yi 'khor lo ni/ /cho ga gsum gyis bskyed par bya/ /
256b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes spyan drangs la sogs pa/ /cho ga rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /dus gsum mchod dang bstod par bya/ /'jig rten mgon po thugs kar ni/ /paM bskyed pad+ma zla ba'i steng/ /a las pu pa bzang por gyur/ /nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ri lu bsam/ /gtso bo la sogs lha
256b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi/ /thugs las rtsa ba'i snying po dang/ /nye snying spros nas ri lur bstim/ /thun mtshams bskor pa brgya phrag byas/ /de tshe ri lu lhar mthong na/ /'jig rten mgon po 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri lu rgyal chen bzhir mthong na/ /zhi sogs phrin las 'grub par 'gyur//
256b4(rgyud 'grel): ri lu nyi ma zla bar mthong/ /mkha' la 'gro 'gyur the tshom med/ /ri lu 'khor lo nor bur mthong/ /yid bzhin dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de tshe bum pa'i gzugs mthong na/ /sa 'og dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /'od mthong lha yi spyan dang 'dra/ /sgra 'byung lha yi snyan
256b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /ral gris shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /du ba byung bas tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /dri yis nad rnams zhi byed 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bzlas pa la sogs pa'i/ /sgrub pa gzungs kyi cho gar shes/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas/ /de yis bsod nams gang
256b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kun/ /'jig rten mgon po thob par shog /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dze ta ris mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //paN+Di ta pur+Na kIrti dang/ sna nam rdo rje bla
256b7(rgyud 'grel): mas bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom par 'dod pas/ dang por skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed
257a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas rang gi snying gar yi ge a dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ de'i steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhig bsgom/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas ri bo po ta lan rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs pa de mdun gyi
257a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkhar spyan drangs te de la rang gi lus dpag tu med pa sprul nas yid kyis phyag byas par bsam zhing snying ga'i h+rI'i 'od zer gyis mchod pa lngas mchod de/ sdig pa thams cad ni so sor bshags so/ /bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /sangs
257a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so/ /bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod do/ /de nas ye shes pa de'i thugs ka'i yi ge h+rI las 'od zer byung ste/ /rang gi snying ga'i yi ge h+rI la thim de las 'od zer 'phros pas rang gi sgrib pa

257a5(rgyud 'grel): tshugs can sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyan kun gyis spras shing/ /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur par bsam/ de nas ye shes pa de rang dam tshig pa la thim pas dbyer med du gyur bar bsgom/ yang rang gi snying ga'i
257a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge? h+ri las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can thams cad la phog ste de rnams kyi sgrib pa gnyis dag par byas nas thams cad rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur par bsgom zhing de rnams kyis ngag tu sgra ci phrag pa thams cad kyang yi ge drug pa zlos pa bsam/
257a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gis zlos pa'i tshe de thams cad kyis yi ge drug pa di ri ri'i zlos par bsgom zhing dag par bzlas so/ /mthar yongs su dag pa'i bsngo pa bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/
257b1(rgyud 'grel): chag lo tsa ba chos rje dpal gyis nyung du bsdus te bsgyur ba'o// (//yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ ShaDa ak+Sha ratan+t+ra kra ma maN+Dal tsakra u pa de sha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i
257b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re shig dang por ting nge 'dzin dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su zhugs nas/ thal mo sbyar la spyi bor bzhag nas shar phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra banda
257b3(rgyud 'grel): naM kA ro mi zhes phyag bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna banda naM kA ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du nub phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma banda naM kA ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du byang phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma banda naM kA ro mi/ zhes bya bas
257b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi byas la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur spyi bor gzhag nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ur b+ha ba ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /khu tshur de nyid kyis kha la/ oM padmotb+ha bA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /g.yon pa'i
257b5(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur snying gar gzhag nas/ oM badzrod+d+ha pA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la cho ga 'dis bgegs bsal bar bya ste/ oM a mri ta ha na ha na sarba bi d+hAM da ha da ha/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba brjod la thal mo sbyar nas/ mthe bong bar
257b6(rgyud 'grel): du gzhag pa de la badzra hUM phaT ces bya ba'i yi ge 'bar ba'i rnam par bkod la/ thal mo de las phyogs bcur 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'phro bar bsams nas/ oM a mri ta ha na ha na sarba b+hig+h+rAM da ha da ha/ sarba pA pi hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun brjod la thal mo lan gsum brdabs
257b7(rgyud 'grel): nas se gol yang lan gsum brdab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje dra bas bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du re pa las me 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsams la/ rdo rje'i
258a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings nas/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya ste/ oM pad+ma sarba sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ pad+ma satwa twe na pa tiSh+Tha/ driDho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma mA me muny+tsa pad+ma badzri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun brjod do/ /spyi bor a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid la yi ge oM gyis brlabs la bsgom par bya'o/ /sngags brjod pa'i rjes
258a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid la snying ga'i gnas su re pha las me sbar la lus thams cad bsregs la yang spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje thal mo bcings la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma na nai? ryA ta ya mi oM sarba ta thA ga ta a sham se
258a4(rgyud 'grel): ta sarba satwa naM sarba sid+d+ha ya saM paryan+taM/ sarba ta thA ga ta taSh+Ta a b+hi tiSh+Tha taM/ zhes bya ba 'di nyid lan gsum brjod la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' yongs su gang bar lhag par mos la de rnams yid kyis
258a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs par bya'o/ /oM dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung/ zhes bya bas sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod
258a6(rgyud 'grel): nams ? su yid rang ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bya'o de'i rjes la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod la/ byang chub kyi sems tsam la lhag par gnas pa sems kyis mthong nas/ oM d+harma hA? tu swA b+hA ba Arya konyaM
258a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes mngon par brjod nas/ byang chub kyi sems de yi ge paM gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par mthong nas/ de las sna tshogs pad ma chen por bskyed la/ de'i steng du yi ge a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yang yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/

258b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa'i dang po ni ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya de'i rtse mo la chud zad dbu 'dud pa'o/ /gnyis pa la phreng ba/ gsum pa'i phyag skyabs sbyin la rin po che zur drug pa bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang bos pad+ma'i steng

258b6(rgyud 'grel): ni pad+ma der la utpa la'i steng du rin po che zur drug pa'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma drug pa bsnams pa'o/ /shar du aau badzra pad+ma hUM/ lhor oM ratna pad+ma hUM/ nub tu oM mu ne pad+ma hUM/ byang du oM karma badzra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rim pa 'dis/ rdo rje pad+ma dang/ rin
258b7(rgyud 'grel): chen pad+ma dang/ thub pa'i pad+ma dang/ las kyi pad+ma rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par blta'o/ /khyad par ni pad+ma'i steng du rin po che zur drug ba'i steng du rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /me'i phyogs su oM badzra re hUM/
259a1(rgyud 'grel): bden bral gyi phyogs so oM ratna tA re hUM/ rlung gi phyogs su oM mu ne tA re hUM/ dbang ldan du oM karma tA re hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis go rims bzhin du bco ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par rdo rje sgrol ma dang/ rin chen sgrol ma dang/ thub pa'i sgrol ma
259a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ las kyi sgrol ma dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas pa'o// //khyad par ni utpa la'i steng bzhin du/ rin po che zur drug pa'i gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis zla ba'i dkyil
259a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /phyogs mtshams kyi 'dab ma la shar phyogs su oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ lho ru oM pradz+nyAn+ta ka hUM/ nub tu oM padmAn+ta ka hUM/ byang du oM big+h+nAn+ta ka hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi ngo bor khro bo bzhi blta bar
259a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /khyad par ni g.yas brkyang ba/ mi'u thung gi rnam pa la zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ sna gong nyag pa smin ma ser skya nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ 'od 'bar ba'i dbus su gnas par bsgom mo/ /thams cad kyi g.yon pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag dag ni sdigs mdzub
259a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag dag la tho ba'o/ /gnyis pa la ral gri /gsum pa la zhags pa'o/ /lhag ma'i phyag gnyis la pad ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la snying gar paM las pad+ma dkar po/ /de'i steng du a las zla
259a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du oM ma Ni padme hUM/ zhes snga ma bzhin du yi ge rnams bsams la/ de las 'od zer spros nas sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor bsgrubs nas/ yang bsdus te de nyid du bzhugs so/ /de'i
259a7(rgyud 'grel): rjes la sngags kha nas byung nas rdo rje'i lam nas rjes su zhugs nas mu tig gi phreng ba ltar bsams nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pa byas nas snying ga'i sngags las cig car dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo phyi rol tu spros nas mchod par bya'o/ /'di dag gi sngags ni/
259b1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta arg+haM pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ arga'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra puShpa pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta
259b2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta gand+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na byu ha hUM/ byug pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rA sa/ e gro pi te na a ha ri na san ta ra pa ya me pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ lhab shos kyis sngags so/ /de ltar mchod pa byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
259b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying gar sngags kyi yi ge la gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bstod pa dang/ smon lam yang btab nas/ langs la rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o/ /yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs
259b4(rgyud 'grel): so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mahA dza na dang/ lo tsa ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal kha sarba Na'i sgru ? bzhugs so//) rgya gar skad du/ AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra kha sarba Na sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sarba Na sgrub thabs/ mgon
259b5(rgyud 'grel): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar ji ltar bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ ras ris la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku mdun du bzhugs par dmigs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pas legs
259b6(rgyud 'grel): par mchod de/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bdag nyid dbul ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/ /'gra ba'i
259b7(rgyud 'grel): dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar yi ge a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dang bcas pa de'i steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis
260a1(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad drangs nas 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa dang/ thal mo lan gsum brdabs la tshig 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarbba d+harmma swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ de'i 'og tu chos thams cad bdag med pa
260a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /tshig gi don dang bcas par bsams nas/ zla ba bye ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer yongs su gyur pa las ral pa'i cod pan gyi dbus na gnas pa'i rgyal pa'i sku 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i ri'i phug gi nang na pad+ma chen po dang/ zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs
260a3(rgyud 'grel): shing zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pa sems dpa' i skyil mo krung la gnas pa cung zad brkyang ba/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas kyis mchog sbyin pa zhi ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis
260a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa utpa la'i snying po kha 'byed pa bsam mo/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su khro gnyer can cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang/ spyi blugs bsnams pa g.yas gnyis kyis phyag byed pa dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o/ /spyi gtsug las skyes pa'i mchod rten gyis
260a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon na khro bo chen po rta mgrin phyag g.yas pa phyag 'tshal ba dang/ g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas na nor bzangs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs pa de ltar bsam mo/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro ba yis/ /rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms
260a6(rgyud 'grel): na ni/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od chen po/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob bar 'gyur/ /bsgoms pas dub par gyur na/ rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sngags mu tig gi phreng ba dang 'dra ba bsam te bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM ma Ni padme hUM/ brgya 'am stong du bzlas
260a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis mchod pa legs par bya'o/ /oM khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzod/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gshegs pa dang slar byon
260b1(rgyud 'grel): par bskul nas bzod par gsol bar bya ste/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/ /'dir ni nyes pa gang byas pas/ /gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pas/ /mgon po khyod ni bzod pa zhes/ /gtso bo nus pa ma mchis pas/ /ma tshang ba dang ma rnyed pa'i/ /'dir ni bya ba gang byas pa/ /mgon khyod de
260b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bzod par mdzod/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas kyang/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' las/ /'gro ba ma lus sgrol bar shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sarba Na sgrub thabs// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya
260b3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya sha Da k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sngags pas gdong bkrus nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsams la/
260b4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /zhes mos pa byas nas/ sems can ji snyed sems can du bsdus pas yang dag par bsdus la/ sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te
260b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min te/ ji srid du sems can ni khams gsum du btags pas/ btags pa de dag thams cad bdag nyid kyis phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su
260b6(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya'o zhes bsam/ de nas oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ de nas stong pa nyid du bsdu bas bsdus pa tsam gyis bsgoms la de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /de'i steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer brgya stong 'byung bar bsgoms te/ yang de nyid
260b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa mdza' dag rnam par dag par byas nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar zhugs pa las/ bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/
261a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na bgrang phreng g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ gzhan gnyis kyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /g.yas su nor bu 'dzin pa sku mdog dang phyag la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /g.yon du 'bru drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo phyag bzhi pa ston ka'i sprin lta bu'o/ /de nas oM
261a2(rgyud 'grel): mahA bu ka badzra satwa/ dza hUM baM ho su ra ta stwaM/ a la la la la ho/ a a a a zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phreng ba 'dra ba dkar po zhal nas gyu zhing
261a3(rgyud 'grel): lte bar byugs te 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin nor bu'i rtog pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mchan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas lus g.yo ba dang bcas bar gyur pa la sogs par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dad pa dang snying rje dang/ bla ma
261a4(rgyud 'grel): la gus pa dang ldan pa ni ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM ma Ni padme hUM zhes de ltar bzla'o/ /de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod pa'o/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su bo hyo me b+ha ba
261a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho:/ b+ha ga ba na/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzri b+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bzlas nas ci bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po pU dza badzras mdzad pa'o//
261a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dAM baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Argya ba lo ki te shwa ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/ rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/
261a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong nyid snying rje las byung ba/ /rnam lnga byang chub che bdag nyid/ /sku gsung thugs kyis thugs?  dag pa/ /'jig rten ma bon po mkhas pas sgrub/ /pad+ma zla dbus gzhon nu'i sku/ /skyil krung phyed brkyang 'gying bag brtan/ /zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mdzes pas/ /sa gsum bdag
261b1(rgyud 'grel): gir gzigs mdzad pa'o/ /mchog sbyin padmo g.yas dang g.yon/ /rgyal ba'i cod pan rin chen brgyan/ /'od dpag med kyis spyi gtsug mdzes/ /de yi thugs ni pad+mar rgyal/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig rang sems 'od gsal ba/ /sa gsum sbyangs mdzad yi ge bzhi/ /'khor lo rnam gsum
261b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bzhi/ /sgyu ma brag ca mkhas 'dra ba'o/ /thugs rje chen po kha sarba Ni'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ yo gA sA ra/ rnal 'byor snying po/ dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal dran byas nas/
261b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po rab bskyed de/ /spyi bor bla ma snying kar lha/ /rang sems ma yengs bsgom par bya/ /gang shar thams cad de yin te/ /de ni gang duAng ma shar ba'o/ /de phyir gang skyes de ma skyes/ /ma skyes pa nyid skye ba'i tshul/ /gang skyes gnyug ma nyid yin phyir/ /de shar dran pas
261b4(rgyud 'grel): ma brjed na/ /gang snang stong pa nyid bdag tu/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po gdon mi za/ /ma rtogs 'gro la rang dbang du/ /rnam kun dmigs pa med yid kyis/ /snying rje chen po ngang gis 'grub/ /de yi thabs sbyangs byang chub bzhed/ /rnal 'byor snying po/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI
261b5(rgyud 'grel): dzaka ta mi tra'i gdams pa a'i thI// (//spyan ras gzigs kha sarba Na'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kha sarba Na lo ke shwa ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal kha sarba Na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal
261b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dbang phyug byams pa dang/ /snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms las/ /byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi bdag /'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal/ /de zhabs pad+ma mo la reg pas/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal bsgral ba'i phyir/ /ji bzhin ji ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /mdor bsdus bdag gi
261b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /mkha' ltar dri med stong nyid dbyings las dbang po gzhu ltar gsal ba'i dngos/ /padmo zla rgyas thugs gsung 'od la dro sgyu ma'i rnam thar sprul pa'i sku/ /rab mdzes sku ni gzi brjid brtan mdzes 'bar ba'i 'od zer dkar 'khrigs pa/ /skyil krung phyed brkyang dul ba'i phyag
262a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas mchod sbyin gsal po g.yon gyi phyag /padmo'i sdong mdzes dri med 'dab brgyas gzhon nu sgeg po'i thugs kar 'dzin/ /shel ltar dri med utpal spyan rib? kun nas yid 'phrog 'od 'bar zhal/ /brtan po dkar gsal zla rgyas stong lhag ral
262a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cod pan thub pa'i gdan/ /'bar ba'i rin chen dri med sna tshogs shin tu 'od sbyangs legs spras shing/ /mkha' la nyi shar lham me lhan ne nam mkha' i mthar gtugs 'od 'gyed pa/ /dpe byad mtshan rdzogs gcig bu skyob pa skyabs kyi dam pa slu med ni/ /shin tu
262a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dka' de nyid gzhir gyur snying gi pad 'dab h+rI yig gis/ /gang ba'i phyogs rnams de bzhin de gzugs oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): dang h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM/ /dkar sogs kha dog dag gi phreng ba yid ni ye shes yig 'bru'i dngos/ /brtse ba'i rlung bskyod ye shes me 'bar 'gro ba'i sdig tshogs bud
262a4(rgyud 'grel): shing bsregs/ /zhi ba'i ngang ni gnyis med mi g.yo mkha' ltar spros bral rol gcig ro/ /bde chen 'byung gnas ye shes dri med mnyam gzhag chen po bsgom par bya/ /de rjes mchod sogs dag pa'i yan lag cho ga ji bzhin ye shes sems dpa' legs bcug
262a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rnam gsum 'khor lo dkar dmar sngo tshul go rim ji bzhin sku gsung thugs/ /brtan po'i mtshan nyid dam pa'i zhal bzhin mkhas pas rab tu shes par bya/ /thugs rje chen po khar sarba Na'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa'i brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po sh+rI shAn+ta ka ras
262a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo tsa ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa de wa ta thA ga to lo ke sho ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal
262a7(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /shin tu rnam dag dang ba'i mtshor/ /rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng/ /rnam snang rdo rje sems dpas dang/ /rin 'byung 'od dpag med don grub/ /sa rigs rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs/ /dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa khyad
262b1(rgyud 'grel): par can la gnas pra/ snying rje chen po mdun du byas la/ /thog mkho nar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgom par bya'o/ /'dod nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba/ /gang shar nyid na ngo bo med/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de/ /bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang
262b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos 'di dag ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' bas mi shes pa'i/ 'gro ba lnga po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o zhes brtags nas/ dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon bar bskyod gyur pas/ /skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin
262b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po shin tu mthug po gtums gyur la/ /tsham tshom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun tu dral zhing yongs su gtor/ /de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings skyes sna tshogs mdzad pa dbyer med cig char sgrub pa yi/ /mgon po dam par rigs kyi lha lnga drim
262b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga spyod las lnga bsgrub cing stobs la sogs/ /de la dbus sogs sdong 'dab bcas/ /zla ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba la/ /me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam/ /'phrin las la sbyar skur bskyed do/ /rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can/ /ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag
262b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya can h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'i snying po can 'khor los mtshan pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ni nam mkha' i mdog can/ ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can/ hUM gi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser brtso ma'i mdog can/ ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can/ tri ga snying po can
262b6(rgyud 'grel): rin po ches mtshan pa'o/ /'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can/ ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'i snying po can pad+mas mtshan pa'o/ /don yod grub pa ni sA lu ljang pa'i mdog can/ ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can/ a'i snying po can ral gris mtshan pa'o//
262b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su/ /rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la/ /brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa/ /bdag spyang ba dang gzhan sbyang gnyis/ /oM a swa pa ra dz+nyA na bi shud+ha kra sa hUM/ 'khor lo lha bu'i sngags so/ /thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs
263a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI mi tra a nan ta'i gdams pa rdzogs so// //gnubs lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ siM ha nA da sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ seng+ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang
263a2(rgyud 'grel): por re zhig sngags pas kha bshal ba la sogs pa byas te/ stan bde pa la 'dug nas/ rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkar po bltas te/ de'i 'od kyis gla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs te mdun du bsams la/ de'i
263a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs byas te/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma konyahaM/ zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas skad cig gis paM gyur pa las pad+ma dkar po de'i steng du yi ge siM yongs su gyur pa las seng+ge
263a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po de'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las yang dag par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge sgrar bdag nyid bsam par bya/ dkar po 'od dpag med pa'i dang ral ba'i thor cog can spyan gsum pa dka' thub pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa/ rgyal po chen po'i
263a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gying bag gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa'i g.yon pa na pad+ma gyen du langs pa'i thog na ral gri 'bar ba/ g.yas na rtse gsum dkar po sprul gyis bcings pa/ yang g.yon ngos su dri bzangs sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa dkar po/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro
263a6(rgyud 'grel): ba sprul pa'i sku chen por bsam par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): siM ha nA da hUM phaT/ de'i rjes su gzungs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): Arya ba lo ka ti shwa rA ya/ po d+hi satwA ya/ (mahA satwA ya/) mahA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tadya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/
263a7(rgyud 'grel): ka Te ka Te/ ka ro TaM/ bidya swAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar snga dro'i dus su ba lci sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal brgyad byas la maN+Dal ra ra la yang lan bcu gsum brjod par bya/ de nas lci ba lhag ma la sngags lan bdun bzlas la
263b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te/ nad gang du byung ba'i sar bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bdun nam bcu gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yin du zin kyang grub par ma gyur na ngas mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro//
263b2(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun seng+ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra si ha nA da sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge sgra la
263b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis 'jig rten nyes pa ma lus dbang gyur ji srid legs pa'i lam la ma bkod pa/ /de srid yang dag 'don phyir bdag ni byang chub mchog tu bgrod par byed ma gyur/ /gang gis khams gsum 'di dag seng+ge sgra chen mchog gis gsal bar gang gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal can
263b4(rgyud 'grel): dag bskyab phyir thugs rje'i spyan dang seng+ge sgra ldan khyod la bstod/ /ral pa rgya che'i dbyibs can dri me zla 'dra shin tu dkar ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags brtul zhugs chen po shin tu dag byed dang ldan pa/ /'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad lha dang lha min grub pa
263b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rab btud pa/ /shin tu rgya che ba yi sku mnga' khyod la rtag tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma dmar po rgyas pa zla ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lnga yi gdan/ /seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i rol bas rnam par mdzes/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag 'byor bas dri med gsung
263b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bka' stsal pas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i dpal gyi sku la 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag ni pad+ma gsal ba lta bur 'jam pa yis/ /khams gsum nyes pa gsum po zhi bar bya phyir rtse gsum pa/ /'od zer 'bar 'khrigs sprul dang ldan pas rtag tu
263b7(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dzin pa/ /bdag gi thub pa seng+ge sgra de la ni rtag tu bgyi'o/ /khams gsum po la thugs rje chen po gnas kyang skyon gyis ni/ /khyod la gos pa med kyang de dag spang phyir khyed kyis ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis ral gri dam rdzas dang bcas
264a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma bsnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras po khyod la rtag tu bdag nyid skyabs su mchi/ /nga rgyal la sogs tshogs kyis g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ /dmigs nas rgyal ba lnga po yang dag spros nas de rnams la/ /ji lta ji ltar
