268a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams
268b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas/ /de'i sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a sa me tri sa ma mahA sa ma ye swAhA/ de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi khu chur bcangs
268b2(rgyud 'grel): la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la 'dzub? mo gnyis bsgreng ngo/ /phyag rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ chos dbyings rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /de'i sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ d+harmA d+hu tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni lag
268b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la/ mthe bong gnyis lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gzhug go/ rgyal mchog dpal dang ldan pa yi /chos kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob ba yis/ /'khor lo rab tu 'di sgyur ro/ /de'i
268b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra naM badzra At+ma ko haM?/ yi ge raM dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis gnas lngar gtugs na go gyon bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyag rgya la thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis gung
268b5(rgyud 'grel): me'i rgyab tu sbyar mthe bong gnyis gung mo la sbyar ro/ /sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM/ badzra ka ba tsaM hUM/ de nas bgegs thams cad rnam par sel ba mi bzad pa'i rig sngags chen mo rjes su 'breng bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la
268b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis rtse sbrang srin lag gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad dgug pa ni bsrung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo sarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu kha b+hya:
268b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA haM khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le/ sarba ta tha ga ta pu ne nir dza te/ hUM hUM tra Ta tra Ta/ a pra ti ha te swA hA/ bgegs dang ngan khrid thams cad dang/ /srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang//
269a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad 'byer bar byed/ de nas yon chab kyi snod chu gtsang ma dang dri chu dang me tog bzang pos bkang la chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge dang/ rigs kyi snying po dang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i
269a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yon phyogs su gzhag go /bsang gtor dang mchod pa'i yo byad gzhag go /de dag kun yang bsang ba dang sbyad pa'i phyir mi g.yo mgon nam/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis gdab bo/ /de nas bskrad
269a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mtshams bcad pa dag byas te bsgom par bya'o/ /bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa yang de dag nyid kyis bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge raM/ /rigs kyi snying po badzra d+h+ri ka /mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yon pa'i khu
269a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcangs la 'dzub mo dang gung mo gnyis brkyang la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo mthe bos mnan la lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthil du gzhag go /
269a5(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo mgon po'i ral gri shubs su bcug pa ste/ bskrad pa'i tshe ral gri shubs nas phyung nas g.yon nas bskor/ mtshams bcad pa'i tshe g.yas nas bskor sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM a tsa la kA Na tsaN+Da mahA
269a6(rgyud 'grel): ro Sha Na spho Ta spho Ta ya hUM/ tra Da haM maM lan gsum bya'o/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya thal mo sbyar nas gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de brkyang mthe'u chung bsnol te nang du bcug pa'i nang du srin lag gnyis gzhag pa'i rtse mo
269a7(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i phyi rol nas rgur por byas te nas gang tsam ma reg par bya'o/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag rgya rtse gsum pa las thams cad pa ste las kun la 'dis sbyar ro/ /
269b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM a mri ta hUM phaT/ yang na sngar gyi sngags mang pos sbyar ro/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du 'dug la snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge ba bsams te/ de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral lo zhes
269b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra byung nas dngos po thams cad stong par bsgom/ de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i sku re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar byed pa/ mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser ram/
269b3(rgyud 'grel): yang na rin po che markata ltar ljang sngon phyag gnyis pa dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs dar ba ti 'am/ dar tshigs gu bsnams pa 'od zer gyis bskor ba gzi brjid dang ldan pa phyag na ye
269b4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams par bsgom mo/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge raM dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo/ /mi gnyis su traM dmar po gzhag ste/ byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi phyag rgya bcings
269b5(rgyud 'grel): te gnas lnga ru gtug go /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug la ngos gnyis su gzhag la rdo rje ltar bya'o/ /mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs ta bsgrengs
269b6(rgyud 'grel): la gzhag srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du gzhug go /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya/ /mi shes grong khyer 'jigs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di/ /nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs te bstan/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/
269b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje la'o/ /sngags la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nI? tsaN+Da? ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ de nas yan lag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gtsug gyi phyag bcings la spyi gtsug tu gzhug go /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings la gung mo gzhibs te bsgreng mdzub
270a1(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar ro/ /gtsug tor phyag rgya rgya che ste/ /gtsug tor zhes ni grags pa yin/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang/ /rgyal ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /de'i sngags la/
270a2(rgyud 'grel): na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM hUM hUM/ de nas ye shes kyi spyan bsgrub bo/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo srin lag brkyang ste mthe bong gi drung du gzhag go /'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi/ /ye shes byung spyan yin te
270a3(rgyud 'grel): mig gi steng du mkhas pas gzhag /de las ye shes sbyin du gyur/ /de'i sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ga ga na spha ra Na k+Sha Na/ ka ru mahA ta thA ga ta tsak+Shu swAhA/ de nas yum gyi phyag rgya bcings la gnas sngar gtug go /lag
270a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i phyi rol nas bkug la bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bya/ mthe bong gnyis srin lag gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du gzhug go /
270a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni yum mA ma kI'i phyag rgya ste rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o/ /de'i sngags la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM dri Dha dri Dha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha dza yan+te swA hA/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcings la go bgo ste phyag rgya dang sngags gong du bstan no/ /de nas mdun
270a6(rgyud 'grel): du gzhal med khang bsams te/ de'i rim pa yang dang por chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ger raM gyis gnas kun stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsams la de'i 'og tu nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor du yi ge a gser gyi mdog can las
270a7(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa dang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can rdo rjes mtshan ma brgya dang khyon dpag tu med par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge ba mdog dkar po gangs dang shel lta bus dang cing gsal
270b1(rgyud 'grel): ba las chu'i rgyun 'o ma dang mu tig gi 'bru lta bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ba/ /gser gyi sa gzhi bkang ste dpag tu med pa'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i nang nas yi ge laM las ri rab chen po sna bzhi las grub pa gru bzhi pa
270b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang khyon dpag tu med par 'byung ba'i steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtsegs ma'i nang na pad+ma dang seng+ge'i gdan chen po pad ma'i gdan mang pos bskor bar bsams te/ de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du gyur par sngags 'dis
270b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab po/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM a na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba tatgaM ud+ga te spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA/ /'di ltar de dag thams cad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang na nam mkha' mdzod kyis kyang de
270b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje spyan drang par bya ste/ nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas mtho bo gnyis nang du g.yab cing sngags 'dis rang gi pho brang nas spyan drang bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra NAM/ e hye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru NI
270b5(rgyud 'grel): ka badzra pA NI sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya satwaM/ de nas gshegs te mdun gyi nam mkha' la dmigs la sngar bstan pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ rang gi phyag rgya dang yum gyi phyag rgya rnams bstan te so so'i sngags brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig
270b6(rgyud 'grel): can du gzigs pas mnyes par bya ste/ gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzhed pas sngags pa ji srid 'dod pa de srid du byin gyis brlab po/ de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon nam bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas snga ma gnas pa dang/ phyi nas
270b7(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhal med khang gi nang du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir mchod yon sngags kyis btab pa blangs la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mchod yon sprang zhing nang du byon par bsam mo/ /bdag gi dad dang
271a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas byon de dbus kyis pad+ma dang seng+ge'i gdan la dpal phyag na rdo rje dang 'khor
271a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi pad+ma'i gdan rnams la gsang sngags dang khro bo la sogs pa dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs 'bring gi 'phags pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas ?? kyi snod du spos chu gtsang ma blugs la zhal dang zhabs bsil dbus par bya'o/ /de'i sngags
271a3(rgyud 'grel): la oM bra ba ra satka ra pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i pho brang gi phyi rol du 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i 'am/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mtshams bcad do/ /de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs la
271a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do/ /mchod rnams rim pa bzhin du dbul/ /bcom ldan thugs rjes byon pa legs/ /bdag ni bsod nams skal bar ldan/ /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang/ /thugs rjes thugs dpag mdzad du
271a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /zhes dang por mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni oM sarba de ba ta thA a tsi ta a mri ta da rA ya swAhA/ de nas dri dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i dri mchog dag /bdag gi dad pas dbul las kyi/ /bzhes
271a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A ha ra A ha ra b+ha ga bAn sarba bidya d+ha ra pu dzi ti swA hA/ zhes sngags 'dis tshigs bcad kun gyi mjug la brjod/ de nas me tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di//
271a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dad pas 'dul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bdug sbos dbul te/ nags tshal bcud ldan yi gar 'ong/ /dri zhim rgyas pa'i bdug pa'i mchog /bdag gi dad pas 'dul lags kyis//
271b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ lha bshos dbul te/ sman rnams bcud gtsang yi ger 'ong/ /sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag /bdag gi /dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /mar me dbul te/ gdon
271b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa/ dge zhing mun pa rnams sel ba/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /a lo ke sarba bi b+hyA d+ha ra pU dzi te hUM swA hA/ dri la sogs pa dngos su ma 'byor na yang/ de dag gi phyag
271b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya bas? la yid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ /de la mchod yon gyi phyag rgya ni thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs gsum par sbyar la srin lag gnyis dbus su bkug la mthe bong gnyis glor sbyar
271b4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di ni bdud rtsi rgyun gyi phyag rgya ste mchod yon gyis sbyar ro/ /dri'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pas g.yas pa'i 'khrigs ma nas gzung ba'o/ /me tog gi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis sor mo phan
271b5(rgyud 'grel): tshun bsnol la lag pa'i nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar la gdu bu'i tshul du byas la mthe bong glor gzhag ste thal mo ltar bya'o/ /bdug spos kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis kyis mthe chung dang srin lag dang gung mo'i
271b6(rgyud 'grel): sor mo rnams phan tshun du rgyab tu sbyar te so so'i sor mo'i drung du bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng/ mthe bong gnyis glor gzhad ge/ lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ni bzed pa'i thal mo las mdzub mo cung zad bkug pa'o/ /??
271b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te gtong la lhag ma rnams khu tshur du bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM ga ga na sa ma ye swAhA/ dri'i sngags ni na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bi shud+d+ha gand+hed+d+hA bA ya
272a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ me tog gi sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ma hA mu dra mud+ga te swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+harma d+hA tu mud+ga te swA hA/ lha bshos kyi sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta ta thA ga te pU dza pU dza na sa
272a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hUM/ mar me'i sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+haM nAM/ ta thA ga ta a tsi spha ra Na a ba b+ha sa ga ga me da ra ye swA hA/ 'di dag kyang mchod pa tsam du zad do/ /bdag gi nus pa dang 'jig rten na bsngags pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po gzha?
272a3(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang ci 'byor pa dbul lo/ /de nas mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya bcings te/ sems rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas yid kyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de'i thabs kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang/ chos kyi
272a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings byin gyi mthu dang/ bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes dang smon lam gyi mthu dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pa'i mchod pa chen po'i sprin chen po dang/ rgyan dam pa dang/ bstod pa sna tshogs pa rnams 'phags pa
272a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig ces bsam zhing tshig tu yang brjod la/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'byung bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'di
272a6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum brjod do/ /mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya ni lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor gzhag go /'di'i sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a b+hi sa ma ye spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM/ d+harmA d+hA tu A kA sha sa man+ta ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta
272a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ri shud+d+ha maN+Dal/ ma ma pra ti pu n+na dz+nyA na ba len+ta sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiShthA Na ba le ny+tsa swA hA/ de ltar mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'phags pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur bar yid ches par bya'o zhes bcom
272b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu lag tu blangs la dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa 'dis bstod do/ /dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje mchog gi lam ston pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes
272b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med tshul 'chang zhing/ /theg mchog rtogs par thugs su chud/ /gsang sngags rgyal po gsang 'dzin pa/ /gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stobs po che la drag shul che/ /rig sngags rgyal po dge ba po/ /gdul dka' 
272b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dag 'dul mdzad pa/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa bya ste/ 'di skad du 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub
272b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad la skyabs su mchis kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar gzigs te/ 'gro ba lus pa bskyab pa'i mthu bdag la stsol cig ces brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar bya ste/ 'jig rten
272b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams phyogs bcu'i zhing rab 'byam thams cad du sems can gyi don mdzad pa kha dog dang tshul dang/ spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan pa kun tu bzang po'i sprul pa mang po rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig des kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyi nang gi
272b6(rgyud 'grel): don thams cad rab tu zhi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang de dag gis thob par gyur cig par bsams nas byin gyis brlab pa
272b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po/ /sems can gyi don gyis rlob pa'i rig sngags nam mkha' mdzod du byung bar mdzad pa 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba tatkhaM ud+ga te spha da Na hi maM ga ga na khaM 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ 'dis lan gsum bzlas pas ji ltar bsams pa'i don rnams sems can gyi khams rnams su de bzhin du 'gyur bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan shes rab chung
273a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyis mi shes so shes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa pa rnams kyis yid ches par bya'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don
273a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa des bdag gi lha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge bkod pa la sogs pas bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgyur la yi ge khaM dkar po de'i spyi bor gzhag ste mdun du lha bzhugs pa'i thugs kar bzlas pa bya ba'i yi ge phreng ba
273a4(rgyud 'grel): bkod la dbugs dang dran pa rab tu bsdams nas slar sdud pa'i tshig gis non par yid la 'am shub bur mi drag mi ngal bar mi skyo bar ci tsam 'dod pa'i bar du bzlas bar bya'o/ /bzlas kar nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
273a5(rgyud 'grel): te bdag dang lha'i thugs kar gzung la de nas nor bu lag pa g.yas pas blangs nas snyim par bcug la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas te de'i 'og tu yang yum bzlas snying ga'i thad kar bzung la bzlas pa re la nor bu re re
273a6(rgyud 'grel): bgrang zhing mgo mjug tu phyag bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin ma nus na yang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs te/ sems can gyi don
273a7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar dmigs shing bzlas so/ /de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na bzlas ba btang ste bzlas pa rnams yid kyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la gtams pa'i tshul gyis phul la las kyi rdo rje
273b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpar bsgyur te/ 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rgya cher bsngo'o// //'phags pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dpar
273b2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM zhes bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon dbul te/ 'di skad brjod pas dpal phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /gdon mi za bar bdag la yang/
273b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su brtse bar dgongs nas ni/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /ci bde ba yang gshegs su gsol/ /de nas dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya spyi bor gyen
273b4(rgyud 'grel): du dkrol/ sngar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rnams gshegs par bya'o/ /mtshams bcad pa yang yid kyis dgrol lo/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings
273b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgyas chos kyis dbyings su byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sngags dang phyag rgyas las kyi rdo rje sems
273b6(rgyud 'grel): dpar byin gyis brlab bo/ /spyi bor chos kyis dbyings kyi yi ge ra yig bsam mo/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas kyang go bgas la ksangs rgyas
273b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas dge ba'i/ las bya bar rab tu bsam zhing ldang ngo/ /langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo klag pa la sogs pa dge ba'i las ci nus pa bya'o/
274a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas zas za ba'i tshe na bdag nyid rigs kyi snying pos bsrungs la sngags 'di bzlas la lan gsum btab ste chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ges sbyangs la zas kyis ro la ma chags par rigs pa dang ldan par ran par
274a2(rgyud 'grel): bza' o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM a mri tod+d+ha bA ya swA hA/ nyal ba'i tshe na yang rigs kyi yum gyi snying pos bsrungs nas/ blo g.yas pas nyal lo ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ma nus pas mnyes par bya mi nus so snyam pa'i
274a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa mi bskyed do/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i skal ldan pas/ /zhabs la gtugs nas bsdus pa yin/ /rnam dag lam chen mdzod yin pas/ /skal ldan byang chub mchog gis spyad/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs

274a5(rgyud 'grel): nye ba bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ nA lAM ba ra d+ha ro ba sid+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /thugs rje chu rgyun bdag
274a6(rgyud 'grel): po la/ /rtag tu brjed med yid kyis mos/ /mchod rten sngon po'i gdams ngag bshad/ rnal 'byor brtson 'grus drag po yi/ /dbang dang gdams ngag thob nas kyang/ /myur du nus pa 'byung ba dang/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis nye
274a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /nye bya sku gdung mchod rten bsgrub/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig la gnas pa/ /bla ma'i man ngag byin brlabs kyis/ /'grub ste the tshom mi bya'o/ /rgyu dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang/
274b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba bya dang yon tan no/ /gser dngul zangs lcags dung yang rung/ /rwa shing 'dags pa la sogs pa/ /hUM gi bskyed rim ldan pa yis/ /drag po'i tor tshogs mdun du ni/ dbang bskur chas bsgyur ? bo yis/ /bai DUrya 'dra legs par byug
274b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i nang du rgya shog/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/ /snying po thams cad bris te gzhug/ bla ma grub thob brgyud pa dang/ /rtsa ba'i lha yi mtshan dag dang/ /ming dang gsang mtshan gzhug pa ni/ /sku gdung byin brlab
274b3(rgyud 'grel): snying po gzhug/ sreg shing la sogs me tog phreng/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis spras par bya/ /dbang bskur du ma gzhung bzhin bya/ /mchod pa phyi nang rtag tu dbul/ /gsal zhing ma 'dres thig le ste/ de las saM b+hyo ka ya lnga/ /de nyid mchod rten
274b4(rgyud 'grel): dag tu bstim/ /brgyud pa'i bla ma'ang de bzhin no/ /gtso bo 'khor gyis bskor ba ste/ shin tu gsal bar de bzhin bsgom/ /brgya stong nus tshad bzlas shing bskor/ /lha tshogs bla ma'i thugs ka nas/ /'od zer byung ba kun tu

274b7(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sdig pa 'dag /dag pas 'dod pa phyogs med 'phel/ /mdor bsdus phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub/ /rang sems chos sku lhar ldan pa/ /mchog dang thun mong 'di la sbyor/ /snod kyi bye brag ldan par sbyin/ /legs nyes rin chen bdug dang

278b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po snying rje'i bdag/ bskyed rim bsnyen pa'i dus bzhin bya/ /khyad par bum pa'i lha rnams bskyed/ /tshogs bsag sngon 'gro rjes 'jug rnams/ /bsnyen pa'i dus dang mthun par gsungs/ /khyad par ye shes sems dpa' bstim/ /sku gsung
278b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ /rigs kyi bdag po spyan drangs te/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur bum nang thim/ /thun mong sngags sam khyad par sngags/ /bzlas shin spro bsdu'i rim pa ni/ /snod bcud ye shes bcud bsdus nas/ /bum nang lha dang rdzas la
278b4(rgyud 'grel): thim/ /sngags la gtang de bzlas pa ni/ /lce ni hUm gis rdo rjer gyur/ /snying ga'i mtshan ma la sogs las/ /sngags kyi phreng ba brgyud mar 'khor/ /de las khro chung grangs med spros/ /bsregs gzir bcom gtags che bcad bskad/ /tshur 'dus pa
278b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'don rnams phyung/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas kyang/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /thun mtshams mchod bstod gtor ma gtang/ /sgrub pa thun nas bum pa yis/ /bdag gam gzhan la dbang bskur te/ /dngos grub rdzas par
278b6(rgyud 'grel): lha la dbul/ /lhag ma bdud rtsir bsams te bza' / /de nas yi ge brgya pas bshags/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i nga rgyal las/ /ji ltar zhi ba'i las rnams bya/ /po las
278b7(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes 'dab brgyad bskyed/ /gtso bo klu chen brgyad bsams te/ /rin chen snod du gtor ma bshams/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman blugs/ /sbyangs shing byin gyis brlabs byas te/ /klu la byan pas gdugs rtsub zhi/ /sngags bzlas
279a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ khyab ba'i rdzas kyis dug phyung ste/ /chos bshad khro bo'i che brjod pas/ /sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dran te/ /des na zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yang na mtshan ma bzang po 'byung/ /ngan na pogs pa'i cho ga
279a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de rjes zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya/ /gdon dang sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la/ /smag bshad pa la bo se'u yis/ /sngags bzlas lcug mas bya bas sam brabs?/ /'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir/ /glu rtsi gu
279a3(rgyud 'grel): gul mu zi dang/ /dri chen mi sha sbyang ki'i drun/ /bsregs pa'i dud pas skag cing 'phros/ /de ni khyad par klu la shis/ /de bzhin gzungs kyi las chogs rnams/ /ji ltar bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yis ma zlag bgegs rnams la//
279a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod dag gi las byas te/ /gnas ni gdug cing rtsub pa yi/ /gnod sbyin pho mo 'du ba'i ser/ /sde dpon chen po'i 'khrul 'khor bca' / /rig pa 'dzin pas lhor bltas te/ /gnag cing rtsub pa'i stan la 'dug/ gtsar du khyos pa'i
279a5(rgyud 'grel): sems ldan pas/ /dur khrod ro ras chen po la/ /khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya/ /rmyo byed tsha ba gsum gyis byug/ ni ma pa ga pur snag chal/ /rus chen dag gi smyu gu yis/ /'khrul 'khor rin gyis bca' ba ni/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad cu
279a6(rgyud 'grel): khyud bcas/ /re mig phyir bstan rtse mo nang/ /sde dpon lto bar 'khrul 'khor bri/ /khros pas mche gtsigs gnod sbyin 'jigs/ /sprul gnyis za zhing 'khor lo 'dzin/ /de bzhin steng 'og 'khor lo bri/ /mu byud dag la mdza' rten
279a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ /rtsigs la ya tshogs bcu drug bri/ /dbus su lhas byin gzugs bris te/ /mgo dang dbang po yan lag rnams/ /rtsibs mchan dag la rgyang zhing dgod do/ /snying gar nri dang lte bar dza/ /ming rnams go rim bzhin du bri/ /'khrul
279b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lcags kyi bum bar gzhug /bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom/ /bzlas ba'i sngags kyi rim pa yis/ /bkug ste gsum kha bcad gzir/ /sngags bzlas 'khrul 'khor dgongs pa yang/ /stong gcod me'i 'khor lo ste/ /me
279b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung drag po g.yon du 'khor/ /'og gcod rlung gi 'khor lo ste/ /drang zhing myur bar g.yas su 'khor/ /'khor lo spu gri chen po yis/ /lhas byin lus sems so so dbral/ /phung po mtshon cha'i 'khor los gtub/ /'khor lo tsha srang
279b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thabs pa'i sgra/ /'ur 'ur 'brug ltar sngags bzlas shing/ /khros pas rgyun du bskor ba ni/ klu chen brgyad po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nges par bsod na mnan dang bsreg / yang na nag po'i tshes brgyad nas/ /brtsams ta mthing nag 'brug khung?
279b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ /ling+ga 'khrul 'khor nang bcug la/ /rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed bya ste/ /sngags bzlas bkug ste rtags ldan na/ /sde dpen bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor du/ /bcug ste rdo rje 'am phur bu yis/ /dus drug 'khrul 'od shad du brdung/ /mngon spyod las
279b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams gang byed kyang/ /mchod rten nag por byug bya ste/ /gdug pa'i mchod yon la sogs bsham/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar/ /bdud rtsi sha lnga sna tshogs bkang/ /gtor ma sde dpon rnams la sbyin/ /thod tshon rnga
279b6(rgyud 'grel): brdung phrin las bcol/ /ling+ga drag po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na mnan pa'i las bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gzungs kyi las tshogs gang byed kyang/ /mchod rten sku mdung dang ldan par/ /rtag tu me tog sngon pos mchod/ /
279b7(rgyud 'grel): bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gzungs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /des ni las rnams thams cad 'grub/ /grub nas rtag tu mchod par bya/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po yi/ /gzungs sgrub 'di la nyes pa gang/ /gong ma rnams
280a1(rgyud 'grel): la bzod par gsol/ /bsod nams sems can kun la bsngo/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas ni/ /rig sngags 'chang 'drar gyur nas kyang/ /gdug pa'i nad las grol bar shog/
280a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje'i gzungs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po su bA gi shwa rakArti si mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur cing
280a3(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni no pi ka sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku/ /
280a4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul mdzad sprul sogs brgyan/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub pa yi ni go rim rnams/ /bla mas ji ltar gsungs pa ltar/ /man ngag brjed byang du
280a5(rgyud 'grel): bkol ba/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bsnyen 'dod pas/ /gnas ni dur khrod shing gcig gam/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khyim/ /bkra shis nyams dga' i gnas ngag tu/ /ma Na Da la sngon po legs byas la/ /me tog la sogs mchod rdzas dgraM/ /bde ba'i stan
280a6(rgyud 'grel): la rab 'dug ste/ /gdod la sogs pa khrus byas la/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /hUM yig las ni mdog nag pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rab bsgoms te/ /dpal ba'i nyams kyis yungs kar pa/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngags
280a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas khro bo'i sprul pa spro/ /gdug pa tshar bcad tshur 'dus pas/ /rdo rje gur dang ra bar gyur/ /de nas rang gi snying gar ni/ /a dkar zhu bas zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor nya gang lta bur bsam/ /de steng hUM sngon zhu ba las/ /rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga
280b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de yi bum par hUM sngon po/ /de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lhag pa lha dang bla ma rnams/ /spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir/ /phyag 'tshal mchod
280b2(rgyud 'grel): cing sdig bshags rnams/ /bdun po yongs su dag pa yis/ /tshig tu brjod de tshogs bsags bya/ /spyan drangs rnams ni gshegs su gsol/ /de nas ye shes chogs bsags phyir/ /phyi nang snod bcud 'od zhu nas/ /bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kar thim/ /de
280b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'od tu hUM la 'dus/ /hUM zhu zla chos thig ler thim/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung ba yi/ /sngags 'di yang dag brjod par bya/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ tshig gis don dang bcas par bsgom/ /chu
280b4(rgyud 'grel): las chu bur rdol pa'i tshul/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /raM las me yi kha dog lnga/ /dbus su paM las pad+ma bsam/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi steng du hUM sngon las/ /de zhu rdo rje sngon po ni/ 'od zer sngon po 'phro bar bsam/ /de yi bum par
280b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM sngon bsam/ /de las 'od zer hUM phra mo/ /'phros nas phyi nang snod bcud sbyangs/ /tshur 'dus rdo rje phra mor gyur/ /sngar gyi gnas su thim las/ /de zhu rdo rje sngon po na/ /nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam par bsam/ /de yi bum dkyil hUM sngon las/ de las 'od byung
280b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur spangs te/ /tshur 'dus phyag na rdo rje yi/ /sku ni phra mo'i tshul du 'dus/ /de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku/ /mdo nas ji ltar gsungs bzhin bsgom/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' i sku/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su bsgom pa ni/ /sku mdog nam mkha' 'od can/ /zhal gcig
280b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag kyang gnyis pa ste/ /spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs pa la/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdig mdzub/ /shin tu gdug cing khros pa ste/ /klu chen brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /stod g.yogs sngon po legs bsnabs shing/ /na bza' chos gos sngon po
281a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /smad g.yogs pa ti khra bo 'chang/ /stag gi smad g.yogs seng stong g.yegs/ /nyi zla'i steng na gar byed dgyes/ /bdag nyid dang ni sprul rgyan gyi/ /kha nas ha ha'i sbra sgrogs pas/ /log 'dren tshogs rnams 'joms par byed/ /de ltar khro
281a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rgyal por ni/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya/ /bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba rdo rje hUM/ /'phro 'dus ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /thugs kar nyi ma rdo rje hUM/ /sran ma nas tshad yungs 'bru la/ /rtsa ba'i
281a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskor bsam mo/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnas lngar gtug cing lus bsrungs bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra naM k+Sha tsa hUM/ rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis/ /sngags 'di brjod de brtan par bsam/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra naM badzra tsanDa ma hA re sha NA ya hUM/ lcags
281a4(rgyud 'grel): kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ /'og min gnas mchog dam pa yi/ /lcang lo can yi pho brang nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i
281a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang bdag 'phags pa gos sngon can/ /'khor bcas ma lus spyan 'dren gyis/ /'dir gshegs mchod pa dam par bzhes/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sa ma ya maN+Dal ma d+ha A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ tiSh+Tha ya tiSh+Tha
281a6(rgyud 'grel): ya/ a ba lo kA ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi nam mkha' bzhugs par bsam/ /snying ga'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi mchod/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha badzra pa Ni/ badzra puShpa pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ badzra d+hu pe hUM/ badzra a lo ke hUM/ badzra gand+he hUM/ badzra nai re
281a7(rgyud 'grel): dye hUM/ badzra gI ti/ ga ta ga ta hUM swA hA/ sngags dang tshigs bcad rab brjod pas/ /dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul/ /de nas bstong dang phrin las bcol/ /mdun du rta yi gtor ma la/ /a lA band+ha gzhal yas khang/ /thun mong gdan
281b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ma yin te/ /hUM yig las ni mdog gnag pa/ /las kyi sems dpar bskyed par bya/ /ri rab chen po'i lho shar nas/ /lcang lo can gyi skul tshig dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs
281b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' bstim par bya/ /spyi bo mgrin ba snying ga ru/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum rab bkod de/ /yi ge bcu gsum 'khor lo bsgom/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bak+tsat+ti badzra swa b+hA
281b3(rgyud 'grel): ba At+ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas bye snyed rnams/ /spyan drangs mchod dang sdigs bshags te/ /rjes su gnang ba gsum ldan gyis/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs gnyis
281b4(rgyud 'grel): med tham/ /oM sh+rI badzra bA Ni hUM mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan sarba bud+d+ha sa pa ri wA ra badzra sa ma ya hUM/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /thugs ka'i ting 'dzin sems dpa' la/ /gtad de sngags kyi phreng bas bskor/ /
281b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang las kyi sems dpa' la/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa rnams/ /ji lta bar ni gsal bar bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gsang sngags skyon spangs bzlas par bya/ /bsnyen dus lha
281b6(rgyud 'grel): la gtad de bzlas/ /sgrub pa'i dus su sngags la gtad/ /bzlas dus gzas ba po rnams la/ /gtad de sngags kyi 'phro 'du bya/ /de nas bdag dang rgyan cha yis/ /sbrul gyi kha nas sngags bzlas pas/ /me yi
281b7(rgyud 'grel): tshub ma dmar nag dang/ /khro bo grangs med 'phros pa las/ /de yis de dag bsrengs nas kyang/ /lhag ma las par gyur pa rnams/ /sbogs pa yi ni sgyor bas bsred/ /de ltar byas nas bsgom zhing bzlas/ /de
282a1(rgyud 'grel): nas dang po'i thun thon nas/ /skyo 'am dub na mchod byas te/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlabs de dbul/ /bstod dang phrin las bcol bar bya/ /ji ltar nye bar ma gyur bar/ /ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol/
282a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten sngon po dag la'o/ /thun ni gnyis dang gsum pa la/ /ye shes sems dpa' mchod pa dang/ /thun ni tha ma bsgom pa'i tshe/ /dang po'i thun ni mthun par gsungs/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya/ /de nas
282a3(rgyud 'grel): lngar ba'i dus dag tu/ /rig sngags las kyi lha la gtad/ /de ltar ma nor bsgom byas na/ /dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa/ /gang la dmigs de 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang ba dang/ /ye shes
282a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol/ /gshegs na dngos grub yal 'gyur bas/ /lha ni rgyun du 'khor ba yi/ /man ngag zhal las shes par bya/ /gtor ma bka' las phab nas ni/ /gta' yi bdag po mchod byas nas/ /gta'
282a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor bskul tshig bcas la gtang/ /bsgrub bya'i phyogs su dmar la ma brtan/ /gta' yi bdag po gshegs su gsol/ /las kyi sems dpa' bdag la bsdu/ /hUM hUM zhes bsdu mi dmigs bsgom/ /
282a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ma yin nga rgyal gyis/ /spyod lam ci bder gnas par bya/ /bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang gyur nas/ /drag po las la sbyar byas te/ /mchod rten
282a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po sku gdung ldan/ /me tog sngon po drir bsnyugs kyis/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing/ /bdag nyid gos sngon chas gon la/ /rak+Sha rus pa'i phreng ba bgrang/ /sngags ni brgya dang brgya lnga bcus/ /thun
282b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi ni rnal 'byor bya/ /rdo rje 'am seng ldeng phur ba la/ /gzugs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ /bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yi/ /drag sngags lnga bcu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /gzas pa po las bsnun gyur na/ /
282b2(rgyud 'grel): des ni las rnams thams cad 'grub/ /bdag gis 'di byas dge ba yis/ /blo chung rnams kyis don rtogs te/ /'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje thob par shog /phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag /
282b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kIrtis gzungs kyi 'grel pa ltar mdzad pa 'grel pa las gzungs sgrub thabs su mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsa ba rgya brtson
282b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grus seng ges bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ //nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na
282b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khro bo gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad klu rnams rgyan du mdzad/ /gtum zhing rngam pas gshin rje'i
282b6(rgyud 'grel): cha lugs 'dzin/ /khro rgyal gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir bri/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nye bar sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gnas dben zhing nyams dga' 
282b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sar? maN+Dal bya ba ni bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lus sngo ba/ sna nyeg pa khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ /shin tu khros pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pas len du bcug ste/ lho nub mtshams nas sngon po 'am nag po
283a1(rgyud 'grel): len du bcug la/ dri zhim pa'i chu la srung ba'i sngags bzlas te/ oM badzra pA Ni satwa artha sid+d+hi ku ru rak+Sha zhes btab la/ maN+Dal sngon po rgyar khru gang ba la/ dpangs su mtho gang brtsigs te/ tsan dan
283a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ a ka ru dang/ dza ti dang/ e la dang/ rams dang/ sa shing gi lo ma dri chus byugs la/ me tog sngon po 'am dri'i thig le bdun byas la/ mchod rdzas dgram par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs ltar lha dgu'i
283a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bsgom mo/ /de'ang sgrub thabs las rta bcas la mchod do zhes pa ni gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs 'di'o/ /dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rta gtor 'di la brten la rtag tu sgrub pa ni gtor ma'i snod
283a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i rgyu las byas te/ de'i nang du 'bras chan dang/ nas dang/ gro la sogs pa las gtor ma byas te/ spyan gzigs dang/ sha dang mar dang/ mngar la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o/ /de'i nang du thun mong dang thun mong
283a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa'i gdan bshams pa 'am bskyed par bya'o/ /la las ri rab bsams te/ de'i steng du ba las nyi ma/ paM las pad+ma bsam/ bdag nyid kyi thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros te/ bsgrub bya bkug te thun mong ma yin
283a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdan la bstim/ yang 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu'i tsha tsha 'phros bas lha dang phral la gcer bu byab thang la bor ba ltar bsam/ steng du hUM las gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bskyed do/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal cig phyag
283a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon rtse gsum 'phan can 'phyar ba/ bzhin khros pa/ smin ma glog stong 'od du 'gyur ba/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bcings pa ste/ rin po che dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ mig 'bras hUM las me'i phung bo 'dra gzhi?
283b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ha ha dang hUM hUM gi sgra sgogs pas khams gsum pa rgyal bar byed pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis sku la rnam par brgyan pa sku che la yan yag rags pa/ ri rab la rnam par bzhugs pa ste/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang la/
283b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu bar snang gi khams na 'phyo ba/ 'khor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba cig bskyed do/ /de ci 'dra bar cig ri rab rtse la spyan drangs la phyag btsal /mchod pa dbul/ bdun rnam dag bya ste/
283b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab ste/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa gnyis su med par bstims la/ gta' bdag las kyis gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje drag po'i sgo nas thugs rjes bzhugs pas gzas pa po'i nyon
283b4(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas bzhugs te/ drag po drag pos sgrol bar bsam mo/ /de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM
283b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA Ni h+rI da ya Na hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal ldan gnod sbyin gyi yang snying yin pas bsnyen pa'i dus su bdun 'bum nyi khri gdon no// / //mtshan ma bzang ba dang?
283b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa la 'jug ste/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis thugs ka'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas las kyi gnod sbyin gyi thugs dam bskul te 'od zer dmar po me'i
283b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od lta bu byung ste/ gzas pa po bsreg pa dang sdig pa la sogs pa sbyangs te/ /slar bdag nyid kyi thugs kar thim par bsam oM ya k+Sha nI lAM ba ra
284a1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye a mu ka sya mA ra ya hUM phaT zhes sngags (bzlas pas zhal nas sngags) kyi phreng ba me'i 'od dang bcas te las kyi lha'i zhal du thim/ thugs
284a2(rgyud 'grel): ka nas 'thon te /slar bdag nyid kyi snying gar thim ste sngags kyis phreng bas bskor bas gzas pa po sngags kyi phreng bas bsregs shing 'dul bar bya'o/ sgrub pa rtags bzang ba dang las la
284a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te/ rgyud las kyang 'og tu me'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ me 'bar klong chen dkyil du gzir/ /bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis/ /gdul bya'i steng du
284a4(rgyud 'grel): dbab par bya zhes gsungs pas bsregs bskrad bcom btags par bsam/ dmar lam bstan pa ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa bya zhing drag sngags bzlas te/ tadya
284a5(rgyud 'grel): thA bud+hha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha mahA pra bta/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ nA ga nAM/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda/ nA ga h+ri da ya ni b+hinda b+hinda/ nA ga d+ha mA ni/
284a6(rgyud 'grel): bas? mand+ha nAM ga sha rA ra ni/ bi spho Ta ya/ nA ga ya nA ni ta dya tha hUM phaT/ /nA ga bi d+ha ra na ya hUM phaT nA ga uts+tsha Ta nA hUM phaT/ /nA ga mA ra na sod sod/ /nA ga mA ra bying bying/ nA ga mA
284a7(rgyud 'grel): ra na mugs mugs/ nA ga mA ra na ha la ha la/ nA ga mA ra na shig shig /nA ga mA ra na du na du na/ nA ga mA ra na myos myos/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mi yengs mi myur bar smra ba bcad do/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs
284b1(rgyud 'grel): ba gsal la /drag par bya'o/ /kha zas kyi dus la bab pa 'am ldang bar 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' phye la mchod pa 'bul /gtor ma bsngo/ bstod pa bya/ las kyi lha la gtor ma dbul
284b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i hUM las a las ban d+ha'i 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du raM las me gru gsum/ de'i steng du hUM gsum/ de'i steng du ban d+ha'i gzhal yas khang /
284b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ yaM las rlung byung/ me 'bar/ me thod pa bskol/ sha lnga bdud rtsir gyur pas mchod /rtsa sngags la ba laM ta khA hi zhes btags la
284b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ las kyi dus su gtor ma sha khrag tu dmigs la dbul/ rtsa sngags la ma ma sarba sha truM btags la dbul/ skabs su gtor mas bskul/ /
284b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gnyid log gam /kha zas dus la bab na las kyi lha la thugs dam gtad/ rag sngags dbul/ gta'i gtor ma gtor na bka' 
284b6(rgyud 'grel): las phab lo no pi ka ltang bskul tshig dang bcas la gtang ngo/ /gta' bdag gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa bdag la bsdu/ gnod
284b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub ba'i thabs/ gta'i gtor ma'i gdams ngag slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
285a1(rgyud 'grel): */ (/phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i man ngag bzhugs so//) /rgya gar skad du/ tsakra u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor sngon bsnyen byas pas/ /drag po'i las la
285a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bya ste/ /las sbyor cis kyang ma thul na/ /'khor lo'i las la 'jug par bya/ /sbyor ba 'di la zhugs gyur na/ /brlag par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshon yin te/ /rtse gcig
285a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas 'grub pa las/ /kun gyis 'grub par mi nus so/ /'di ni zhe sdang 'khor lo ste/ /drag po 'khrugs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /dmigs na lha 'ang brlag par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs brtol
285a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /gzugs sngags drag po'i 'khrul 'khor 'dis/ /myur du bsgrims te bsgral ba na/ /nam mkha' nyid kyang 'jig 'gyur na/ /bsgrub bya'i rnam shes smos ci dgos/ /'di ni dgug pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /sga tsha thal chen grog mo'i zhing/ /bong
285a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i spangs dang sa gnyan la/ /klu rigs rnams kyi gzugs bya ste/ /snying po til dang ming bcug la/ /dgug pa'i dgos pa 'di ltar bya/ /tha ma'i phaT las dza(rgyud 'grel): 'phros te/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las lcags kyu'i dbyings byung nas/ /bsgrub bya'i rnam
285a6(rgyud 'grel): shes bkug par bsam/ /khugs nas sgrub pa'i las la 'jug /de nas gsung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam/ /stong nyid ngang las e las ni/ /mthing ga gru gsum chos 'byung dbus/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /ri las me
285a7(rgyud 'grel): ri lnga yi dbus/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo bskyed par bya/ /bruM badzra tsakra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ bruM las srid pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /spu gri gcod pa'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /badzra rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ /me 'bar dpal dang bcas par bsam/ /tsakra phyogs
285b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje ra ba'i 'khor lo bsgom/ /rak+Sha zhes pas steng bsrung ba'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /hUM rnams las ni bde gshegs sku/ /cho ga yan lag gsum gyis bskyed/ /thugs kar ye shes
285b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsgom/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka ru/ /nyi steng dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod/ /mu khyud rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor/ /bde gshegs bka' dang dam tshig las/ /mi 'da' ba yi 'khor lo la/ /zil gyis mnan pa'i sngags
285b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dgod/ /phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i 'khor lo la/ /gnad la dbab pa'i sngags rnams dgod/ /rdo rje srid pa'i 'khor lo la/ /tshar bcad pa yi sngags rnams bsam/ /byin brlabs srung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus/ /mi
285b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod zhe sdang rdo rje ste/ /mthing nag sdigs mdzub rdo rje bcas/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung nyi zla'i gdan/ /'khor lo yi ni rtsibs dag la/ /bcom ldan gtum po khros pa'i sku/ /rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas/ /zhal nas sngags  
285b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgra sgrogs pas/ /log 'dren tshogs rnams 'joms par byed/ /de ltar 'khor lo chen po bsgom/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /mchod bstod sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis de la bstim/ /sku gsung
285b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /rjes su gnang ba sum ldan gyis/ /chos kyi rgyal bor dbang bskur te/ de nas 'khor lo bskor 'dod na/ /thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs dam bskul/ /de las
285b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros sngags la phog /sngags las 'od 'phros 'khor lo bskul/ /'khor lo 'od zer 'bar ba yis/ /steng 'og phyogs mtshams 'khor lo bskor/ /thub cing rab tu bsreg par bsam/ /bdag nyid kyis ni sngags bzlas pas/
286a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis 'khor lo rim par bskor/ /gzas pa po yi snying ga ru/ /yi yis bskyod de hUM gis bsdu/ /phaT kyis rnam par 'thor zhing bsreg /srid pa rdo rje'i 'khor los gtubs/ /phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i
286a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo yis/ /phog na thams cad brlag par 'gyur/ /tsit+ta thugs kyi sgrub pa ste/ /shin tu gnod na brten la bskor/ /skabs su gnod na dgug cing bskor/ /bskor nas brlag par gdon mi za/ /'khrul 'khor 'di yi
286a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags dang/ /byad dang bka' nyan pho nya dang/ /'khor lo'i ting 'dzin la sogs rnams/ /gnod sbyor thams cad 'jig byed cing/ /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcod/ /rig
286a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags drag po'i gzungs sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su bA gi shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya bod gnyis la grags par gyur pa yis/ /mdo sngags don la mkhas
286a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i di paM ka ra la/ sgra sgyur bod nam mkhas pa'i rgyal po brtson seng ges bka' bas nyams su blangs nas rin chen gser gyis zhus// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra kalpaM ba liM ta bi d+hi nA ma /
286a6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon dang ni sgrub pa po/ /bsnyen pa dang ni sgrub ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg dang/ /gzhan yang lha rnams
286a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes ba dang/ /bgegs zhi ba dang nyams pa bskang/ /'khrul 'khor tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang/ /phan gdags pa dang tshar bcas dang/ /dgar dang gsang dang dgug pa dang/ /gzir dang bcing dang mnan pa dang/ /rgyas dang bsdus
286b1(rgyud 'grel): dang shin tu bsdus/ /zhi dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang/ /rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyis/ /las rnams nye bar 'grub ba dang/ /thun mong mchog dang dngos grub dang/ /bsod nams chen po thob bya'i phyir/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu
286b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi nya stong ngam/ /yang na rgyun nam dus drug tu/ /rtag tu gtor ma'i las rnams bya/ /rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga/ /'bru dang shing rtog sman rnams dang/ /chan thug khur ba dkar gsum mngar/ /sha khrag rus pa
286b3(rgyud 'grel): snying sna rnams/ /dgra 'am 'byung po bgegs kyi gzugs/ /sbrul dang sbal ljong nya sha rnams/ /de sogs drag po'i thun rdzas so/ /cho ga gsum 'aM skad cig mas/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams bskyed byas la/ /tshogs bsags sngon 'gro rjes
286b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug rnams/ /bsnyen sgrub dus dang mthun par bya/ /bdag mchod lha rnams mnyes bya'i phyir/ /mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la/ /rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang byas te/ /yaM las rlung steng ri me spar/ /de steng a las ka pA lar/ /de 'og ye
286b5(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga ldan gsum/ /go ku da ha na las ni/ /lcags kyu lnga po bskyed par bya/ /bi mu ma ra shu las ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bskyed/ /dpa' bo lnga yis rab sbyangs te/ /zla steng oM las rdo rje hUM/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /
286b6(rgyud 'grel): snga bskyed med spar rdzas rnams bskol/ /'od kyis ri bong rtse lnga zhu/ /thim pas bdud rtsi'i ngo bor gnas/ /ye shes lnga yi yig 'bru las/ /'od kyis gang ga'a'i klung sogs kyi/ /bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags
286b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /lhag pa'i lha dang bla ma dang/ /dkon mchog gsum dang chos skyong rnams/ /lce yi rdo rjes bdud rtsi len/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra ni pA Ni ba liM ta i daM g+hih+na g+hih+na khA hi/ bA hi b+huM dza ho ba liM ta khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu
287a1(rgyud 'grel): khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A dya nutpan+na twA ta oM(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bsnyen pa'i dus su dbul lo/ /de rjes sgrub pa'i dus dag tu/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /a las ban d+ha'i nang dag tu/ /maM las sha yi phung po
287a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /keM las rus pa'i pho brang las/ /ra las rak+ta'i rgya mtsho bskyil/ /sha khrag rus par byin brlabs la/ /dug gsum dmar gyi mchod pa 'di/ /drag po'i sngags 'dis dbul bar bya/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA ni/ ma ma
287a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba sha truM a mu ka'i madzdza me/ pA sa maM sa dzI baM bu gaM ru b+hi ra prI ya ku ru b+hak+Sha ni i daM ba liM grih+Na grih+Na khA hi khA hi b+huM dza ho/ rak+ta pI ba ta a ti kra ma sa ma ye swA hA zhes sgrub pa'i dus su'o/ /las sbyor drag po'i dus dag tu/ /rta yi
287a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /sbal lcong nya sha'i gtor ma bsham/ /gzas pa po yi ling ga la/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed bya ste/ /bkug ste gru gsum kha bcad gzir/ /'jig rten 'das
287a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ma 'das pa'i/ /las kyi gnod sbyin tshogs la dbul/ /yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye che mo'i srog la shag shag ma ma sarba sha trUM a mu ka zhes dbul lo/ /de nas bstod cing smon lam  
287a6(rgyud 'grel): btab/ /thod chen rnga brdung phrin las bcol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po yis/ /rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /go bgo lus bsrung brtan par bya/ /rang nyid nga rgyal ci bder gnas/ /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi
287a7(rgyud 'grel): gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su bA gi shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni no pa ka sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/
287b1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi gsang sngags dbye ba bshad/ /oM nas swAhA bcu bdun bar/ /gtsol bsnyen pa dbul ba'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs dag la//
287b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bum du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas/ /myur du bsad pa'i las la 'jug /klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gsogs/ /gzhan yang gnod sbyor mdza' dag rnams/ /bzlog cing mi tshugs bya ba'i phyir/ /las kyi gnod sbyin sgrub thabs brtsam/ /sngags
287b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nag po'i sgrub pa la/ /sngags kyang du ma rnam pa bzhi/ /bod pa sbad pa bsad dang mchod/ /gdams ngag can gyis nan tan bya/ /oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha/ badzra d+ha ra badzra khaDga d+ha ra/ badzra kha la rU pa sha d+ha ra/ badzra tsakra d+ha ra/ nA ga mA rA
287b4(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha/ badzra d+ha ra nA ga rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha khaDga d+ha ra nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha kha la ru pA sha d+ha ra nA ga mA rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha tsakra d+ha ra nA ga mA rA ya hUM
287b5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha hUM/ ha ra ha ra nA ga naM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga naM/ che ge mo mA ra ya sod sod/ nA ga mA ra ya bying bying/ nA ga mA ra ya mugs mugs/ na ga mA rA ya shig shig /nA ga mA rA ya myogs myogs/ /nA ga mA rA
287b6(rgyud 'grel): ya du na du na/ nA ga mA rA ya thum rI la dza/ oM badzra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha badzra d+ha ra badzra khaDga d+ha ra kha la ru pA sha d+ha ra tsakra d+har/ yak+Sha kro d+ha che ge mo'i srog la shag shag /ma mi sarba sha trUM/ a mu ki ya madzdza ma d+ha/ b+ha sa mAM sa dzI bi bu ga ru dA?
287b7(rgyud 'grel): ra brI yaM btak+Sha ni ba liM i daM grih+Na grih+Na khA hi khA hi b+huny+dza ho/ rak+ta pi ba ho/ mA ti kra ma sa ma ye swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bzhi'i sgrub thabs thun mong ma yin pa gu ru su bA gI shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta
288a1(rgyud 'grel): dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsa ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o// //dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bye snyed kyis/ /rjes gnang las kyi khro bor dbang bskur
288a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /mthu stobs bdag po gdug pa'i gnyen po la/ /dang bas phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i go rim bri/ /dang por gnas dang dkyil 'khor bsham/ /mchod rten sngon po bum pa bcas/ /gta' bcas mchod rdzas tkhrus byas la/ /mchod
288a3(rgyud 'grel): rten sngon po bum pa dang/ /gta' gtor mchod yon byin gyis brlab/ /sems bskyed snod bcud sngags kyis sbyang/ /tshogs bsags mgron gyi lha rnams gshegs/ /bgegs bskrad mtshams bcad tshad med bsgom/ /stong nyid
288a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la 'byung rnams bskyed/ /ri rab steng du srung 'khor bsgom/ /de dkyil gzhal yas khang dang gdan/ /yig 'bru rnams las lha rnams bskyad/ /thugs kar ye shes 'khor lo bsgom/ /byin brlabs lus bsrung
288a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug gdan dbul/ /phyag 'tshal mchod bstod sdig bshags bstim/ /byin rlabs 'od zer gsum 'phro 'du/ /dbang bskur lha rnams spyan drangs mchod/ /sdig bshags gzungs
288a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar rjes gnang bya/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs de nyid bstim/ /lce ni byin brlabs skyon spangs bzlas/ /bsnyen dus lhar gtad spro bsdu bya/ /thun mtshams phye la mchod gtor btang/ /gshegs gsol bskyed bsdu mi dmigs
288a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /bsnyen pa rtags ldan dngos grub blang/ /rta gtor nam gung tho rangs dus/ /dbang bskur rgyas gdab bum lha gshegs/ /lus bsrung spyod lam rnal 'byor bya/ /rtags rnams sgyu ma lta bu gzung/ /de don gzhan la smra
288b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /sgrub thabs gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag 'di/ /tshig rkang sum cus de nyid don bsdus nas/ /shes par byed pa'i don 'grol sgron ma 'di/ /byas pa'i dge ba sems can kun la bsngo/ /nongs pa mchis na 'phags pas bzod par
288b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /slob dpon gsung gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs sku gsum sras bcas kyis/ /rjes gnang las kyi khro
288b3(rgyud 'grel): bor dbang bskur ba'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dug dgra dregs 'joms la/ /dad bas phyag 'tshal sgrub thabs go rim bri/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi/ /bsnyen rdzogs dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/ /gnas dang phyogs dang sngon 'gro bya/ /brig? dang
288b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon dgyes phyag 'tshal dgod/ /khyad par rdzas gsog bum pa bca' / /dngos grub rten dang mchod rdzas bsham/ /sdom bsrung smyung gnas chos gos brgyan/ /tshogs bsag sngon 'gro rjes 'jug dang/ /bskyed rim mchod pa bsnyen dus bzhin//
288b5(rgyud 'grel): bum nang lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs bum nang thim/ /gzungs thag btags te rig sngags bzlas/ /steng dang 'og gi lam gnyis las/ /thun mong khyad par spro bsdu bya/ /khri phrag bdun du dngos grub blang/ /dbang
288b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur mchod bstod gshegs su gsol/ /bskyed bsdu spyod lam rnal 'byor bya/ /de rjes sgrub pa thon pa dang/ /zhi dang bskrad dang 'khrul 'khor dang/ /sbyor ba bdun pas las la sbyar/ /sgrub pa'i go rim/ slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kirtis
288b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ka la sha sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa'i dgrar gyur mi shigs 'dzin//
289a1(rgyud 'grel): khro rgyal spyi bos rab btud nas/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan bya'i phyir/ /buM pa'i sgrub pa bri bar bya/ /maN+Dal sngon po'i steng dag tu/ /rdzas rnams mngon par 'dus byas la/ /bdag nyid yid dam lhar bskyed de/ /bum
289a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ye shes gzhal yas su/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga/ /rin chen lnga dang dri chu lnga/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor byin brlabs la/ /cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed de/ /de nas sgrub po'i gnas mal bca' / /gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pa yis//
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang lha ru 'brel bar bya/ /spro ba gsung gi rang bzhin la/ /bsdu bsngags kyi yan lag yin/ /skyo bar gyur na gzungs thag gzung/ /steng dang 'og gi lam gnyis la/ /brten pas mtshan ma 'byung par 'gyur/ /med na las
289a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /de yis 'bras bu 'byin par byed/ /'di ni bum pa'i sgrub pa ste/ /lam brtan bzlas pa'i sgor 'jug yin/ /dbang bskur ba dang khrus la sogs/ /gang byas dngos grub 'byung bar byed/ /snod ldan rnams kyis 'di
289a5(rgyud 'grel): yi don/ /rtogs nas thun mong mchog thob shog /bum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tat+twa pra dI pa nA ma/ /bod skad du/ de kho na
289a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid sgrol ma zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthu stobs kun gyi bdag po ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bsnyen sgrub las sbyor la sogs pa'i/ /rtags kyi rim pa bri bar bya/ /de la rtags ni bzhi
289a7(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /lha grub gdon rnams thub pa dang/ /nad phyir byung dang mi ldog pa'o/ /lha ni nye bar grub gyur na/ /yang dag rtags dang bdud kyi rtags/ /rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya/ /dang po rnam pa gsum yin te/ /mngon sum
289b1(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam nyams myong ngo/ /dbang po'i mngon sum dag tu yang/ /lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan gzugs/ /rten dang lus las 'od byung ba/ /mig gis mthong ngam nyams su 'byung/ /rna bas dag pa'i gsang sngags thos/ /des ni dngos grub
289b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka 'byung/ /'bring ni rmi lam gsal po la/ /dngos dang phyag 'tshal mchod rten dang/ /me tog sngo dang khye chung sngo/ /bla ma sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ /ri bo 'dzeg dang lha yul mthong/ /dngos grub 'grub tu nye ba ste/ /bsnyen pa'i
289b3(rgyud 'grel): rtags su shes par bya/ /rang gi nyams su 'byung ba ni/ /lus la srog chags sngar bas ni/ /phyi dang nang du nyung ba dang/ /rig pa shin tu bde ba dang/ /nyon mongs rnam rtag shas chung ba'o/ /gong du bstan pa de rnams kyang/ /yang na 'jigs dang
289b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dang/ /kha dog skya la mdangs med dang/ /'od kyang so zhing mi rtag dang/ /nam gung man chad rmi lam ni/ /sad nas 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba/ /bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya/ /sngar gyi rtog pa sangs pa ni/ /nad rnams phyi la thon
289b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtogs/ /gzugs brnyan bsregs par thal bar gyur/ /dgra bo yul nas thon gyi rmi/ /'og tu bcug pas dngos po brlab/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags yin te/ /de rnams las bzlog ngan pa yi/ /rtags su nges par shes par bya//
289b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di la rten nas 'dir zhugs rnams/ /'di yis dngos grub thob par shog /de kho na nyid sgrol ma zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kirtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag
289b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen sgrub rtags dang ldan gyur nas/ /spur zhing gsang pa'i las dag brtsam/ /de yang las tshogs bsdus pa las/ /zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la/ /smag shad bal po me'u yi/ /sngags bzlas bcug mas bya bas sam
290a1(rgyud 'grel): brabs/ /'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir/ zhes pa ni spur bsad kyi sbyor ba'o/ /de'ang spur ba ni bskrad pa'i las te/ /thog mar rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyis zhugs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid brtags la/ nad rnams 'byung
290a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing gdon pa gdon par bya ba'i thabs ni/ rgyal po bram ze rje rigs kyi/ /gzhon nu gtsang ma shar bltas te/ /dkon mchog gsum dang gos sngon la/ /phyag btsal sems bskyed smyag shad blang/ /dag byed sngags bzlas chus bsangs la/ /
290a3(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar rma bya tshon skud bcings/ /bya ba pa'i rjes te rtag tu bcad/ /de nas rin chen snod dag tu/ /gtso bo klu chen brgyad pa dang/ /rigs drug rigs bzhi'i sa bdag gnyan/ /gzugs brnyan byas te klu sman dang/ /dkar gsum rin chen
290a4(rgyud 'grel): dar zab bcas/ /shing snas mdza' bskor mtshon lngas brgyan/ /gzhan yang mchod rdzas thams cad bsog /rig pa 'dzin pa sgrub thabs ltar/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs bya/ /gtso bo gdan gyi klu brgyad las/ /paM las 'dab
290a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad naM gyis mtshan/ /de gyur sprul lam klu chen brgyad/ /btsun mo sras bcas blon po dang/ /sprul pa yang sprul rnams bskyed la/ /de dang 'dra ba bkug bstim mchod/ /dbang bskur gtor ma byin brlabs sbyin/ /oM nA ga rA dza pa
290a6(rgyud 'grel): su tak+Sha ka kar/ ko pad ma ma hA pad ma shaM kha pa la g+he la g+he'u hu lu hu lu ta ge ni ba li i daM grih+na grih+na khA hi khA hi/ gtor ma byin pas gdug rtsub zhi/ /de nas bdag nyid khro bor bsgom/ /gzungs sngags bzlas shing lcug mas
290a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ nA ga rA dza ba su gi h+ri daM da ra ya phud phud/ /dza ye phu/ bi dza ye phu/ dzi ti dzi ti phu/ dzi ti i ge phu/ sa ma ya phu/ shaM ka ru te phu/ a la u ga te phu gra he ka ra phu/ sa ma ya phu/ nA ga sarba ni phu/ h+ri daM d+ha rA ya phud
290b1(rgyud 'grel): phur/ nad pa la byabs gzugs la dbab/ /dug phyung khro bo'i che brjod la/ /zla dkyil steng bzhag yaM las bskyod do/ /nA ga spha ra Na phaT zhes/ klu pro bsgag cing dam tshig bsgag /gzungs brgya bzlas la spur zhing bskrad/ /de ltar brgya 'am
290b2(rgyud 'grel): stong byas na/ /klu yi nad las grol bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan sa 'am chu bor dor/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal te/ /zhi dang spur bas mi thul zhing/ /rig sngags 'chang gi bka' 'das na/ /de la 'jigs pa'i las brgyad brtsam/ /grogs
290b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khar bdud chad tshub ma yin/ /sa las mthing nag gru gsum brtsigs/ /zur gsum lcags kyu'i rtsags mas mtshan/ /dbus su ling ga sngon dmar gyis/ /bcings te byang bcug phur la gtor/ /mgyogs phur rtsar dang phur pas
290b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /bye tshan gze ma yungs kar dang/ /tsha la zangs lcags dur blug bcas/ /dmar gtor du ga gtor dug thun bsham/ /gru gsum dur khrod g.yam pas bcas/ /dur khrod ras la nam mkha' lding/ /gser mdog zhal gsum phyag
290b5(rgyud 'grel): drug gis/ /ba su ta yi klu rnams 'dzin/ /spyan mig nyi zer rdo rje'i mchu/ /'khor lo'i bzhug sgro ral gri'i gshog /lus rnams rdo rje'i spu yis gtams/ /de 'dra rgyal rigs kha bstan gzhag /khra spyang nya khrag can gzan gyi/ /mche
290b6(rgyud 'grel): sder la sogs chu rnams bsog /drag po'i mchod yon bsham byas la/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rnams/ /na ra'i gos gyon gos sngon gyis/ /so so'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas/ /bsnyen sgrub spur dang gsang sngags bzlas/ /
290b7(rgyud 'grel): zhi bas dug phyung gsad pa yi/ /rtse gcig bsgoms te brtson 'grus kyis/ /bar chad med par las la sbyar/ /nag po'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ /zhi ba byams pa snying rje bsgom/ /gzungs kyi sngags dang shAn+ti bzlas/ /nad dang
291a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug go rtsub zhi bar bsam/ /spur ba gong du bstan pa bzhin/ /gsad pa'i sbyor ba'i drag sngags ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa hUM yig las/ /gyur te nag po char sprin mdog /smin mtshams dpral bsdus ha ha bzhad/ /rdo
291a2(rgyud 'grel): rje tshar gcod sdigs mdzub bcas/ /de 'drir bsgoms te yungs kar la/ /sngags bzlas tshangs pa'i gnas su brab/ /shi sa drag po 'di yis gdab/ yak+Sha nI lAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM/ mahA yakA se nA pa ta yi/ /de ba ku ru shan da ra/
291a3(rgyud 'grel): thog thog thog ril thog thog dang byams sad/ che ge mo'i lus la rum rum/ snying la shag shag ma ma shAn+te rbang pu nan ti ta sri rbang pu nan/ nA ga sa khrag pu mo mA ra ya phaT/ yungs kar dang ni yungs nag se tshe dang/ /che la zangs
291a4(rgyud 'grel): lcags bye tsha na char/ /gnam lcags drag po'i sngags des brdeg /gcan zan mche sder bya khra'i mchu/ /mkha' lding rgyal po'i sngags bzlas brab/ /kI la ya dang bcas pa'i sngags/ /dus drug phur pas gzir bar bya/ /'og
291a5(rgyud 'grel): nas drag po'i rdzas kyis bdug /smag shang bal po se'u yis/ /lcug mas brdzeg cing rig sngags bzlas/ /g.yas nas gsad cing g.yon nas spur/ /mi bzad rdzas kyis de la byug /gag pa lhag pa byung ba bzhin/ /drag po'i sngags
291a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis de la gdab/ /bdun nam rtsa gcig bdun tsho bdun/ /de la sogs te bsgrubs gyur na/ /nA ga rA dza ka ra ko Ta/ des zin pa yang grol 'gyur nges/ /phyag na rdo rje'i las bsdus 'di/ /paN+Di ta rnams kyis mdzad las/ /mi ma yin rnams
291a7(rgyud 'grel): skrag cing brgyal/ /des na rnam smin sdig pa'i rgyu/ /de phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs/ /dpal lag na rdo rje'i spur gsad las tshogs bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su pA gI shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
291b1(rgyud 'grel): ta dya thA/ oM bi bu le pra bA ra nA ga /mahA nA ga hyid? ya/ ya pa ra te/ dzwa la dzwa la sarba nA DI ta ya ni/ ki mI ki mI/ nA ga ku la pi d+hwaM? sa ni ha na ha na sarba nA ga duSh+Ta Di ta ya ni/ da ha da ha sarba puSh+TaM/ na ga d+ha pa na ni/ pa tsa pa tsa ya sarba puSh+TaM/
291b2(rgyud 'grel): nA ga naM/ a kra ma a kra ma sa mu twa/ sA ga ra tsa ma le/ bI kri mA ma hA nA ga ti dza ba re swAhA/ zhes nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i drag sngags kyis bsad pa'o/ /oM na me bud d+hA ya/ badzra kI li ki lA ya/ nA ga du tsunde mi li mi li/ ban d+ha
291b3(rgyud 'grel): ban d+ha nA ga na swAhA zhes phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM tsa ta tsa ta/ bi tsa ta bi tsa ta/ sha ta sha ta/ bi sha de/ nA ga pi shad swAhA/ klu 'bros pa'i sngags so// /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//
291b4(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su bsnyen par 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin bas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar sa bslang ba dang/ gnas brtsig pa dang/ /dgos pa'i yo byad dang/ mthun pa'i sbyor ba dang/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bsogs la sngon du 'gro ba'i?
291b5(rgyud 'grel): las bya ste/ dang por dkon mchog mchod/ de nas chos skyong dang rigs drug la sbyin/ gtor ma rgya chen po gtang/ de nas bsam gtan khang pa byi dor byas te/ /me tog gcal du bkram la rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te/ de'i byas
291b6(rgyud 'grel): su maN+Dal sngon po gru bzhi pa zhig gi steng du/ mchod rten sngon po sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs te/ mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang/ gta' gtor dang/ bum pa bca' thabs rdzogs par byas la dang por ??
291b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pa nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la/ de nas a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarbba d+harmA ta badzra
292a1(rgyud 'grel): sid d+hi hUM/ zhes pas snod bcud dang rdzas thams cad dag pa chen por bsam mo/ /hUM de nyid las skad cig tu lha'i nga rgyal du gnas pa'i hUM las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ bla ma dang/ lhag pa'i lha dang/ dkon mchog spyan
292a2(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ e hye hi b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ bu d+d+ha/ d+harma/ saM g+ha/ badzra pA Ni/ mahA gu ru/ badzra sa ma ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam pa mdun du byon par bsam mo/ /pad+ma sa ma ya stwaM zhes
292a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan dbul lo/ /phyag btsal ba dang/ mchod pa dbul ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ lus dbul zhing
292a4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o/ /de nas yi ge brgya pas tshogs sogs lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): big+h+nAM ta kri ta hUM zhes pas bdag nyid bgegs dgra'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yungs kar la sngags bzlas te/
292a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i sprul par spro ste oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM/ sarba big+h+nAM ta kri ta hUM phaT zhes phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcur sngags bdun bdun dang bcas te mtshams bcad par bya'o/ /na mo ratna tra ya yA/
292a6(rgyud 'grel): na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ mahA daMShDotka Da b+hai ru pA ya/ a si mu sa la/ b+ha rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sha hasta/ tadya thA/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/
292a7(rgyud 'grel): tadya thA/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ gardza gardza/ paM spho Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM/ paM dzA ya ga /mahA ga Ne/ dza bi taM/ ta ka rA ye swAhA/ zhes mtshon
292b1(rgyud 'grel): cha'i char phab la btul zhing spyod par bya'o/ /de nas khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya'o snyam pa ni snying rje tshad med pa'o/ /bde ba la dgod par bya'o snyam pa ni byams pa tshad med pa'o/ /bde ba dang
292b2(rgyud 'grel): nam duAng mi 'bral bar bya'o snyam pa ni dga' ba tshad med pa'o/ /de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa ni btang snyoms tshad med pa'o/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM zhes pa stong pa nyid du bsams la/
292b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i ngang las e las chos 'byung gru gsum pa'i dbus su yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ khaM las gser gyi sa gzhi/ raM las me ri lnga'i dbus su/ laM las ri rab kyi steng du/ saM yongs
292b4(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i gur dang/ rab dang/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i dbus su/ bruM sngon po 'phros 'dus pa las gzhal yas khang sngon po gru bzhi/
292b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo khyud dang ldan par bsgom mar bya'o/ /tsa ser po las 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i dbus su paM las pad+ma/ ma las nyi ma/ a las dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM mthing nag bsams/ 'od 'phros pa las 'phags pa mchod/ /
292b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don byas nas snang ba thams cad rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur te/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog sngon po 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnam par 'khrug pa lte ba hUM gi mtshan par bsam mo/ /de'i
292b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi khro bo'i rigs rnams bkug nas de dag yongs su gyur pa las/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung phrag 'bum bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba mche ba gtsigs 
293a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang 'tsham pa 'am/ sku mdog sngon po g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon sdigs mdzub klu chen brgyad kyis bzungs nas byung ba ltar brgyan pa/ stag gi sham thabs dang/ na bza' chos gos sngon po dang/ seng+ge
293a2(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs dang/ /gdan dbang po dang/ nyi ma dang/ pad+ma'i steng na klu chen po brgyad nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang bcas pa yang dag par bskyod do/ /de nyid kyi snying kar ye shes sems dpa' i 'khor lo gos sngon can
293a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /dbang po drug la'ang de dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can re bsam par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i hUM las hUM re 'khor lo'i steng du gnas pa las phyag 'tshan tri shUl dang/ ral gri
293a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dbyug to dang/ 'khor lo hUM gis mtshan par gyur te/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las shar gyi 'khor lo'i steng du las kyi gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon tri shUl rtse gsum 'phan can
293a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar ba/ na bza' mi bzang sngo bkra gsol ba/ gdan klu rgyal rigs mnan pa'i/ /lhor rdo rje srin po g.yas rdo rje g.yon ral gri na bza' pad+ma rA ga /gdan bram ze'i rigs can mnan pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje gdon
293a6(rgyud 'grel): chen g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon dbyug to/ /gdan rje rigs mnan pa/ na bza' za hor btsan dmar gsol ba'o/ /byang gi 'khor lo'i steng du rdo rje ro longs g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon 'khor lo na bzla ba ti khra bo gdan klu
293a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar rigs mnan pa'o/ /sde dpon de dag sku mdog gtso bo dang mthun pa/ klu rnams rgyan mdzad pa/ bskal pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bsgom mo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho:/ bzhi las sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma dang/
293b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa ma dang/ lcags sgrogs ma dang/ dril bu ma dang/ khro mo de dag kyang stag gi sham thabs dang/ sbrul gyi rgyan cha dang/ nyi zla'i gdan dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar gtugs te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA nA ka
293b2(rgyud 'grel): ba tsa hUM zhes brjod pas lus thams cad rdo rjer bsgom mo/ /de nas rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra nAM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM zhes brjod nas gnas ldang rgyas btab bas lus thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dra mig rnams
293b3(rgyud 'grel): khro chung tshon gang pas gtams par bsams te byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas de ltar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyod nas/ /rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba ni/ 'og min gnas mchog dam pa yi/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas/
293b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i?/ /gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can/ /maN+Dal sngon po'i gzhal yas 'dir/ /'khor bcas ma lus spyan 'dren gyis/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang gi mthu/ /
293b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rgyal po gos ston can/ /ri rab chen pa'i lcog bzhi yi/ /lcags ri nag po'i gzhal yas na/ /spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM/ mahA yak+Sha me nA pa ta ye/ badzra d+ha ra/ badzra
293b6(rgyud 'grel): khaDga t+ta ro/ badzra nI la d+ha ra/ badzra tsakra d+ha ra/ sa ma ya maN+Da la ma d+he/ A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ pra ba sha ya/ pra bi sha ya/ tiSh+Tha ya tiSh+Tha ya/ a ba lo kA ya/ a ba lo kA ya hUM swAhA/ bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ gdug pa 'dul
293b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnyen po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can/ /mchod rten sngon po gzhal yas 'dir/ /dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis/ /las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon 'khor dang
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas kyang/ /'tsham ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ pad+ma sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ldan/ sangs rgyas mang pos dbang bskur
294a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /gnod sbyin kun pas khyad par 'phags/ /mthu stobs kun gyi bdag po ste/ /stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /las kyi gnod sbyin chen po rnams/ /'jigs su rung ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad ma lus 'jigs par byed/ /
294a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs bzhi klu yi gnyen po ste/ /'jigs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /shel ltar dag pa'i snod mchog tu/ /bkra shis 'o ma'i chab kyis gtams/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs
294a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dbul/ /yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pa Ni hUM/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da mahA yak+Sha kro d+ha/ ro Sha NA ya/ badzra d+ha ra/ badzra kharga d+ha ra/ badzra nI la d+ha ra/ badzra tsakra d+ha ra/ badzra yak+Sha rak+Sha he/ A ha ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu
294a5(rgyud 'grel): twa spha ra na sa ma ye swAhA/ me tog dam pa 'di dag dang/ /de bzhin lha rdzas me tog rnams/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /badzra puShpa pU dza/ me g+ha sa mu da spha ra Na sa ma ya swAhA/
294a6(rgyud 'grel): a ka ru dang tu ruSh+ka /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i bdug spos 'di/ /gsang bdag 'phags pa gos sngon gyi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /badzra d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Ni sa ma
294a7(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA/ tsan dan ga pur dzA ti dang/ /gur kum chu gtsang sman sbyar 'di/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /badzra g+hand+ha bU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spho ra na sa ma ye swAhA/ mun pa'i tshogs
294b1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'joms byed cing/ /phyogs bcu gsal ba'i mar me 'di/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /badzra A lo ke dI ba pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye swAhA/ kha dog dri dang ro ldan pa'i/ /lha
294b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /badzra nai dai tye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye swAhA/ bla med rdo rje theg pa'i don ston pa'i/ /shes rab mchog gi
294b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'gro rol mo'i sgra/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /bdud kyi 'khor lo gzhom phyir gshegs su gsol/ /badzra gI ti ga ta ga ta hUM/ spha ra Na sa ma ye swAhA/ bla bre? rgyal mtshan ba ngan?
294b4(rgyud 'grel): gdugs/ /dpung rgyan do shal se mo do/ /na bza' chos gos sngon por bcas/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul/ /oM wastra a laM ka ra bi b+hu Sha na pA da spha ra na sa ma ye hUM swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i mtshan
294b5(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i/ /sku gsung thugs dang phrin las las/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon bzhi sbrul pa/ /ring po chen po'i lcags la gnas/ /kun kyang sku
294b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog mthing nag la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams/ /g.yon pa so so'i phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /na bza' la ba sngon po gsol/ /na bza' sngo kra stag sham can/ /klu chen brgyad kyi sku la brgyan/ /dus mdza' i me dpung 'bar ba
294b7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /dkyil nas 'od zer mtshon cha phyar/ /klu rigs bzhi la 'bebs mdzad pa/ /sde dpon rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yan lag bdun pas sdig pa bshags la/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab cing phrin las bcol te/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM
295a1(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i lnga rnams bstim par bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes sbyi bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying gar dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ mthing ga dang/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la yi ge bcu
295a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa bkod de/ rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nyid las spro bsgu'i rim pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bIk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM zhes phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing kham bye ba phrag brjod kyis
295a3(rgyud 'grel): mi lang bar 'dod yon gyi lha mo rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams la yang dag par mchod cing gnyis su med par thim nas de dag gi gsung rnam par dag ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams kyi 'od zer bdag nyid la thim
295a4(rgyud 'grel): pas sgrib pa sbyangs te/ thugs 'od zer 'gro drug la phogs pas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur nas/ sems can gyi don byas te/ slar bdag nyid la bstim pa dang/ /spro ba spu'i rim pa yang nas yang du bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya
295a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang/ de'i sras khro bo rnams spyan drangs pa dang/ mchod cing sdig pa bshags te/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
295a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i gzungs las ji ltar byung ba ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi bskyod pa/ rigs bzhi'i 'khor dang sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang/ rigs kyi yum rnams kyis bum pas dbang bskur zhing/ rdo rje sems
295a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sngags yi ge brgya bas sku khrus gsol ba ni/ lha'i rjes su gnang ba ste/ sku rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /mdo nas ji ltar byung ba ltar sngags kyi gnang ba thob pa ni gsung rdo rjer byin brlab pa'o/ /oM sh+rI badzra pA Ni hUM/ mahA tsaN+Da
