295b1(rgyud 'grel): sarba duShta na sarba bud d+ha sa pa ri wa ra badzra samta ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes dgug ba dang gzhug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ tha mi dad par byas te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po thugs gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje
295b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par gyur te/ ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /skyo bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i gzungs kyi phreng ba kho na la sprul 'khril ba ltar bzlas shing rdo rje gsum gyis dgongs pas bdag nyid kyis lus kyi
295b3(rgyud 'grel): nang dang sdig sgrib dang/ klu'i dug dang gdug rtsub rnams zhi bar bsgom mo/ /thun mtshams su bzlas pa gtong bar 'dod pa dang/ ye shes sems dpa' mchod rten sngon po bzhugs su gsol te/ me tog la sogs pas yang mchod cing
295b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod la gtong ma gtang ba'i las bya'o/ /tha ma'i thun la/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas zhes bzod par gsol la/ khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ ces gshegs su gsol lo/ /bskyed pa thugs kar bsdu/ /mir? min?
295b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ yi ge brgya pa brjod/ spyod lam gyi dus su skad cig mas lhar bskyed/ lus bsrung go ba po/ nang ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang/ phyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo gdag? 'khor lo kha sbyor bsdam?/ rtag tu lha yi rgyal gyi spyod lam
295b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par bya'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i blos dge ba'i las 'ba' zhig la 'bad par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge 'bru bcu bdun pa dang/ las kyi phyag na rdo rje'i yi ge bcu pa la
295b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bzlas shing nang nub bum pa la gzungs sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsnyen pa dbul lo/ /gta' gtor la'ang de bzhin bya'o/ /bsnyen pa'i grangs kyi tshad ni bye ba 'am bdun 'bum mo/ /rtags kyi mtshan ma thob nas bsnyen
296a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thon nas/ nam gung la gta' gtor btang/ thos rangs bum pas rang ngam slob ma la dbang bskur/ rta bdag las kyi gnod sbyin ri/ rab kyi lcog la gshegs su gsol/ bum pa'i lhas bdag la rgyas
296a2(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ khrus byas/ dngos grub kyi rten phung lha la dbul/ lhag ma dngos grub tu dmigs la rang bza' / bskyed ba sdu/ me dmigs par bsam/ lha rgyun tu 'khor ba'i man ngag la gnas par bya'o/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs
296a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi man ngag lag tu blang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po bIrya tsaN+Das mdzad ba rdzogs so// //lha dgu'i lag len// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dben
296a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing nyams dga' i gnas dag tu/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyi skyon gyur pa/ /sgra ches skyon gyur 'byung po dag /snod med gyur pas thos gyur na/ /sgra ches bar chad mthu med 'gyur/ /sgra chungs gyur na dngos grub med/ /skyon gyur
296a5(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi phrad pa nyams/ /des na sngags kyi mthu med 'gyur/ /bul na bzlas ba'i grangs med pas/ /dus 'das pas gcod? sbyor ba 'byung/ /glo dang g.yal dang sbrid pa dang/ /gnyid la sogs pas bar chod na/ /des ni yi
296a6(rgyud 'grel): dags bdud la sogs/ /spro nas myur du bar gcod 'byung/ sngags kyi bsnyen pa byed pa byed dus su/ /me dang 'dra ba'i zhes sdang gis/ /sngags kyi 'bras bu sreg par byed/ /kun nas dkris pa'i 'dod chags kyis/ /yon tan
296a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rnams 'ching bar byed/ /mun pa lta bu'i gti mug gis/ /dngos grub stor ba rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sgang bu lta bu'i nga rgyal gyis/ /dngos grub chu 'dra rtse la min/ /sngags kyi yon tan sprin 'dra la/ /phrag dog rlung gis mthor bar
296b1(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /dngos grub bye ma'i rgyun bsdus ba'ang/ /brtson 'grus rdo rje'i brag med na/ /le los rba rlabs chen po 'khrug /dngos grub bar du gcod ba bcu/ /lnga las 'byung bas lnga bcu ste/ /mi dge bcu zhes gsungs pa yin/ /ma byin len
296b2(rgyud 'grel): dang srog gcod g.yem/ /tshig 'khyal ngag rtsub phra ma rdzun/ brnab sems gnod sems log par lta/ /dge bcu'i bar du gcod pa ste/ /yang dag don gyi sgra zhes bshad/ /'di ltar dngos grub kun bral bas/ /sngags kyi 'bras bu
296b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas spang/ /de spangs 'bras bu myur du 'thob/ /rtag tu bzas brjod me dpung la/ /bsam gtan rlung gis sbar gyur na/ /sdig pa stobs can mi bzad pa'i/ /ljan ljin thams cad srog par byed/ /bzlas brjod me yi rgyun 'dra yang/ /
296b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bral bas mi 'grub ste/ /sdig pa chu dang 'dra bas gsod/ /de bas bsam gtan ldan par bya/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes gsungs pas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi skur bsgoms te/ /phyi nang shin tu nad dag dang/ dgug dang gdon dang
296b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dang/ /oM gyi don dang la sogs pa/ /dre la dmigs nas bzlas par bya/ /gang zhig don 'di med gyur pas/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas gyur pa/ /mun la bye ma'i gser phye tshol/ /mi 'dod 'du yi 'dod pa min/ /slob
296b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po birya tsaN+Das mdzad ba gsang sngags bzlas brjod rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra ba ti rA dza tu Na De sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes
296b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig dang po dben pa'i gnas su/ /rig pa 'dzin pa des khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la/ gos gsar pa bgos/ dam tshig dang sdom pa la
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang bcas pas maN+Dal ba'i rnam lngas byugs la/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gzugs sam/ mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa dkyil
297a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de'i dbus su gzhag ste/ spos chab kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /me tog dang bdug pa la sogs te/ mchod rdzas rnams bshams la stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la de'i rang bzhin a las zla
297a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng du hUM yongs su bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bkug ste/ phyag btsal ba dang/ mchod cing bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang zhing chos
297a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngos te gshegs su gsol/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mtshan dang dpe
297a5(rgyud 'grel): byad ldan par bskyed la/ snying rje dang byams pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po'i dang gis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na mo b+ha ga pa te shAkya mu nA ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ta dya thA/ b+hu dza sa ma ye/ b+hu dze ta tha b+hu dze/ pra ba ra b+hu dze/ sa man+ta
297a6(rgyud 'grel): a ka b+hu dza/ tu ru tu ru swAhA/ sa ma ya pA lA ya swAhA/ na sarba sa tsa nA da swAhA/ klu mi bgrungs pa/ dam tshig mi 'tshal ba rnams slar bzlog cing bskrad pa'i phyir lan bdun brjod do/ /swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha sarba d+harmmA swa b+ha pa
297a7(rgyud 'grel): bi shud d+ho haM zhes brjod pas de nyid kyi dang las badzra ba ti ga ru Da zhes sgra'i rnam pa dang bcas te hUM ngo bor gnas pa las de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ rin po che 'bar ba hUM gis mtshan pa/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnam par
297b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug par gyur/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las rI dza sri dza hUM zhes pas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser gyi 'dab ma can/ rdo rje'i mchu can bdag nyid chen po'i lus 'bar ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ khro bo 'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can/ rin
297b2(rgyud 'grel): po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang/ mu tig dang/ man shel dang/ gser gyis spras pa'i rgyan mgo la thogs pa/ gser gyis klubs pa/ dregs pa'i gzugs can 'gying bar lta ba/ klu chen po brgyad gdan du bcas pa/ klu mgo
297b3(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa brgyan du byas pa/ klu mgo gsum pa g.yas na thogs pa/ nor bu'i rin po che'i dbyug pa g.yon na thogs pa/ lus thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba gsor gyi rang bzhin gshog pa'i 'dab ma brkyang bas klu rigs dbang du bsdud pa/
297b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yog 'khor nam mkha' lding gi tshogs kyis bskor ba zhig tu bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcas te/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra dun+ti mi li mi li swAhA/ de nas brtan par byas te lus bsrung bar bya'o/ /de dang
297b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ yang dag par mchod cing bstod la de nyid kyi rten la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar skyong bar ma gyur gyi bar du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pa bya'o/ /de nyid
297b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar ma gyur na skyon spangs pa'i bzlas pa bya'o/ /oM badzra ba ti ga ru Da be ga ta hUM hUM dza dza rA dza hUM phaT ces nyin gcig bzhin sngags stong ngam khri brjod do/ /nam lus kyi mi thub par skyo bar gyur pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar bya ste/ yang
297b7(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o/ /gu gul gyi dung pas bdug go /me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ yon chab dang/ mar me dang/ bshos gtsang la sogs te/ gtor ma'i rdzas ci 'byor pas mchod cing/ yang dag par bstod nas nyal
298a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur zhing las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur la/ mchog dang thun mong thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /ci bsgo ba des byed pa 'gyur/ grub nas kyang rtag tu mchod par bya'o/ /nam
298a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding gi rgyal po sngon pa'i cho ga /slob dpon bIrya tsaN+Das mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//
298a3(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i stobs kyis gdul dka' 'dul/ /bde gshegs kun gyi thugs ngo bo/ /rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas/ de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /bslab pa gsum ldan dge slong ngam/ /dge tshul dge bsnyen bsnyen gnas pa/ bya ba'i rgyud/
298a4(rgyud 'grel): mos de yis bsgrub/ /gzhan gyis de ltar ma yin no/ /dang por sa phyogs rang nyams dga' ba'i phyogs su/ stan bde ba la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis gnas la/ dri dang me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mdzes par byas la/
298a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du rig sngags kyis bdag po dang/ bla ma bsams la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pas mchod/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ byed pa bsdam pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya/ de nas oM
298a6(rgyud 'grel): bA? b+hA? ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM zhes lan gsum brjod pas thams cad stong par bsam mo/ /rang sems dag pas paM pad ma/ /dkar po 'dab brgyad dbus zla ba/ /dbus su hUM las rdo rjer gyur/ /lte ba'i dbus su hUM mthing ga/ /
298a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa bzhi pa rdo rje 'chang/ /brkyang bskum sems dpa' khros pa ste/ /mthing ga na ra'i rgyan gyis bud?/ /'jigs byed mgo skyes gyen du brdzes/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin me phud bzhugs/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsam/ /rang snying zla
298b1(rgyud 'grel): bar snying po dgod/ /sngon du bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad bsreg pa dang/ thams cad bsrung bar byed do/ /'byung po'i gdon gyi zin pa la sogs pa la bsnun na 'byor bar byed mog kha ting
298b2(rgyud 'grel): khas kham phor la bris te sgo la dbyangs na srin bu srung bar byed do/ /spra tshil la gzugs sor bzhi pa byas la/ de'i snying gar dgra'i ming dang sngags spel nas tshe mas kha la btsugs na phyir rgol ba'i ngag rengs par byed do/ /snying la btsugs na khros
298b3(rgyud 'grel): ba zhi ba dang/ gsang ba'i sems kyis gsang bar 'gyur ba dang/ rkang lag gang la btsugs na zha bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtags la btsugs na nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ ma'i rje dar gyi phur bu 'aM lcags phur la bsngags te gang bsnun pa rengs par 'gyur ro//
298b4(rgyud 'grel): mi thod la sngags bris la/ de'i nang du mi khrag gis bkang ba dur du sbas na rigs rgyud 'chad do/ /dug blugs te klu yod pa'i gnas su sbas na mdze nad kyis 'dzin to/ /dgra'i sgor sbas na 'byer bar byed pa dang/ zhing dkyil du sbas na
298b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing mi skye ba dang/ phyugs lhas su sbas na mi 'phel ba dang/ chur sbas nas chu skems so/ /skyes bu mtshon gyis bsang pa'i thod pa la/ bsngags dang/ yul lha'i ming spel la bris nas yul lha'i ga nas su spas la/ de'i
298b6(rgyud 'grel): thog tu phur pa la sngags mang du bzlas la yul lha'i snying gar dam du gdab/ de'i steng du tsher ma can gyi shing la gdug pa'i me btang la/ rta dang/ mi dang/ ba lang dang/ khyi dang ma he la sogs pa'i sha khrag bsregs la/ lha khyed
298b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis yul 'dir thog ser phob shig /ma phebs na bskal par mi gtang ngo zhes brjod la/ phebs na rdzas rnams 'o mas bkrus la btang/ ma phebs na gzhag /las de dag thams cad ni sngags dang ming spel ba'i dbye bas shes par
299a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gsang sngags ni oM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na che ge mo hUM phaT/ gzhan yang gong gi gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar ming 'ba' zhig bris la/ mchod rten nag po mtho gang pa'i nang du bcug la/ lhung bzed kyi 'og tu
299a2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal byas la gzhag /de nas dge slong ngam dge tshul lam/ dge bsnyen phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa sngags pa po bzhi yan chad kyis/ /dben par nub bcom ldan nam gung la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla zhing bskor ba bya/ bcu
299a3(rgyud 'grel): drug pa la bskor ba bzlog la gzugs bsrigs na/ ci skad sngags dang/ spel ba bzhin lo las mi 'da' o/ /ser ba la sogs pa bzlog pa la 'khor lo la bri ba 'am rnga'o/ /yul du 'jug na ral gri la sogs pa'o/ /nad thams cad
299a4(rgyud 'grel): chu dang yungs kar la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'di'i yon tan ni brjod par mi nus so/ /phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po sh+rad+d+ha kA ra ba rmas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag
299a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu rigs lnga la dug lnga ste/ /'gro ba gzhan la gnod pa byed/ /gnod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lnga ste/ /brag par grog po gting rings dang/ /ri phug dog dang sgo dog mor/ /mi shong
299a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'tshang ba dang/ /lha khang khang h+rul nyams mi dga' / /chu dang 'dam rdzab brab pa ngan/ /g.yag dang ba lang ra lug dang/ /ri dags gcan gzan khyi yis 'tshe/ /gzar ba'i ri la 'dzeg 'bab rmi/ /lus dang shes pa lci ba
299a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gnyid che sems dkar snang glu len/ /spro thung snying mig dga' ba 'ong/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag bsrung dang gso bya'i phyir/ /rdzas kyi sbyor ba bstan par bya/ /thun mong sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /ri dags lte dri
299b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dre gsod chu/ /nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi ngo tsha/ /dri chen nya yi mkhris pa dang/ /byi sku bdun du sbyar ba yi/ /klu gnyan sa bdag nag mo bskor/ /'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing/ /mdze 'bras shu ba stong pa dang/ /bal ldags
299b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yan pa med bal dang/ /gag pa lhog pa rma rims dang/ /tshad rims rgyu zer 'byung po'i nad/ /bza' dang gdags dang byug dang bdug /thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog /khyad par sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi/ /lte dri shing kun a
299b3(rgyud 'grel): ru ra/ /dri chus sbyangs shing khong du btung/ /skad snyan tshe ring nad skems srun/ /lte dri 'dre gsod thang chu dang/ /nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi bo che/ /byi sku ha la dza ti rang/ /a mri ta sbyar bcad pa'o/ /lte dri 'dre gsod du rta nag /bdud rtsi rgya tshil sa
299b4(rgyud 'grel): tshil dang/ /byi sku ha la mi phrag bcud/ /byug pa'i rdzas su bshad pa yin/ /rus chen mnan la bdug pa bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin/ /jo bo rje dang/ rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur// // */ /rgya gar
299b5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/ /lhag pa'i khro rgyal skyon kun las rgyal ba/ /rnam dag byang chub sems
299b6(rgyud 'grel): can don mdzad pa/ /gos sngon phyag na rdo rje la btud de/ /de yi sgrub thabs sems can phan phyir bshad/ /'di la lhag par dbang ba'i sngags pa ni/ /snying rje yis ni yid ni bcugs gyur cing/ /lhag par mos pa brtan po'i yid can
299b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam pas rab tu brgyan/ /dkon mchog gsum la gcig tu skyabs su song/ /bla ma'i rjes gnang thob cing yon tan ldan/ /rang 'dod lha dang bla ma dbyer med lha/ /shin tu brtson ldan dbang du gyur pa yis/ /
300a1(rgyud 'grel): snga bar langs te snying kar nyi ma la/ /hUM yig sngon po bung ba lta bu'i 'od/ /'od gsal ba ni blo ldan gyis brtan nas/ /kha la sogs pa rab tu dag par bya/ /tsan dan a kar dzA ti e la dang/ /rams dang so
300a2(rgyud 'grel): ba shing gi lo ma yis/ /bsres pa'i dri zhim chu yis byugs pa la/ /me tog sngon pos nye bar brgyan byas te/ /sha dkar dri sogs bdug pa dag gis ni/ /bdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa yi/ /nye bar 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa
300a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams spangs te/ /yangs shing 'jam pa'i stan la rab 'dug nas/ /de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bdag nyid khro rgyal gtso bo dag tu ni/ /rnam par bsgoms nas g.yas kyi sdigs mdzub la/ /raM yig
300a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de nas de las byung ba'i nyi ma la/ /hUM yig sngon po las ni byung ba yi/ /mi bzad pa ni rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /de nas phyogs bcu dag tu ni/ /khros pas sngags ni
300a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya zhing/ /go rim ji bzhin se gol gyis/ /gnas bdag rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya/ /de la gnas la sogs pa bsrung ba'i sngags ni/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sarba big+ha nAM ha na ha na hUM phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA zhes bya'o/ /de nas sngon
300a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs nyid kyis ni/ /dri zhim chu yis dkyil 'khor yang/ /byas nas me tog dgram par bya/ /arg+ha la sogs hUM bzlas bya/ /de nas rang gi snying gar 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i lcags kyus bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
300a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun gyis nam mkha' i phyogs su nye bar gnas par lhag par mos te/ de rnams la yang dag pa'i dad pa nye bar bskyed de/ de kun la bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam bdun bya'o/ /dus gsum
300b1(rgyud 'grel): du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la lus dang ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab gus rgya che'i mchod pa yis/ /bde gshegs rnams la te bar mchod/ /'jigs pas de mdun ma lus pa'i/ /sdig pa byas pa bshags par bgyi/ /sangs
300b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sogs bgyis bsod nams la/ /deng 'dir rjes su yi rang ngo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad du/ /bde gshegs rnams la bskul bar bgyi/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /de rnams yun rings gnas gsol 'debs//
300b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs mchod rang bzhin bsod nams dang/ /dge ba gzhan yang bdag gis ni/ /gang de thams cad byang chub dag /gcig tu bsdus nas bsngo bar gyis/ /de nas skyabs su 'gro bya ste/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ /theg chen
300b4(rgyud 'grel): dam chos 'di dang ni/ /dge 'dun sangs rgyas sras tshogs la/ /byang chub par du skyabs su mchi/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bya ste/ /bdag nyid thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul bar gyi/ /bdag kyang rab tu bzhes mdzod la//
300b5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du sbyor/ /de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/ ngo mtshar che mchog byang chub ni/ /bla med dag ni thob nas su/ /shin tu mthar thug mya ngan 'das/ /'gro ba myur du dgod par bgyi/ /de nas lam ni bsten bya ste/ /
300b6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dir rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /snying rje mchog gis bstan bya ba/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /mchog gyur snying po brten par bgyi/ /de nas snying rje bsgom byas te/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma brgal ba'i/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams bltas nas/ /sdug
300b7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal sel bar byed pa yi/ /snying rje mthar thug bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong nyid bsgom bya ste/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi ldan pa'i/ /ma dpyad dngos po yod ma yin/ /de phyir 'gro kun stong pa nyid/ /gnyis su med par sgom par bya/ /de
301a1(rgyud 'grel): na oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rgyu mthun pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ste/ dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rnam pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi bsgom par
301a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de la laM skyes ser po ste/ /mdza' ni ma lus rdo rjes mtshan/ /gru bzhi pa la rab rgyas pa'o/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de nas paM skyes dkar po ni/ /zlum po bum pas mtshan pa ste/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum
301a3(rgyud 'grel): po de/ /steng du gnas pa yang dag bsam/ /de nas raM skyes dmar po ni/ /gru gsum raM gyis rtse mtshon pa/ /'bar zhing 'phro ba steng du ni/ /me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de nas yaM skyes sngon po ni/ /sbyar gzhu lta bu 'od 'bar ba/ /
301a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dan dang bcas mnyam gzhag pas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor blta bar bya/ /'byung ba bzhi ni yang dag gyur/ /rgyas 'phro gzhal yas khang pa ste/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin ni/ /thar pa'i grong mchog bsgom par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la
301a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /mchod rnams bzhi yis yongs su bskor/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje thig gis rab tu bskor/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /bla re rnga yab me long dang/ /gos dang me tog
301a6(rgyud 'grel): phrang gis brgyan/ /mchod pa lnga yis yang dag brgyan/ /'dod yon lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /glu dang gar sogs mchod pa ni/ /lha rdzas bsnams pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/ /bdan rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i/ /dril bu dag ni phyogs
301a7(rgyud 'grel): sgor 'khrol/ /kha dog lnga yi 'od tshogs kyi/ /ma lus pa yi khams ni gsal/ /de yi lte bar pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma ge sar bcas/ /dga' bo la sogs klu brgyad ni/ /gdan du rnam par bsam par bya/ /shar la sogs
301b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyogs bzhi ru/ /de bzhin gdan ni bsgom bya ste/ /pang gnas 'jigs byed stag dang ni/ /chu srin mi ni rim bzhin no/ /de nas phyi 'phar bzhi po la/ /rol sngon po bris pa yi/ /dkar dang nag dang sngo skya dang/ /de bzhin ser skya bsgom par
301b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas dbus gdan shes rab ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug ngo bo nyid/ /rab rgyas zla ba bsgom bya ba/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /de stengs sum cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /gsal byed snying rje'i bdag nyid ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od ? rnams bsam pa//
301b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /de steng paM gis hUM byas pa/ /yang dag skyes la rtse lnga pa'i/ /rdo rje lte bar hUM gis mtshan/ /so sor kun rtogs ye shes bsgom/ /hUM las sangs rgyas spro bya ste/ /bsdus te de la de rnams gzhug /
301b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag 'dus nas dbyer med pa/ /de ni bya ba grub bar bsgom/ /zla ba nyi mtshan hUM yig las/ /skyes pa'i rang nyid gos sngon can/ /rnam dag ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /yun ring phyag na rdo rje bsam/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'greng/ /khro gnyer spyad ni
301b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba ste/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yi ni zhal/ /grog gi ljags kyis 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs dus rlung gi dbugs dang ni/ /hUM yig 'don pa yi ni zhal/ /ha har rgod pa rtsub cing drag /rgya mtsho chen po lto ba che/ /pad+ma dbu la rgyas pa
301b6(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /dga' bo nye dga' rna cha ste/ /pad+ma chen po tshang skud do/ /dung skyong tak+Sha lag gdub po/ /rigs ldan karko dpung brgyan te/ /lha gcan nor rgyas rkang gdub po/ /phrag pa zla ba nyi mas brgyan/ /seng ge rkang brgyad pags pa'i gos/ /rdo rje
301b7(rgyud 'grel): lcag skrog rked par dkris/ /brang 'gro chen po gsol bas so/ /rang mdog rdo rje rtse gsum ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyug chen mi bzad pa/ /g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gdan dang rgyab rten brag /g.yon
302a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /de nas dbyug pa'i steng bsam pa/ /mkha' la 'gro bdag bya khyung ste/ /khros shing lus ni che la dpa' / /kha gdangs sna tshogs mdog can no/ /rkang pa gnyis kyis sprul rgyal po/ /rang
302a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pa ni nyid du byed/ /zlum zhing dmar la 'bar ba'i spyan/ /'jigs shing kun tu seng seng lha/ /de nas snying gar nyin mtshan hUM/ /de nyid 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /de bzhin spyi bo mgrin pa snying/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM yongs su bsgom par bya
302a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas snying nyin mtshan gnas pa'i/ /sa bon las byung zla ba ni/ /'jigs byed la sogs brgyad la dgod/ /de rnams nyi gnas de bzhin no/ /de la zla nyi sbyor ba las/ /de
302a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sa bon brgyang du gyur/ /hUM hUM phuM(rgyud 'grel): kuny+dza shaM raM maM/ /thig le nA da ldan rim bzhin/ /de rnams yongs su gyur las lha'i/ /mtshan ma brgyad ni go rims bzhin/ /'og nas 'byung bzhin sgrub pa po/ /rang rang sa bon yang dag
302a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /de nas zla ba nyi ma dang/ /mtshan ma sa bon las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor pa ni go rims bzhin/ rang rang gdan gnas bsam par bya/ /de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal ni/ /kun tu sngo ba 'bar ba'i sku/ /rtsa
302a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gnag cing dkar ba ni/ /g.yas pa'i zhal te spyan mig dmar/ /g.yon zhal dmar zhing sha rgyas la/ /cung zhig mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /stag lpags gos can khros pa ste/ /nyi gnas rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje
302a7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri lcags kyu rno/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /dril bu zhags pa mi mgo ni/ /g.yas las cig shos phyag na bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas pa/ /shar gyi gdan la bsam par bya/ /sges cing lang tsho dang
302b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing/ /rgyan rnam kun gyis rnam par bsam/ /lho phyogs gdan gyi nyi ma la/ /nag po chen po de nas blta/ /spyan gsum po ni dmar ba ste/ /gnag cing khros pa mche ba gtsigs/ /skra ni kham pa gyen du 'gyed/ /gang yang rung ba'i rgyan
302b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis mdzes/ /sbrul mchog mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi gnas/ /rtse mo rno zhing 'jigs pa yis/ /tsan dan bud shing g.yas na bsnams/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni zhags pa ni/ /bsnams shing mi bzad pa
302b3(rgyud 'grel): yis gzugs/ /nub kyi gdan gyi zla ba la/ /klu yi rgyal po ba ru na/ /dkar po gdengs ka brgyad kyis sgeg /mnyam pa'i zhabs kyis yang dag gnas/ /sdong bu dang bcas pad+ma phye/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /de nas g.yon
302b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag gis ni/ /phyag byed tshul du bsgom par bya/ /byang gi gdan la nyi ma la/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug rnam thos sras/ /ser zhing bzang la mchog tu dga' / /lha rdzas rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'phro ba/ /
302b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams/ /gser gyi ne'u le kha 'og bltas/ /g.yon pa yi ni phyag na bsnams/ /rtag tu bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /spyan ni kun tu dmar zhing che/ /lto ba che zhing smon
302b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bsam/ /de nas phyi 'phar bsam bya ste/ /shar gyi gdan gyi nyi ma la/ /sreg za dag ni che zhing gnag /ri dang sdigs mdzub kyi ni phyag /lho phyogs gdan gyi nyi ma la/ /de nas dbugs 'phrog pa ni blta/ /dUrpa lta bu ljang zhing ring/ /
302b7(rgyud 'grel): pags pa dang ni sdigs mdzub phyag /nub kyi gdan gyi nyi ma la/ /dmar po khrag za bsgom par bya/ /sbal ba'i khrag gis gang ba yi/ /thod pa dag ni phyag na bsnams/ /byang gi gdan gyi nyi ma la/ /sha za ba ni rnam par bsam/ /thal ba'i
303a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog can gri dang zhags/ /phyag bsnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di ni stobs dang ldan/ /bong thung grims pa yi ni lus/ /mche ba gtsigs shing mi sdug pa/ /sma ra smin ma mgo skyes ldan/ /ha har bzhad bcas
303a2(rgyud 'grel): ljags 'dril ba/ zlum zhing dmar ba yi ni spyan/ /smin ma 'khrog cing gsus po che/ /'jigs dus kyi ni me yi 'od/ /drag po stag lpags kyi ni gos/ /thod ba'i rus pas rnam par brgyan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis khros pa ste/ /
303a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes sogs nas/ /mdangs 'phrog ma yi mthar thug par/ /snying kar sa bon gdan mtshan ma/ /de nyid gsum dang ldan pa bsam/ /gzhan yang yongs rdzogs dkyil
303a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni/ /sngags rig pa yis bltas nas su/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo yongs su dgug /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag bzhugs/ /hUM gis bgegs ni bskrad bya ste/ /
303a5(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor la sogs sbyar bar bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug pa dang/ /gdug dang bcing dang dgyes par ni/ /tshogs dam tshig ye shes ni/ /gcig tu gyur par rnam par bsam/ /de nas snying sngags 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' i rgyal ba
303a6(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas su/ /bzhugs gsol me tog la sogs mchod/ /brtul zhugs dbang bskur gsol ba gdab/ /de nas ye shes chus gang ba'i/ /rgyal bdag rin chen bum pa yis/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la/ /sangs
303a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur bsgom/ /de na dbang bskur chu gyur pas/ /kun gyi dbul mi bskyod de/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /mig sman lta bu bsgom par bya/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon 'od/ /byung ba'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams
303b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /yang dag mchod bzhin bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan par bsam/ /de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor kun gyis glu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid la bstod bzhin par blta'o/ /gsang ba'i bdag po
303b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso chen po/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i lus/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba'i bdag po gtso chen po/ /sangs rgyas gsung dang 'dra ba'i dag /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag /
303b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba'i bdag po gtso chen po/ /sangs rgyas thugs dang mtshungs pa'i yid/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rang bzhin bdag /rdo rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ ces pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces
303b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o/ /de na rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs kyi 'gro ba'i don byed la rjes su gnas par bya ste snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te dkyil 'khor pa kun gyis 'od spro zhing rang gi lus la sdud par bsam par bya'o/ /rang nyid
303b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las yang rang gi 'od yongs su spros te/ sems can gyi don byas shing rang nyid la rang nyid kyi 'od ma lus pa bsdu bar bya'o/ zhes pa ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang
303b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas sgyon? ngal so zhing sngags yongs su bzlas par bya ste/ sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba snying ga'i nyi ma la dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par go rims bzhin du rnam par bltas nas/ sgra khro bo dag gis rab tu bzlas so/ /rdo rje'i bzlos pa mgal
303b7(rgyud 'grel): me'i 'khor lo'i rim pas gzhan nyid kyang ngo/ /ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bla ma'i man ngag gis bzlas so/ /sngags ni/ tadya thA /b+ho b+ho ban+nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni h+ri da yaM/ ya(rgyud 'grel): sa mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ku lotwA
304a1(rgyud 'grel): da nAM/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tadya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda/ nA ga h+ri da yA ni/ b+hinda b+hinda/ nA ga marmA Ni/ bi sa ma da/ nA ga shA rI raM/ biM spro Ta ya/
304a2(rgyud 'grel): nA ga nA ya nA ni tadya thA/ /hUM phaT/ nA ga ba rA ra NA ye hUM phaT/ nA go t+sA dA ya phaT/ nAM lAM bA sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la/ pa ra kra mA ya phaT kri tAn+tA ya phaT/ krI tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha nA ya phaT /twA sa nA ya phaT/ kuSh+maN+Da? ? da
304a3(rgyud 'grel): nA ya phaT/ pre ta bi shA tsa/ bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra baM nA shA karA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ sarba big+ha nA/ bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+haM baM nA sha ka rA ya
304a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ne rA dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA zhes bya'o/ /bzlas pa dang bsgom pas skyo na sngags pas skyo ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir lus gso ba'i cho ga bya ste/ bdud rtsi lnga zhu gang ba yi/ /spyi bo'i steng du zla dkyil 'khor/ /oM
304a5(rgyud 'grel): yig byin brlabs bsgom bar bya/ /de yi 'od zer dkar spros pas/ /ye shes bdud rtsi sangs rgyas las/ /'bad pas yang dag dgug pa bya/ /de dag nyid las bsgrub bya ste/ /ro gcig gnyis med dag tu bya/ /srog dang
304a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba bsdams pa las/ /de nas legs rgyun la babs pas/ /bdag nyid lus la sogs pa de/ /gso bzhin par ni blta bar bya/ /de nas langs par 'dod na ni/ /smon lam dag kyang gdab par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon
304a7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /go 'phang myur du thob par shog /bsod nams 'di yis 'gro ba ni/ /ma lus pa yis thob par shog /de nas de nyid gsum brjod pas/ /rang snying sa bon rang dkyil 'khor/ /bsdus te lha yi rnam pa yi/ /nga rgyal dag gis
304b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya/ /nyin mo thun gnyis rnal 'byor pas/ /rang nyid sa bon las byung ba'i/ /yongs sur rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /sngon bzhin du ni rab tu bya/ /de ltar nub kyi thun mtshams su/ /'on kyang khyad par yod gyur te/ /ye shes
304b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /'khor lo rang gi gnyug mar bsdu/ /ye shes 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas
304b3(rgyud 'grel): yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'di ru byon par mdzod/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /gnyug mar dkyil 'khor bsdu bya ste/ /mal stan klu ru bsgom bya zhing/ /blo ldan seng ge bzhin du nyal/ /
304b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon gsungs klu ni gsum po yi/ /tho rangs bdag la bskul bzhin par/ /klu dbang rang nyid bsam par bya/ /langs nas sngon gyi zhag bzhin du/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa rab tu bya/ /dngos su thun ni so so la/ /ji srid dngos grub
304b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur de bzhin/ /bgegs rnams nye bar zhi don du/ /sngags rig pa yis thun la ni/ /ji lta'i gdams ngag gis sbyangs te/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin/ /rgyal bas dbang bskur bar bsams nas/ /rang nyid rnam par dag 'dod
304b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rtsa sngags lan gsum brjod nas su/ /blo ldan byams pas gsol bar bsam/ /rkang 'og sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /hUM yig las ni byung bar bsam/ /de yi steng du hUM skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bsam/ /de steng 'bar
304b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje yi/ /gur ni hUM las byung ba ste/ /bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bsgom pa rnal 'byor pa yi bya/ /sgrub po'i bsgom dang rmi lam na/ /mtshan ma rnyed gyur de nas ni/ /stegs bu rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /lha rnams kun la
305a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya/ /ri bo dben pa skyed tshal dang/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang chu bo'i dogs/ /yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa' gzhi/ /ma mo'i khang pa gnyug gzhi 'am/ /gzhan yang sa yi cha la ni/ /de la 'tshe ba bral?
305a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ru/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga'i phyir/ /sngon gsungs dri yi chag chag gdab/ /bcu drug lo lon mig yang sa pa/ /lus rgyas mgo skyes gnas pa yi/ /khro zhing sna ni nyag gyur pa/ /bu mo blo ldan gyis bsgrub bya/ /rmangs? te chu
305a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'o ma dang/ /dri zhim chu dang ldan pa yis/ /khrus byas gos sngon sar ba ni/ /de la yongs su bskon bar bya/ /me tog sngon po'i phreng ba dang/ /skra yi zhags pas dkri bar bya/ /dpral bar thig le bkod nas su/ /de la lcags kyu bri
305a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /lcags kyu rtse mo rnon po ni/ /de nas lag pa g.yas su sbyin/ /mkhrad zhing gsar du byas pa yis/ /snod ni de yi g.yon du sbyin/ /bsrung ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa yis/ /de la yungs kar brdeg par bya/ /'khor
305a5(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur ba'i sngags 'di ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/ /de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM badzra pA Ni ye sarba artha sid d+hi ku ru swAhA/ zhes bya'o/ /de nas sngags pas rdan? byin te/ /thun mong sbyin pas
305a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di mnyes bya/ /bden bral mtshams gnas bzang po yi/ /sa ni 'di yis blang bar bya/ /zhi ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /sa ni nag po brke bar bya/ /phyung ste snod du blug nas su/ /rung ba'i gnas su blang sa la gzhag /de nas sa
305a7(rgyud 'grel): ni blangs pa la/ /dri zhim chu bzlas der gdab bya/ /mtho gang dang bcas sra ba yi/ /khru gang mtho ba'i stegs su dge /sa ni nag po dang bcas pa'i/ /sngon gsungs dri yis byugs par bya/ /stegs bu me tog sngon po yis/ /dus
305b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum du ni nye bar brgyan/ /stegs bu 'og gos la ni/ /de nas gos sngon rnal 'byor gyi/ /ting 'dzin gsum ni rab byas te/ /bum par lhag par gnas par bya/ /nag nog rtsa ba med mchu 'phyang/ /mgrin ring lto ba che ba la/ /'bras dang 'bras
305b2(rgyud 'grel): bu gsum 'og ma/ /rin chen sman dang yang dag ldan/ /me tog 'bras bu ldan gyur pa'i/ /yal ga dag gis kha brgyan te/ /sngon po mgul par gos ni sngo/ /sna tshogs me tog dag gis brgyan/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /rjes
305b3(rgyud 'grel): su mthun pa'i gdan la gnas/ /ci srid brgya rtsa brgyad tu ni/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /maN+Dal dgu yi rim pa ni/ /de nas stegs bu dag la bya/ /lha yi gnas su yang dag gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rnon po 'gro zhu las/ /lha
305b4(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor steng du yang dag blta/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bkug nas su/ /yang dag mchod de rab tu gzhug /bcid dang dgyes bya'i cho ga yis/ /yang ni arg+hA la sogs sbyin/ /sna tshogs mchod  
305b5(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod nas ni/ /bstod dang sngags ni rab tu bzla/ /zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /de ltar nyi re bzhin du bya/ /sngags pas bzlas pa khri phrag gcig /nyi ma re re yongs su bskang/ /de ltar byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang
305b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /mngon spyod las ni thams cad du/ /des ni nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyon rnams thams cad zad 'gyur te/ /yon tan thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /dug dang nye ba'i dug dang ni/ /klu yi dug ni med par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa
305b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad nyid nyams 'gyur zhing/ /rims dang nad rnams de bzhin no/ /mi ma yin ni 'gres 'gyur zhing/ /rgyal po rkun po dbang du 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal skal dan dbul ba dang/ /rtsod pa sdig pa bsags pa rnams/ /mi 'dod pa yi sbyor ba yang
306a1(rgyud 'grel): rims kyis zad cing zil gnon 'gyur/ /g.yeng dang tshe dang legs stobs dang/ /rig pa dag dang 'khor gyis rigs/ /phyugs dang nor ni thams cad dang/ /nor dang 'bru yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sbyor ba ni yang dag
306a2(rgyud 'grel): par bskul ba rtsa ba'i sngags ni chu la lan gsum bzlos te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas bas g.yon pa'i lag pa phyag byed pa ltar byas te sngags pas khyor ba gsum btung bar bya'o/ /zla ba drug gi nang du shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sor
306a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga lnga brkos pa'i 'og gis dkar po dang/ 'bras zan la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rkun po la mngon par phyogs te gtor na rkun po rengs par byed do/ /mi ma yin pas gzung ba la de bzhin du de'i dpung pa la yongs su
306a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te skud pa sngon pos bcings na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /byi la 'dug pa'i sa la de bzhin du yongs su bzlas te dri'i chu rma bya'i sgro'i chun pos gtor te/ grub pa'i don du chag chag byas na byi la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi ske
306a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am rwa la de bzhin bzlas te/ skud pa sngon po la mdud pa brgya byas nas phyugs kyi nang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mang po 'chi ba'i sar sngar bzhin du bzlas pa'i dri chu la 'bu ka'i gsheg pas gtor zhing yungs kar ser po gtor na zhi bar
306a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /khrag dang nya dang/ sha dang/ 'bras dang/ mon sran rde'u bsres pa'i zan dang/ kha dog kun dang/ til dang/ spos dang/ mon sran dre'u bcos pas sa'i khams skyong gang ba la de bzhin du bzlas te/ gtor ma de gang gi khyim du
306a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ba de rtsa rgyud 'chad do/ /rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma las spros pa'i rab tu gtum pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis khams gsum du gtogs pa'i dug bsregs bzhin par rnam par bltas la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i
306b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dkar ba'i 'od zer gyi bdud rtsis rgyas par snang bzhin par blta bar bya'o/ /khams gsum gyi dug nyams par byed pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /nam mkha' la spyod pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la khams ser po rnam par bsams la/ de yongs su gyur
306b2(rgyud 'grel): pa las mdag ser pa'i dug gis phung por nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma las byung ba'i dug gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi zel ma'i rnam pa dmug pa lta bu lhang ste/ sems can gyi 'jig rten dang/ snod
306b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gnyis khyad par bya'o/ /brtan pa dang g.yo ba dug du bya ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /gal te yang/ dug de med par byed 'dod na gong du bstan pa'i sbyor bas bya'o/ /dug bslang ba'o/ /klu rnams tshar bcad par 'dod na/ klu'i gnas
306b4(rgyud 'grel): su sngags de nyid khro bo'i tshig gis bzlas par bya'o/ /klu 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gal te mi 'bros na de rnams spyi bo dang mig 'gags so/ /mtsho skam mo/ /gzhan yang chu'i skye bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /klu la sogs par tshar bcad pa'o//
306b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sngags kyi sbyor ba brjod par bya ste/ na mo ratna tra yA ya/ nA ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha sai nA pa ta ye/ a na le/ pa ra le/ hUM ru ra swAhA zhes bya ba 'dis ske tshe'i mar khu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de
306b6(rgyud 'grel): yis rkang? byugs dpag mtshar bcu ru 'gro zhing song yang mi 'chad do/ /rkang pa'i nye bar spyod pa'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ oM kA me ka ma ya ka badzri ni ka ma la ye/ kA ma bA si ni ka ma shwa ri ni
306b7(rgyud 'grel): mit+trI? kA ma badzre ni/ A nA ya la glu? che ge mo/ /me ba sha mA nA ya swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas gro kha la tshon sna ma lus pas sor brgyad kyi tshang phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis na/ sa bon gyis gang ba'i shing tog
307a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa'i rdo rje 'dod ma bri la/ snying kar dri zhim po'i me tog la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying gar dus gsum du brdeg par bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum na phyag rgya'i sbyor bas brgya byin gyi bu mo
307a2(rgyud 'grel): yang 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis phan tshun sbyar te/ sor mo'i rtse mo khab lta bur byas te/ rdo rje'i rnam par mtheb chen gnyis sdigs mdzub gnyis la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dbang dang dgug pa'o/ /na mo
307a3(rgyud 'grel): ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ /ma hA yak+Sha ye nA pA ta ye/ tadya thA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da yak+Shi ni/ as+thi ni/ tsA pa sha hi sa da dzA me da mahA ta swAhA zhes bya bas shar gyi grwar phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs gyi mdun du stong phrag gcig
307a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje la ci 'byor bas mchod pa byas la/ sngags brgya brgya'i bar du bzlas pa byas la nyal bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe gang bsams pa de 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa de nyid brjod par byed do/ /rmi lam brtag
307a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM bA bA hi/ mahA pA rA hi/ badzra pA rA hi/ mahA badzre/ ma nu Sha badzra/ a be shA ya/ de ba h+ri dA ya/ /a be shA ya/ yak+Sha h+ri da ya/ a be sha ya/
307a6(rgyud 'grel): gand+ha ? h+ri da ya/ a be sha ya/ daM Sh+Ta ma daM Sh+Ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ gardza gardza/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ nar da nar da/ kaM pa kaM pa/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ b+hu me pa ta ya/ sid+d+ha tsaN+Da? badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes bya bas
307a7(rgyud 'grel): ? dkar po'i shing la sor brgyad kyi tshang? ma'i pags pa snams pa'i rdo rje phag? mo mdun du gzhag ste/ 'bum 'phrag gcig bzlas ba bya'o/ /de nas nag po'i phyogs kyi brgyad nas nub gsum du smyur bar gnas pas/ lha
307b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i mdun du bum pa'i chu la brgya phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas la/ me tog gi phreng ba yang dag par gzhag ste/ ci srid rang nyid la bsams kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dgos dgu byed pa'i g.yog pos bum pa'i
307b2(rgyud 'grel): chus khrus byas la/ me tog gi phreng ba skad? pa la dkris na de nas babs pa las legs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzung ste mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad la phobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbra tshil dang myos byed kyi rang bzhin gyi sprul la brgya
307b3(rgyud 'grel): phrag brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ lha che ge mo shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sbrul 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /chu bos bar du chod pa'i grong yang 'dzin te/ de yang gzhan gyis 'tsho ba'i nus pa med do/ /gzhan yang 'tsho bar 'dod na
307b4(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba'i mi/ /lha mo'i mdun du khrus byas la/ /lha mo'i mos khrus byas na de nas sos par 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lto ba bkang ba'i spra tshil gyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs byas te/ myos byed kyi tsher mas phug la seng ldeng gi
307b5(rgyud 'grel): me la nyin zhag bdun dus gsum du gdungs na/ gang gi ming nas gzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar pho ba ris dkar po'i sbyin sreg zhag bdun du byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de yang lha mo g.yon pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gzung ba/
307b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i phyag gis mdud 'phyang ba/ mi bzang cing bod thung la khro bo'i lta stangs can g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa'o/ /las kyi sbyor ba gzhan dang gzhan ni gzhung mangs pa sa 'jigs bas na 'dir ma brjod do/ /
307b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi slob dpon byas pa'i gzhung/ /bltas nas ma rgyas 'khrugs pa la/ /de dag rgyas phyir 'di byas la/ /bdag la mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod/ /gos sngon phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ni/ /rab rgyas sbyor ba dang ldan byas pa
308a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /bdag gi bsod nams bsags pa de yis ni/ /gos sngon rdo rje 'dzin pa dgra rgyal shog /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob
308a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal stong pa nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rang gi bla ma nyid la thos nas khams pa dge slong ba ri lo tsa ba chen po rin chen grags pas
308a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po a bi yug+ha dang/ zhu thig byas nas gtan la phab pa'o// (//phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil chog 'gro bzang snying bos mdzad ba'o/) /rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni
308a4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal bid+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang/ /bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga
308a5(rgyud 'grel): brtsam/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bdag nyid lhar bskyed la snying po 'bum bzlas pa bya ba
308a6(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ yang na ji srid mtshan ma thob par ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa'i cho ga bya ste/ gtsug lag khang ngam kun dga' ra ba 'am/ nags
308a7(rgyud 'grel): tshal la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su sa bslang ba dang/ sa sbyang ba dang sa gzung ba dang/ sa byin gyis brlab par byas te/ da la bslang ba ni gnas kyi bdag po la bslang ba dang/ maN+Dal dang dri'i thig le dang/ me tog
308b1(rgyud 'grel): gi tshom bu bya ste/ /mchod pa bdag dor ma bshams nas oM a pra ti bi ka ra sha hUM zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje bsdam ma pa'i mdzub gnyis brkyang las la reg par byas pas sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas ba spyan drangs la/ sa'i lha mo mtshon pa 
308b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de'i 'khor la gtor ma byin nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod ba'i tshul dang khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud
308b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par bya ste dkyil 'khor bri zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod la/ byin par bsams te mchod la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas spyang ba ni drag po dang zhi ba'i sbyin srog bya'o/ /
308b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dom gang nye 'khor du lte ba nub tsam/ pus mo nub tsam brkas la gseg ma dang/ gya mo dang/ rus pa la sogs pa bsal la sbos chus bran la/ sa de nyid kyis bkang nas sa'i ltas brtag par bya ste sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /
308b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes las gzung ba ni gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bla bre la sogs pa bres la sku gzugs bkras nas phyogs bzhir spos rgyun mi 'chad par btul bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa der gtugs te/ yi ge brgya pa
308b6(rgyud 'grel): bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas bar bya ste/ sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa ni sa gzung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ste sa'i cho ga'o// //de nas bdag nyid khrus bya zhing dris byugs la/ gos
308b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i stod g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs bgo zhing/ rgyan gdags shing rdo rje dril bur ldan pas gal te nus ni smyung bar gnas ba 'am/ ma nus na zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /de la re zhig sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
309a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su 'dug la tshogs bsag pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang/ gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom par bya ste/ de'ang yi ge hUM yongs su gyur ba las rdo rje chen po nam mkha' i tshad dang
309a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa khong stong bsam pa ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /de'i nang du b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs dang bcas pa bskyed la/ dbus su a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid lhar
309a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'i bar du byas la sa'i lha mo mchod nas gsol ba gdab pa'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos
309a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas/ bstod nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ maN+Dal dbus dang phyogs bzhir ni/ gos sngon rigs lnga skad cig gis bsgoms la/ lha la gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ bdag
309a5(rgyud 'grel): gis dkyil 'khor sa gzungs bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol zhes so/ /slob ma bzhi yis phyogs bzhi nas gsol ba gdab pa'i tshig 'di dag go /rdo rje gos sngon rigs kyi
309a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku/ /zhe sdang chen po tshar gcod phyir/ /rdo rje rigs kyis sa gzung mdzod/ /rin chen gos sngon rigs kyi gtso/ /mnyam pa'i ngang? las 'bar ba'i sku/ /nga rgyal can rnams gzhom pa'i
309a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ rin chen rigs kyi sa gzung mdzod/ /pad+ma'i gos sngon rigs kyi gtso/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku/ /'dod chags can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ /pad+ma rigs kyi sa gzung mdzod/ /las kyi gos sngon rigs kyi
309b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku/ /phrag dog can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ /las kyi rigs kyi sa gzung mdzod ces so/ /de nas mig g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ g.yon par Ta las zla ba/ rkang mthil du
309b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas langs te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas bdag lha'i sku gsal bar dmigs te/ dbus kyi gtso bo nam mkhar bteg la khro bo'i bstod pa bya'o/ /de la bstod pa ni/ chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med dang nyid
309b3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi sbor? zhing/ /thabs la mkhas pa 'jigs byed skur ston pa'i/ /khro chen 'bar ba'i tshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa'i med bung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /dpa' ba' i stang stabs brkyang
309b4(rgyud 'grel): bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdad mig gis/ /bgegs dpung bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ ces brjod la bka' bsgo par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha la sogs pa'i
309b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig /da ni gnas 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po 'dri/ /bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin 'byer bar gyis/ /ci ste nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/ /ye shes can gyi rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis/ /spyi bo tshal pa brgya
309b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gas 'gyur zhing/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za zhes bya ba dang/ ding rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes bya bas rdzogs pa'i slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba byang chub tu rdzogs pa'i bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad
309b7(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir dang/ dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhig rtsom gyis gang su yang rung bas phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi dags
310a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sha za dang/ 'byung po dang/ gnon po dang/ mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rigs 'dzin la sogs pa rgan po dang/ rgan mo dang/ 'khor dang/ g.yog du bcas pa 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs
310a2(rgyud 'grel): shig de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka' thos pas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni de'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po kun tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te re zhes lan gsum brjod de/ rdo
310a3(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i ga ra dang/ rdo rje chen po'i 'gros kyis sa gzhi lan gsum bskor zhing/ rang gi lus las khro bo'i tshogs phyung la sdang ba thams cad bskrod par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge hUM gis bsrung ba'i 'khor lo byas la/ phur bu
310a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga stong phyag na rdo rje smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+han+na? ban d+ha hUM phaT ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dbus su grwa bzhir oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/
310a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk tsit+ta badzra kA li ya hUM phaT ces bya bas btab la/ oM badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces bya bas brdung bar bya'o/ /de nas srung skud bcing ba dang/
310a6(rgyud 'grel): gu gul gyis bdug pa dang/ me tog phreng ba btags shing dri'i thig le byas nas byams pa'i go chas bskon par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam pa lnga dang/ snying po bzlas pa'i bri chus byugs la/ dbus su dri'i thig le
310a7(rgyud 'grel): byas te me tog gi tsham bu bkram nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM bo ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sngags kyis bteg pa la bzhugs su gsol la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs/ mchod pa lnga dang/
310b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rgyas pa dang/ bstod ba byas nas snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma kun la brtse ba dang/ khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil
310b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ zhes lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ lha lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa gnyis legs par bkrus nas ras gtsang ma mgul
310b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bcings te/ ldum bcas lcug mas kha brgyan la/ rin po che lnga dang/ sman lnga dang/ 'bru lnga bcug nas lhag par gnas par ste/ de nas bum pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsangs nas/ b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang dang/ baM las
310b4(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho dang/ h+ri las sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas de'i steng du hUM las phyag na rdo rje bskyed de/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dbang bkur ba dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/
310b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ bstod pa byas nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gos gtsang mas bkab la bzhag ste/ phyi de zhag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas 'byor pa yod na sbyin sreg gi mchod pa bya'o/ /
310b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gtor ma'i cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du gtor ma gtang nas slob ma lhag par gnas pa bya ste/ /brus byas la me tog lag tu thogs te slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab ste rgyun bshags bya'o/ /dga' 
310b7(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod la bdag dge'o/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /mgon po chen po bdag la stsol/ dam tshig chen po stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos
311a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ khu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags tshul chen spyod pa dag /khyad la
311a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma brnyes/
311a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /des na kun mkhyen
311a4(rgyud 'grel): thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas lhar bskyed nas mchod pa bya ste/ /so shing dor ba dang/ ku sha sbyin ba dang/ spung skud gdags pa dang/ zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad pa bya ste/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnam//
311a5(rgyud 'grel): u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed
311a6(rgyud 'grel): par nas/ /skal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /'gro don mnyam med byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang theg pa chen po yi/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /thams cad
311a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /des na bu yis brtson par gyis/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de ltar lhag par gnas par byas nas/ /nang bar nyi ma shar dang mchod pa bshams la//
311b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nam mkha' bteg ste/ sa bzhi pa'i rnam lnga dang dri chen pos byugs nas thig skud byin gyis brlabs la cho ga bzhin thig gdab par bya'o/ /de nas tshon dgye bar bya ste/ tshon byin gyis brlab la dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba'i
311b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris pa dang/ phyogs kyi rim par tshon dgye ba dang/ rtsig pa la phyir rim dkar po dang/ sor po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ zhag po dang/ kha khyer dmar po dang/ rin po che pha khu ser po
311b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dra ba dra phyed nag po/ /mnga' yab ljang gu /rta babs ci mdzes pa/ rdo rje me ri dang/ bcas bri bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dgongs ka'i dus su mchod rdzas bsags nas bdag nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste/
311b4(rgyud 'grel): lha'i nga rgyal gyis dkyil 'khor btags la yid kyis nang du zhugs te/ lhag pa dang mchod pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir lan bdun pa skor bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba dor la slar rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /
311b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la mdun gyi lha yang sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje las 'od zer sngo bsdu byas nas/ lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ mchod pa rgyas
311b6(rgyud 'grel): par phul bstod pa byas nas bum par bcug ste/ bzlas pa byas nas tshur zhu ba las sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg bya ba dang/ gtor ma btang nas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ de nas bdag nyid 'jug pa'i chog
311b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ka mang tshul bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byas la/ /gnang pa nod par bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can rnams la phan
312a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /spyod lam lags par bsrungs pa yis/ /bla ma chen po khyed kyis ni/ /byang chub chen po'i lam ston pa'i/ /bsam gyis
312a2(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab dam chos slob/ /dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol/ /gdong g.yogs bcing ba dang/ rgyun bshags bya ba dang/ sdom pa gzung ba dang/ lhar bskyed cing las thams cad pa'i buM pas khrus bya ba dang/ dkyil 'khor du
312a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang/ /lha'i dam tshig bsgrag pa ni/ /mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni/ /khyed kyi snying la yang dag zhugs/ rtag tu yi dam lha yin gyi/ /tshul 'di smra bar ma byed cig /gal te tshul 'di smras na yang/ /de ma thag
312a4(rgyud 'grel): tu dral te gshegs zhes pa'o/ /de nas tsan dan gur kum la sogs pa'i chu khyor bar blugs la 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i tshul/ /dam tshig 'das na tshig par byed/ /gal te gsang sngags dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i
312a5(rgyud 'grel): chu 'dis 'grub ces brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgrag ste/ nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /nga yis bsgos pa'i las nyon cig /ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig /gal te khyed kyis bsnyas na ni/ /dam tshig 'di
312a6(rgyud 'grel): yis sreg bar byed/ /tsha ba chen po'i gnas su sreg ces pa'o/ /ye shes dbab pa/ de nas rdzas kyi dud pa btang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs ga nas/ /kha dog dmar ba'i a gton nas/ /slob ma'i snying gar gzhug
312a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /slob ma rnams kyis bde ba bsgom/ /'phar dang ldeg pa'i rtag byung na/ /de nyid brtan pa'i yan lag bya/ /ye shes dbab pa'o/ /phreng ba dor ba dang/ gdong g.yogs dgrol ba dang/ dkyil 'khor blta ba byas nas
312b1(rgyud 'grel): lhar bskyed la/ rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid las/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug ma yi gnas/ /dri ma rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bu khyed kyis ni blta bar gyis/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol te 'khor lo'i lhag de bzhin nyid ni bstan
312b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /gtso bo sgo mar bcas pa bstan/ /chu dang/ cod pan dang/ rdo rje dang/ dril bu dang/ ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas sku gsung thugs kyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa bskur ro/ /de yang dang po/ /yon phul nas ni
312b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol gdab bya/ /bum ba'i chu kun bsdus nas kyang/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur bya/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas pas/ /ji ltar phul bas mchod pa che/ /bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don du ni/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la gsol
312b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur te/ rdo rje dbang bskur chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pas/ /gsang gsum bzhi las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje gos sngon chu dbang sbyin/ /oM badzra nI lAM ba ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /
312b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas yon tan las byung ba'i/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba che/ /bsams pa thams cad 'byung pa'i gnas/ /rin chen gos sngon ka dbang bskur ro/ /oM ratna mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas rdo rje'i
312b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /di ring khyod la bskur byas pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /pad+ma'i gos sngon rdo rje zung/ /oM pad+ma nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas dril bu'i dbang
312b7(rgyud 'grel): bskur te/ /chos kun sgyu ma'i sgra sgrogs te/ /stong pa'i don las sad par byed/ /shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur bas/ /las kyi gos sngon dbang thob shog /oM karma nI lAM ba ra d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas ming gi dbang bskur 
313a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rdo rje'i ming ni bla med pas/ /cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pas/ /bla med byang chub des thob pa/ /bde gshegs gos sngon dbang thob shog /oM bud+d+ha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ des nas
313a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te/ /dbang stegs pad+ma 'dab brgyad dri/ /de steng slob ma bzhag nas ni/ /tshig gis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang gsol cig dkyil 'khor
313a3(rgyud 'grel): lha yi de nyid dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i de nyid rnams/ /bdag nyid slob dpon bgyid par 'tshal/ /de nas bum chus dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba byang chub sems kyi chu/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa ste/ /dri med rdo rje chu yi dbang/ /rdo rje
313a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chu dbang sbyin/ /rdo rje dam tshig sbyin te/ hUM thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso/ /yang dag thog ma med pa yi/ /
313a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /dril bu'i dam tshig sbyin/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyings shes 'gro bar 'dod/ /rtag tu khyed kyis kyang bzung ste/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mchog
313a6(rgyud 'grel): tu bzheng/ /oM badzra dipta driSh+Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgya/ mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid/ /'khyud pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /khyed kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /oM kA ya mu dA a
313a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni de nyid dang/ /slob dpon de nyid rab tu sbyin/ /de ba maN+Dal gu ru a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de la lha'i gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /sems can rnams la phan don phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji lta
313b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /rjes su gnang ba sbyin ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /rtag tu khyod kyis kyang gzung ste/ /lag na rdo rje'i brtul
313b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Tha sa ma ya/ a te de sha stwaM d+ha ra ya ni badzra satwa hi hi hi hi ha hUM zhes brtul zhugs sbyin no/ /de nas slob dpon gtso bor bsgoms te/ chos gos gyon pa'i tha ma lag pa g.yon pa'i khu chur
313b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis snying gar gzung la/ /lag pa g.yas pa mchod sbyin du bya/ kye 'dod chags rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bos la/ /sngags 'di brjod bar bya'o/ /sid+d+hi sa ma ya staM/ b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/ de nas lung bstan te/ sangs rgyas
313b4(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang dag pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mthu dang/ sngags kyi mthu nges par 'ong gis dad par gyis shig ces lung bstan par
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar ba yi/ /dge ba gang nges 'gro ba kun/ /phyag na rdo rje thob nas ni/ /'gro don ma lus byed par shog /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon klu sgrub dang/ 'gro bzang snying po'i
313b6(rgyud 'grel): don gcig tu bsdebs pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra pA Ni sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM bskal ba me ltar 'bar
313b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs/ /chos sku nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nyid las/ /gzugs sku 'ja' tshon lta bu'i skur snang ba/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po khros pa'i sku/ /zhal gcig
314a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing nag la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnun pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'chang ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen brdzes cod pan can/ /dbang bskur sangs rgyas mi bskyod
314a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis mdzes/ /smin bsdus smin ma glog stong 'od du 'phro/ /spyan gsum 'bar ba khro bo'i lta bas mdzes/ /mche ba gtsigs shing dbugs rgyu me ltar 'bar/ /a la la yi gang rgya ngas chen po sgrogs/ /ha ha'i gad mos steng gsum
314a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyal bar byed/ /hUM gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgra/ /phaT kyis thog 'bebs rdo rje ser chen 'bebs/ /gshin rje'i gzugs can rgyan dang cha lugs ldan/ /sku stong seng ge'i pags pas rnam par brgyan/ /na bza' chos gos
314a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po 'chang pa bsnabs/ /stag gi smad g.yogs pa ti khra bos brgyan/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i sprul gyis dbu brgyan cing/ /dga' bo nyer dga' i snyan chas rab tu mdzes/ /gdug pa 'bar ba zas su gsol par mdzad/ /? nag
314a5(rgyud 'grel): ser la kha ru brgyan pa ste/ /'dab bzang dkar pos ska rags rnams par bcings/ /nor rgyas bus ni phyag dang zhabs brgyan te/ /nyi zla'i steng na khro rgyal gar byed dgyes/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /rdo
314a6(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rigs mchog bcom ldan gtum po ste/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM bskal pa'i me 'bar klong na bzhugs pa 'di/ /nyon mongs 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis
314a7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthing nag ni/ /thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'i rtags/ /rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas na bsnams pa ni/ /ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga 'joms pa'i rtags/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'chang ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings
314b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa ni/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren pa'i rtags/ /sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yis brgyan pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dgongs pa'i rtags//
314b2(rgyud 'grel): smin bsdus smin ma glog stong 'phro ba ni/ /thugs rje'i thabs kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i rtags/ /mche gtsigs dbugs rgyu me ltar 'bar pa ni/ /thabs kyi spyod pas nyon mongs bsreg pa'i rtags/ /spyan gsum dmar ba khro bos blta
314b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi don dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /a la la yi gang rgyangs sgrogs pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum na 'gran zla med pa'i rtags/ /ha ha'i gad rgyangs stong gsum brgyal ba ni/ thabs mkhas thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul
314b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtags/ /hUM gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba ni/ /khro bo'i rigs rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /phaT kyis rdo rje'i thog ser 'bebs pa ni/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /gshin rje'i gzugs can rgyan dang cha lugs
314b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sku tshe yan lag rags te che ba'i rtags/ /sku stong seng ge'i pags pas brgyan pa ni/ /chos nyid don lan spros dang bral ba'i rtags/ /na bza' chos gos sngon po 'chang ba ni/ /tshul khrims don ldan dri ma med pa'i rtags/ /
314b6(rgyud 'grel): stag sham pa ti khra bos brgyan pa ni/ /zhe sdang 'du la mdzad sgrub mchog skyob pa'i rtags/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i sprul gyis dbu brgyan pa/ /'dod dgu bsam pa re ba skong ba'i rtags/ /dga' bo nye dga' snyan chas brgyan pa ni/ /bram ze'i
314b7(rgyud 'grel): klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /gdug pa 'bar bzas su gsol ba ni/ /gdol pa'i rigs rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /klu nag ser la kha ru brgyan pa ni/ /dmangs rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /'dab
315a1(rgyud 'grel): bzangs dkar po ska rags bcings pa ni/ /rgyal rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /nor rgyas bu yis phyag zhabs brgyan pa ni/ /rje rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /nyi zla'i steng na gar byed
315a2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bzung du 'brel ba'i rtags/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /nyon mongs 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos rtags so/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog bcom ldan gtum po ni/ /thabs dang spyod pas
315a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don byed pa'i rtags/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i skur bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags/ /sku yi yan lag rags te dpa' dang 'dra/ /rgyan dang cha lugs ldan te sgeg sgeg 'dra/ /zhe sdang 'joms
315a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad stag gi sham thabs can/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad sprul gyi chun pos brgyan/ /nyon mongs 'joms mdzad med pung klong na zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang/ /bcom ldan gtum po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//
315a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal phyag na rdo rje la don rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ /slob dpon dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsa ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur pa'o// //
315a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bA na badzra pA Ni sto tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /sku mchog 'bar ba'i 'od zer can/ /gdug pa ma lus
315a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad cing/ /stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /gsung mchog 'bar ba'i 'od zer can/ /ngag gi nyes pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /sngags rnams gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje
315b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /thugs mchog 'bar ba'i 'od zer can/ /rnam rtog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /sku mdog sngon po 'od zer 'bar/ /rdo rje'i rtogs kyis 'byung po 'dul/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal
315b2(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /las kyi gnod sbyin chen po rnams/ /'jigs su rung ba'i cha byad can/ /ma lus thams cad 'jigs bar byed/ /'jigs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na/ /gsang sngags rigs sngags kun gyi bdag
315b3(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /log 'den bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/ rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn nI lAM ba ra d+ha?
315b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA Na bA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis ni/ /ri bo
315b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la bde bar bzhugs/ /klu rigs rnams kyi dgrar gyur ba'i/ /khro rgyal spyi bos rab btud nas/ /de nas bla ma'i bka' drin las/ /ji lta'i rim pas sgrub pa yi/ /bdag nyid de ltar dran pa yis/ /'di ni bdag gis bri bar bya/ /de la khro
315b6(rgyud 'grel): bo'i bdag po yang dag par sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thog mar gdong khrus byas la phyag bya ste/ sa gzhi rnam par dag pa la me tog bkram nas de'i dbus su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar yi ge hUM kha dog sngon po
315b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam la/ /de'i 'od kyis rje btsun phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang thabs gcig pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul la mdun du bsam nas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa
316a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tAdz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de'i sgra'i don dang lhan cig tu stong pa nyid kyi don rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkhar yi ge a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
316a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du yi ge hUM kha dog sngon po 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'od kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par sbyangs nas rnam par grol bas so sor gos sngon po can gyi sku'i ngo bor byas la/ de nas 'od kyis bsdus nas sa bon
316a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi yi ge'i dbus su gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pas bltas la de nas de las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can thams cad drangs nas rdo rje la gzhug par bya'o/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa las//
316a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /shin tu khro bas dregs pa yi/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis bde bar bzhugs/ /na tshod bcu drug lon pa bzhin/ /drag cing khro bo'i nyams dang ldan/ /klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /zhal gcig pa
316a5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag gnyis pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa yis/ /bsnun pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin mdzad cing/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'chang ba dang/ /na bza' sngon po 'char ba bsnams/ /spyan dmar mche ba brtsigs pa ste/ /dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od
316a6(rgyud 'grel): zer bzhin/ /dbu skra dgyen brdzes cod pan can/ /ha ha'i sgra ni cher sgrogs pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs par byed/ /log 'dren la sogs bsregs par mdzad/ /bdag nyid de 'drer bsam par bya/ /de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge hUM
316a7(rgyud 'grel): bkod la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya/ /de nas mdun du bzhugs pa de la/ mchod par byas la/ /dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dgug pa dang gzhug ba dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o/ /yang lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs par bya ste/
316b1(rgyud 'grel): mgo dang lkog ma dang snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bkod la/ dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po dang bsam par bya'o/ /phyi nas ji srid nus par spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis mi skyo ba'i rab tu bsgom par bya'o/ /
316b2(rgyud 'grel): skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags yid kyis bzlas par bya ste/ myur ba dang dal ba dang gsal ba dang/ mi gsal ba spangs pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs la bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pas skyon/ oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NaM adya
316b3(rgyud 'grel): nutpan+na twat/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ /gsang sngags 'dis gtor ma gtang ngo/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i de ma thag tu ye shes sems dpa' mchod la/ khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun par dngos grub
316b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol/ de la bsnyen pa'i sngags ni/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /skal bar
316b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas sgrub thabs 'di la 'bad pas na/ /rang gi 'bad bas bla ma'i man ngag bdud rtsi ni/ /'thungs nas lus ni yongs su rgyas pa bskyed pa dang/ /rnal 'byor gcig gis byang chub sa ni bde thob 'gyur/ /skye ba snga ma'i yang dag
316b6(rgyud 'grel): skal bar ldan na yang/ /nyes pa 'di dag ji ltar spong bar nus pa 'gyur/ /bla ma'i drin gyis man ngag thob par gyur pa na/ /bsnyen pa med kyang dgongs pa 'di dag thams cad ni/ /de yis myur du dngos grub thob par gyur pa dang/ /dam pa'i
316b7(rgyud 'grel): gdam ngag phan pa'i bdud rtsi yi/ /thigs pas sdug bsngal phung po 'jigs par byed pas na/ /skye ba rnam rtog rdul rnams zhig par byed par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gos sngon can sgyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon 'gre
317a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta te dza de ba dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyi bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //
317a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni a ba ba la nI bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu gtor byed par 'dod pas dang
317a3(rgyud 'grel): po gtor ma'i snod ci 'byor pa'i nang du chu gtsang ma srog chags med pas khengs par bkang/ de'i nang du phyed dang/ rin po che lnga dang/ sman dang/ me tog la sogs pa ci 'byor pa btab la skyabs 'gro sems skyed byas la/
317a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje wa la gyis bsgoms la lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho haM(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas chu gtor gyi snod de stong par bsams la/ stong pa'i
317a5(rgyud 'grel): ngang las bruM ser po las gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi tshad tsam du bsams te/ de'i nang du gtor ma yi ge khaM ljang khu las kha zas ro brgya pa/ nam mkha' i tshad dang mnyam pa
317a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ de'i nang du/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Adya nutpan+na twat oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes 'jig rten pa'i bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis
317a7(rgyud 'grel): brlab ba ni/ oM rur? a'u ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa na sarba artha sA d+ha na ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags kyis spel ba ni/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): bi sho mu khe b+hya:/ sarba thA khaM
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ung+ga ta spha ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha' i khams su h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma dpag tu med pa bsams te/ de'i steng du yi dam lha la sogs pa 'gro drug thams cad spyan
317b2(rgyud 'grel): drangs la/ de rnams la yang 'od phog pas sdig sgrib dag nas yi dam gyi lhar byas la/ bdun rnam dag byas la bgegs bskrad pa ni oM badzra pA Ni a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT ces byas/ /oM nI lAM ba rad+ha ra badzra pA Ni A dz+nyAM
317b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ya ti i daM ba liM grih+na tu sa ma ya/ rak+ShaM tu ma ma sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tshiM tu ma ma sarba karma sA du swAhA zhes pas yi dam rnams la dbul/ /mgron gzhan rnams la yang sbyin pa na /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki taM oM saM b+ha ra stwaM ba ra hUM
317b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phan tshun zhe 'gras pa med pa dang/ 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas nas sngags 'dis yid la ci 'dod pa dang/ mig sngar ci mdzes pa mngon par dga' ba dang/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
317b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ oM ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa na sarba artha sA d+ha na ye swAhA/ sngags 'di gnyis lan bdun bdun du brjod do/ /de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/ /chos kyi sbyin pa ni rten 'brel snying po dang/ de nas chos rnams thams cad rgyu
317b6(rgyud 'grel): las byung/ /de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de la 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /dge sbyong chen pos 'di skad gsungs/ /sdig pa ci yang mi bgyi ste/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyang/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su dul/ 'di ni
317b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ zhes pa dang/ de nas smon lam gdab ba ni/ /dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te/ /bsod nams ye shes las byung pa'i/ /dam pa nyid ni thob par shog /zhes
318a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas bden pa bdar ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ chos kyi bden pa dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rigs sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i
318a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad zhi nas bar chad dang gnod pa thams cad spangs te byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis/ /klu rnams gnod pa myur du zhi ba
318a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bgegs dang log 'dren 'tshe ba med pa dang/ /bdag gi las rnams thams cad grub par mdzod/ /de nas rdo rje sems pa'i yi ge brgya pa brjod pa/ badzra mu zhes pas so sor rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o/ /rdo rje gos sngon
318a4(rgyud 'grel): po can gyi chu gtor gyi cho ga slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta te dzo de ba dang/ bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab kyis zhus shing gtan la
318a5(rgyud 'grel): phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra nA ga ra ba liM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi klu gtor gyi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po
318a6(rgyud 'grel): can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /byams dang snying rje byang chub sems/ /yang nas yang du bsgom byas nas/ /mdun du paM las pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dmar po 'dab brgyad de/ /phu brgyad las ni klu brgyad bskyed/ /de nas
318a7(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i 'od zer dang/ /oM phe phuM zhes pas klu chen brgyad/ /'khor dang bcas pa bkug la bstim/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas/ /dam tshig yi shes klu rnams mchod/ /de nas gtor ma byin brlabs
318b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /snod ni khaM las rin po che/ /shin tu mdzes shing blta na sdug /yangs la rgya ni che bar bsgom/ /rin chen snod mchod de nang du/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas/ /snod ni shin tu gang bar bsam/ /de yi steng du yi ge
