318b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /kha dog dri dang ro sbyangs dang/ /bdud rtsi ro mchog brgya dang ldan/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya la/ /ha ho hi baM dag las ni/ /dpag bsam shing chen bsam byas la/ /lo ma yal ga thams cad la/ /rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis
318b3(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /dpag tu med pa bsams nas ni/ /bruM las bdud rtsir char babs pas/ /gtor ma yongs su gang bar bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes lan gsum brjod/ /mgron rnams thams cad lce las ni/ /hUM las rdo rje spu gus rdub/ /oM ba su
318b4(rgyud 'grel): ki i maM bi laM ta kha kha khA ha khI hi/ oM tak+Sha ka oM maM ba liM ta kha kha oM karko Ta/ oM hu lutNa ka/ oM pad+ma/ oM mahA pad+ma/ oM shaM Sha pA la/ oM ko li sha ya/ oM nA ga pa na saM khru ha ra ha re i maM ba liM Ta/ kha la khA hi khA hi/
318b5(rgyud 'grel): i maM bi laM tsa la gdags/ oM pheM klu'i rgyal po sog ma med/ i maM bi lAM kha khA hi khA hi/ oM mdza' yas dang ni nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang/ /dung skyong dang ni rigs ldan dang/ /lha mo lha mo
318b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mo dang/ /zla ba zla ba spyi gtsug che/ /snying po med dang 'gu ling ta/ /dga' bo dang ni nyer dga' dang/ /rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che/ /gdung ba dang ni gdung ba che/ /dpal gyi 'od dang 'od bo che/ /rin chen 'od dang gzugs bzangs dang/ /gzugs
318b7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od dang sprul bzangs lto 'phye che/ /smig rgyu dang ni smig rgyu che/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma bzhes so/ /mdzes pa'i dkar gsum gtor ma 'di/ /mngar gsum 'o ma'i rgya mtshor
319a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /rin chen phreng ba'i them skas can/ /klu yi gnod pa skyob byed pa/ /mthun pa'i rdzas su 'di gyur cig /mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams la/ klu las gyur pa'i
319a2(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams la/ /mthong ba'i dug dang kha rlangs dug /bsam pa'i dug la sogs pa kun/ /de dag thams cad zhi gyur cig /bdag bsag ces pa'i rdzas khyer la/ /bdag la gnod pa ma byed par/ /rtag tu byams pa'i sems dang mi tha ma bu'i sems kyis
319a3(rgyud 'grel): ltos/ /gzhan yang las las skyes pa yi/ /bka' dang dam las thogs pa yi/ /gdug pa can gyi tshogs rnams kun/ /bka' yi pha babs? 'di snams la/ /so so rang re'i gnas su dengs/ /nyon cig nyon cig rigs kyi bu/ /ji ltar
319a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon tsha ba la/ /myu gu cha ba 'byung ba ltar/ /so so rang re'i gnas la spyod/ /'byung bzhi so so'i gyur yang srid/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'gyur ba med/ /las 'bras 'gyur zhing slu mi srid/ /de las khyod sdig ma byed par/ /dge
319a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bsam pas gnas par gyis/ /bden pa bdar la chos bshad bya/ /rdo rjes yi ge brgya ba brjod do/ /ye shes klu rnams gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig pa ni ma dmigs bsam/ /gtor ma rgya mtsho chen po 'am/ /yang na gnod pa'i phyogs su
319a6(rgyud 'grel): btang/ /rdo rje gos sngon gyi klu gtor cho ga slob dpon 'gro bzang snying bos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ga na tsakra pra nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo//
319a7(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul byed rdo rje can/ /de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal te/ /tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /tshogs kyi chog bshad par bya/ /gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' bar/ /phyag dang phyag phyag byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni rab
319b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs la/ /yang na maN+Dal sngon por bya/ /gdugs dang ba dan la sogs dbul/ /rdo rje can gyi rten rnams dgram/ /mched pa lnga dang ldan par bya/ /gtor chogs rnams kyang bzang du bsham/ /bdag nyid yi dam lhar ni bskyed/ /mig gnyis dag tu nyi zla bsgom//
319b2(rgyud 'grel): de steng hUM ni bsam par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pas bsreg /de nas ni bsrung bya'i phyir/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ shar gyi phyogs su rab 'phros pas/ /rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo ste/ /sku mdog dkar la 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna
319b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs thogs/ /dpag tu med pas gang ba bskyed/ /oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ rin chen rigs kyi khro bo ste/ /sku mdog ser la 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /dpag tu med pas gang ba bskyed/ /oM grih+Na pa ya grih+NA pa ya
319b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT/ pad+ma rigs kyi khro bo ste/ /sku mdog dmar la 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ dpag tu med pas gdab bskyed/ /oM A na ya ho bidya rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ /las kyi rigs kyi khro bo ste/ /sku mdog sngo la 'jigs pa gzugs/ /phyag na
319b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /dpag tu med pas gang bar bskyed/ /phyogs gsum spros pa shes par bya/ /rdo rje gur dang rab bsam/ /de la me dpung 'bar ba bskyed/ /de nas mgron rnams spyan drangs la/ /bdun po yongs su dag par bya/ /de nas gtor ma gtong
319b6(rgyud 'grel): chog bzhin/ /rgyas par rab tu dbul bar bya/ /de nas tshogs la bgegs bskrad la/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /de nas tshogs bdag bkod pa ni/ /tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag po ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /tshogs kyi bdag ba gzhugs su
319b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /dus gsum bla ma rnams dang ni/ /jo bo dkon mchog gsum po dang/ /bstan pa srung ba'i chos skyong dang/ /dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs/ /tshogs kyi bdag por bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas tshogs ni dbul ba ni/ /dus
320a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum bla ma rnams dang ni/ /yi dam lha tshogs 'khor bcas la/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul lags na/ /thugs rje cher dgongs dngos grub gsol/ /a la la te mchod pa bzhes/ /lha rnams 'dul phyir gos
320a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas la/ /lha sin 'dul phyir gos dmar can/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas la/ /klu rnams 'dul phyir gos dmar can/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas la/ /bla med dkon gsum
320a3(rgyud 'grel): po la/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i chos skyong la/ /lhag ma yul bdag rnams la sbyin/ /de nas tshogs la longs spyod pa/ /lhag ma 'byung po'i gtor ma btang/ /glu dang gar dang bskor ba sogs/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dbul/ /de nas
320a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug gi las rnams su/ /mchod bstod yi ge brgya pas bshags/ /bzod par gsol zhes gshegs pa ni/ /gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/ /legs sbyangs 'di la nyes pa gang/ /de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/ /gtso bo
320a5(rgyud 'grel): nus pa ma mchis shing/ /ma tshang ba dang ma tshogs pa/ /de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/ /hUM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /nyid kyi yul du gshegs su gsol/ /nyid kyi yul du gshegs
320a6(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /thugs kyis brtse bar slar dgongs la/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): yis gshegs su gsol/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga grub pa thos pa'i slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rta gon// //
320a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra bA Ni maN Dal b+hi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang/ /bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /de yi dkyil
320b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cho ga brtsam/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod pa'i don du/ dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du/ bdag nyid lhar bskyed nas/ /snying po 'bum pa blas par bya
320b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am/ yang na ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar de srid kyi bar du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ni sngon du bsnyen pa byed pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas/ sa'i chog bya ste/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ /kun dga' ra ba 'o/ /
320b3(rgyud 'grel): nags tshal la sogs pa yid du 'ong pa'i gnas su sa bslang pa dang/ sa sbyang ba dang/ sa gzung ba dang/ sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ tshad brtag pa dang/ dbyibs brtag pa dang/ kha dog brtag pa'o/ /de la sa bspang? ba ni/ gnas kyi bdag
320b4(rgyud 'grel): bo la bslang ba ni/ maN+Dal dang dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu byas te/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams nas/ oM bi ti baM sa A karSha ya dza(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis brgyad ba sa la reg par byas pas/
320b5(rgyud 'grel): sa'i lha mo 'khor dang dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ sa'i lha mo la mchod pa dang/ de'i 'khor la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ skyong pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyab par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa
320b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya se ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde/ /'pham par byas te dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod la/ byon par bsams te mchod
320b7(rgyud 'grel): la gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas sbyangs pa'i phyir drag po dang ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang 'dom gang nye 'khor du/ lte ba nub tsam 'am/ bus mo nub tsam brkos la gseg ma dang gyo mo dang/ rus pa la sogs pa gsal te/ spos chus
321a1(rgyud 'grel): bran te/ sa de nyid kyis bkang nas sa'i ltas brtag par bya ste/ sa bslang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de'i rjes la sa gzung ba ni/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ /bla? bre la sogs pa bres la/ sku gzugs rnams bkram nas/ /phyogs
321a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir spos rgyun mi 'chad par btul bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa der gtugs te/ yi ge brgya pa lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ /sa bzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis brlab pa na/ sa gzung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ste/
321a3(rgyud 'grel): sa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas khrus bya zhing dris byugs la/ gos sngon po'i stod g.yogs bgos la rgyan gdags shing rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pas/ gal te nus na smyur bar gnas pa dang/ ma nus na zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /
321a4(rgyud 'grel): de la re shig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ tshogs bsags pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de la yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje chen po nam mkha' i ched dang
321a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i khong stong bsam pa ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /de'i steng b+hwaM las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa bskyed la/ dbus su a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la//
321a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i bar du byas la lha mo mchod nas/ gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos mtshan brgya rtsa
321a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pas bstod la gsol ba gdab ste/ mig g.yas par ma las nyi ma/ /g.yon par Ta dang a las zla ba/ rkang mthil du a las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas na/ bdag nyid lha'i
321b1(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal gsal bar byas nas/ dbus kyi gtso bo nam mkhar bteg la khro bo'i bstod pa bya'o/ /de la bstod pa ni/ chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong zhing/ thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs
321b2(rgyud 'grel): byed skur ston pa/ /khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klod dkyil nas/ /dpa' bo'i stang stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis/ /bgegs dpung bsreg
321b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ ces brjod nas bka' bsgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa bzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig /nga ni gnas 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po 'dri/ /bgegs kyi
321b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs tshogs gang yin 'byed par gyis/ /ci ste nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/ /ye shes can gyi rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis/ /spyi bo tshal ba brgyad ni rab bgems shing/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ zhes bya ba dang/ deng
321b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
321b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po zhig rtsom gyis/ gang su yang rung ba sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang brjed byed dang 'byung po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ rig
321b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la sogs pa rgan po dang/ rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams 'dir mi gnas par gzhan du dengs shig /de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka' thos pas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni/ nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po
322a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal ba brgyad 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes lan gsum brjod do/ rdo rje chen po'i gar dang/ rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa gzhi lan gsum bskor zhing/ rang gi lus la khro bo'i tshogs byung la/ snang
322a2(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad bskyod par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge hUM gis bsrung pa'i 'khor lo byas pa la/ 'phur bu lnga stong phyag na rdo rje smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+naM ban d+ha hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad
322a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la dbus dang gwa bzhir/ oM g+ha g+ha ta ga ta ya g+hA ya sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI ya la kI ya la sarba pA baM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra b+ha ra a dz+nya pa ya ti kA ya bak+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces bya bas btab la/ oM badzra mud ga da A
322a4(rgyud 'grel): kO Ta ya hUM phaT/ zhes bya bas bsdud par bya'o/ /de nas bsrung skud bcing pa dang/ gu gul gyis bdug pa dang/ me tog gi phreng bas gdags shing dri'i thig le byas nas/ byams pa'i go cha bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam lnga
322a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying po bzlas pa'i dri'i chus byugs la/ dbus su bri'i thig le bya'o/ /me tog gi tshom bu bkram nas/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sngags kyis bteg pa'i lha gzhugs su gsol/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ yi ge
322a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis gnas gsum du phyin gyis brlabs la mchod pa lnga dang/ mchod pa rgyas pa dang/ bstod pa byas nas snyan gsan ?? pa bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma kun la brtse ba dang/ /
322a7(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ zhes lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ lta lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas 'byor ba yod
322b1(rgyud 'grel): na sbyin sreg gi mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma'i cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin du gtor ma btang nas/ slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste/ khrus byas la/ me tog lag na thogs te/ slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas/ gsol ba btang ste
322b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bshags byas te/ de nas lhar bskyed gnas mchod pa byas te so shing dor ba dang/ ku sha sbyin pa dang/ srung sdud gdags pa dang/ zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya ste/ rgyas par ni bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i cho ga las shes par bya'o/ /slob ma
322b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de ltar lhag par gnas pa byas nas/ nad par nyi ma shar dang/ mchod pa bshams la dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bteg ste/ sa gzhi ba'i rnam lnga dang/ dris byugs nas/ thig byin gyis brlabs la cho ga bzhin du thig gdab par bya'o/
322b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshon dgye bar bya ste/ tshon byin gyis brlabs la dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri ba dang/ phyogs kyi rim par tshon dgyi ba dang/ rtsig pa la phyi rol dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang ljang gu dang/ nag po dang/ kha khyer
322b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rin po che pha gu ser po dang/ dza? badzra phyir nag po/ rta babs ci mdzes par bri bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas/ /rgongs ka'i dus su mchog pa'i rdzas rnams bsags nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ lha'i nga rgyal gyis dkyil 'khor
322b6(rgyud 'grel): bteg la yid kyis dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs te/ lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes bzhi par byi ba'i phyir/ lan bdun bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba der la slang rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid ltar bskyed la/ mdun pa?
322b7(rgyud 'grel): lha yang yi ge yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjer/ de la 'od zer spros bsdu byas nas/ lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs lta ba rdzogs par byas nas mchod pa rgyas pa dbul bar bya'o/ /bstod pa byas nas bum pa bcug
323a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bzlas pa byas nas chung bzhul sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg bya ba dang/ gtor ma btang nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'o/ /de la dang por gsol ba btab pa dang/ gdod g.yogs bcing ba dang/
323a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bshags bya ba dang/ sdom pa bzung ba dang/ lhar bskyed cing las thams cad pa'i bum pas sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang/ slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags pa dang/ ye
323a3(rgyud 'grel): shes dbab pa dang/ phreng ba dor ba dang/ gdod g.yogs dgrol ba dang/ dkyil 'khor lta ba byas nas/ lhar bskyed nas/ chu dang cod pan dang/ bdag po dang/ ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas sku gsung thugs kyi brtul zhugs
323a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spangs pa dang/ ye shes la sogs pa'i dbang dang/ rjes su gnang ba dang/ brtul zhugs kyi dbang la sogs pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar ba 'di/ /dge ba gang des thob pa kun/ /phyag na rdo rje thob nas ni/ /'gro don du ma byed
323a5(rgyud 'grel): par shog /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya badzra pA Ni nI lAM bar d+ha ra sA d+ha tsin+ta ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
323a6(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba dang/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas shing gcig la sogs pa'i phyogs su stan 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying
323a7(rgyud 'grel): ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas la pa'i hUM nag po bsams nas de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas te/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing sdig pa
323b1(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms zhes bya ba tshad med pa changs pa'i gnas bzhi bsams la/ gcig dang du ma dang bral bas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang/ bdag nyid
323b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang stong par bsams la tho rang sa kyi skar ma dang 'dra bar bdag nyid ma dmigs shing/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya bas ni brtan par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge paM las pad+ma nag po'i lte bar yi ge hUM las byung ba'i maM nyi ma'i
323b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su hUM kha dog nag po dang ring po'i sgra sbyir sgra'i yi ge hUM bsams la/ de yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam zhing de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la khro bo'i rigs kun bkug la de nyid gzhug ste/ de yongs su
323b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/ sku mdog nag po sprin lta bu/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum dmar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal khro gnyer can/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ ral pa'i cod? pan
323b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbus na mi bskyod pa sku mdog nag pos brgyan pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje phyar te gnas pa/ phyag g.yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis gdug pa gnon pa'i sdigs
323b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub 'chad ba/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM nag po dang ldan pa/ gos sngon po'i ga sha dang/ sham thabs bsnams pa/ rigs kyi klu brgyad kyis dbu brgyan mdzad pa ni 'jog po dang/ rigs ldan
323b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ zhabs gnyis la mdza' yas dang nor rgyas kyi bu nag po/ snyan gnyis la pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po'o/ /skar gsum bcings pa ni dud skyong dkar po/ ral pa gcig pa'i srang bu ni hUM lu ta ljang gu 'dzin pa/ bdud thams cad dang/
324a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po dang/ /khyab 'jug la sogs pa mu stegs pa'i gzhung dang gzugs 'joms par bsams la/ de dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can mdun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs par bsams la rang gi snying ka nas
324a2(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi mchod la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ tha mi dad par bya ba'o/ /de nas lce la yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa de nyid kyis mtshon
324a3(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la ye shes pa'i thugs ka na yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa hUM gis mtshan pa bsams te/ mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug la yang yi ge hUM drug yongs su gyur ba las de dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can drug bkod de/ yi ge gsum
324a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te/ ru rak+Sha'i phreng ba las bzla bar bya'o/ /oM nI lAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA ni hUM hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags 'di yi ge bcu gsum pa'o/ /oM badzra pA ni hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po yi ge bdun pa'o//
324a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag la yang sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na drag po'i las 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang pa'i las ni dur khrod du byin la/ me thab gru gsum bcas la bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang/ dur khrod kyi thal ba dang/
324a6(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe dang/ da du ra dang/ khrag dang/ dug dang bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan la/ bcad bcing bsregs na zhag bdun nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /hUM dang phaT spangs pa'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis mngar gsum la swAhA'i mdza' can gyis bsregs
324a7(rgyud 'grel): na/ zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyas pa la ni oM gyi mdza' can gyis so/ /dbang la ho'i mdza' can gyis so/ /dgug pa la ni dza(rgyud 'grel): 'i mdza' can gyis so/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A
324b1(rgyud 'grel): dya nu tpan+na twat ces pa'am/ snying po 'am nye ba'i snying pos gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /gtor ma gtong ba'i rdzas ni bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ gzhib pa dang/ bldag pa 'os pa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /ldang ba'i dus su ye shes sems
324b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' kri d+ha A(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol ba dang/ sbyod lam bzhi de'i ngang gis gnas par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje khro bo che/ /sgrub thabs gsal ba 'di byas pas/ /bsod nams gang zhig bsags pa des/ /sgrub pa 'di
324b3(rgyud 'grel): yis las kun byed par shog/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dngos grub brnyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po nyin mdzad rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ phyag na
324b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI ku mA ra kA shu'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus ba'o// //
324b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na ho ma ta bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

325a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ zhi ba 'ba' zhig gi las la/ thab khung rgyar khru gang ba/ zabs su de'i phyed la kha khyer sor bzhi spangs su brtsig pa dang/ sor bzhi phyir dor? la/ tha mar ga bzhir byas te/ sgo bzhir sgo khyud dang ldan par byas la/ sa

325a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dngul dang/ dar dkar po dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ 'obs chan dang/ ku sha dang/ dur ba la sogs pa bsags la/ dgongs mo'i dus su sbyin sreg bya ste/ bdag nyid ji lta ba

326a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra a na le mahA b+hU ta dzwa lA/ sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+Ta na hUM zhes pas mar gyi dgang blugs kyi'o/ /oM agna na ye swAhA mar gyi'o/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha nA ya swAhA til gyi'o/ /oM badzra agnan ye swAhA yaM shing gi'o/ /oM sarba saM
326a3(rgyud 'grel): ba de swAhA/ zho dang 'o ma'o/ /oM mahA be gA ye swAhA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ye swAhA/ nas so ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ 'bras so ba'i 'o/ /oM mahA pa lA ya swAhA/ sran ma'i 'o/ /oM badzra mu dz+nyA ye swAhA/ sran ma ma sha'i

328a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa mdun gyis nam mkha' la spyan drangs te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod ba dbul ba dang/ yan lag bdun pa byas la de'i rjes la tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas

328a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bsal nas slar 'dus pa las rdo rje'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje 'phyar ba/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bstan pa zhabs g.yas bskum/ g.yon
328a4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba/ gdug pa'i tshogs kyis sku la brgyan par bsgom/ de las rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod nas rang la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ rang gi spyi bor mi bskyod pa
328a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs te ji srid du sems mi 'phro bar mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /mi rtog pa bsgom/ drag po'i las byed par 'dod na rdzas la sogs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin no/ /raM las
328a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i steng du hUM/ de las 'od 'phros pas rdul phra rab thams cad rdo rje'i snying por byas te 'dus pa las rdo rje'o/ /de las rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgom par bya'o/ /yang na skad cig gis stong par bsams te/ cho ga gsum gyis phyag na rdo rjer
328a7(rgyud 'grel): ldang bar bya'o/ /yang na badzra hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis skad cig gis lhag gi tsher? chu las nya ldang ltar rdo rje snying por lngar ba bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms nas ldan bar 'dod na/ rang gi snying gar sa bon gyi mthar/ badzra badzra hUM zhes brjod pas rang brtan?
328b1(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dug 'jil bar byed pa'i sngags brgya 'am lnga bcu la sogs pa thogs ma nyid du zlos par bya ste/ des klu'i dug 'jil bar byed pa'o/ /de nas mdza' yas bskyed bar bya ste/ /mdun du 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho 'am/ de'i steng du
328b2(rgyud 'grel): paM las pad+ma'i steng du phu las/ klu mdza' yas sku mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa stod mi smad sbrul/ mgo la sbrul mgo dgu yod pa/ sbrul rigs lnga'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rang dang 'dra ba'i btsun mos 'khyud pa bsam mo/ /de nas
328b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/ klu'i gnas nas mdza' yas rang rgyud pa bkug la bstim pas bya'o/ /de nas bdag la bka' mod? par bya ste/ de nas klu'i srog snying dang bcas pa bzlas te/ 'di ni bsnyen pa'i sngags so/ /de yang tshogs
328b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs ba la ni/ rang dang blu gnyis ka'i sa bon las 'od zer dkar po 'phros/ 'dus pas sdig pa thams cad dag par bsam mo/ /ba dra bo la ni 'od zer nag po dang dmar bo dang me lta bu 'am/ yang na rang dang 'dra ba'i khro bo 'am rlung grangs med pa
328b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros te/ de dag gis gnod pa dpag tu med pa byed par bsam mo/ /de yang rgyun du ni bsnyen pa nyid do/ /gdon thams cad la ni sngags thams cad do/ yang na gang yin pa de nyid do/ /'jog par 'dod na gtor ma btang la bstod nas 'phrin las bcol
328b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing gshegs bar mkhyen par byas nas/ daM tshig sems dpa' rang gi sa bon la bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas smon laM gdab pa dang/ mdo 'don pa la sogs pa ci bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /bla ma'i bka' drin mnos pa la brten te/ /sgrubs thabs
328b7(rgyud 'grel): man ngag sbrang rtsi rab tu btung/ /'thung byed rab tu dang bas de dag la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis skyob byed shog /rdo rje snying po'i man ngag sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba paN+Di ta dz+nyA na sh+rI mdzad ba rdzogs so// //'phags pa gos sngon po can
329a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga ni/ /rgyud chen mdo dang mi 'gal bar/ /bdag gis dran phyir bri bar bya/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /dang por bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /
329a2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal mchod yon mchod pa dang/ /tshul bzhin gtor ma bshams nas ni/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bskyed la/ /ye shes lha ni spyan drangs la/ /mchod pa lnga yis mchod de bstod/ /maN+Dal steng du sku gzugs gzhag /dam tshig lha ru byin brlabs nas/
329a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /gnyis med gos sngon bstim byas la/ /mchod dang bstod pa gong bzhin bya/ /med na maN+Dal dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad legs bris la/ /de dbus hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /dam tshig lha ru bskyed byas nas//
329a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bstim zhing mchod/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /'bum maM khri yi bar du bzlas/ /mtshan ma byung nas dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /dang por sa gzhi brtag byas la/ /khru gang yang na khru do ru/ /khrus nas skyon rnams bsal bar
329a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /nang du nor bu rin chen gzhug /'thas par bcags la dri yis byung/ /lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed byas la/ /sa yi lha mo bstan ma la/ /mchod bstod gsol btab bka' yang bsgo /dam tshig can gyi srung ma la/ /gtor ma sbyin la 'phrin las
329a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /pus btsugs lag tu spos thogs la/ /ye shes lha la gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sa yi bgegs rnams kyang/ /drag po sngags kyis bskrad par bya/ /skyon bral dngul gyi bum pa ni/ /lto ba che la mgrin pa ring/ /rgyan dang mche ni rdzogs
329a7(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /byin brlabs gos sngon ltar bskyed cing/ /spyan drangs mchod yon mchod pas mchod/ /bzlas pa brgya ni rtsas brgyad bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sta gon ni/ /me tog dgram zhing gsang sngags bzlas/ /gdan dang lha ru bskyed byas la/ /
329b1(rgyud 'grel): de la mchod cing gsol ba gdab/ /lan gsum rab tu brjod par bya/ /de nas blo ldan slob ma la/ /khrus byas lus ni dris byugs la/ /me tog thogs la phyag 'tshal gzhug/ gsol gdab gnang ba sbyin pa dang/ /skyabs 'gro sdig bshags la sogs
329b2(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /yan lag bdun pa nyid kyis bya/ /slob dpon gyis brjod slob mas nyan/ /de nas sems bskyed cho ga ni/ /slob dpon slob ma nyis kas bzlas/ /de ltar slob ma snod ldan la/ /dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka ru/ dri yi thig le gsum byas la/ /
329b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma zla ba pad+ma gsum/ /snying ka la sogs dgod par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM yi ge las/ /'bras bu sku gsung thugs lhar bsgom/ /me tog spos la sogs pas mchod/ /srung skud la sogs sbyin byas la/ /chos bshad rmi lam brtag bar bya/ /nang
329b4(rgyud 'grel): par sngar langs dkyil 'khor bri/ /'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dbus su gos sngon dgod par bya/ /d+hu po la sogs lha mo dang/ /sgo ba bzhi yang dgod par bya/ /ba dan la sogs rgyan rnams dang/ /mchod pa gtor ma dgram par bya/ /de nas
329b5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin tshul bskyed la/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga bya ba ni/ /gtor ma gtang la 'thor 'thung bya/ /gsol btab gdong g.yogs bcing ba dang/ /bka' bsgo me tog ga dor byas la/ /mig phye lha yi ngo yang bstan/ /de nas rig pa'i dbang bskur te/ /dang
329b6(rgyud 'grel): por bum pa lag thogs la/ /bkra shis glu blangs buM dbang bskur/ /oM sid d+hi sid d+hi zhes bzlas/ /de nas sngags rigs kyis 'jug la/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes btags la /chu yi de ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dbu rgyan la sogs pa/ /bya ba'i rgyud
329b7(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun byas la/ /rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa thams cad bslabs la/ de nas lha la mchod bstod bya/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas gos sngon can bsgrubs cing/ /bye brag gis ni las thams cad
330a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub tu rung ngo/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan bo nag po dang/ tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur
330a2(rgyud 'grel): cing gtan la phab pa'o// (//phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi cho ga bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du /nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang
330a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa kun bcom de nyid rtogs gyur kyang/ /thugs rje'i rgyun gyis 'jigs pa'i sku sprul pa/ /klu dbang la sogs
330a4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pas phyag byas pa'i/ /gos sngon phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig mthong bas sdug bsngal sel 'gyur zhing/ /gang du smin pas dngos grub skal gyur phyir/ /dri med rgyud mang mthong dang bla ma yi/ /drin thob gyur
330a5(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /gang zhig dbang rnams rim thob dam tshig ldan/ /brten zhing dul ba bzod ldan blo gros che/ /dpa' zhing brtson ldan drangs la g.yo sgyu med/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rab shes dang/ /de nyid bcu shes
330a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri bar mkhas// mtshan nyid dang ldan gyur pa'i bla ma la/ /skal ldan slob mas gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /snod ldan gyur na bla mas gnas ba sbyin/ /slob ma'i lte bar hUM gi yi ge ni/ /du ba'i mdog can 'od zer
330a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba bsam/ /snying kar kaM yig nag po smig pa yi/ /rang bzhin bltas te hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /sna rtser bton te ltung bas sdig pa ni/ /mi sdug cer bu skra grol nyal thag cing/ /til mar gyis bsgos gnag la rid pa bsam//
330b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin la/ /badzra yak+Sha sogs sngags kyis zos pa 'am/ /hUM las byung ba'i phur bus gdab par bya/ /saM las kun tu bzang po bskyed nas ni/ /snying gar hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsam/ /spyi bor gtugs te rtsa sngags lan gsum
330b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /bzlas te slob ma yongs su bsrung bar bya/ /dben zhing nyam dga' i gnas su bdag nyid ni/ /ting 'dzin sum ldan mtshan ma thob ba 'am/ /bzlas pa 'bum rdzogs yang na zla gcig dang/ /zla drug la sogs bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya/ /de ltar
330b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs nas/ /khang stong dag gam dur khrod dang/ /sbum med drag po'i las can dang/ /de bzhin tshang tshing mi bzad 'jigs/ /de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /yang na yid ni gang dag du//
330b4(rgyud 'grel): nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /mdor na sa gzhi nyams dga' dang/ /mdangs bsam shar du gzhol bar bshad/ /yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yi/ /las ni legs par sbyar bar bya/ /tsan dan a ka ru sogs la/ /dri zhim chu dang ba sogs kyi/ /
330b5(rgyud 'grel): chag chag legs par gdab par bya/ /phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma ni/ /sbyin par byas te gsol ba gdab/ /sa yi lha mo sku mdog ser/ /phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams pa ni/ /zlos bkug mchod de gsol ba gdab/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad
330b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin pa yi/ /sa 'dir dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes brjod nas mkhar gdegs par bya/ /bdag dang slob ma sa bdag sogs/ /zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang ni/ /bgegs rnams bzlog bar bya ba'i phyir//
330b7(rgyud 'grel): zhi dang drag po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas pus nub 'dom gang par/ /brus te rdo dang rus sogs bsal/ /slar yang sa yis de nyid dgang/ /gal te lhag par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub yod par ston pa yin/ /de ltar sbyang ba byas pa dang/ /dri zhim chu dang
331a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i sas/ /gru bzhi shin tu 'thas byas te/ /dri zhim chu dang ba yi lngas/ /shar nas brtsams te legs byugs la/ /grwa bzhi sgo bzhi khang brtsegs ma/ /rta babs sgar khung dra ba can/ /me tog chun 'phyang sogs ldan pa'i/ /
331a2(rgyud 'grel): khang pa'i nang chud rgyan sogs dgram/ /de nas hUM baM hUM zhes pas/ /rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' bsam/ /hUM suM hUM las byung ba yi/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i ri rab bskyed/ /de steng hUM laM hUM byung ba'i/ /gser gyi sa bzhi bru bzhi pa/ /bskyed de thal bcings kha
331a3(rgyud 'grel): sbub la/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba band+ha hUM/ de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal ni/ /bsrung ba'i sngags kyis bsrung bya ba/ /sa yi cho gar gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing/ /shin tu sngo ba'i
331a4(rgyud 'grel): gom? bgos te/ /ji snyed rgyan gdags dri zhim bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus nas shar du bltas/ /ji ltar sgrub thabs las bshad pa'i/ /ting 'dzin gsum ni bsgom pa dang/ /bzlas pa dag la brtson pa la/ /grogs mchog rnams kyis bstod
331a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol gdab/ /gsang ba'i bdag po brtson chen po/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i lus/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po brtson chen po/ /sangs rgyas gsung dang 'dra ba'i ngag /'dod chags rdo
331a6(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rang bzhin bdag /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po brtson chen no/ /sangs rgyas thugs dang 'dra ba'i yid/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag /rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la sman slad du//
331a7(rgyud 'grel): gdub pa thams cad 'dul byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de ltar gsol gdab bdag po yi/ /nga rgyal brtan pas langs nas ni/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin rdo rje can/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag rang yin/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che//
331b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen rnal 'byor can bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po'i bdag /phyag na rdo rje bstan bdag ste/ /byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro/ /zhes brjod badzrod ti Sha yis/ /dkyil 'khor mkhar bteg ma Ta yis/ /nyi ma zla ba hUM mtshan nyid/ /rkang 'og
331b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam byas nas/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs bskor bas/ /bgegs bskrad ra ba sa gzhi kun/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du bsam/ /de nas dbus su gnas nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs
331b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das
331b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhin 'bar pa'i/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mgo ni tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing/ /zhig bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ zhes brjod byang shar nas brtsams te/ /khro bo'i gar gyi 'dor stangs kyis/ /drag tu lan gsum bskor byas la/ /
331b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus 'dug bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod/ /bdag slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas/ /slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /sa phyogs 'dir bcom
331b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dri bas lha dang lha yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ brjed byed dang/ 'byung po dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags grub pa rgan po dang/
331b7(rgyud 'grel): rgan mo 'khor dang g.yog tu btsas pa gang dag 'khor pa rnams dengs shig /de ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' thos nas myur du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni/ /phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu 'bar ba khro bzhin 'bar ba'i ye shes
332a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje chen po 'dis mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas bar byed do/ /de ltar brjod nas dbus su ni/ /mthun pa'i stang stabs shar la sogs/ /phyogs bzhi stang stabs bzhi yis ni/ /bgegs rnams tshar gcad bsrung 'khor bya/ /de nas
332a2(rgyud 'grel): phur bu lnga la ni/ /dri phyug me tog srad? bu dmar/ /btags te zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /smad ni mdud ltar byin brlabs te/ /phur pa'i gsang sngags legs brjod la/ /g+ha g+ha la sogs kyis gdab bya/ /de nas dbus su dris byugs la/ /baM las
332a3(rgyud 'grel): ma yi lha mo bskyed/ /bkug ste mchod la gsol ba gdab/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad bar dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom
332a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi steng/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ zhes ni lan gsum brjod de bstim/ /de nas dris yis legs byugs la/ /dri yi thig le dgu byas te/ /me tog tshom bu lhar bskyed la/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor phab
332a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod/ /rdo rje 'char ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor bdag ni 'dri bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyod rnams la yang mchod pa'i
332a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang pa mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags lta rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha
332a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang yang rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na/ /deng bdag
332b1(rgyud 'grel): slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bas ni dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes ni lan gsum gsol btab la/ /mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya/ /de nas bum pa dgu 'am bcu/ /mtshan
332b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang ldan bkru byas te/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan byas la/ /sman 'bru rin chen lnga dri chu/ /btsal te mgul bcings kha brgyan la/ /rnam rgyal bum pa gtso bo'i mdun/ /lhag ma phyi rol dag la 'god/ /las byed bum pa sgo 'gram dgod/ /
332b3(rgyud 'grel): baM las bum bskyed de'i nang du/ /lha rnams skad cig gis bskyed la/ /ye shes sems dpa' dgug sogs bya/ /mchod bstod byas te gtso bo la/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sa bon de nyid gsum ldan ni/ /lhag ma rnams ni bzla bar bya/ /de
332b4(rgyud 'grel): nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i/ /slob ma nang du pos byas la/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don gnyer gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan/ /gzhan dag 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /'jig rten pha
332b5(rgyud 'grel): rol don gnyer ba'i/ /dad pa mang du byad pa yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu gnyer mi bya/ /gal te 'di 'bras don gnyer na/ /'jig rten pha rol 'grub mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol la dmigs na/ /'bad pa med
332b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'di 'bras 'grub/ /ces brjod slob mas gsol ba gdab/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston ba bas/ /slob dpon khyed ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen por bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshigs de nyid stsal du
332b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /bu chur theg 
333a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs
333a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po'i 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi
333a3(rgyud 'grel): bzad pa/ /dpung chen dgra yang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces brjod slob mas bshags sogs bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par
333a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub tu sems bskyed/ /de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du/ /khu tshur spos chur ldan pa yis/ /thig le byas te zla ba dang/ /pad+ma nyi steng sa yig gsum dgong/ /sku gsung thugs su byin
333a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab nas/ /dus 'di nas ni gzung nas ni/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /dus kun tu ni bde bar mnos/ zhes brjod me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /a shwatTha sogs so shing ni/ /sor bcu
333a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis drang srog chags med/ /rtse mo me tog gis btags sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /shar ram byang du bltas te dor/ /byang shar lho nub steng 'og tu/ /zhi rgyas mngon spyod dbang rigs 'dzin/ /sa 'og dngos
333a7(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir lhung med/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sogs sngags skyor chu blung/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal bzlas pa yis/ /ku sha stan dang sngas su sbyin/ /sngags de bzlas pa'i srung spung ni/ /mdud pa gsum ldan dpung g.yas bcing/ /de nas
333b1(rgyud 'grel): gzengs bstod phyir 'chos pa/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u duM bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis
333b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa bgyi bar 'gyur ba gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur lag na/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la
333b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas par smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phang bla med thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros rtag tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /bdag nyid
333b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyes pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab
333b5(rgyud 'grel): tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams 'dir ni dong bas na/ /rang byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /de ltar chos bshad spro
333b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la/ /bzhin bzangs longs la song zhig dang/ /sang ni thar pa chen po yi/ /grong khyer mchog ni mthong 'gyur zhes/ /brjod la nyal du gtang bar bya/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi/ /mdza' legs dag tu nyal bar bya/ /de ltar
333b7(rgyud 'grel): lhag gnas rdzogs byas nas/ /nang par skya reng shar ba dang/ /lha yi rnal 'byor ldan byas te/ /slob ma'i rmi lam brtag byas la/ /ngan na sbyin sreg gis bzlog bya/ /nyi ma 'char kar gyur pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bteg byas la/ /thig
334a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa ni brtsams par bya/ /sar pa legs par bka' nas kyang/ /tshad dang mi thun pa'i mdzes pa ni/ /kha dog so sor bsgyur byas la/ /oM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bkod de/ /'bar ba'i lha rnams bkug nas ni/ /gcig tu bsgril
334a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba yin/ /oM n+yo n+ya oM nu ga ta sarba d+harmA ba ras pa ra sarba d+harmA/ /a tyan ta a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ grogs mchog khams gsum rnam rgyal du/ /dmigs te dza gsum gyis thig drang//  
334a3(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byang ltar tshangs thig gdab/ /mer gnas byang du bltas pa dang/ /rlung gnas lho ru bltas pa dang/ /de nyid nas ni shar bltas dang/ /me gnas nub tu bltas pa yis/ /phyi yi thig ni bzhi gdab bya/ /me dang bden bral du gnas
334a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /mtshams kyi thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /de bzhin tshangs pa'i thig nas ni/ /phyi yi thig gi bar du ni/ /ngos rer bdun bdun gdab par bya/ /de bzhin sgo khyud logs dang ngos/ /'gram dang ya phubs kyang gdab bya/ /sgo ni 'khor lo brgyad kyi
334a5(rgyud 'grel): cha/ /sgo khyung lha rnams sgo yi tshad/ /kha khyer dra phyed de yi phyed/ /tshon sna lnga ni kha khyer phyed/ /rta babs sgo yi gsum 'gyur ro/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /mchod rnam bzhi yis yongs su bskor/ /ka ba brgyad kyis
334a6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /bla re rnga yab me long dang/ /gos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/ /lha rdzas bsnams pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/ /ba dan rtse mo rlung bskyod ldan/ /de ltar legs par thig btab nas//
334a7(rgyud 'grel): tshon dgyes ba ni brtsam par bya/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na sa yi phye ma ni/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa la/ /sa bon lnga dang ldan byas te/ /'bar ba'i lta bas sangs rgyas lnga/ /spyan drangs tshan la bstim par bya/ /oM badzra tsi tra saM ma ya hUM/ phur  
334b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i bu ga bkang nas ni/ /dbang ldan nas brtsams bri bya ste/ /ma chad ya yo med par bri/ /dkar po ser po dmar dang ljang/ /sngon po nang du bri bar bya/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar ba ste/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang dbus/ /ser po dmar po ljang dang gnag /legs par
334b2(rgyud 'grel): bris nas mtshan ma dgod/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ /sbrul brgyad mjug ma bsnol ba la/ /nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje che/ /sngon po rtse lnga 'od zer can/ /shar sogs leng tshe bzhin la ni/ /sna tshogs pad steng 'jigs byed dang/ /stag dang chu srin mi rnams la/ /nyi
334b3(rgyud 'grel): me'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya/ /chu srin steng du zla ba bri/ /de rnams steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo dgu pa nyid dang ni/ /tsan dan bud shing pad+ma dang/ /rin po che rnams bri bar bya/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan rnams la/ /gri gug sbrul gyi pags pa
334b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sbal ba'i khrag ldan thod pa dang/ /gri ste mtshan ma bzhi bri bya/ /de ltar legs par bri byas la/ /me tog chal ba bkram nas ni/ /gzhan yang rgyan rnams legs par 'god/ /de nas rgongs ka'i dus su ni/ /khrus byas nang du zhugs byas la/ /gzhal
334b5(rgyud 'grel): yas khang bslang shugs 'jug bya/ /oM badzra u tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ lhag chad bskad ste me tog ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya/ /de nas sgo phye phyir byung ba/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas lha rnams spro bar bya/ /so sor gnas su
334b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan bskyed la/ /bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /zla nyi sa bon ldan spros pas/ /de las so so'i mtshan mar gyur/ /de las lha rnams kun rdzogs bsgom/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /bdag gi
334b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i sa bon la/ /nam mkhar rgyal ba spyan drangs la/ /mched bstod gsol btab dbang bskur ba/ /kun gyi dbul mi bskyod pa/ /lha rnams kun gyi gnas gsum du/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i/ /mchod
335a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis mchod bstod bya/ /phyogs skyong la sogs gdon tshogs la/ /gtor ma rgya chen sbyin par bya/ /de nas zhi ba'i thab khung du/ /lha rnams sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ /de nas bum pa so so la/ /sngar bzhin bzlas pas mnyes
335a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid ni/ /'jug dang dbang bskur ba yi ram/ /slob ma'i bzhin du 'dir spyad bya/ /de nas slob ma gzhug don du/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod par bya/ /nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
335a3(rgyud 'grel): sems pa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag 'grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag 'grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mda' rtag  
335a4(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis 'grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang
335a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' bdag 'grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /sems can kun gyi
335a6(rgyud 'grel): snying la zhugs/ /sems can gyi yab gyur cing/ /'dod chags dam tshig gyur pa'o/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod//
335a7(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /
335b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis dri ma med mthor shog /de ltar slob dpon bdag zhugs la/ /slob ma 'jug pa brtsam par bya/ /las byed bum pas khrus byas la/ /ras sngon gdong g.yogs phyi rol dgug /'dod pa dag pa gang yin smos/ /bdag ni skal bzang zhes brjod do/ /de
335b2(rgyud 'grel): nas slob dpon phyag byas la/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag la gsol/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab la/ /me tog
335b3(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'i slob ma yis/ /sdig pa bshags la sogs pa bya/ /slar yang gsol ba gdab bya ste/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /slob dpon
335b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /mi ldog pa la 'khor lo sbyor/ /thar ba chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba thams cad bsdus pas ni/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang
335b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba'i/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi
335b6(rgyud 'grel): phyis /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyi/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon bgyi/ /che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'dir ni 'jug par mtshal/ /de ltar
335b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab 'dod dam dri/ /gsang chen po yi rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba chen po yongs 'dzin par/ /bdag nyid chen po 'dod dam cing/ /des kyang tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs  
336a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab bril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun
336a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu byin/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum//
336a3(rgyud 'grel): dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /gzhan yang
336a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi 'di dag ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod
336a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo/ /'dod pa log par mi spyod cing/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chad ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang//
336a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa nye bar bstan bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa las bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyis las ni rnam gsum dang/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang/ /yid? kyis rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /cing nus par ni rjes su spongs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can
336a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yong mi spang/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya zhing 'di dag dam tshig yin par
336b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar byed/ /des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste/ /slob dpon 'di ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid 'tshal zhes/ /ji ltar gzung bzhin khas blang bya/ /de nas slob ma sems bskyed de/ /oM sarba yo
336b2(rgyud 'grel): ga tsit+ta ut pA da yA mi/ /de nas snying gar rdo rje ni/ /sngags 'dis rab tu gzhag par bya/ /su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ de nas slob ma ltar bskyed la/ /dri la sogs pa lngas mchod bya/ /me tog thogs pa'i slob ma yis/ /bla ma yon gyis mnyes
336b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /las byed bum pas dbang bskur te/ /gung mos me tog gzung byas la/ /sgo bzhi nas bcug shar du gnas/ /deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos
336b4(rgyud 'grel): grub kyang 'thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi/ khyod dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas sngags 'dis chu 'thung gzhug rdo rje sems
336b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' der khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad/ /gal te tshul 'di smra na ni/ /de ma thag tu dril te gshegs/ /oM badzro da ka tha/ de nas brtsams te khyod kyis phyag na rdo rjer yin gyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus
336b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /de nas gdam ngag ji lta ba/ /slob ma'i rgyud la dbab par bya/ /legs par babs par shes pa dang/ /'di ltar bdag gi slob ma ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas/ /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las/ /lha
336b7(rgyud 'grel): yi rim bzhin 'bab par shog /'di ni dngos grub gang gyur dang/ /rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang/ /bsod nams mthu ni ci yod dang/ /dkyil 'khor ba'i de? de bzhin 'gyur/ /de nas me tog bcom ldan gyi/ /dbu la brtan pas dong bar bya/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /dor te me
337a1(rgyud 'grel): tog slar bcings nas/ /pra ti grih+na la sogs brjod/ /dngos grub gang 'grub mtshan min/ /ci zhig mthong zhes dri bar bya/ /sngags 'dis gdongs g.yogs grol byas te/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la deng/ /mig 'byed pa la brtson bar
337a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed 'tshal te/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /he badzra pA sh+ya/ de nas lha rnams legs bstan la/ /dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya/ /slob ma gzhag ste lhag byas la/ /gnas gsum de nyid gsum 'god de/ /dri la sogs pa
337a3(rgyud 'grel): lngas mchod bya/ /bkra shis brjod cing bum pa yis/ /chu yis dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sa bon lnga las skyes pa yi/ /cod pan mgo bor bcings byas la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs
337a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rang grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra ya d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu gnyis/ /'khyud pa'i tshul du 'dzin du gzhug /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /slob dpon spyi bor gzung bya la/ /badzra satwa stwaM a b+hi
337a5(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes/ ming 'dis dbang bskur bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang
337a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis/ /bdag la di ring stsal du gsol/ /de ltar gsol btab hUM las ni/ /rdo rje rab tu bskyed byas la/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid /
337a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /a las dril bu bskyed byas te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
337b1(rgyud 'grel): bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /slob ma'i lag tu sbyin bya la/ /srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems ldan pas/ /srid pas dag pa'i mchog tu byed/ /de ltar brjod la dkrol
337b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod/ /gang gis lus kun rten byed pa/ /de nas phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /de rjes dkyil 'khor dag pa dang/ /lha yi rnam dag slong dpon gyi/ /bya ba'i rim pa legs par brlab/ /de nas gser
337b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi thur thogs te/ /de nas mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+ri/ /de nas me long rab bstan la/ /chos rnams gzugs
337b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /rang bzhin dag phyir bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos rnam shes byas nas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su
337b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes/ /a yis dril bur rab byin la/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /ho yis mda' drug gzhu byin la/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams
337b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes gyis zhes/ /brjod la mnga' drug 'phen du gzhug /badzra satwas me long bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni sting la gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso/ /rkang pa'i bar du 'khor lo ni//
337b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra he tus bcug byas la/ /oM b+ha Sha raM gyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas pas dung byin la/ /g.yon par po ti legs sbyin la/ /de nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa/ /tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis
338a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang bar gyis/ /sngags mchog tshul gyis gdug pa rnams/ /skye bo rnams kyis don du chos/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje
338a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa de kun kyang/ /khyod la rtag du bsrung bar byed/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'dul gyur sna tshogs pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskur/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen pad/ /las kyi 'khor lo'i rjes
338a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan sbyin/ /de nas lung brtan dbugs 'byung sogs/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin sbyin par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi
338a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM/ d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pas brtul zhugs sbyin par bya/ /de nas 'byor pa'i yon bdag gis/ /bla ma rjes su mnyes par bya/ /zhi ba yi ni thab khung du/ /sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par bya/ /de nas rdul tshon la sogs ni/ /'dod
338a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mi la sbyin pa 'am/ /chu bo chen por dor bar bya/ /klu rigs kun gyi dgrar gyur pa'i/ /gos sngon dkyil 'khor cho ga byas/ /'di la 'khrul pa mthong na yang/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod/ /'di byas dge ba gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba ma
338a6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa/ /rdo rje can gyi zhal mthong nas/ /sdug bsngal mtshe las sgrol bar shog /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon chen po stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin snying rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
338a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod pa'i rdo rje dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba khams pa ba ri dge slong rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra kro d+ha d+ha ra sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes
338b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /bla ma rje btsun pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor ba la gnod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams bsgrub ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin mchog sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'bad pa'i blo yis bsgrub par bya/ /dang por stan bde la 'dug ste/ /skad cig gcig gis
338b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo'i rgyal por bskyed pa yi/ /snying ka'i sa bon 'phros pa las/ /'gro ba sbyang ba rnam gsum bya/ /mchod pa'i lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /mnyes pa'i don du lus sprul bya/ /snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga dag kyang/ /spro
338b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdul tshul gyis brgyan par bya/ /oM badzra sa man+ta a ga ba badzra puShpe hUM badzra d+hu de hUM badzra pa dI ye hUM/ badzra gan d+he hUM/ badzra ne be dye hUM/ shapta hUM/ de nas pus mo sar btsugs te/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang/ /rab tu gus pas 'di brjod bya/ /bsags
338b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig ji snyed bshags par bgyi/ /tshogs rnams kun la rjes yi rang/ /zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /dge ba thams cad mchog tu bsngo/ /lus nyid kyang ni rnam par dbul/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskyed bya// 
338b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob shog /de nas byams dang snying rje dang/ /dga' dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya/ /de nas snod bcud rnam par sbyang/ /oM a kA ro mu kham sarba d+harmA NAM A dya nuta pan na twAt/ zhes brjod pas chos thams cad stong
338b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /hUM las rgya gram dra pa'i mchog /pad+ma zla ba'i steng dag tu/ /hUM las rdo rje'i skur bskyed bya/ /badzra hUM kar zhes pas/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo ni/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i bzhin/ /smar
338b7(rgyud 'grel): mgo skyes seng la mdzes/ /sprul sngon za zhing mche ba gtsigs/ /g.yas na rdo rje gdengs pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /sbrul nag se ral kha ru bzang/ /a la la yi gang mo sgrogs/ /klu brgyad dag gis brgyan pa'i sku/ /pad+ma'i
339a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /stag gis pags pas smad dkris pa/ /brgyan la ye shes sems bsgom bya/ /sa bon 'od kyis mchog bkug nas/ /gong gi mchod pas mnyes byas te/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di
339a2(rgyud 'grel): yang brjod/ /oM na ma swAhA ri shuSh+To pa yi na ma sh+rud kri badzra pA Ni na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa ro na paM sarba wa sh+ruSh+NI Sha ka ri he he he he/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa gnyis med nas/ /lha mo bzhi las dbang blangs pa'i/ /rtags ni mi bskyod cod pan rtser/ /yi ge gsum gyis
339a3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs/ /yid bzhin 'khor lo'i bzlas pa ni/ /tadya thA b+hyo b+hyo zhes bya ba nas/ /rata na pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /sgra che ma yin chung ma yin/ /rang bzhin gsal ba'i bzlas pa ni/ /mi skyo bar du ci bder bya/ /de nas spro bsdu
339a4(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed pa'i/ /mdza' la bsdu ba byas nas kyang/ /stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /slar la bskyed la phyag rgya dgrol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas spyod pa ci bder spyad/ /dam tshig nga rgyal gtang mi bya/ /de thun bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /brtson par
339a5(rgyud 'grel): byas na nges par 'grub/ /dang ldan bla ma ldan pa dang/ /dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin mchog gi /mchog gi dngos grub nyer rnyed 'gyur/ /khro rgyal rdo rje 'dzin mchog gi /sgrub thabs dam pa 'di nyid ni/ /bdag gis
339a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par mi rigs kyang/ /rgyud 'brel dgongs pa las btus byas/ /'di las byung ba'i dge ba yis/ /'gro rnams rdo rje 'dzin par shog /khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //slob dpon ba su d+ha badzras
339a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sa gzhi shin tu legs pa la/ /thab khung rgyar mi khru gang zhing/ /zabs su khru phyed brkos pa dag /kha khyer sor gzhi gnyis dor bya/ pa yi rnam pa lnga yis byug sa/ /kha dog dkar po byas nas kyang//
339b1(rgyud 'grel): dri dkar 'o ma me tog dor/ /dkyil du rdo rje sor brgyad pa/ /nang du rdo rje bskor nas kyang/ /tha ma me yi 'od zer can/ /bya ba thab khung rim pa'o/ /tsandan pa la sha dag dang/ /byang chub shing dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /dri bzangs dri zhim pa yi shing/ /srog chags med cing
339b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rul ba/ /gsar pa khru gang tshad la ni/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi bran nas kyang/ /dri zhim pa yi chu yis gtor/ /thab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ /ku sha rtse mo phyir bstan pa/ /bkram la bud shing rtsig par bya/ /thab pas mtho na nyes par 'gyur/ /de ni bud shing
339b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'o/ /rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi/ /yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis la/ /gsar zhing 'dab ma bcas pa dang/ drang zhing bla skams med pa ste/ /skyon dang bral ba'i yam shing la/ /mngar gsum dkar gsum dag gis bran/ /dri yi tshogs

339b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par dogs? pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas thab ni bsang byas la/ /a las pad+ma'i gzhal yas khang/ /dkar zhing zlum pa mdzes pa bskyed/ /paM las chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /de steng paM las pad+ma'o/ /a dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan/ /hUM las rdo
340a1(rgyud 'grel): rje dkar po ste/ /der bskyed pa ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhu bar raM las gru gsum me/ /de nas me lha'i rgyal po ni/ /dkar zhing zhi la sgeg pa ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi skyil krung byed/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing
340a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i skud pa ser la bzang/ /g.yas ni dbyug pa spyi blugs te/ /g.yon na phreng ba ku mu ta/ /dbu rgyan la sogs rgyan rab mdzes/ /bskyed la ye shes me lha dgug /gong ltar mchod pas mnyes byas la/ /dza hUM baM hos
340a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug bya/ /dbang bskur ba dang byin brlab pa/ /mchod pas rab tu mnyes byas nas/ /bstod pas rgyal po 'di dag kyang/ /rdo rje dril bu ldan pas kyang/ /glu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya/ /hUM me lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa mchog gis sras/ /me
340a4(rgyud 'grel): lha'i rgyal po dag gis dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'dzin byed me lha nyi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas dgang gzar blugs gzar ni/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon thogs nas kyang/ /me lha
340a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i zhal nyid du/ /sngags 'di dag gis bsreg par bya/ /oM badzra agna ye mahA b+hU ta dzwa la ya sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ na ma che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /shI tidku ru ye swAhA/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam lnga bcu ste/ /nyi shu lnga 'am bdun du
340a6(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ de ni me lha'i riM po'o/ /de nas me lha'i thugs ki'i nang/ /pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan steng du/ /hUM las rdo rje sngon po ste/ /de las rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i chag bzhin/ /bsal ba nyid du bskyed par bya/ /de nas mchod pas 
340a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bya ba nas/ /bstod pa dag kyang rab tu brjod/ /de nas bsreg rdzas dbul ba ni/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'ba' zhig la/ /sreg sngags 'di dag btags la dbul/ /oM sarba pu dza me g+ha ratna a ga d+ha/ /na ma che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di shAM ting ku ru swAhA/ ji
340b1(rgyud 'grel): snyed spros pa phul nas kyang/ /de nas mchod bstod yang byas te/ /gshegs dang bzod pa gsol nas kyang/ /bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya/ /oM A hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig rang gi snying gar bsdu/ /mchod
340b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /lhag ma ji snyed yod pa yis/ /me lha mnyes par yang byas te/ /mchod pa la sogs gong bzhin no/ /ye shes me lha gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim/ /bdag gis sbyin sreg sbyar ba yis/ /
340b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub myur du 'grub gyur cig /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po bsu d+ha badzras mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra d+har ba liM bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'i
340b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las rnams kun gyi sngon 'gro ba/ /bshad phyir bla ma la btud de/ /thams cad tshig par byed pa yis/ /gtor ma'i cho ga de bshad bya/ /de la dang por rdo rje 'dzin/ /sgrub par 'dod pa'i
340b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ba dag gis/ rin po che las snod rgya che la bzang la mnyams pa de dag gi nang du/ 'bras chan la sogs pa chan gyi tshogs dang/ /khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba'i tshogs dang/ nya sha la sogs pa sha'i tshogs dang/ 'o ma la

340b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs dang/ rin po che la sogs te snang ba'i tshogs dang/ du ru ka dang dri zhim sbyar ba la sogs te dri'i tshogs dang/ ga bur la sogs te sman gyi tshogs dang/ rol mo dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan deng/ ba dan dang/ ras bzang po la

341a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthil du dri sbyar ba'i chu blugs la/ oM sarba big+h+nan nA sha ya a mri ta kuN+Da yi ha na ha na hUM/ zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod do/ /oM a bag+hi nAM ta krita hUM phaT/ zhes pas gtor ma lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas yi ge traM ser po las
341a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i snod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du/ rdzas dngos po dpag tu med pa bsams te/ de'i steng du zla ba hUM gis mtshan pa dag gi 'od kyis bsregs shing sbyangs pa'i bdud rtsi'i dngos por gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas thugs ka'i sa bon gyi
341a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ bdud rtsi 'o ma rgyun lta bu 'bab pas snod gang bar bsams la oM A hUM/ zhes lan bdun brjod pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
341a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drangs la badzra dzi hwa zhes byin gyis brlabs la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod la dbul bar bya'o/ oM badzra bA Ni d+ha rA ya/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta d+hu pa/ puShpa/ dI pa/ gand+he ba liM/ arg+ha ta ba li ma da mAM sa i daM grih+na
341a6(rgyud 'grel): khA hi khA hi d+huny+dza ho/ /pi ba ho/ a ti kra ma ye swAhA/ de nas thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi 'byung po'i tshogs ma lus pa bkug ste/ oM badzra hUM ka ra ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta phaT/ ces bya bas sbyang ngo/ /de thams cad rdo rje 'dzin gyi ngo

341b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar gyur cig ces brjod par bsam mo/ /de nas lag tu me tog thogs te/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab la/ bzod pa gsol ba ni/ hUM lhag pa dang ni chad bas kyang/ /bdag gis brjed pas gang bgyis pa/ /mgon po khyed kyis bzod
