363a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs/ rdo rje sel byed/ rdo rje gdong/ nam mkha' i gdong/ rdo rje gnod 'joms/ rdo rje mi bzang pa/ rdo rje 'jigs pa/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ rdo rje thog thog rnams bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su las kyi rigs rdo rje dbyug pa/ 'jigs
363a7(rgyud 'grel): byed chen po/ /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor/ pad+ma yangs pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje dgra sta/ rdo rje seng ge'i khri/ rdo rje lcags mda'/ rdo rje mtshon cha mchog /rdo rje mtshon cha'i shugs/ mtshon cha'i snying po/ dam tshig chen po/ rdo rje dbyug pa/ rdo rje gtsug gtor/
363b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dod pa/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnams bri bar bya'o/ /rdo rje pho nya de rnams bri bar sngags dang phyag rgya ni sngar bstan pa'i spyi'i de nyid kyis bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bris nas/ gdugs bzhi dang/ ba dan bzhi gur gum dang rgya skyegs las
363b2(rgyud 'grel): btsos ba shing rings bzhi'i rtse mo la gtags pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas dang/ phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag /phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi klag pa dang/ mda' bcu dang phur gdab pa dang/
363b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang/ mtshon thag btags pa dang/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag rnams dang/ mchod pa'i rdzas thams cad dang/ bum pa dang sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma'i rdzas thams cad bsags la rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid sngar
363b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa bzhin du khrus dang gos bgob byas nas/ cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed de/ bsrung dang spyan drang sbyang ba dang/ phyag rgya bcing dang phyir bzlog gnon/ bskad dang tshim par bya ba dang/ tshar gcad pa dang bskul ba dang/ 'khrul 'khor sbyin sreg
363b5(rgyud 'grel): khrus bya ba zhes bshad pa'i cho ga bcu gnyis 'dir yang thams cad rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid dngos grub bsgrub pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir cho ga thams cad sbyad par bya'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa'i tshe don bcu gnyis ji
363b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas pa bzhin du nye ba'i bsnyen pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /sgrub pa sta gon la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /sgrub pa chen po dkyil 'khor gyi zhag don bcu gnyis snga cha bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung ba la/ slob ma
363b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la dang por phyi'i 'jug pa ni sems rab tu dang pa'i slob ma snga ma bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa
364a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun rnam dag byas la/ sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang/ gdong g.yogs bskon la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags dang phyag rgya spyi bor gzhag nas sngags lan gsum
364a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas/ lha'i rigs kyi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /des dkyil 'khor dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi sngags bzlas la me tog 'phangs la gang la phog pa'i lha de ni de'i rigs kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdong
364a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs dkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dang pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su bskyed/ /sngags dang rigs pas byin gyis brlabs/ /'byor ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /rten dang
364a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad kyang/ /khyod la mngon du phyogs 'gyur gyi/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig srungs zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i tshe me tog dbu la phog ma mchog gi dngos grub 'thob/ /me tog rked pa la phog na thun mong gi dngos grub 'thob/
364a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog rkang pa la phog na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /nang gi 'jug pa rdzogs nas/ nas dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma la sogs zhi ba 'am/ yang na rgyas pa/ mngon spyod kyis bgegs bzlog pas dbang ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud rtsi
364a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i rten sar ba la bzhag nas/ sgrub pa'i grogs pos bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gdon par bya ste/ gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcoms dri ma sel mdzad cing/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' 
364a7(rgyud 'grel): des/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar ba'i lam du mdzud mdzad cing/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /ston pa bzhugs pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can
364b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gi bde ba mda' mdzad des/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /skyob pa gang gis byams pa yis/ /thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs nges/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /gang zhig
364b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur ba ste/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad pa shog /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa
364b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes par/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing/ /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par
364b4(rgyud 'grel): rab g.yogs shing/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' byed/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cig /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog /
364b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba/ /thub pa'i bstan pa gang 'byung ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /rgya byin bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ /'byung po kun
364b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang/ /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring 'grub 'gyur shog /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi
364b7(rgyud 'grel): khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs gyur/ /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs gyur/ /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma gung la'ang bde legs shog /khyed cag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /khyed cag sdig
365a1(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur cig /ces bkra shis brjod nas/ cho ga drug gi lhar bskyed nas gnas sngar byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i gdugs bteg la khro bo gnod mdzes kyi sngags bzlas ba'i bdug pas bdug cing
365a2(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab kyi g.yabs la glu dang sil snyan dang/ rnga brdungs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun la gsol ba btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags btab pa'i bum pas lan gsum bskor ba byed du bcug la/ chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas
365a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcing ba dang/ sngags bzlas pas spyi bor gtug par bya'o/ /de nas gos sar pa bskon nas cod pan dang rgyan btags pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan g.yas pa g.yas par sbyin/ g.yon pa g.yon par
365a4(rgyud 'grel): byin la/ de nas slob dpon gyis me tog gi phreng ba spyi bor gzhag la ming btags par bya'o/ /de nas seng ge'i khri'i kha la gzhag la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgrengs na/ rin po che sna dang bkra shis rdzas brgyad dang lha rnams kyis phyag
365a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang bcas pa byin la/ rang gi ming dang lung bstan pa dang/ gzeng bstod pa dang/ dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyi gnang ba gi wang ngam gur kum gyi yi ge bris la slob dpon mnyam du lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par
365a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /des sngags kyis gnang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong nas dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ slob dpon go 'phang thob pa'i phyir/ /dang po'i dbang du bsgrags pa yin/ /rig sngags thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /
365a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i dbang du bshad pa yin/ /bgegs mi rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsum pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /bzhi pa sbyor ba thob pa'i phyir/ /cho ga bzang po de bshad do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang po'o/ /rigs
365b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas pa gnyis pa'o/ /bgegs rnams zhi ba gsum pa'o/ /dpal 'phel ba ni bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs pas/ ngan song gsum du mi ltung dang/ /mi khom ba brgyad spangs pa dang/ /tshe rabs dran zhes longs spyod che/ /tshul khrims
365b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing gzugs dang bzang/ /rtag tu mi dang lha rnams kyi/ /mtho ris gnas su skye bar shog /ces smon lam yang gdab par bya'o/ /gal te sdom pa 'dzin par mi nus pa 'am/ nad pa 'am bar chad nang du 'byung ba 'am/ 'byung po'i
365b3(rgyud 'grel): log 'dren gyis zin pa 'am/ rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gtses pa la khrus kyi cho ga bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed la gnas byin gyis brlab ste/ lha rnams kyi sngags bzlos shing yungs kar gyis bra ba
365b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rma bya'i sgo'i dbus su phyag rgya bcings pa ni du ba la zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bzlos shing byab pa dang/ ru rag sha gdod gcig pa'i rin po che rma med pa lus la btags nas bsrung ba bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
365b5(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /mgon po thugs rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /rig sngags rgyal po dge ba can/ /gnod pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs mdzod ces brjod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste/
365b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas myur bar shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing/ /sems can sdug bsngal mang po'i gzir las grol zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang/ bzod par gsol
365b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas shes bya la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor lha bum pa'i lha dang gcig tu bsres la/ rma bya'i sgros dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rnams
366a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas khrus kyi gzhong pa gzhag ste/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs rje can gyi thabs chen gyi/ /zhi yang sems can don du ni/ /dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur zhes bstod la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags
366a2(rgyud 'grel): rings kyis kyang mtshams gcad gnas lngar rdo rjes gtug cing byin gyis brlab/ sems dpa' gtsug tor dang/ gzi brjid phung po bskyed par bya ste/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzod spur gzhag ste/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta
366a3(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+hA nAM/ a pu dza zhes bya bas mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings te/ oM dza la dza la/ di ba da oM da ka de u pri sha du na du na hUM/ zhes bya bas gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'tshol
366a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ gu gul gyi dud pas kyang bdug par bya'o/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang/ oM badzra a sha ni hUM phaT ces bya bas sran phye dang bag phye de'i lus la btab la sgrub pa'i grogs pos
366a5(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad pa'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa gdon zhing bum pa thams cad kyi lha'i bum par bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor la phyag 'tshal
366a6(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /de thams cad kyi mthu dang/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis che ge mo zhes bya ba'i gnod pa dang/ gdon thams cad zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du lus thams cad khrus bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i
366a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags lan bdun bzlas pas spyi bor blugs pa dang/ lan bdun bzlas shing snying khar blugs pa dang/ lan bdun bzlas pas lte bar blugs par bya'o/ /de nas rma bya'i sgos bya ba cing/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsags pa yis//
366b1(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang 'di ni thob bya'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma rungs pa'i/ /dgra dang bgegs kyang med par shog /rkun po la sogs pa med par shog /mu stegs can las rgyal 'gyur cig /byang chub snying po thob par du/ /bdud sde bzhi yis mi thub
366b2(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /pho nya mdag gzhug pho nya mo/ /bran la sogs pas bsrung bar shog /gcong rong g.yang sa la sogs dang/ /gdon dang rims nad med par shog /ces byas la rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par 'dzoms kyi gzungs
366b3(rgyud 'grel): lan gnyis gsum bton la khrus lan gsum bya'o/ /de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du/ de nas bsrung ba byas la me tog gi phreng ba dang/ khro bo rnams kyi phyag mtshan bri ba 'am/ lugs ma spyi bor gdags par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyang
366b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrung ba byas la ldang bar bya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i lha yang khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /dam tshig sems dpa' yang stong pa nyid du zhu ba dang rdul tshon
366b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha'i dman ma yang chu bo la sogs par dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas de na gnas pa'i 'byung po dang/ gdon rnams dang/ phyogs skyong la gtor ma byin la/ nus na sbyin bdag dang slob ma bsrung ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sangs rgyas
366b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rigs 'dzin sngon gyi mkhas pa yis/ /ci gsungs lhag chad med par ni/ /rang gzor ma byas bzod gsol med/ /legs grub rig pa mchog dag dang/ /rab grub gsang ba spyi rgyud dang/ /phyag na rdo rje'i
366b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur la/ /yon blangs dge rtsa sngo ba byed/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga rin po che mig thur zhes bya ba'i slob dpon shA rI ga wa rmas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga rdo rje gi chos
367a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/) /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi d+ha rA maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje kun dge 'joms
367a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /dang por bdag stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ oM sho dan+te sho dan ye swAhA/ zhes dbang po'i sgo dag pa'i khrus byas te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la/
367a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid skad cig mas lhar bskyed pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM A na yo ha b+ha ga bAn bidyA rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ mi 'gro ba rnams la mtshon cha'i char dbab pa ste/ oM tsakra hUM bruM traM bruM h+riM bruM/ ha bruM/
367a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mtshon cha lnga'i gur dang sa gzhir 'gyur te/ mtshams kyi khang pa'i nang du/ tsakra tsa la maN+Da la ma ye zhes tshogs bsag pa rten gyi dkyil 'khor mdun du sprul la/ phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod/ rdo rje me'i phyag rgyas mchod
367a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzas rnams bsregs la/ badzra dzau ti dzA la rA hUM zhes pa'o/ /dam tshig phyag rgyas sprul te/ pra dzra satwa hUM/ pra bar satkA ra pra tIts+tsha hUM/ d+hU pe/ puShpe traM a lo ke h+ri:/ gan d+he a(rgyud 'grel): nai bidye hUM/ dbul ba las kyi phyag rgyas
367a6(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ hUM yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /khrus kyi dam pa yon chab 'di/ /bcom ldan rnams 'joms nyid la dbul/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /oM ga ga na ga ga na sa ma ye hUM/ hUM dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba
367a7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i khrus chab 'di/ /rnam 'dzoms 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /oM pra ba ra satkA ra pra tIts+tsha ho/ /hUM nags tshal btsud ni yi gar 'ong/ /dri mchog rgyas pa'i spos me 'di
367b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rnam 'joms 'khor bcas la/ /dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): bi d+ha ra badzra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra sa pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ chu 'am thang las skyes pa yi/ /kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'di bcom ldan dad pas na
367b2(rgyud 'grel): ma(rgyud 'grel): badzra bi dA ra puShpe/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa'i/ /dge zhing mun sel snang gsal 'di/ /bcom ldan dad pas dbul/ A lo ke /'chal ba'i dri ma sel mdzad pa'i/ /yid bzhin bdud rtsi mtsho ltar bskyil/ /gan d+ha/ dag cing
367b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di/ /nai bitye/ de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs/ /rol mo sgra snyan yid 'ong ba/ /sems can sdug bsngal tshim mdzad pa'i/ /dus rnams kun tu rgyas gyur cig /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): bi dA ra
367b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+haN+Ta ra ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba yang/ /bdun ni rnam dag byang chub sems/ /bsod nams tshogs chen bsags par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ bdag nyid
367b5(rgyud 'grel): lus 'bul gyis thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis/ bdag dus thams cad du bzhes su gsol lo/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa/ /thams cad ma lus bsdus nas ni/ dge
367b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa byang chub chen por bsngo/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /dkon mchog bla ma dam pa'i chos/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod
367b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /sems bskyed sdom pa rnams ni/ /rigs lnga'i dam tshig sdom pa bzung/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi/ /ma rgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung ste/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /des ni
368a1(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa sems kyi mchod pa'o/ /badzra any+dza li sar sdom pa/ /badzra ban d+ha tra Ta zhes sdig pa dral/ /badzra a be sha a a zhes ye shes dbab pa bstan pa badzra muSh+Ti baM zhes pa/ sdig sgrib dral zhing ye
368a2(rgyud 'grel): shes dbab pa ni/ /ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa ste/ de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o/ /mchod pa lnga yis tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /bsrung 'khor bsdus la nam mkhar gnas/ /sarba bid badzra zhes brjod pas/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu thams

368a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga bsnams/ /lho ru rdo rje phur bu ste/ /ljang nag rdo rje phur bu bsnams/ /nub tu rdo rje be con ni/ /dmar nag phyag na bo con bsnams/ /byang du rdo rje tho ba ni/ /ljang nag phyag na tho ba bsnams/ /g.yon pa kun ni sdigs mdzub ste//
368b1(rgyud 'grel): phro las byang chub sems dpa' i brgyan/ /'khor lo'i gong ras bzhi la ni/ /phyag mtshan rdo rje rin po che/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje la/ /spho Ta badzra badzra lA sye hUM zhes brjod pas/ /lA sye dkar mo phyag na me long bsnams/ /badzra mA le traM/ mA le sngon mo phyag na
368b2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba bsnams/ /badzra gI ti hwi(rgyud 'grel): gI ti dmar mo phyag na pi wang bsnams/ /badzra nri tye a:/ nri tye ljang ku gar bsgyur thal sbyir spyi/ /phyi rim rgyas pa'i gru chad la/ /phyag rgya gser dngul zangs lcags gzhong pa bzhi/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi po bskyed/ /d+hU pa

368b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ brgya byin dkar po phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /agna ye swAhA/ agne dmar ser phyag na mtheb bsnams/ /ya ma ye swAhA/ gshin rje nag po phyag na be con bsnams/ /nai ri te swAhA/ bden bral dmar ser phyag na ral gri bsnams//

368b7(rgyud 'grel): ga(rgyud 'grel): sU rya tsan+d+ra ye swAhA/ tshangs pa sngo skya phyag na nyi zla bsnams/ /pra ti b+hya ye swAhA/ sa bdag mthing nag phyag na bum pa bsnams/ dregs ba sems can kun gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /sgo bzhir phyag rgya lcags kyu dang/ /zhags pa lcags 
369a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dril bu las/ /shar du angku sha dzA(rgyud 'grel): rta gdong dkar mo phyag na lcags kyu bsnams/ /lhor pA sha hUM las/ phyag gdong nag mo mche zhags thogs pa'o/ /nub sgor lo ka bi las/ nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrog bsgom mo/

370b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dun ste/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol/ /thar ba chen po grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed la/ ho rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas su/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang dang
371a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas nyon/ /brjod des blo la rdo rje rnam 'joms pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /de nas slob mas sdig pa bshags pa/ dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang yang na bgyis
371a2(rgyud 'grel): stsal gang/ /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog chen gyi/ /spyan sngar sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /bdag gis sems can don du ni/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /sdug bsngal gru las thar ba'i
371a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rgya gram bcug la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya/ zhes brjod la slob ma rdo rje rnam par 'joms par bskyed la/ /hUM tra(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab
371a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag rgyas snying gar hUM las rdo rje/ dpral bar traM las rin po che/ mgrin par h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma/ spyi bor a(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed do/ /de ltar gnas bzhir ye shes bzhi rtags dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs nas
371a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dbul zhing snang bar byas te/ bdug spos lag tu gtad/ me tog lus la gtor/ dri thugs kar byug mar me snang bar bstan/ lha bshos zhal du bcug /sil snyan rnam par bsgrags sngags dang phyag rgyas tshig rnams go bar
371a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// //a shwat+tha la sogs pa'i so shing/ sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo me tog bcings pa/ de badzra hA sa a zhes sbyin par bya'o/ /ku sha sngon po badzra tIk+Sh+na zhes gtad la/ la la sngas su gzhug /la la snyan du bting la nyol
371a7(rgyud 'grel): cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas pa'i srung skud mgul du gdags so/ /gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /nang par bzhin bzangs longs shig /dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod/ lhag gnas slob ma sta gon
371b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi cho ga'o/ /sta gon gyi dkyil 'khor de/ badzra driSh+Ti maT ces nam mkha' la bteg la thig gdab par bya'o/ /gzhung dang mthun par bris nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga byas te/ dkyil 'khor de nam mkhar bslang bar bya ste/ rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis/
371b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra be gA kra ma hUM zhes gdeg par bya'o/ /phyag mtshan la sta gon gyi ye shes dbab ste/ badzra tsaN+Da a/ badzra hu lu a/ badzra tiSh+Tha a/ badzra band+ha a/ badzra ha na a/ badzra lA sye a/ zhes sgo ba 'pheb pa'i bar du dbab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor byin dang ldan pa'i
371b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ rdo rje gzungs kyis bsgrub par bya ste/ bdag rdo rje rnam par 'joms pas bsgoms la/ gzungs tshar nyi shu rtsa gcig bton pas/ kun kyang rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhir gyur te/ mtshams bcad cing bar chad med par bsgrub par bya'o/ /lhag chad kyi nyes
371b4(rgyud 'grel): pa kha bskang bar bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje shugs kyis bsgrub par ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' i yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing/ dril bu dkrol zhing lan bdun du dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya/ rdo rje shugs ni dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg ste bskor ba byas pas/
371b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa dang/ ma 'byor pa'i cho ga nyams pa thams cad sor chud par 'gyur ro/ /rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pa thams cad gsung yin/ lha thams cad/ kyis phyag mtshan gsal ba thugs/ de las sku gsal bar byed
371b6(rgyud 'grel): med du gyur par bsgom mo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gdan thog tu phyag mtshan phab pa de rnams la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha kI lI kI la ya zhes brjod pa de gsung/ rdo rje rgya gram du gsal pa de thugs/ de las 'od gzer 'phro 'dus byas te/ skur dkrongs
371b7(rgyud 'grel): tser sor ba de gsum dbyer med pa de ka/ sku gsung thugs tha mi dad par bsgrub pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha ye shes lha yi bdag nyid can du bsgrub pa'i chos brgyad de/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi ser gol brdab cing/ badzra sa mA ya dzA(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes rang
372a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ngo/ /badzra g+hanTe pra be sha phaT/ ces sgo dbye/ a badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas nang du spyan drang/ badzra pA she ho(rgyud 'grel): gdan gcig la gzhug /badzra spho Ta baM gnyis med bstim/ a be sha a zhes dgyes pa bskyed/
372a2(rgyud 'grel): badzra a mri ta kuN+Da li sarba big+ha nAM sha ya hUM phaT/ badzra ka rmas ra ba bya/ badzra sand+hi baM gis sgo gcod do/ /yi ge gnyis gnyis kyis lha thams cad la rdo rje ka nan gtang/ /phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ oM
372a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra tsaN+Da dri sh+ya dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma ya stwaM/ a haM/ a haM/ oM badzra tsaN+Da tsaN+Da ti/ rtsa ba'i lha'i snying po mthun te lnga'o/ /oM badzra lA sye hUM/ /ma le traM/ gI ti h+rI(rgyud 'grel): nri ra tye a(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra puShpe traM/ a lo ke h+rI(rgyud 'grel): gand+he a(rgyud 'grel): oM
372a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra saM dam/ oM badzra pra ma ye/ oM badzra dzi pa ye/ oM badzra shi lo ye/ oM badzra gu sha hUM/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ oM badzra ba la hUM/ /oM badzra da la hUM/ bkra shis lha mo brgyad ni phyag thal mo gzings pa'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pA sha hUM/
372a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra spho Ta baM/ oM a be sha a/ zhes dam tshig phyag rgya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ lha thams cad kyis ldags la badzra d+harmA dz+nyA na zhes bsgom mo/ /las kyi phyag rgya ni/ rigs lnga la/ g.yas gdangs shing/ g.yon sdigs mdzub thugs
372a6(rgyud 'grel): kar bsgreng ba'o/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pas/ sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i las mdzad du gsol/ rdo rje gtum pos zhi ba/ rdo rje phur bus rgyas pa/ rdo rje be con gyis dbang/ rdo rje thobs sems can thams cad rengs pa'i las
372a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol lo/ /gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par mdzad du gsol lo/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis mchod pa'i las/ bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis sems can thams cad re ba bskang pa'i las/
372b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo ba bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa dgug gzhug gis las mdzad du gsol lo/ /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje dril bu thogs la/ las kyi phyag rgya bzhin bca' zhing/ hUM mu dra mahA sa lha thams cad zhi ba'i las mdzad du gsol lo/ /kun gyi phrin las
372b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig yin pas/ /de nas re re ma bshad do/ /mchod pa rgyas par bar 'dir mchod par bya'o/ /mchod yon sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod/ bcom ldan khro bo gos sngon can/ /yon tan thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /rdo rje rgya gram las
372b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams rdzogs/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni/ /mthing nag brjid pa'i cha lugs can/ /rdo rje rtse lnga sdigs mdzub 'gyed/ /rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rdo rje phur bu ni/ /ser nag 'jigs pa'i
372b4(rgyud 'grel): cha lugs can/ /rdo rje phur bus las rnams mdzad/ /yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rdo rje be con ni/ dmar nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ be con 'bar bas gdug pa 'dul/ /dbang sdud sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
372b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje thob ni/ /ljang nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /thod sbrul dar gyi rgyan cha can/ /phrin las rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgeg mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs/ /mdzes pa'i me long phreng bas brgyan/ /snyan pa'i pi wang gang sgyur
372b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdug pa me tog mar me dri/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhong pa bsnams/ /shangs spyan thugs 'od mchod pa dbul/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bkra shis lha mo las kyi sku/ /
372b7(rgyud 'grel): btso ma gser mdog rgyas pa'i sku/ /phyag na bkra shis rdzas brgyad rnams/ /re bskong rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgog dril/ /dgug gzhug dgyes pa'i las mdzad ma/ /sgo ba rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
373a1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa brgya byin me yi lha/ /gshin rje srin po chu yi lha/ /rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs kyi rgyal/ /sa bdag la sogs phyogs skyong bcu/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang/ /mkha' lding 'dab bzangs lus srul po/
373a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sde brgyad tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las/ /gnas pa'i bgegs rigs stong phrag tshogs/ /so so rang gis 'khor 'dul zhing/ /sa gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas
373a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing bzlas pas bsgrub pa bya ste/ lha rnams rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams/ /rdo rje'i lte ba'i hUM la rang rang gi sngags kyis bskor ba la/ bzlas pa byas pas/ sngags kyi lha mo mchod pa dang/ sgrib pa sbyang ba dang/
373a4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs thon pa dang/ dngos grub bsdu ba'i las bzhi'i 'phro 'du bya'o/ /de nas thun mtshams su sder bzangs kyi mchod pa dbul te/ tshe 'dzin zas kyi steng du ni/ /sbrang gi seng ge skyong bzhi gzhag/ mar gyi tha ma zangs kyi bcud/ /bu ram
373a5(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam rdzing gi shing/ /lan tshwa spos mchog gangs ri spungs/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ bcom ldan rdo rje rnam 'joms la/ /snying po lnga yi mchod pa dbul/ /tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyangs phyir/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas
373a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM pa na pe na ku rak+Sha khA hi/ zhes lan gsum bar du btab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la/ snying po lnga'o/ /tshogs bsags thugs rjes/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM pa na peM pa na ku ru/ /rak+Sha khA hi/ rdo rje
373a7(rgyud 'grel): phur bu/ be con thob rnams 'dre'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dkyil 'khor gong ras 'khor lo'i mtshams/ /gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po la/ /snying po 'dre /rgyas pa'i gru chad ser po la/ /las mdzad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /snying po lnga'i
373b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa man tshad mthun/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams phyogs mtshams brgyad/ /yid 'ong bkra shis lha mo brgyad/ /snying po/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ye shes las kyis sgo bzhi nas/ /sgom dgu gzhug las mdzad cing/ /snying po lnga/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/
373b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma me 'od las/ phyogs skyong sde bzhi 'byung pa'i tshogs/ /snying po lnga yi mchod pa dbul/ /tshogs bsag byang chub lam sbyang phyir/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM gyis nyes pa'i skyon rnams dag/ A(rgyud 'grel): yis bdud rtsi chen por
373b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /hUM gis spros te mchod pa 'bul/ /pa na pe na pe na ku rA k+Sha khA hi/ phung tsho bcu'i mchod pa 'bul lo/ /de nas nad du 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis mchod/ /de nas sgo'i phyir rol 'od kor la/ /'jig rten pa rnams
373b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma cha gsum gyis mchod/ dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rjes la/ /dkyil 'khor bslang zhing ye shes phab la/ bum pa rnams dgram ste/ rigs kyi bum pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang ldar dgod/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa 'jug pa sgo'i
373b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon logs su dgeng/ de rnams lhar bskyed la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod/ bsgom zhing bzlas ba'i skabs su/ /bum pa re la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis bskyal lo/ /dang po dkyil 'khor brlang zhing ye shes dbab pa'i bsgrub pa byas la/ bum pa
373b6(rgyud 'grel): dgram pa sngon du 'gro ba mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod/ dkyil 'khor de byin dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje gzungs kyi sgrub pa byas la/ lhag chad kyi nyes pa bskang ba rdo rje shugs kyi sgrub pa bya/ sku gsung thugs tha mi dad pa'i sgrub pa bya/ /dkyil
373b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha ye shes kyi lha'i bdag nyid du bsgrubs la/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste/ mchod pa rgyas pas mchod/ /rtsa ba'i lha bsgom zhing sgrub pa phyas te/ sder bzangs tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul/ nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa
374a1(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin sreg gis mchod/ phyi rol du 'jig rten pa la gtor ma cha gsum gyis mchod la de ltar mchod cing bsgrub pa'i chos bcu gcig la gnas nas/ dbang bskur bar bya ste/ de yang dang po la slong ma lhag gnas dus
374a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ dbang bskur ba smin pa'i chos bcu po bya/ slob ma dang po lus khrus byas la slob dpon la gsol ba gdab/ de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed/ slob mas rang gis sdig pa bshags sdig pa bshags nas sems bskyed/ sems bskyed kyi
374a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu lhar bskyed/ lha'i gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab/ slob ma'i lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la/ /slob dpon gyis de la mchod pa 'bul/ lha gang la dbang thob pa'i dkyil 'khor du spyan bkang la sa shing bsgyur? /
374a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang la bar chad bskyab phyir srung skur gang gso/ /hUM srung skur sngags kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /lha yi mgul du dbang bskur bas/ /cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dbang mchog thob par shog /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha bsrung du
374a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol lo/ /bar chad cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i rdo rje'i go cha gyon par bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dang po bum pa thogs te 'di skad do/ /bum pa dag byed chos nyid spros bral ste/ /kun
374a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi nyon mongs gnas 'gyur lus ngag ste/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes mthar rtogs nas/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms sku ru sangs rgyas shog /na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): lan lnga brjod pa gong mas 'gre/ /bum pa hUM yi dbang
374a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas/ /lus kyi sgrib pa dag pa ste/ me long lta bu'i don mchog ni/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs par gyur cig /de nas dbu rgyan thogs la 'di skad do/ /dbu rgyan rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi sku/ /nyon mongs lnga yi gnas
374b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dag 'gyur te/ /lus kyi sgrib pa dag ste mnyam nyid rtogs/ /rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru sangs rgyas shog /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo'i phyag rgya bcas te/ oM badzra d+hA twi shwa ri ni hUM/ badzra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ badzra badzri Ni hUM/ ratna badzra Ni traM/ d+ha rmA badzri
374b2(rgyud 'grel): NaM hUM/ oM karmA badzri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur bas/ nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs to/ rin chen 'byung ldan skur sangs rgyas par gyur cig /de nas
374b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thogs la 'di skad do/ /de nas hUM sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab 'grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ rigs kyi bu la
374b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /yid kyi rnams par shes pa gnas gyur te/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig /de nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ /kye rdo rje kun tu bzang po zhes ming btags pas/ rnam rtog sgo lnga'i dri ma gnas gyur pas//
374b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba grub ba'i ye shes der rtogs nas/ /ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang thob par gyur cig /oM badzra satwa stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ rdo rje ming gi dbang thob pa kho nar gyur cig /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis ka thogs la/ /rdo rje brtul
374b6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs kyi dbang bskur ba/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba tA thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma yastwaM e Sha stwaM d+ha ra ya me badzra satwa hi
374b7(rgyud 'grel): hi hUM/ rigs kyi bu khyod la rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur bas/ /khyad par byang chub sems dang ldan te/ gti mug gnas gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs pa kho nar gyur cig /de nas zhal zas la slob ma la bkra shis
375a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor zhal gsum/ skar ma rab rib mar me dang/ /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang/ /rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu/ /'dus byas chos kyang de dang 'dra/ /man+d+ra mu dra/ sa ma ya traT zhes dbus nas nub tu kha
375a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas te zhal gsum mo/ /rim par brtsams pas bdag nyid dga' / /shes par byas pas mun la sgron/ /dga' sgron dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di/ /bdag gis brtsams par mi rigs kyang/ /bdag pas dman la phan phyir brtsams/ /'di
375a3(rgyud 'grel): yis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /rnam 'joms sku yi zhal mthong shog /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo tsa ba spu
375a4(rgyud 'grel): rangs bsod nams blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // !/ (/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus chog gi 'grel pa rdo rje chogs mdzad pa'o/) /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma bi d+hi prit+ti/ bod skad du/
375a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dag dang rgyal po'i blon po dang/ rje rigs dag dang dmar rigs dag dang/ dge
375a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyong dang bram ze gang dag srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma brgal ba dag la/ nad dang gnod pa dang/ byad la sogs pa gzhan gyis gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag la/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho gas grol
375a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de dag rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa brtsam par bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di'i don gyi mtshan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi sgo nas nges par bstan te/ ji lta zhe na/ rdo rje zhes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi yang
375b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dags te/ ye shes de ni bsod nams dang ye shes tshad med pa rnams kyi tshogs can/ rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir lag na rdo rje lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
375b2(rgyud 'grel): nas zhes bya bas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi las grub pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi ye shes kyi lus can du bstan pa'o/ /de'i phyir rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa zhes pa yang ye shes des chos kyi de kho na nyid shin tu rtogs pa'i ngo bo rdo rje
375b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar thogs pa med pas rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs la bya bar mngon no/ /ci'i phyir ye shes 'di la rdo rje zhes bya zhe na/ phyi rol gyi rdo rje rin po che dang chos mthun pa rnam pa bdun yod pa'i phyir dpe'i sgo nas nye bar
375b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa yin te/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa zhes bya ba rnams te/ de ni ye shes de nyid kyis rang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang
375b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /de gzhan gyi don bstan pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i sgo sna tshogs nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste/ khams gsum pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba/ phyin ci log gi lta ba can/ phyi dang nang nas bgegs dang long
375b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dren rnams ldang ba'i rgyud/ /las kyi bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba dang bcas pa de dag 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad
375b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba zhes bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du cho ga'i don rnams pa bco lngas bstan te/ de dag rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa bstan te/ zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang/
376a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang sogs las rnams bzhi po dag /thabs kyis 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa/ /ci rigs par ni sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ltar de dag gi ye shes kyi rdo rje des 'dul bar mdzad/ sel bar mdzad 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje rnam par
376a2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags kyi gang dag gsung pa de dag ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/ thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i tshig tu rig par bya'o/ /de nas de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ cho gar bya ba thams cad la/
376a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsod slob dpon la brten par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir slob dpon slob ma gnyis sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga bshad cing bstan par bya ba ni/ des ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems
376a4(rgyud 'grel): dang zhing/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyi ra ba brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba zhes bya ba la/ shin tu khrus bya ba dang/ gos gtsang ma bgo ba ni phyi'i gtsang sbra'o/ /sgo gsum nas sdig pa mi byed pa ni yid dge ba'o/ /byang chub tu
376a5(rgyud 'grel): smon pa ni sems dang ba ste/ de dag ni phyi nang gi gtsang sbra'o/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya zhes pa'i don no/ /rig sngags de rnams ye shes las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba zhes pa yang ye shes kyi rang
376a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rtogs pa nyid do/ /de nas slob dpon gyi cho gar bya ba ni mdo sde 'di nyid las dbang bskur ba'i yan lag bstan pa tsam du zad de/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de nyid gsungs pa las mi mngon par 'gyur
376a7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am yang na spyi rgyud dag las gsal ba'i phyir ro/ /de dag du ma bstan pa de gnyis ka ltar na yang de dag dang sbyar de las ni/ phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa dang/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags tshal du/ /dkyil 'khor
376b1(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshang/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri/ /phyogs kyi lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung/ /sgo bzhi ru ku sha'i rtswa rnams dgram zhes gsungs pa la rig par bya ste/ de ltar dkyil 'khor bya ba yang slob dpon gyis dang
376b2(rgyud 'grel): po brtag pa dang sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du bya ste/ 'thas par bcag ste ba'i rnam pa lnga dang spos chu gtsang mas byugs te steng yang bla re bre zhing/ dar gyi lda ldi dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ me long dag gis kyang brgyan par
376b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gzhan yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis kyi bum pa tshul dang mthun par yon tan 'grub pa'i phyir 'di nyid las de'i rgyu bstan pa ni/ gser ram yang na ni/ dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung zhes bya bas bston to/ /de'i nang
376b4(rgyud 'grel): du dgang ba ni chu yis zhes pa smos te/ tsan dan dang gur kum la sogs pa'i spos chus bkang ste/ de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i rin po che ni shel dang rdo rje zhes pa ni dngos su zad nor bu zhes pa spyi'i tshig tu smos te/ rnam par ma phye ba'i pad+ma
376b5(rgyud 'grel): rA ga dang/ in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa ni rin po che'i rigs su gtogs pa dang mu tig dang sa le sbram la sogs pa ste/ de dag gas chag med pa rgyan gyi bya ba byed nus pa ste rin chen rma med ces bya'o/ /gzhan yang de'i zla la yungs kar dang/
376b6(rgyud 'grel): rtswa dUrba dang/ me tog rnams gzhug par bya'o tshul de bzhin spyi rgyud las kyang/ bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog 'dra zhing/ nag po ra ri med cing rin chen bcas/ /sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba dag /kha brgyan ras kyis mgul pa
376b7(rgyud 'grel): dkri bar bya zhes bstan to/ /de dag gi lto bar chu bre gang shong ba la sogs bstan to/ /mtshan nyid gzhan rgyud dag las rig par bya'o/ /yang gong ma'i 'bru dang sman zhes bya ba la/ bya kri seng kri la sogs pa'i sman rnam pa lnga dang/ til
377a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sran ma la sogs pa'i rgyun las grags pa bzhin no/ /mgul chings gtsang ma'i gos zhes bya ba ma spyad pa ma nyams pa'i ros dkar po kha tshar dang bcas pa'o/ /dkri zhing dgar ba ni gong du bstan pa rnams kyi
377a2(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/ /bum pa de ltar byas pa yang rtog pa gzhan cho ga las 'byung ba ji bzhin du grangs bzhi 'am lnga gu gul gyi dud pa la sogs pas gdugs la dbus dang grwa bzhir gzhag pa'o/ /de nas slob
377a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon bdag nyid las kyi khro bor bsgyur nas/ lag pas rdo rje dang yungs kar blangs te/ bskrad cing bsrung ba dang/ mtshams bcad pa dag byas na/ thig skud lag tu blangs te/ phyogs ma 'khrul bar sa bcad de/ rim pa gsum
377a4(rgyud 'grel): par thig gdab par bya'o/ /de nas ri mo bri ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya rdo rje rgya gram las phyogs gcig med pa pad+ma 'am khri'i steng du gzhag go /de'i gru bzhir 'khor rnams kyi phyag mtshan byang shar nas brtsams te/
377a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rdo rje gdengs pa dang/ rdo rje gcig pa dang/ be con rdo rje mtshan pa dang/ rdo rje tho ba rnams bri'o/ /de nas rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa phyogs skyong bcu dang/ de'i bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad kyi phyag mtshan bri'o/ /rim
377a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum par rin po che chun 'phyang dang mu tig gi phreng bdag dgod cing phyogs bzhir sgo khyud dang rta babs kyis mdzes bar bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol stegs bu'i mdza' bskor du rtswa ku shas bskor cing/ me tog gi sil ma dag kyang
377a7(rgyud 'grel): dgram mo/ /de nas phyi rol du byung ste/ 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bza' ba sha chang la phug la sogs bcas/ 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin zhes bya ba dag khyer nas/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin ste
377b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phye grul zhes pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bden pa bdar ba byas nas lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo khong stang du sbyar ba las kha phye ste/ bskan nas bstan pa'i tshul du bya ba ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'byung po de dag la so
377b2(rgyud 'grel): so'i rig sngags brjod cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig bas byin gyis brlabs te bsngo ba'o/ /de nas slar log ste lha'i gnas su sod la tshon gyi dkyil 'khor de dag mdun gyi bar snang la gyen du dpag cing rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gdan
377b3(rgyud 'grel): seng ge dang pad+mar bcas pa'i gdan khri bsams nas der rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba ni pho brang lcang lo can gyi dpal phyag na rdo rje ye shes kyi snang ba'i khyad par las byung ba'i/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba
377b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang sngon zhal gyi smin ma khro gnyer can phyag g.yas prdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pa dkur brten cing 'gying bag can/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dar ljang gu'i tshig gu gsol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis
377b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa 'khor rig sngags kyi lha dang/ khro bo phyag rgya grangs med pa'i phyag brnyan can bdag nyid kyis phyag rgyas spyan drang ste/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo
377b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad bkug pa byas la/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/ bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas na mthe bong gnyis mthe chung gnyis gzhibs la de'i sngags ni/
377b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra dza la na ya swAhA zhes bya'o/ /yang na rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo/ /de nas mthog mar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya ste/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe chung gis sen mos mthe bo mnan la/ lhag ma
378a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas te/ de'i sngags ni oM shar mahA swa ma ye swAhA/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas yang dkyil 'khor nang gi grwa bzhir khro bo bzhi gzhag ste byang shar mtshams nas gzung ste khro bo'i rgyal
378a2(rgyud 'grel): po rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba sku mdog smug nag /bzhin khro gnyer can phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs par byas te thogs par bsams te/ de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag /g.yas pa'i sor mo
378a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum rdo rje ltar bya ste/ de nyid kyi sngags kyang 'di nyid las/ /ts+tshinda ts+tshinda mahA ki la ki lA ya swAhA/ zhes sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas shar lho mtshams su rdo rje kyi lA ya zhes bya ba/ mdog ljang nag dpral ba khro gnyer can phyag g.yas pa
378a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse gcig pa ka na ya'i dbyibs 'dra ba thogs par bsam ste/ de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcangs te/ cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste mthe bong gnyis gyen du gzhibs la bsgreng la/ de'i sngags ni
378a5(rgyud 'grel): band+ha band+ha kro d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de nas yang lho nub mtshams su rdo rje be con zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag smar ser po gyen du 'khyil ba/ g.yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa bsams te/ de'i
378a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste/ tshigs bkug nas srin lag gi drung du gzugs par bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swAhA zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de nas nub byang gi
378a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba mdog nag po shin tu khros pas mche ba gtsigs pa bsams te/ de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings te mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug ste/ de'i sngags ni/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra ki li
378b1(rgyud 'grel): ki lA ya swAhA zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa gsum par dbang ldan la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba bcu dang/ rnam rgyal la sogs pa bkra shis kyi lha brgyad kyi phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ de
378b2(rgyud 'grel): dag so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings la spyan drangs shing rang rang gnas su bkod nas gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gus pa khyad par can byas te/ mchod yon dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa dang zhal zas mar me'i
378b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnams rim bzhin dbul lo/ /de nas phyogs bcu dag na ji ltar srid pa'i lha rdzas dang/ kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa dag gis mchod la/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas kyang byin gyis brlab ste/ 'di ltar na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarbba ta thA ga te
378b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya:/ oM sarbba tar khaM ud ga te/ spha ra Na ti maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ de nas bstod ba gang yang rung bas bstod/ de nas rig sngags gdon pa ni/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad ces
378b5(rgyud 'grel): bya bas grangs nges par gsungs pa la/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags dang mjug nas yang snying gi sngags rnams? dang gnyis bskul ba dang bcas bar zlo na ni lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig zlos bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de rnams gnyis ka zlos par mi nus na
378b6(rgyud 'grel): mjug nas na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra zhes pa nas/ sa mri te hUM phaT ces ba'i bar ni rig sngags 'di'i yang snying ste bskul tshig dang bcas pa lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar bzlas brjod zin nas yon bdag dang slob ma gnyis ka
378b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su khri lta bu bzhag pa'i sar yang na ri mo yid kyis gdeg pa dang/ yang na phyag rgya nyi tshe bya'o/ /de nas der bum pa rnams kyi chus blugs shing dbang bskur te/ shu ti dang nyi shing la
379a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas kyang bkru/ /rol mo dang bkra shis la sogs pa yang gdon no/ /khrus zin nas sgor 'byung ba'i dus su zho mar sman dang 'bras bu la sogs bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams la sogs pa bkag pa med do/ /de nas
379a2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga'i phan yon 'byung ba mdor bsdus na gnyis su 'dus te/ sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa dang bde ba bskyed par byed pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni/ sems can dbang po nyams dang/ tshe zad
379a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang tshe nyams dang zhes bya ba nas/ de dag thams cad zhi ba lta zhes bya ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhis bstan to/ bde ba bskyed
379a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed ba ni/ /rgyud do cog gis rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan zhes bya ba nas/ tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes bya ba rnams kyis bstan te/ de dag gi phan yon
379a5(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa tsam du zad kyi/ gzhan yang rgyal po'i chad bas 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun dang/ me dang chu dang/ dug dang mtshon la sogs pas 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i
379a6(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las kyi mdza' bco brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs sil mar bshad pa la spyi don bzhir
379a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bar bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang/ lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga dang/ las su bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/ mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga'o/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga spyir mthun no/ /lhag par gnas ba sta gon gyi cho ga
379b1(rgyud 'grel): la lnga ste/ so so'i ling kha bca' ba dang/ bdug pa'i rdzas gdab pa'i rdzas/ /brab pa'i rdzas byug pa'i rdzas so/ /las kyi mdza' bco brgyad kyang las bzhir bsdu na/ zhi ba la lce dpog dkar po/ rgyas pa la gla rtsi dang ga bur/ /dbang la tsandan gur
379b2(rgyud 'grel): kum/ brag po la gu gul nag po'o/ /zhi ba la 'o ma can gyi shing/ rgyas ba la gser can gyi shing/ dbang la khrag can gyi shing/ drag po la dug can gyi shing ngo/ /sor bzhi dang/ sor drug dang/ sor brgyad dang/ sor bcu gnyis pa bya zhing/ rtse
379b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan zlum po dang gru bzhi/ zla kham/ zur gsum mo/ /de dag lte ba dang/ dpung ba dang/ gsang ba dang/ snying gar so sor gdab po/ /gzhan yang yungs kar kun gtsor byas te/ til dang ske tshe shar tshe dang/ yungs kar brab pa'i las dang ?
379b4(rgyud 'grel): las su bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun pa las/ gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun las gang 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ming bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gang yang rung ba'i phur bus gzir te gzhag /bzlas pa la ?
379b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ traT nas sa ga'i bar du yang snying rtsa sngags so sor sbyar ro/ /gtor ma'i cho ga yan chad rdzogs nas mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga shes bar bya ste/ sems can gang zhig bskrag par bya ba'i cho ga ni/ tra Ta dang sbyar te ri mo bdun du blangs?
379b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje khro bo'i sngags bzlas shing lan brgya rtsa brgyad du gu gul nag po'i dud bas bdug cing phur ba snying gar btab ste/ brabs nas yul wa ra NA se'i sas byugs nas/ ri mo rlung chen po la phyar na gdab? bya ba de kho na skrag par
379b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dmag gi dbung bzhil ba ni tro Ta dang sbyar te/ sbyar ba thams cad gong dang 'thun pa las mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga'i dus su ri mo bdun du blangs te lce dpog dkar pos bdug /phur pas btab ste brabs nas mi rus kyi phya mar ?
380a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bcag la mchod rten byas te mchod nas sgra mtshams su spyi tshugs su sbas na/ dgra bgegs kyi dpung nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags thams cad gcod pa sphu Ta dang sbyar te/ ri mo la
380a2(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa brab pa'i las byas nas thal chen gyis byugs la/ mtshon rnon pos gtubs la dug gi shing gi me la/ /byad kyi rdzas gnyis dang mar nag tu byas pas sbyin sreg tu byas te/ thal ba chu chen por gtor na nges bar
380a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi smod pa zhi ba'o/ /rig sngags thams cad gnon pa ni/ spho Ta dang sbyar te/ thal chen gyis byugs pa yan chad 'thun pa las rdzas dang bcas te mchod rten chen po'i 'og tu spas na/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad kyi mgo
380a4(rgyud 'grel): gnon par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad 'joms pa ni g+hur+N+Na dang sbyar te/ de ni lho phyogs kyi rgyal po stobs ldan gyi rnam smin mi bzad pa ste/ bram ze'i phru gu rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ mdo sde dang gzungs sngags ltar bzlas pa'i
380a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes la/ rgyal po'i nad mi bzad ba de thams cad/ sarbba bidya g+hur+N+Na g+hur+N+Na mA ra ya ku ru ya swAhA/ bram ze/ chen pos bzlas pa'i yon tan de tsam na bsgrubs pa'i yon tan bsams las 'das rig sngags rgyal po dge par
380a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs zhes pa dang/ /sgrub pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga gzhung ltar byas la bzlas pa'i dus su yang snying dang rtsa sngags la sarbba bidyA dang g+hur+N+Na sbyar ro/ /'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang/ mjug gi don
380a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ khyab pa dang bsrung ba bya ba ni gtil nag po la sdig pa byas te/ mtshon rnon pos gtubs te/ shing sar pa la sbyin sreg byas pas nges pa kho nar sngon gyi las bcom mo/ /gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa ni/ g+hur+N+Na pA ya da sbyar te/ gzhan dag las
380b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gran sems can gyi ming gang yin pa'i ri mo bris la/ dkyil khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste/ cho ga yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ ri mo mdun du blangs te bdug pa dang brab pa byas te/ ro'i sol bas byugs nas tsher ma can gyi me blangs te sbyin
380b2(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya ste/ thal ba rlung chen po la phyar na'o/ /dgra bgegs brlag par byed na ni/ sarbba satwa ni la sogs pa ni gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni bo d+ha dang sbyar te/ 'di ni thar bar byed pa yin gyi rlag par mi
380b3(rgyud 'grel): byed de btson ra nas thar ba dang 'dra zhes pa'i tha tshig go /thar bar 'dod pa'i ri mo dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste/ las thams cad gong ma dang 'dra ba las phur pa dang bcas pa la chas dril ba la/ gser dang g.yu rgod dang/ ngo? rgod che ba
380b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pa lus sam mgul du btags na/ gdon la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa ni bshaM dbang du bya ba dngos so/ /rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa ni sam b+ho dang sbyar te/ gro ga 'am
380b5(rgyud 'grel): ras sam shog bu la gang 'dod kyi ming byang bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste/ cho ga rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ gdab pa dang/ brab pa'i sbyor ba byas te sbyar spros dang dri sna tshogs ba byugs te/ tsandan? la sogs
380b6(rgyud 'grel): shing bsung can gyi me lha sbyin sreg byas nas sol ba dang de nyid mar dkar dang bsres te/ bza' ba dang byug pa byas na nges par 'grub po ma grub pa grub par byed pa ni bra ma dang sbyar te/ gang grub par 'dod pa'i ri mo bris la/ cho ga gong ma nyid dang 'thun
380b7(rgyud 'grel): no/ /yang na ming mgul khug du gzhug go /grub pa chud ma za bar byed pa ni saM b+h+ra ma sbyar te/ gang sngon du gyur pa'i nor rdzas kyi ming bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag la bdug pa dang gdab pa dang brab pa rdzogs pa dang a shwa ta yi khu bas byugs 
381a1(rgyud 'grel): nas za ma tog tu bcug la ras gtsang ma dkris nas phur pa dang bcas te rgyas btab la /sku gzug sam mchod rten gyis mnan te/ shin tu dben pa'i sar gzhag na nges par chud mi za'o/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin
381a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni ku Ta dang sbyar te/ de la lnga ste/ gu sbyin pa dang nor sbyin pa dang/ 'bru sbyin pa dang/ rkang mgyogs sbyin pa dang/ tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa'o/ /bu sbyin pa ni bu 'dod pa'i ming byang bdug gdab bral pa bya ste/ ga bur
381a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i dris byugs te lung thab dang bo de tse dang glas dang bcas te/ ser po shing la me btang la sbyin sreg bya ste/ sol ba 'bru mar dang sbyar te byin na bu med pa bu yod par gyur te/ nor dang 'bru 'dod pa la nor dang 'bru'i ma bris
381a4(rgyud 'grel): la bdug gdab par bya ste/ phyug po'i bang mdzod dang/ rgyal po'i dkor mdzod cha gang gi nor sna tshogs pa tshogs na 'grub bo/ /dud 'gro'i ming bris te lcags la bzlas nas byin na 'grub bo/ /tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa ni bkra shis kyi zhal
381a5(rgyud 'grel): zas la brten te /A yu bar ta ne puSh+Tir ku ru ye swAhA/ dang sbyar ro/ /de dag thams cad la 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun no/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba ni/ saM ku TTa ya dang sbyar te/
381a6(rgyud 'grel): de la yang lnga ste/ rims bsrung ba dang/ gdon bsrung ba dang/ 'khor dang nor phyugs bsrung ba dang/ lo tog bsrung ba dang/ sri'u bsrung ba'o/ /de dag ni gdams ngag las shes par bya'o/ /ser ba bsrung ba la spyi'i 'khor lo lus la bcangs
381a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ so so'i 'khor lo'i thog tu gzugs pa dang/ yang snying rtsa sngags dril te gdong bzlog bya ba'o/ /rengs bar byed pa ni g+ha Ta dang sbyar te/ gang rengs par 'dod pa'i ming bris te/ bdug gdab brab pa yan chad so so'aM las kyi bye brag
381b1(rgyud 'grel): spyir 'thun pa las thal chen byugs te/ shing bsrang ba'i rna ma'i shing dag la me sbar te me tog ker btsugs dang/ rlung gi rta mo'i dang/ ril ma la sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de byi ba'i rling bur blugs te yungs kar dang yungs nag du sbyar nas gar
381b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ba de rings bar byed do/ /rmugs par byed pa ni saM g+ha Ta ya dang sbyar ta/ gang rmugs par 'dod pa'i ming byang gdug gdab pa brab pa byas nas la cas dril la/ rkang 'og dang lce 'og du bcug na nges pa kho nar rmugs par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi
381b3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bco brgyad pa'i man ngag slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // ? (/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga bzhugs so/) / */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+ha ra Ni bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par
381b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi yang gdug 'dul khro mchog sku 'dud de yi cho ga bshad/ /rang skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
381b5(rgyud 'grel): gzungs kyi sngags bsams la de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ dkon
381b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ lam la gnas pa dang/ lus dbul ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba byas la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konya haM zhes bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lhag
381b7(rgyud 'grel): par mos par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gzungs kyi yi ge sgra tsam la dmigs pa dang/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ gzungs kyi yig 'bru rnam par bsam pa dang/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gzungs kyi yi ge rnams/ gzungs
382a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul du nang na gnas par bsams la/ de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku dpag tu med pa 'phros bas sems can thams cad kyi sdig ba sdug bsngal sbyangs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ slar 'dus nas zla ba la
382a2(rgyud 'grel): thim/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyi sbrul ba rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang sngon phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa bsnams pa g.yon pa dril bu dku ru bsten pa/ rgyan thams cad
382a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan ba/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs kyi yi ge rnams bsam mo/ /de'i sngags kyi 'od kyis mdun du ye shes sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas spyan
382a4(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas/ me tog la sogs pas mchod nas bstod de/ de gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi sngags kyi 'od 'phros pas yi ger ba 'od bskal ba'i mi 'dra ba bsam/ ye shes sems dpa' i sku dang de'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang/
382a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng gi gzungs kyi yi ge la dmigs te gzungs gdon no/ /yang dam tshig sems dpa' i gsung la dmigs te gzungs gdon no/ /de bzhin du rim gyis thun bzhi ru gzungs 'bum bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas nad pa
382a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i don du sa phyogs gtsang ma ru ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs te/ me tog gi sil ma dgram par bya'o/ /phyogs skyong bcu dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba 'am/ maN+Dal gang yang rung ba byas la/ rin po che 'am sa las
382a7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag ba nag por ri med pa'i rin po che sna lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang/ sman lnga dang/ snying bo lnga dang/ spos dri zhim blugs te/ ldam bus kha brgyan la mgrin pa ras kyis dkri'o/ /brum las rin po che'i bum par
382b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de baM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ paM las pad+ma/ de'i steng du gong bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te mchod bstod byas la gtor ma gtang ste/ gong bzhin bzlas ba bya'o/ /de nas nad ba sdom pa 'dzin du
382b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug la/ bum pa'i chus khrus byas na nad pa nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rnam par 'joms pa ye shes sku/ /rab tu btud
382b3(rgyud 'grel): nas mdor bsdus bshad/ /dben gnas 'dus la maN+Dal bca' / /khrus byas gos bgos mchod ba bsham/ /spyan drangs la sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /tshad med bzhi bo bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te/ /rang sems zla
382b4(rgyud 'grel): bar hUM bsams bya/ /hUM las 'od gzer 'phros ba yis/ /rdo rje ra ba dra ba dang/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad tshur 'dus te/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur/ /gnag cing 'bar ba'i me 'od bcas/ /de nas 'od gzer 'phros pa yis/ /sngar bzhin sems can
382b5(rgyud 'grel): don byas te/ /slar yang rdo rje nyid la 'dus/ /rdo rje yongs gyur sku ru gsal/ /sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum pa/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnon/ /phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab brda/ /zhabs gnyis stag gi pags pa
382b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /klu lngas lus brgyan me dpung 'bar/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms nas kyang/ /ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te/ /mchod nas rad la gzhug bar bya/ /nam mkhar sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/ /sbrul pa'i lha mos dbang bskur ro/ /spyi bor
382b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje bsam/ /spyan drangs lha rnams gshegs par gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /spyi bo la sogs gnas gsum du/ /zla ba'i steng du yi ge gsum/ /yongs gyur mtshan mo gsum du gnas/ /de las bzlas ba
383a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ /sngags dang 'od gzer bcas pa las/ /phyag na rdo rje sku ru gsal/ /thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus dag na/ /bdag nyid khro bo chen por gnas/ /kun gyi thugs kar nyi steng du/ /
383a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'joms pa'i yi ge dgod/ /phar spros don ni rdzogs pa dang/ /tshur 'dus sgrub pa nus par ldan/ /sngags kyi 'brug sgra lta bu ste/ /skyon gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /mchod ba byas te ye shes gshegs/ /dam tshig ba rgyal kun spyod bya/ /
383a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni sgrub pa mdor bsdus te/ /bsod nams mchog ni gang thob pa/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis rnam par 'joms pa thob par shog /'phags pa rdo rje rnam bar 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi la
383a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /badzra bi dA ra maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad khro bo che/ /

383a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs shis ba'i sar/ /bslad dang sbyang dang gzung ba dang/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga legs byas bas/ /thog mar bum pa'i bya ba la/ /gser ram dngul lam yang na zangs/ /kham las gnyi lnga nyi shu la/ /dkar po rdzas kyis legs
383a7(rgyud 'grel): byugs la/ /rang lha'i mtshan ma ldan bar bya/ /ma nyams ras kyis mgu la dkris pa/ /dri zhim chu yis bkang ba dang/ /'bru sman rin chen lngar ldan pa/ /bza' ba'i shing gis kha brgyan nas/ /hUM sha'i ston la yang dag gzhag
383b1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang/ /bzlas mthar mchog zhu bdud rtsir bya/ /slob ma gsum la skyabs 'gro dang/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bas/ /sgo gsum mi dge las bzlog cing/ /kun tu spyod ba gtsang ldan pas/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor brtson

383b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog tshom bur bcas/ /bskyed dang gnyis med mchod ba la/ /bstod de nam mkhar gshegs gsol bya/ /dri dang ba yi lci ba yis/ /legs par byugs pa'i stegs bu la/ /gtsang ma'i ras kyis srang bu dang/ /man ngag rig pas thig
383b4(rgyud 'grel): btab ste/ /der ni kha dog lnga ldan ba'i/ /tshon gyis khro bo'i 'khor lo bri/ /gru bzhi kun nas sgo bzhi pa/ /to ra na bzhis rnam bar brgyan/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba dang/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /nad dbus rdo rje kha bzhi ba/ /

383b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma bcas/ /slob dbon kun spyod gtsang ldan pas/ /gtsang ma chu yis khrus byas te/ sar ba'i gos dang rab ldan pas/ /bde ba'i stan la legs 'dug ste/ /mdun gnas 'khor lo gtong ba yis/ /rnam sbyangs dam tshig
383b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed ba dang/ /ye shes gnyis med byin rlabs dang/ /dbang bskur mchod dang bstod bzlas bya/ /dri zhim chu yis legs bkrus te/ /bzang po'i dri yis legs byugs shing/ /sar ba'i gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor nad

385b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo gsum gyis/ /sdig pa bgyis la bdag 'gyod cing/ /mgon po'i spyan sngar rab tu bshags/ /nyan thos sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /so so'i skye bo byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi dge la dga' ba yis/ /bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid/ /sems
385b3(rgyud 'grel): can khams ni ma lus rnams/ /sangs rgyas bde la dgod pa'i phyir/ /bdag gi dge kun bltos med par/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi/ /'gro ba'i skyabs chen gcig pu pa/ /sangs rgyas theg pa mchog gi chos/ /tshogs mchog
385b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa la/ /bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyi/ nyam thag mgon med gyur pa rnams/ /bla med bde la gzhag pa'i phyir/ /sems mchog yang dag bskyed par bgyi/ /lam gang gis ni der 'gro ba/ /
385b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi theg pa'i lam 'di la/ /deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni tshul bzhin gnas par bgyi/ /zhes brjod la de nas byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ kun la btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la
385b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa dang g.yo bar snang ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i don can du rig par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha sarbba d+harmma swa b+hA ba shud d+ho nya haM zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /stong par gnas pa'i paM yig dang/ /raM las
385b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma la/ /hUM byung ba las rgya gram gyi/ /rdo rje chen po rnam par bsgom/ /der gnas hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /ra ba sa gzhi gur yang bsgom/ /de nas bruM las gzhal yas khang/ /kun nas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /rtsibs bcu 'khor lo'i lte
386a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /rgya gram rdo rje dang bcas bsgom/ /der yang zla ba nyi ma dang/ /hUM byung rdo rje che las 'od/ /spros shing bsdus las khro bo che/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed/ /dbus gnas rdo rje'i lte dbus su/ /khro bo rdo rje 'joms chen po/ /char sprin
386a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rdo rje dril bu 'gyid bcas 'dzin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje'i ra dbus su/ /rdo rje khro bo phur bu che/ /utpal sngon po'i mdog mtshungs ba/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje phur bu 'dzin/ /lho yi phyogs su khro bo che/ /rdo rje be con stang zil mdog /
386a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rdo rje be con ste/ /rdo rje'i ra dbus gnas pa'o/ /nub gnas rdo rje'i ra dbus su/ /rdo rje tho ba khro bo che/ /nam mkha' i mdog can phyag g.yas na/ /rdo rje tho ba 'phyar ba'o/ /byang gnas rdo rje khro bo che/ /gtum po bung ba'i mdog lta bu/ /rdo rje rgya gram phyag
386a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i ra dbus gnas par bsgom/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i rtsibs rnams la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub gshin rje gshed/ /rta mgrin rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /utpal kun da dza pa dang/ /mar gad mdog can g.yas pa na/ /thod ba dbyugs pa
386a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ /rgya gram rdo rje phyar ba 'dzin/ /shar nag g.yas skor rim pas bsgom/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po dbyug pa sngo/ /mi g.yo stobs chen sku mdog gnag/ g.yas rnams rim bzhin lcags kyu dang/ /dbyug pa ral gri rtse gsum 'dzin/ /byang shes
386a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni nub byang mthar/ /'di yang g.yas bskor rim pas bsgom/ /mkhar nas rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ /sa 'og gnod mdzes rdo rje che/ /mdog gnag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /phyag g.yon sdigs mdzub zhags par
386a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /kun kyang g.yon brkyang gom pa yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ba'o/ /shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar/ /lhor gnas rdo rje zhags pa ser/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar/ /rdo rje dril ljang byang sgor te/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
386b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dang/ /dril bu 'dzin cing g.yon bskyang bas/ /nyi ma'i steng na gnas pa'o/ /thams cad mche gtsigs spyan gsum zhal/ /dmar ser dbu skra gyen brdzes dang/ /stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan mdzes pa'o/ /rang snying zla
386b2(rgyud 'grel): bar sa bon dang/ /gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsgoms te/ /sa bon 'od kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes bkug mchog gnyis med bya/ /snying gar sngags kyi phreng bkod de/ /'khor lor gnas pa thams cad dang/ /mgrin gcig skad gsar mthon po
386b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA NA ye/ /ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye?/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badzra/ da ru rdza? da ru Na
386b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda badzra/ b+hinda b+hinda badzra hUM phaT/ na ma shtsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM phaT/ 'dis ni rdo rje khro bo rnams kyi thugs bskul nas/ sgrub la bgegs med byed cing/ dngos grub ster ba'o/ /ji srid mi skyo'i
386b5(rgyud 'grel): bar du mngon par du bzlas pa'i mthar/ ye shes 'khor lo phyur nas mdun gzhag mchod pa dang/ /yi ge brgya pa'i mthar ni rdo rje'i sngags brjod de/ rang gnas gshegs la 'khor lo snying kar bsdu bar bya/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms ba'i gzungs kyi
386b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs bram ze ma ni badzra mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na sh+rI dang/ lo tsa ba rab zhi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri badzri ba dA ra Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
386b7(rgyud 'grel): la bstod ba/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan dang nyid las/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad sprul pa/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes
387a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi rang bzhin chags snang rnam bral yang/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis khro la khro ba dang/ /'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston pa/ /byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig las dang
387a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam smin mkhyen pa yis/ /'gro ba kun dang ji ltar 'thun pa yi/ /gsang sngags rol pa rab tu ston mdzad pa/ /bsam yas sprul ba mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sdang dang gdug ba tshar gcod phyir/ /bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs
387a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ba'i sku/ /nyon mongs dug chen rtsad nas gcod mdzad pa'i/ /sprul gdug rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dbus na/ /dpa' bo steng stabs brkyang bskum tshul bzhugs pas/ /spyan gyi sdang mig nyi zla
387a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba yi/ /bgegs dpung bsregs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus mdza' i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba'i sku/ /glog stong 'gyur 'dra khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs/ /gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong bzhin sgrogs pa/ /bgegs 'dul khro rgyal
387a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la bstod pa slob dpon bram ze ma Ni badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dz+nyA na sh+rI dang/ lo tsa ba rab zhi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
387a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra ka la sha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i cho ga /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa yi char/ /kun tu sbyod ba'i gtsang ldan pas/ /gser ram dngul lam kham
387a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi/ /bum pa mtshan nyid bzang ldan pa/ /legs bkrus dkar po'i rdzas kyis byugs/ /dris bdug ras kyis mgul pa bkris/ /me tog srad bus mdzes byas bar/ /rin chen rma med tsan dan dri/ /rgyu 'bab chu yis legs bkang ba/ /

387b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyis rnam sbyangs te/ /bruM las rin chen gzhal yas khang/ /baM byung 'o ma'i rgya mtshor ldan/ /paM par a las zla dkyil 'khor/ /der gnas hUM yig spros bsdus las/ /khro bo khro bo'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod pa
387b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bstod dang gnyis su med par bya/ /dbang bskur slar yang mchod bstod nas/ /rang snying sngags kyis phreng bkod de/ /bzlas dang bum par spro bya bar/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs/ /ji srid mngon par 'dod
387b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar/ /mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba dang/ /lha rnams ye shes bdud rtsi yis/ /rab bkrus gtsang mar gyur pa dang/ /nad med bgegs rnams 'joms pa dang/ /dpal du byed cing bkra shis dang/ /phun sum tshogs min 'joms par byed//
387b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shaM ti ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zug rdu'i nyes ba dang bral zhing/
387b6(rgyud 'grel): mi shes mtshan ma spangs pa dang/ /ma rungs gdon bgegs mi gnas pa/ /dkar zhing gtsang ma snum pa'i sar/ /khru gang kun nas zlum po'i dbyibs/ /khru phyed thur du brus pa'i khung/ /kha khyer gyis mdzes zhi ba yi/ /mtshan ma dkar po'i rdzas
387b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis byug/ dkar zhing dri zhim 'o ma can/ /reg na zug rdu dang bral ba'i/ /zla mdog me tog 'byung ba'i shing/ /khur sa dang rjes mthun dbyibs su brtsigs/ /mchod dang bsreg pa'i yo byad rnams/ /las dang rjes mthun nyer bsags te/ /me spar
388a1(rgyud 'grel): me dbus raM las lha/ /mdog dkar bgrang 'phreng dbyug gu dang/ /mi 'jigs spyi blugs 'dzin pa bskyed/ /ye shes me bkug gnyis med bstim/ /mchod dang bstod dang bsreg pa'i mthar/ /slar yang mchod bstod mnyes pa
388a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /me lha 'bar ba'i me dbus su/ /rang lhag lhar bskyed ye shes bstim/ /der yang mchod dang bstod pa dang/ /bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mnyes pa dang/ /mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba dang/ /yi ge brgya pas yongs bskangs nas//
388a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs bsdu slar yang me lha yi/ /mchod sreg rdzas kyis tshim byas la/ /'dod don las kyis gsol btab ste/ /gshegs gsol nye bar bsdu bar bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //

388a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /khro bo'i sngags kyi gegs med dang/ /stong pa'i sngags kyis rnam sbyang bya/ /bruM gyur pa las rin chen snod/ /de nyid gsum gyi kha dog dang/ /dri ro phun sum tshogs pa la/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyis mngon spel bas/ /bsam yas mchod
388a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprin dang ldan/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /khro bo khro bo'i 'khor lo bskor/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /nyan thos rang rgyal mkha' spyod dang/ /sa spyod sa 'og bcas pa yi/ /'gro rnams dang bcas mdun bltas
388a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /mchod bstod 'byung po kun sngags dang/ /tshig brjod nas ni tshim byas nas/ /'dod don blang dang bskang ba dang/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): yig dang bcas gshegs gsol bya/ gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //

388b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang bstod pas mnyes par bya/ /oM agne de ba/ ka la ru tra/ mahA ru tra/ sarbba karmA ma he shwa ra duSh+Ta na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sngags bcas rdzas rnams tsha ba yi/ /mar la sbags te me la dbul/ /slar yang mchod dang bstod pa yis//

390b1(rgyud 'grel): bud shing rnams/ /rang thab dbyibs dang mthun par brtsig /gang la bud shing bya ba'i shing/ /de nyid la ni yam shing ste/ /rtse? mo'i cha las byung ba ste/ /sor ni bcu gnyis mkhas pas brtag /sngags 'chang las dang rjes mthun pa'i/ /gos dang rgyas stan cod pan ldan//
390b2(rgyud 'grel): las mthun mchod par ldan pa dang/ /rdzas dang yo byad bkod par ldan/ /bram ze khyim ba dang/ smad 'tshong dang/ /dur khrod yang na rdon pa'i khyim/ /gang sgrub las dang 'thun pa yis/ /me ni mkhas pas blang bar bya/ /oM agne dzra la dzra la hUM/ gsang sngags 'di yis

390b5(rgyud 'grel): blugs 'dzin/ /ra yi stan la gnas pa bskyed/ /rang nyid yi ge'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes me ni nyer bkug ste/ /mdun gnas mchod dang bstod mnyes pa/ /dam tshig me dang gnyis med bya/ /slar yang mchod de stod pa yis/ /mnyes bya de nas sbyin sreg ni/ /'bar? ba'i
390b6(rgyud 'grel): me las yam bsreg shing/ /thog mar me yi sngags kyis sbyin/ /mar sbyin pas yang de nyid de/ de 'og til la sogs pa kun/ /rang rang sngags dang 'brel bas so/ /oM agne de ba ta ye swAhA/ oM sarbba pa dAM? da ha na sarbba pA paM swAhA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/
390b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra g+hasma rI ya swAhA/ oM mahA biryA ya swAhA/ oM mahA ba lA ya swAhA/ rim bzhin me dang til nang 'bras/ /gro dang nas dang sran ma ste/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /dbye sgor man ngag rim bas bsreg /rdzas rnams ji ltar ? phul bas/ /slar yang mchod re
391a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod par bya/ /mi yi lha ni gzi brjid che/ /'dod don thams cad ster ba bo/ /bdag dang gzhan don mdzad pa yi/ /drang srong che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'jig rten snang mdzad tshangs pa'i sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po dag byed mchog /bgegs rnams ma lus bsreg mdzad
391a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes 'od kyis nyon mongs bsreg/ mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan/ /nyes pa'i skyon rnams tshangs par mdzod/ /thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bden pa'i tshig gi mi bslu ba/ /'jig rten skyong rnams kun gyi gtso//
391a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par gyur pa'i dag ldan pa/ /rnam 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas zhi la til dang mar/ /dUrba me tog dkar pos bsreg /rgyas la 'bru gzhan me tog ser/ /mngar ba'i rdzas la rnam par sbags/ /dbang dang 'bru dang me tog dmar/ /lan tshwar
391a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bsreg par bya/ /drag po yungs nag ske tshe dang/ /me tog nag po khrag bcas bsreg/ zhi la shAn ting oM swAhA/ dbang la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bcas la wa shar ldan/ /drag po hUM phaT mA ra ya/ /sngar bstan me yi sngags nyid la/ /rnam par sbyar ba ji srid du/ /mngon par 'dod
391a5(rgyud 'grel): pa de bsregs pas/ /las de nye bar 'grub par byed/ /de nas me lha 'bar ba'i mar/ /bltas te de dbus rang gi lha/ /mngon par brjod pa rim pa yis/ /bskyed pa ye shes gnyis med pa/ /sngon du mchod dang bstod pa yis/ /mnyes bya rang lhag lha sngags kyis//
391a6(rgyud 'grel): yam shing mar dbul rdzas gzhan rnams/ /sngar bstan sngags kyis ji lta bu'o/ /de 'og mchog dang bstod byas te/ /khyad par las kyi sbyin sreg kyang/ /sngar bzhin rang lha'i sngags kyi bya/ /der yang mchod dang bstod pa dang/ /'dod don las kyi gsol
391a7(rgyud 'grel): btab ste/ /gshegs gsol nye bar bsdu ba'o/ /de nas lar yang me dbus su/ /lha gzugs mngon par bltas pa la/ /gong du brjod pa ji lta bar/ /mchod dang sreg dbul rdzogs pa'i mthar/ /gang 'dod la kyis bsgrub gsol te/ /gshegs dang mi dmigs blta
391b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /gang zhig dang brtan the tshom bral/ /rang lhag lha la legs bsnyen pas/ /tshul 'di la ni mngon gzhol ba/ /'dod 'bras yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs/ /sgrub la phan pa mchod ster ba'i/ /cho ga legs bkod bsod nams nges/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba'i//
391b2(rgyud 'grel): bla med go 'phang thob par shog/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi bsgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga /paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dz+nyA na sh+rI dang/ lo tsa ba rab zhis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra di dA ra
391b3(rgyud 'grel): karmA tsa tu sA d+ha ka la sha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i bum pa'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rang lha legs bsnyen pas/ /bum pa'i cho ga zhi sa sogs/ /las bzhi mngon par ?
391b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas/ /las mthun gnas su brtsam par bya/ /zhi la dngul dang rgyas la gser/ /dbang la zangs te drag po lcags/ /yang na khams 'am shing yang rung/ /las mthun ras kyi mgul pa dkri/ /dge ba'i shing ngam gdum pa can/ /las dang mthun pas
391b5(rgyud 'grel): kha brgyan te/ /su ru b+ha ti tsandan dkar/ /dmar dang 'bru sman rin chen lnga/ /rgyun 'bab chus bkang las gsum la'o/ /drag po a kar nag po dang/ /gu gul rgyun bral chu yis dgang/ /rang lha'i bsam gtan ldan pa yis/ /bum par las mthun la bskyed de//
