413b4(rgyud 'grel): du gnas par bsam mo/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi rtse mo la yang gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am bsam par bya'o/ /rab tu bsgrims par bya'i gzhan du na rang gi srog kyang g.yo bar 'gyur na dgra bgegs lta rtsi smos/ zin pa dang las kyi mdza' bsreg pa 'am/
413b5(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa gang yang rung ba bya'o/ /'dir yang man nga ni 'di yin te/ rig sngags gcod pa zhes bya ba'i skabs su skud pa sngon po la sum bsgril byas nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te rdo rje lta bu'i mdud pa 'am/ lcags sgrog gam zhags pa
413b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i mdud pa dor zhing mdud pa re re'i nang du pha rol gyis rbad pa'i mi ma yin pa dang de rbod par byed pa po'i dngos po rnams chud cing rab tu gdams nas sngags bzlas pas de ltar gyur te de mgul du gdags so/ gang gi tshe dgos pa'i tshe ?
413b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dgrol bar bya'o/ /gzhan du bsod nams ma yin pa sogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin rig sngags thams cad gnod par byed pa zhes pa de la yang man ngag gi nad 'di lta bu brtsam par bya'o/ 'khrul 'khor gzhung ltar bris la 'khrul 'khor gyi
414a1(rgyud 'grel): lto bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs lce shin tu che pa bris la/ lce la rtsibs kyi sngags rnams dang/ che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba'i dag rengs par gyis shig gces spel te bri'o/ /de la bsgrub pa byas la ri rab sa nag po la byas pa'i
414a2(rgyud 'grel): stong du rnam par 'joms mdzad kyi sngags shog bu la sogs pa la bris la stsal/ smad du bug pa gru gsum brus la de'i nang 'khrul 'khor bris pa de bcug la mnan par bya'o/ /'di ni sngags kyi nus pa 'am ? gtong nye bar zhi bar byed
414a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste mngon spyod kyi khyad par ro// //yang sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba la 'khrul 'khor spangs la rta nag po'i rnga ma la bshad ba'i srin bu brgyus te phreng ba byas nas gang la bya ba la dmigs te khro
414a4(rgyud 'grel): bas sngags bzlas na/ grong khyer la sogs pa 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur te sngags las su rung na las de dag la the tshom mi za'o/ /mngon spyod kyi 'khrul 'khor ni skrag pa dang rig sngags gcod pa dang rig sngags gnon pa dang
414a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'joms pa dang rig sngags kyi las byed du 'jug pa dang/ rengs par byed pa ste las drug byed pa'o/ /dgra mngon spyod kyi 'khrul 'khor rnam par phye ba'i rim pa rdzogs so// //da ni bgegs kyi mngon spyod kyi
414a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor brtsam par bya ste/ ro ras la sogs pa la 'khrul 'khor gru gsum sum rtseg tu byas la gru rnams la/ oM ts+tshinda mo che ge ts+tshinda b+hinda che ge mo b+hinda mahA kI li ki lA ya che ge mo ma ra la/ phaT ces bri'o/ /dbus su bgegs kyi gdugs pa//
414a7(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya zhes spel la bri'o/ /yang gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa byas la rang nyid chu'i zla ba lta bu'i rnam par 'joms mdzad du sku che la yan lag rags par bsgom mo/ /de nas rab tu bsgrims nas sngags ring po
414b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig bzlas par bya ste/ sngags kyi 'od kyis gang la bya ba'i lus la phog pas rab tu gzir cing mi bzod par bsams te/ dper na lo tog la ser ba bab pa lta bur dmigs shing khros pas bzla'o/ /zin pa dang las kyi zhabs bsreg
414b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mnan pa gang 'dod pa bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni phal char bgegs la bshad kyis 'on kyang rnal 'byor la su rung ba'i sngags pas 'khrul 'khor gcig gis kyang las thams cad la sbyar bar nus so/ /'dis gdon
414b3(rgyud 'grel): rlag bar byed pa dang/ rmugs par byed pa'i las gnyis 'grub po/ /de ltar phrin las bcu bdun no/ /gzhan gyi las 'jig pa ni sdig pa ste de dag par byed pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i khrus dang 'brel phyir 'dir ma smos so//
414b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la ni spel ba'i tshig ni dang so so'i skabs la dang sbyar ro/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i man ngag paN+Di ta smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyis bsgyur ba'o// //
414b5(rgyud 'grel): (rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin chen snang ba sogs pa rnam 'joms kyi bskor bzhugs so//) // * rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na ma d+ha ra Ni ratna du ti maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms
414b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rig log par lta ba 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /ye shes thugs rje nyi ma lta bu yis/ /mi shes sgrib? pa
414b7(rgyud 'grel): ma lus sel mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms la phyag 'tshal nas/ /gti mug dra ba bsal pa dang/ 'dod chags dri ma bkru ba dang/ /zhe sdang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rgyud la brten nas 'di bshad do/ /byams dang snying rje
415a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi/ /theg chen don la rab tu zhugs/ /sngon du bsnyen ba rab rdzogs shing/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rab du brtsams/ /dad dang ldan zhing snying brtser bcas/ /ri bo nags tshal yid 'ong ba'i/ /dben pa'i gnas
415a2(rgyud 'grel): su yongs 'dug ste/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun bsams te/ /rang nyid gtum po'i skur gsal bas/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma shtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM hUM/ phyogs skyong
415a3(rgyud 'grel): dag la gtor ma dag/ rdo rje glu dang bcas pas dbul/ /sdig pa che dang bcas pa'i ma rungs pa/ /sa bdag dag la bka' sgo bskrad byas nas/ /gzur ba sbyang zhing maN+Dal legs byas te/ sa yi lha mo dag la rab tu mchod/ /gser dngul
415a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bum par ni/ /bkra shis brgyad dang snyig po sogs/ /gzhan rnams dri zhim chus dgang ba'o/ /phyogs bzhir dkar dang mthing dang dmar/ /ljang gu gcing gos gang du bu'o/ /cod ban phur bu bcu rnams dang/ /gtor ma mchod rdzas ? ?//
415a5(rgyud 'grel): yo byad rdzas rnams sogs pa dang/ /thig dang tshon gyi sa las byas te/ /bstan pa'i sngags kyis thig byin rlabs/ /thig gi bya ba rdzogs pa yis/ /bsrung ba'i sngags tshon byin gyis brlab/ /'dab bzhi 'khor lo bcur 'dug
415a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sgo bzhi rta babs bcas pa bri/ /bum pa pad+ma dag la dgod/ /phur ba 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la'o/ /lha rnams dag la gtor ma ste/ /'dod yon bkra shis rdzas dag dgod/ /gru chad mchod pa rdzogs par bshams/ /de ltar
415a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams dgong par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs bgos te/ /ku sha'i steng 'dug shar du blta/ /mchod cing sdig gshegs sogs byas nas/ /tshad med bzhi ldan sems bskyed do/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu sarbba d+harma a(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis sa bon
415b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung pa'i/ /gur dang dra ba'i rnam par bsgom/ /chos 'byung dkar po'i nang du bruM/ /rin chen khang par mdzes par bskyed/ /dbus su pad steng bum pa'i nang/ /zla steng hUM byung rdo rje'i sku/ /mdog dkar rdo rje dril bu can/ /thugs kar zla steng rdo rje hUM/ /shar du pad
415b2(rgyud 'grel): steng bum pa'i nang/ /zla steng d+hI(rgyud 'grel): 'byung sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog dkar bum pa rdo rjes mtshan/ /thugs kar zla stong d+hI(rgyud 'grel): yig bsam/ /lho ru pad steng bum pa'i nang/ /traM byung zla steng mA ma kI/ mdog mthung? bum pa rin chen nang/ /thugs kar zla steng sna tshogs traM/
415b3(rgyud 'grel): nub tu pad steng bum pa'i nang/ /zla steng raM byung gos dkar mo/ /mdog dkar bum pa pad+mas mtshan thugs kar zla steng raM yig bsam/ /byang du pad steng bum pa'i nang/ /zla steng traM byung sgrol ma'i sku/ /mdog ljang bum pa sna tshogs mtshan/ /thugs kar zla ba'i/
415b4(rgyud 'grel): steng taM bsam mo/ /rdo rje skyil drung gtso bo ste/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan te/ /mchod dang mtshung pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /yum rnams rnam par bzhengs pa'o/ /'khor lo dag la nyi ma bcu/ /hUM gis sa bon las byung ba'i/ /rnam rgyal dkar po rdo rje bsnams?
415b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje dmar nag be con te/ /rta mgrin dmar po'i pad+mas mtshan/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu'o/ /dbyug ba sngon po sngon po ste/ /don yod zhogs pa mthing kha'o/ /khro gnyer can ni dmar nag ste/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ljang gu'o/ /steng phyogs mthing kha chen po ste/ /'og ni
415b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mdog can no/ /phyag na phur bu so so ste/ /stag dang sbrul dang me dpung nang/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs nas/ /ye shes spyan drang mchod nas bstim/ /de nas dbang bskur zhi bsgom mo/ /de'i rtsa ba'i sngags ni/ /oM sarbba bi d+ha badzra badzra?
415b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ gtso bo'i sngags so/ /spho Ta badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ hUM d+hI(rgyud 'grel): traM raM taM zhes bya ba'o/ /lan dang lan gyi tshul du mched/ /de nas las kyi sgrub pa ni/ /oM na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma shtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ya/
416a1(rgyud 'grel): mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tadya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ sphu Ta sphu Ta/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na pa ya g+hUr+N+Na pa ya/ sarba satwa ni/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ saM b+h+ra ma ya/ saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba bud+d+ha ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ saM
416a2(rgyud 'grel): ku Ta ya saM ku Ta ya/ sarba sha truM/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ saM g+ha Ta ya saM g+ha Ta ya/ a TTa ha si nA la badzra su badzra ya swA hA/ hUM d+hI(rgyud 'grel): traM raM taM hUM phaT swA hA/ spro dang bsdu bas gtso bo zhu/ gtso bos 'khor dang de bzhin no/ /gtso bo'i bdud rtsi chu nang du/ /rnam shes
416a3(rgyud 'grel): shar du nyi steng hUM/ /bdag nyid gtum po bsam byas nas/ /sku gsung skye mched byin brlabs bya/ /ma tis+thir badzra hUM/ su tis+thir badzra oM/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra A(rgyud 'grel): gung mo thal sgyar rdo rje ste/ /sor mo bsnol ba 'khor lo
416a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /mdzub mo rtsi sbyar pad+ma yis/ /lan gsum bcings nas gsang sngags gsum/ /zla steng rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ /pad+ma sku gsung thugs la'o/ /skye mched zla steng rdo rje ni/ /so so dag la bsam par bya'o/ /mahA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha
416a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra/ e hye hi badzra/ shI g+h+raM badzrA ya swA hA/ de nas phyogs bskyong bcu rnams dgug/ khro bo bcu yi phur bus gdab/ he phu lu ni ru phu lu gri ha ku lu mi li tsu lu ku ru ku lu badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ pra mo Ta Na pra mo Ta Na ye kI li kI lA ya ??
416a6(rgyud 'grel): tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra mA ra ya kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha na ha na/ tsu ru tsu ru ma hA kro d+ha tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ band+ha band+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha kI lI ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra badzra b+ha ra ya
416a7(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra pra b+hany+dza nA ya/ trA sa ma trA sa ya badzra kI li kI la ya swA hA/ /brgya 'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ /go rim bzhin du phyogs rnams bcing/ /slob dpon chos gos yongs byon
416b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdo rje dril bu rab thogs nas/ /gzhan dag mchod rdzas thogs byas te/ /kha zas dri zhim sman dang ni/ /bkra shis rdzas thogs slob ma dag/ bskor zhing glu 'di blang bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra NAM/ sarba ba le A barta ya/ mahA ba le/ ka ta be/
416b2(rgyud 'grel): ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Da la mA ye swA hA/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba le bi ga ra Na ra Na a dzi te dzwa la dzwa la/ ti Ti ti Ti bing ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ band+ha band+ha/ mahA ba le/ badzra kro d+ha dzwa lA ya swA hA zhes pas blangs zhing bskor bar bya'o
416b3(rgyud 'grel): grub? pa chud mi za bar bya'o/ /bkra shis ston mo bza' bar bya/ /slob ma'i 'dod pa sgrub pa'i phyir/ /gtsang gos ser po rgyan btags nas/ /ku sha'i steng du legs 'dug ste/ /'khor lo'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /gang dag yid dag sems dang ba'i
416b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig bshags sems bskyed sdom pa sbyin spyi bor gtso bo mgrin par bdag/ thugs kar yum ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas bstim nas khrus gsol bya/ /bdag nyid khro bo'i thugs ka nas/ /lha mo'i glu dang bcas pas bkru/ /spyi bor
416b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po bsam par bya/ /brtan par bya phyir sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM ma ti s+thi ra badzra/ su tis+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ badzra kA ya A barta ya swA hA/ mchod pa dag gis yang dag mchod/ /de nas gzung ste lha yi sku/ /rtag tu bral bar
416b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o/ /lus kyi las dag bya ba ni/ /mi dge bcu dag mi bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs nas gtor ma btang/ /sbyang spel sbar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang mgron rnams mchod/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra NAM/ sarbba ba le A barta ya/ ma hA
416b7(rgyud 'grel): ba le/ ka ta ba/ ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Dal mA le/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa'o/ /a ti badzra mahA ba le bi ga ra Na a dzi ti dzwa la dzwa la/ ti Ti ti Ti pa ga le/ da ha da ha te dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ band+ha band+ha/ ma hA ba le/ badzra
417a1(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha dzwa la ye swA hA/ bar du gcod pa sel ba'i khro bo bcu mchod pa'o/ /ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ phyogs skyong mchod pa'o/ /pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA/ oM a kA re mu khaM zhes bya bas 'byung po thams
417a2(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i mchod pa'o/ /de ltar mchod nas bstod pa ni/ /bde gshegs dri med khro bo'i sku/ /skyon gyi ma gos sku mdog dkar/ /rdo rje dril bu mi g.yo brtan/ /rnam par 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum
417a3(rgyud 'grel): skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar/ /sems can bde la sbyar mdzad pa'i/ /spel ba'i rdo rje ma la bstod/ /yon tan thams cad bskyed pa'i yum/ /mi 'gyur rin chen be DUr mdog /sems can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa'i/ /sku yi rdo rje ma la
417a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba'i/ /'dod chags dri ma spangs pa'i yum/ /sems can rnams la spro ba mdzad/ /blo ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bya ba thams cad yongs su bsgrub/ /shes rab sgrol ma yum gyi mchog /ljang
417a5(rgyud 'grel): gu'i mdog can 'gying bag can/ /don dang ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo chen po brjod pa'i sku/ /zhe sdang rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /dri za 'dul mdzad rdo rje bsnams/ /rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo chen po bgyid pa'i sku/ nga rgyal
417a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /gshin rje 'joms byed be con bsnams/ /gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku/ /'dod chags rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /chu lha 'dul mdzad pad+ma bsnams/ /rta mchog dpal
417a7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku/ /phrag dog rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /gnod sbyin 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku/ /sngon po'i mdog can dbyug pa sngo/ /me lha gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i
417b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku/ /don yod zhags pa mthing kha'i mdog /rlung lha gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /don yod zhags pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku/ /
417b2(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer can ni dmar nag ste/ /srin po'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i ljang gu'i mdog /'byung po'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje
417b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje hUM sgra sgrogs pa che/ /steng phyogs degs pa 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /mthing ka'i mdog can rab 'jigs pa'i/ /hUM sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stobs chen rab tu gnon mdzad pa'i/
417b4(rgyud 'grel): 'og gis bgegs chen gnon pa'i bdag /nam mkha' i mdog can 'jigs pa'i sku/ /stobs chen gnon la phyag bstod/ /de ltar bstod nas gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste dang po las kyi rim pa'o// //thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/ /bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgoms la/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i stang/ /gtso bo
417b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa steng bzhag ste/ /yang snying nye ba'i snying po bzlas/ /snying po them nas bsgrub pa brtsam/ /dang po sa yi cho ga bya/ /maN+Dal mnga' gang gru bzhi ste/ /pad+ma 'dab bzhi 'khor lo
417b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu/ /so sor rigs dang mthun par bri/ /gser dngul la sogs bum par ni/ /nor bu yungs kar dUrba dang/ /shel dang pad+ma tsan dan dang/ /gser dang rin chen chus dgang bya/ /dri zhim bkang ba'i bum pa bzhi/ /
418a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma bzhi por bzhag par bya/ /'khor lo'i steng du de bzhin te/ /mchod pa'i rdzas dang gtor ma bsham/ /de ltar rdzogs nas ku sha'i steng/ /rgyan dang bcas pa legs 'dug ste/ /mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /oM sarba
418a2(rgyud 'grel): d+harma d+hA tu A(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /yi ge hUM du rab bsams te/ rdo rje'i khang pa rab tu bskyed/ /b+h+ruM las rin chen khang bar ni/ /dag cing gsal ba rgyal dang bcas/ /pi las byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan/ /steng du rin chen bum pa ni/ /zla
418a3(rgyud 'grel): stengs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /sarbba biryA badzra badzra/ spho Ta badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ yang snying zla steng hUM la ste/ /snying po zla steng rdo rje la'o/ /ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma Ta ma Ta badzra/ d+hu ni d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tso pa tso badzra/ d+ha
418a4(rgyud 'grel): ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda badzra/ b+hinda b+hinda badzra hUM hUM/ phyogs bzhi'i bum pa'i rdo rje la/ /yang snying bzhi po go rims bzhin/ /de bzhin khro bo'i bum pa la/ /nyi ma khro bo'i rdo rje la/ /snying po sngags kyi so?

418b1(rgyud 'grel): chad sel ba'i phyir/ /phyogs skyong bcu po bsdu bar bya/ /de ltar byas dang bdag nyid dang/ /slob mas bskor ba bkra shis rdzas/ /mchod rdzas thogs nas bskor ba dang/ /stong pa'i sngags ni brjod pa dang/ /de nas bkra shis ston mo bya/ /bdag gis da ni khrus bya ste/
418b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo dpag mod sbrul nas ni/ /slob ma dag la khrus gsol phyir/ /gsang sngags bstod pas khrus gsol bya 'o ma na(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ sarba ba le A barta ya/ ma hA ba la/ ka ta pa/ ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Dal mA ye/ a ti badzra/ mahA ba le/ bi ga ra Na da Na
418b3(rgyud 'grel): a dzi te dzwa la dzwa la/ ti Ti ti Ti ping+ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dza ba ti/ ti li ti li/ band+ha band+ha mahA kro d+ha dzwa lA ya swA hA/ ma tis+thir badzra/ su ti shthi ra badzra/ pra ti shthi ra badzra/ mahA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shli g+haM badzra ya swA hA d+ha ra d+ha
418b4(rgyud 'grel): ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra ku laM A barta ye swA hA/ zhes khrus byas nas/ gtor ma phul te gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// //gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa

418b6(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa yi/ /bum pa lnga po pad steng dgram/ /las kyi bum pa shar du ste/ /gtso bo'i snying po rdzas kyis dgang/ /gzhan dag dri zhim chus dgang ngo/ /mchod dang gtor ma zhal zas bsham/ /ku sha'i steng du legs 'dug ste/ /byang chub mdzad? tu
418b7(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed do/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bskyed nas/ /spyan dang byin rlabs rdzogs pa yis/ /mdun du maN+Dal rin chen gnas/ /pad+ma 'dab bzhir bcas pa yi/ /steng du bum pa lnga bskyed nas/ /nang du ?
419a1(rgyud 'grel): stengs sa bon ni/ /hUM d+hI(rgyud 'grel): traM raM taM ngo/ /na ma shtsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hUM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ pand+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM phaT/ bum pa bzhi la so so ste/ /de ltar bskyed nas sangs rgyas bstim/ /bsgrub pa'i rig sngags 'di bzlas
419a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ /na ma shtsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM hUM phaT/ mchod dang mchod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi chu'i rang bzhin bsam/ /las kyi bum pa byin gyis brlabs/ /bum na zla steng bdud rtsi 'khyil//
419a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po grang du bsnol ba'i phyag/ shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed par bya/ /oM tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM phaT/ ces pas bgegs bskrad bskor bar bya/ /bkra shis gsol nas khrus bya'o/ /gtor ma'i
419a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rdzogs pa yis/ /dam tshig bsdus nas gshegs su gsol/ /rig pa las dag gtad pa'i phyir/ /gang dag yig dge sems dang pas/ /dkyil 'khor la ni 'jug pa'i phyir/ /lus ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ma tis+thi ra badzra/
419a5(rgyud 'grel): su ti s+thi ra badzra/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ mahA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hye hi badzra/ shI g+h+raM badzra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i steng/ /'dug sde phreng ba dor bar bya'o/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ hUM pU dza ho zhes bya bas
419a6(rgyud 'grel): dong bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje phyag byang du bcug la/ rdo rje'i glu dang bcas pas bskor bar bya ste/ gong du yang de bzhin no/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa kye/ /gtso bo 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol/ /mi shes mun gyis bsgribs pa la/ /dkyil 'khor
419a7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bstan du gsol/ /lam chen 'di ni bstan par bya/ /khyod ni lam 'di bsgrub par gyis/ /lam mchog sgrub par rab tu dka' / /nyes pa dag gis ma gos par/ /'bras bu myur du 'byin par phyed/ /dam tshig 'das nas dmyal bar ltung//
419b1(rgyud 'grel): na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya na ra kan hUM/ mi shes mun gyis bsgribs pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan par bya/ /maN+Dal la phaT/ badzra shis rdzas kyi mchod pa bya/ /de nas lha mos khrus gsol nas/ /'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas ni/ /slob ma lha
419b2(rgyud 'grel): yi skur bskyed la/ /mchod pa bdag gis yang dag mchod/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sku yi mchog /sku dang yongs su rgyas pa'i sku/ /sku mchog 'di ni khyod kyis zung/ /lus kyi ming dge spang bar bya'o/ /sarba ta thA ga ta su tis+this badzra oM/ de nas mchod
419b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dbul bar bya'o/ /dus gsum gshegs pa thugs kyi mchog /thugs dang phyin las ldan pa'i thugs/ /ye shes 'di ni khyod kyis bzung/ /yid kyi las dag mi bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ma ti s+thi badzra hUM/ mi 'brel gzungs kyi bdag nyid che//
419b4(rgyud 'grel): mu tig rin chen phreng ba 'di/ /sku dang ye shes mi 'bral ba'i/ /ngag gi nyes spong phreng ba gzung/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pra ti s+thi badzra A(rgyud 'grel): de nas bkra shis brgyad dang rgyal mtshan dang/ /gdugs kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la
419b5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa 'di lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /yon tan rgyas pa sku mdog gser dang mtshungs/ /shes rab rtags su po ti ral gri bsams/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir
419b6(rgyud 'grel): bde legs shog /thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od/ /ma chags skyon gyis ma gos phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /chos nyid ma
419b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rtags su sku mdog mthing nag ste/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med rtags su rdo rje 'dzin/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /de nas gtor ma gtang nas yas sems
420a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdun du yi ge brgya pa brjod de gshegs su gsol/ /dad pas bla ma bzang btsal des/ /dam pa'i drin gyis yang dag thob/ /dge ba gang gis ye shes 'di/ /'dir bzhugs rnams yis thog par shog /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil
420a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sa ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i bla ma de ba pur+Na ma hi dang/ /lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
420a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra d+ha karma mA ra ya sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje khro bos gsang ba'i las shes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /mi 'gyur dbyer med ?
420a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan/ /drag po de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /gdug pa ma lus zhi mdzad pa'i/ /drag po'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su maN+Dal me tog dang bcas pa sngon po'i steng du mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa bzhag la/ mchod
420a5(rgyud 'grel): cing skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom pa ni/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas sa bon hUM las byung ba'i baM las pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa bskyed la/ de'i dbus su lag na rdo rje rnam par 'don? ?
420a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na be con bsnams pa/ g.yon rdo rje thogs pa/ zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa bsgoms te/ de'i thugs ga nas hUM las 'od 'phros nas klu'i rgyan cha bcing pa ni/ oM tsi la? tsi la?
420a7(rgyud 'grel): phu ru phu ru phu ru/ phu phu phu zhes pas klu'i rgyan cha bcing bar bya'o/ /des ni rgyal rigs kyis ni dbu la/ chu lhas ni mgul du/ gzi can se ral khar na tris pa'o/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la/ /b+hu na b+hu na b+hu na/ band+ha band+ha band+ha/ nI laM nI laM nI laM/ badzra d+ha ra
420b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa sku khro bo 'chol ba'i me dpung dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /oM ki ti ki ti ki ti ni/ /sarba b+hU ta ni/ badzra ma li/ badzra d+ha ra/ badzra aTTa hA sa/ tsartu martu/ ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ hu 'uM hu 'uM hu 'uM/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsand+ha
420b2(rgyud 'grel): tsand+ha tsand+ha/ mahA tsaN+Da hu ru tu hu ru tu/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ grih+Na grih+Na/ badzra pA Ni ha na ha na mAM sarba sha trUM murna ha da la phaT/ ku tu ku tu ku tu ku tu/ 'dis ni bar du gced ba sel cing/ dam tshig gi sku gzi byin dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs
420b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa'i yum sangs rgyas spyan no/ /traM las bskyed pa'i mA ma kI'o/ /raM las bskyed pa'i gos dkar mo/ taM las bskyed pa'i sgrol ma rnams bskyed do/ /de nas spyan drang zhing gnyis su med par bstim
420b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni/ tadya thA/ oM mo ha ni mo ha ni/ na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA ba te ye/ tadya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa ma tI d+hi de ni/ ma A barta i sh+yA mi/ e hya badzra ku ti li/ ko ti pa la ka ku la/ shi kho gi ba la ke
420b5(rgyud 'grel): shi/ ti Da? tsi ti tsi ti/ mahA ni/ ka rga ti mu ta ba ti badzre/ mahA be du dul lo le bu gu gu/ su mu su mu/ sa ra sa ra/ swAhA sya hA/ u to ti bi ga le tsi te/ bi dza di dza la sing ga le/ sarbA de bA ga Na pra ha ra/ na ma ya sid+d+hi yi ge/ ?
420b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra gri ne/ badzra d+hi d+ha sa pra ha ra Ne/ ratna tra yA d+hi ga la bud+d+he/ badzra be sha sa ni ka /a pra ti ha ta pra ma ta ni swA hA/ khro bo me ltar 'bar bas rdo rje'i klus mchod cing gsol ba btab pa'o/ /tadya thA/ oM mu ne ma ne mahA mu na/ tadya thA/
420b7(rgyud 'grel): dza ye dza ye/ mahA dza ya ba ti ye/ khu da d+he a bi shi te/ d+harma ma a bA b+ha saM ni bu d+d+ha i d+ha i d+ha ga mye/ dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swA hA/ dbang bskur zhing spyi bo na bcom ldan 'das bsam zhing bsgom mo/ /snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM tsaN+Da badzra d+ha ? ya hu lu hu lu/ ti?? 
421a1(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hu 'uM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po ni/ na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ /oM d+hi(rgyud 'grel): aM/ oM traM aM/ oM raM aM/ oM taM aM swAhA/ sgrub pa'i snying po 'di las dang 'brel
421a2(rgyud 'grel): te 'di'o/ /oM mahA kro d+ha mahA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+hwaM sa ya/ dza ti ba laM bo d+ha rA ya/ u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hu luM phaT/ klu'i gzugs byas te tshon sna lngas bcings la/ khaM sa'i ga 'ur bcug la zhungs kar la bsngags la gdab po/ /dgug cing mnan
421a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM sarbba at+ma dza/ mahA de tsa badzra aM ku sha ni/ badzra pra sha a nu pra bi sha sarbba duSh+TaM staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya hu 'uM phaT/ mtshon gyis gtub pa ni/ badzra kro d+ha badzra kArta ri ka rak ra/ tshind+ha tshind+ha hu 'uM phaT/ bsreg pa ni/ oM badzra
421a4(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha mahA ba la dzwa la dzwa la pra dzwa la pra dzwa la/ d+hi pya ya di pya ya/ hu 'uM phaT/ dbye ba ni oM badzra kro b+ha mahA ba la/ ta da ta da/ tad ya/ tadya thA hu 'uM phaT zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas gtor ma btang ba ni/ spyod lam gyis gnas
421a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /ma lus gdug ba'i dug sel ba'i/ /dam ba la brten 'di brtsams pas/ /nyon mongs dug gis zin pa rnams/ /grol nas bde dang ldan gyur shog /rdo rje khro bos gsang ba'i phrin las slob dpon chen po sa
421a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgyag gar skad du/ nI lAM bar badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ro Sha sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ phyag na
421a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gos sngon bo can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yon brkyang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnams shing klu rnams 'dul rgyan ldan khro bo'i rgyal la 'dud
421b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rtog brgyud la brten nas bri/ /snying rtse shes rab dad? dang ldan/ /dbang dang rjes gnang sgrub pa bos/ /gnas khang me tog bcas bkram nas/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /rje btsun la sogs spyan drangs nas/ mchod cing sdig bshags
421b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bya/ /oM shU N+ya tA dz+nyA nas badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas rang sems hUM du bsam/ /'od 'phros gyur dang sa gzhir bsam/ /de nas bruM las gzhal yas ni/ /rdo rje sngon po lte bar bcas/ /glu bzhi sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan/ /hUM las rdo rje sku
421b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do/ /brkyang bskum ljang nag rdo rje g.yas/ /sprul dang stags lpags bsdigs pa g.yon/ /khro bo'i zhal mdog thugs ni hUM/ /de las khro bo bzhi po 'phros/ /khams gsum rgyal dang shin tu khros/ /rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sgo bzhi
421b4(rgyud 'grel): dag tu bsam par bya/ /sku mdog ljang nag phur bu bsnams/ /zla ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /ye shes la sogs spyan drangs bstims/ /sku gsung byin brlabs gnas drug bsrung/ /oM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ bradz+nyA
421b5(rgyud 'grel): ta kri ta kI li kI lA ya hUM phaT/ tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya phaT/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya phaT/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da a mo g+ha kI li kI lA ya phaT ces bzlas par bya'o/ /gtor ma ni oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo/ /rtsa pa'i
421b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i byin brlabs phan pa chen po thob/ /'bras bu nye ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'di/ /bdag gis 'thungs nas gzhan phyir brtsams/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas bas/ /bdag dang
421b7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /bar chad thams cad rab zhi ste/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar shog /phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs o rgyan gyi slob dpon a mo pa na d+ha zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ?
422a1(rgyud 'grel): pur+Na ma ti dang/ lo tsa ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ hom baM b+hi/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi g.yog tum po'i gzugs su snang//
422a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bskyab la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rnal 'byor pa la phan bya'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg rim par bshad par bya/ /bkra shis gnas su sa brtag sogs/ /phyag na rdo rjes byin brlabs bya/ thab ni zlum po khru gang tshad/ /dbus su rdo rje sngon
422a3(rgyud 'grel): pos mtshan/ /bud shing khru gang yam shing ni/ /mdzub gang mdog dkar lo 'dab rgyas/ /dkar gsum la sogs mchod rdzas bsag /dri zhim chu dang me tog bcas/ /dgang blugs tshang dbyibs rgyu rnams mthun/ /rgyan la sogs pa
422a4(rgyud 'grel): bgos byas nas/ /lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /me lha bskyed nas mchod pa dang/ /de rjes thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor mchod/ /rjes la phyogs skyong mchod par bya/ /thams cad rtsa sngags kyis mchod/ /gtor ma'i mgon rnams tshim par bya/ /
422a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sbyin sreg rim brtsams pas/ /las dang nyon mongs dag gyur nas/ /dam pa'i dam pa nyer thob cing/ /'bras bu sku gsum thob par shog /slob dpon chen po bram ze par ma tis mdzad pa 'phags pa rnam par 'joms
422a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyin sreg rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta da pa pur+Na ma ti dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos sbyar pa'o// //
422a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra bo dE ra rgA ma d+hA ra Ni tsaN+Da ma hA bo Sha Na sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gtum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
422b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /gdug pa can rnams 'joms pa yi/ /shin tu khro zhing 'jigs pa'i sku/ /rnam par 'joms la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud don la brten nas/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di
422b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya/ re zhig yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su/ /stan bde ba la 'dug ste /byams pa dang ldan pa'i khrus byas nas/ dur khrod kyi sa la sogs dkyil 'khor gang gru bzhi pa byas te/ dbus su gru gsum brtsegs
422b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /tha ma rdo rje rgya gram dang/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i gru chod bzhi dang/ sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa/ /rdo rje me ri dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de ltar bris nas phur bu bco lnga dgod do/ /phyogs skyong la gtor
422b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang lha bshos bzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs nas bsgom pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas/ de nas oM swa b+hA ba shu d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmma ni hUM/ de'i rjes la rang nyid sa bon hUM gi rnam par gnas
422b5(rgyud 'grel): te /'od zer gyis rdo rje ra ba me ri dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bruM las dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bskyed nas/ dbus su nyi ma zla pa'i gdan no/ /rgya gram bzhi dang 'khor lo rtsib bcu la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
422b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu bsam nas/ bdag nyid nyi zla'i steng du bsam te/ yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje/ de las 'od 'phros sems can spangs/ sangs rgyas thams cad rdo rje de nyid la thim pas/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa mthing nag tu 'dug pa /
422b7(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'khyil pa/ chu lha dkar mo mgul du bcings pa/ gzi brjid can nag po se ral khang bcings pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ stod g.yogs sngon po/ smad stag gi sham thabs bcings pa /
423a1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma shtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha saM nA pa ta ye/ hUM bcu las 'khor lo brdu'i steng du khro bo bcu dang/ hUM bzhi las rdo rje rgya gar nyid gyi steng du khro bo bzhi'i
423a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bzhi na khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /zhe sdang zhi zhing brjid pa'i sku mdog dkar po'o/ /lho'i rdo rje be con ni rtog pa thams cad gzhig pa'i sku nga rgyal zhi ba'i bdag nyid dmar nag go /nub kyi rdo rje brtan pa ni 'dod chags
423a3(rgyud 'grel): dri ma spangs pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje don yod brtan pa phrag dog 'joms pa ljang khu'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /sarbba bidy'badzra badzra/ spho Ta badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma
423a4(rgyud 'grel): tha badzra badzra/ aTTa hA sa nI la badzra su badzra ya swA hA/ ('khor lo'i rtsigs bcu la khro bo chen po bcu ni) khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dkar po'o/ /gshin rje gshed ni dmar nag ste/ /rta mgrin dmar po rta mgo ljang gu can/ bdud rtsi 'khyil
423a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ljang gu'o/ /sgo bzhir ro/ /ri phyug pa sngon po la sogs pa tshams su'o/ /de ltar steng 'og gnyis te/ khro bo bcu ni stag sham can/ sbrul gyis brgyan cing thams cad phur bu bsnams pa
423a6(rgyud 'grel): ? brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar dam tshig rdzogs nas spyan drangs pa dang/ mchod ba dang bstim pa byas nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa byas la thugs phyag
423a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang bcas pas skye mched byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur zhing gtso bos mtshan par bya'o/ /de nas bsgoms pas skyon bsnyen pa dang/ sgrub pa'i bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas lha mo'i glus gtor ma nye bar phul te /
423b1(rgyud 'grel): skyod pas gnas par bya'o/ /las bya bar 'dod pas rabs chad nag po'i rus pa'i phye ma dang/ yungs kar dang/ ska tshe dang/ shangs tshe dang/ /ti nag po dag gis thod par ni dug chu dag gis gdab par bya'o/ /tadya thA/ oM tra Ta
423b2(rgyud 'grel): tra Ta /tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ sphu Ta sphu Ta/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ g+hur+N+Na g+hur+N+Na/ /g+hur+N+Na pa ya g+hur+N+Na pa ya/ sarbba satwa ni/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+ha ma b+ha ma/ saM b+ha ma saM b+ha ma ya /sarba bud d+ha ni/
423b3(rgyud 'grel): ku Ta ku Ta/ saM ku Ta ya/ saM ku Ta ya/ sarba sha truM nA na/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ saM g+ha Ta ya saM g+ha Ta ya/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye gdab/ oM sarbba bidyA badzra badzra/ spho Ta badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/
423b4(rgyud 'grel): ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aTTa ha sa ni ya badzra su badzra ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo chen po bcu'i phung pas gdab par bya'o/ /he phu lu ni ru phu lu grih+Na ku ru mi li tsu lu ku lu ku lu badzra bi dza ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ /ka Ta
423b5(rgyud 'grel): ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na pra me Ta nA ya/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tshinda tshinda mahA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ b+hinda b+hinda mahA
423b6(rgyud 'grel): kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ band+ha band+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha ra ha badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra
423b7(rgyud 'grel): ha ra badzra bra b+hany+dzanA ya trA sa ya trA ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ de nas gtor ma byas nas dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas drag po'i sbyin sreg ni/ gru gsum khru gad pa la sum rtseg tu bya'o/ /dur khrod kyi sol
424a1(rgyud 'grel): bas byugs la/ dbus su rdo rje nag po bri bar bya'o/ /rus pa'i phye ma dang/ yungs kar dang/ yungs nag dang/ ske tshe dang/ shangs tshe la sogs gong du bstan pa'i rdzas ni sreg rdzas
424a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ /de nas pad nyi khro bo gtum po 'khrugs pa'i skur bsgom mo/ /mdun du me thab nag po'i nang du /'khor lo'i steng du lha bco lnga po so sor me dpung dang bcas pa bskyed la/ thugs
424a3(rgyud 'grel): kar raM bsam la reg par bya ba ni/ mA ra ya dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ myos su gzhug pa dang/ sprul pa'i khro bos byas la sngags 'dis
424a4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg go /na mo ratna tra yA ya na sa saM ga ta ya'i bar dang/ sarbba sha trUM hUM/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT ces pas sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o/ /yang snying sngags la mA ra ya btags pas bsreg par
424a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sngags kyis yungs kar la sogs pa sreg par bya'o/ /yang snying gis ni bye ma rnams kyis gdab par bya'o/ /yam shing gis gdug pa'i shing la bya ste/ khro bo'i sngags
424a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsreg bar bya'o/ /de ltar phul nas gtor ma gtang ste/ thal bas mnan par bya'o/ /de ltar sbyin sreg rdzogs nas mnan par bya'o/ /nag po'i thod par che ge mo'i gzugs gcer bu/ dbyangs yig dang
424a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed phyin ci log gi gnas brgyad du brgyad kyis bskor ba'i gzugs/ mi gtsang ba'i skud las byad du bcug la thod pa phur bu go /phur bu bcus gdab par bya'o/ /thun la sogs pas gdab par bya'o//
424b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byas nas mchod rten kun nas bzlas pa 'am/ khru gsum gang yang rung ba sum rtseg byas la/ 'og rnams la rdo rje gsum bri bar bya'o/ /bum ba'i nang du sangs rgyas gagngA klung gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang/
424b2(rgyud 'grel): yang snying 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la bris pa gzhug go /rab tu gnas pa'i bya ba'i phyir sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog mthing nag/ sbrul gsum gyi brgyan cing rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/
424b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu khro ba zhig bsgoms la/ thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsgoms la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas la bsgom pa ni/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM zhes 'bum
424b4(rgyud 'grel): mam sa ya bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs nas rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ maN+Da la sngon po me tog gcal du bkram ste/ bu dza ci 'byor pa yang bshams la/ sku'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa brten nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /
424b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdzogs nas mchod rten hUM nag po las rdo rje rgya gram gyi steng du mchod rten 'khor lo sum rtsegs pa'i rnam pa can bskyed la/ 'khor lo dang po la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la khro bo bzhi dang bcas pa/ bar du hUM
424b6(rgyud 'grel): kar la phyogs kyi khro bo bzhi ste/ 'og gi stobs po che la mtshams kyi khro bo bzhi ste/ lha bco lnga'i rnam par bsams mo/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje gtum por bsams la/ des ye shes sems dpa' 
424b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te bstim ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /'khor lo rtsibs rnams las de bsgoms nas/ sku'i gsang sngags phrin las bzhi dang/ de las sna tshogs te sprul pa'i
425a1(rgyud 'grel): las bya'o/ /thugs kyi sngags ni sku gdung byin gyis brlabs pa'i ched du bzlas so/ /gsung gi sngags kyis ni bdag nyid do/ /de ltar dang po gsang
425a2(rgyud 'grel): mnan bzlog pa'i las bya'o/ /thod pa dang bcas pa mnan cing bskor bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i gdams ngag la brten nas/ /rgyud don zab mo lam 'di sbyar/ /nyes pa khyed la
425a3(rgyud 'grel): bzod par 'bul/ /'di brtsams sems can bde thob shog /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i sa ba ri pas
425a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong
425a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //sarba mang+ga la/ //bkra shis// //
